location.name: Brontynn Marshad's Cottage
location.description: Brontynn Marshad's cottage is here, along with a locked chest. The man himself is nowhere to be found, however.

location.name: Swamp Temple
location.description: Without lockpick skill or the Carved Key (Swamp Temple) you cannot even leave the drop room. The Carved Key (Swamp Temple) can be found in a bunker not far from the dungeon at 23.8S, 49.6E. The doors have a lockpick resistance of 355.
location.monsters: Mosswart Feeder, Barker Mosswart, Mudlurk Mosswart, Mosswart Shaman, Mosswart Chief, Limestone Golem, Sandstome Golem, Zombie, Lich, Se Sclavus, Aste Sclavus, Essa Sclavus

location.name: Gelidite Library
location.description:
Quest(s): Gelidite Library.
This library houses many books, although it has now fallen into disrepair and suffers from a raging fire.
NPCs:
Kai Mallan
This dungeon contains the two books Linaural Urilaentai and Miadun hu Okardunai.
location.monsters: Flamma, Shiver

location.name: Wedding Trials Dungeon
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
The dungeons is initially split up into two routes, so that those who intend to get married are required to work together to continue. You will pass through 3 stages that each have a Knath creature that drop one of the three symbols required to form the Symbol of Marriage.
Symbol Of Friendship Symbol Of Honor Symbol Of Love

What secrets might they be hiding?

location.name: Tai Wo
location.description:
Quest(s): Thorsten Cragstone's Armor and Axe.
Tai Wo tells you, "Have you been sent by Brontynn Marshad or by Glysander Cartoth in Cragstone? No, I see you have not. Go see Glysander Cartoth in Cragstone and he will tell you what he needs done."

location.name: Lia Tze
location.description:
Quest(s): Thorsten Cragstone's Armor and Axe.
Lia Tze tells you, "Have you been sent by Brontynn Marshad, who is helping Glysander Cartoth in Cragstone? No, I think you have not. Go see Glysander Cartoth in Cragstone and he will tell you what he needs done."

location.description:
A direlands fort inhabited by Tumeroks.
A Tumerok Officer inside is known to drop a Tumerok Officer's Key.

location.name: Yu Vuo-Ki
location.description:
Quest(s): Dryreach Rescue / Dansha-Ki's Rescue.
Yu Vuo-Ki tells you, Can you help me? My sister went south headed towards Dryreach for some much needed supplies. She has not returned and I fear the Tumeroks may have captured her again. Kind soul, can you help find her for me? I'm really worried for her safety.
Yu Vuo-Ki tells you, However, I can't just send anyone to rescue her. Bring me an insignia from a Tumerok to prove your strength. Then I'll trust you in saving my sister.

location.name: Igloo
location.description: A snowman can be found occupying this frigid igloo.

location.name: Small Cottage
location.description:
A small, snow covered cottage sits alone in the Linvak Mountains.
It appears to be occupied by a rather unfriendly Bronze Armoredillo.

location.name: A Mosswart Ruin
location.description: This ruined temple has been overtaken by a small, but deadly, band of Mosswarts.

location.name: Stranger in Town
location.description:
Quest(s): Elysa's Favor.
The Stranger in Town is a bandit employed by Martine to send adventurers to the Darkened Halls where they will be captured by Martine's Hollow Minions and have their skins used to make Simulacrums
Stranger in Town tells you, "Greetings, my friend, greetings! Welcome to my humble home. The hurly-burly of Marae Lassel proved too much for me, so I've decided to move here and call Yaraq home. Blend in. Make some friends among the peaceful townsfolk. In fact, I've made a good friend over in the Darkened Halls. He's recently moved here too. Why don't you pay him a visit as well? I'm sure he'd be happy to meet you and make you feel right at home."

location.name: Olthoi Horde Nest
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Weapons.
A dungeon filled with Olthoi Workers and Soldiers.
Two Sturdy Iron Chests can be found within its depths.
location.monsters: Olthoi Eviscerator, Noble, Soldier, Worker

location.name: Arcanum Research Facility
location.description:
Quest(s): Isparian Weapons, Shadowfire Weapons.
Empty Enchanted Decanters are found here - these are used in several quests.

location.name: Fathomless Chasm
location.description:
Quest(s): Isparian Weapons.
This dungeon grants access to the five, level-restricted Fathomless Chasm dungeon portals.
There are no enemies in this part of the dungeon.

location.restrictions: Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Complete the Gelidite Library Quest by saving Nuhmudira.
location.name: Arcanum Storehouse
location.description:
Quest(s): Nuhmudira's Boon.
This dungeon provides access to the three levels of the storehouse via portals:
Arcanum Storehouse Lower Level Arcanum Storehouse Middle Level Arcanum Storehouse Upper Level
NPCs:
Balthazar, Royal Guardian Isabelle, Royal Guardian Guen, Royal Guardian Etienne, Royal Guardian
This storehouse is protected by a member of the Queen's Royal Guard. He will not let you enter if you chose to condem the tortured Nuhmudira.

location.name: Arwic to Defiant Prey Cottages Portal
Arwic to Jeweled Thorn Estates Portal
Arwic to Secluded Valley Cottages Portal
Crater to North Pass Hollow Cottages Portal
Crater to Shaky Ledge Cottages Portal
Mayoi to Shield of Valor Cottages
Samsur to Stone Face Oasis Villas
Tou-Tou to Dame Tolani Villas Portal
Uziz to Morntide Ascent Cottages Portal
Mannikin Foundry Portal
location.description:
A dungeon in the pedasteal of a bronze statue.
* Destination: Nanto

location.name: Emissary of Asheron (Eastham)
location.description: Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Greetings, Asheron, my lord and creator, has asked me to invite all humans to his home. He wishes to thank you all for your help in freeing him from the horrible Falatacot who imprisoned him on Bur. You can take this portal to get to his island."

location.name: Mammet Foundry Portal
location.description:
This dungeon can be found in the base of the bronze statues.
* Destination: Baishi

location.name: Arcanum Researcher (Cragstone)
location.description:
Arcanum Researcher tells you, "I have the latest reports from the Arcanum with me. Asheron stopped by the Arcanum workshops and gifted the Tinkers with knowledge of Yalaini transmutation magic. Using their new insights, the Tinkers have found the way to penetrate the Foundries from which these statues have come. If you seek out the Arcanum Tinker in the Consortium near Xarabydun, he will be able to tell you more!"
Arcanum Researcher tells you, "Meanwhile, I will still deliver the same rewards for any trophies that you might find on the statues menacing our towns. I will give additional rewards for any interesting items found within the Foundries, for I am sure the Arcanum would be interested in studying them further."

location.name: Coron Usgin
location.description:
Quest(s): Horn of Vigilance.
Coron Usgin tells you, "Hello harried traveler. Is thy residence threatened by Olthoi or other vermin? Then thou art in need of the Horn of Vigilance! I have been commissioned by the famed Isparian Researcher Telk the Addlepated to sell instructions for this device that he has spent decades developing. The merest breath of wind blowing through this instrument produces a sound which is not discernible by human ears, yet repels all manner of vermin! It also makes an exquisite decoration for any residence!"
Coron Usgin tells you, "Such a fine instrument could easily be sold for 999,999,999 Pyreals, however I will provide you with everything you need to craft it for a mere jar of Sunflower Oil! For one single jar of Sunflower Oil I will provide thee with a beautiful, leather bound, instruction book describing the easy to follow crafting steps for making the astounding Horn of Vigilance."
Coron Usgin tells you, "But hark! There is more!"
Coron Usgin tells you, "For no extra fee at all I will give thee an extremely useful carving knife which thou may use to craft this item! This knife alone has a thousand and one uses! It can carve arrowshafts, cut meat and chicken, chop cabbage, filet fish, slice mushrooms and carrots, cut bread and even carve a pumpkin! Is that not extraordinary?!"
Coron Usgin tells you, "Thus, I strongly urge thee to hurry, pick a Sunflower and bring it to Lilly of Glenden Wood. She will make thee some Sunflower Oil which thou should bring back to me. It is just that effortless! One may find Sunflowers in forested areas of North and South Osteth."
Coron Usgin tells you, "When you return I will tell you about other items required. Good hunting!"

location.name: Ciandra, Arcanum Alchemist
location.description:
Quest(s): Harbinger, Repaired Shadow Stone, Shadowfire Stone, Prismatic Shadow Armor, Isparian Weapons.
Ciandra, Arcanum Alchemist tells you, "Welcome to the Arcanum Alchemists Guild! My name is Ciandra, I'm the guild's leading Alchemist."
Ciandra, Arcanum Alchemist tells you, "My research focuses mainly on the Harbinger and the various alchemical oddities that stem from its existence. If you are interested in fighting the Harbinger I have written a guide on the various ways to weaken him. Janier downstairs sells it as well as the Arcanum Vendor, Beldin, in Old Yanshi."
Ciandra, Arcanum Alchemist tells you, "If you want more information on the Harbinger please donate any pyreal you can spare to the Alchemist Guild Retirement Fund."

location.name: Bhab, Arcanum Tinkerer
location.description:
Quest(s): Bronze Statues, Nuhmudira's Boon.
Bhab, Arcanum Tinkerer tells you, "Remember, if you find anything that looks even slightly mechanical down in those Foundries, bring it to me and I'll see if I can make it into a little statue for you."

location.name: Hiro, Arcanum Artificer
location.description:
Quest(s): The Moars, Nuhmudira's Boon.
Hiro, Arcanum Artificer surveys you with the scrutiny of a jeweler appraising a fine gem. Hiro, Arcanum Artificer tells you, "I see that you are an adventurer of sorts. I find most adventurers to be fools. But ... you have helped Nuhmudira. That makes you a noble fool, at least."
Hiro, Arcanum Artificer sighs.
Hiro, Arcanum Artificer tells you, "If you assisted Balthazar and you obtained a necklace or gorget of sorts, then be quick -- hand it to me."
Hiro, Arcanum Artificer tells you, "If you have not, perhaps you had best go see if Balthazar and the High Queen's Royal Guard need your help in getting the job done in Lin. Though I wouldn't put much faith in the woman, or anyone loyal to her. Don't look so surprised -- not everyone follows the High Queen blindly. I think that our recent contact with Asheron is an affront to Nuhmudira."
Hiro, Arcanum Artificer raises an eyebrow and studies you grimly.
Hiro, Arcanum Artificer tells you, "No ... I do not believe the lies that are spread about Nuhmudira. But you are welcome to your own opinion."

location.name: MacNiall the Unruled
location.description:
Quest(s): Bandit Hilt.
MacNiall will accept Idol Gems in exchange for a letter to his cousin MacDugal at Bandit Castle. Use this letter to complete the Bandit Hilt quest.
MacNiall the Unruled says, "Bloody Pwyll-worshipping lackeys..." MacNiall the Unruled says, "Don't believe what the townies on the other island tell ye, the bunch of bleating sheep that they are... Hrm. It's been a while since I seen a sheep."
MacNiall the Unruled tells you, "Arrr, and welcome to MacNiall's Freehold. Have ye seen them funny statue things the Mosswarts like to worship? I thinks their eyes is kinda pretty. Bring me one, and I'll see what I can do to reward ye."

location.name: Mairisa bint Fuda
location.description:
Quest(s): Frore.
Mairisa bint Fuda tells you, "I came here to be free of the madding pace of the Arcanum at Zaikhal. Unless you have urgent business, I'd prefer to be left to my meditation."
Mairisa bint Fuda tells you, "If you are another seeking the lost City of Frore, be warned - you will need a substantial party to survive. Should you die, you will be unable to reenter the caves to recover your equipment. Be certain you are prepared."

location.name: Arcanum Researcher (Zaikhal)
location.description:
Arcanum Researcher tells you, "I have the latest reports from the Arcanum with me. Asheron stopped by the Arcanum workshops and gifted the Tinkers with knowledge of Yalaini transmutation magic. Using their new insights, the Tinkers have found the way to penetrate the Foundries from which these statues have come. If you seek out the Arcanum Tinker in the Consortium near Xarabydun, he will be able to tell you more!"
Arcanum Researcher tells you, "Meanwhile, I will still deliver the same rewards for any trophies that you might find on the statues menacing our towns. I will give additional rewards for any interesting items found within the Foundries, for I am sure the Arcanum would be interested in studying them further."

location.name: Kuyazi bint Zayi the Translator
location.description: Kuyiza bint Zayi the Translator tells you, "I am a scholar of a certain era of Empyrean history, the time of the Millennium War. If your text is of Dericost, Haebrous, or early Yalain, I may be able to translate it."

location.name: Diyas al-Yat
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House of Water.
Kuyiza bint Zayi the Translator tells you, "I am a scholar of a certain era of Empyrean history, the time of the Millennium War. If your text is of Dericost, Haebrous, or early Yalain, I may be able to translate it."

location.name: Ecorto the Lost Director
location.description:
Quest(s): New Singular Repositories.
Ecorto the Lost Director says, "If we cannot think of anything quieter and tidier than that... We are not any better than these humans..."
Ecorto the Lost Director says, "Oh, we're not united any more than you are."
Ecorto the Lost Director says, "I was with the renegades... no use trying to hide that... but I disagree with some of the things they are doing..."
Ecorto the Lost Director tells you, "Greetings, human. Call me Ecorto. I have disjoined myself from those who plan your eradication because I disagree with their methods. Their plan to construct a New Singularity in this realm is madness. Even now they gather and imbue material to construct their monstrous dream. Find the repositories of the New Singularity in the desert, the southern mountains and the Obsidian Plains, human."
Ecorto the Lost Director gives you Ecorto's Chisel.
Ecorto the Lost Director tells you, "Take this chisel, scrape slivers from the pillars they assemble, and bring the joined elements back to me... Be careful, however. The Singular material is quite strong, and could break the chisel."

location.name: Loom
location.description:
Quest(s): Flags, Fetish of the Dark Idols, Mattekar Robes.
An ornate loom etched with ancient symbols. It seems to be in perfect working order despite its obvious age.
Give the Loom a spool of thread to fashion cloth.

location.name: Spinning Wheel
location.description:
Quest(s): Flags.
This spinning wheel would be the thing to use if only you had some sort of material to spin upon it...
Give Silk to Spinning Wheel to obtain Spool of Silk.
You give Spinning Wheel Silk. The wheel spins the silk into a fine thread, which winds onto a spool. Spinning Wheel gives you Spool of Silk.

location.name: Slithe Traddittor
location.description:
Quest(s): Arcane Pedestal.
Slithe Traddittor tells you...
Traveler. I have a tale to tell and a task I would put upon you. Were you to take this task on yourself, you will bear witness to things I have seen and a wondrous device I glimpsed but could not fathom or grasp.
For you see, there is an artifact in a place unlike any that exists in Dereth.
I am an explorer for the Explorer Society. In a desert region, I came upon a suspended walkway hung out from the edge of a cliff. The other end of the walkway was attached not to solid ground but was lost in the spinning light of a portal. I held my breath and stepped upon teh walkway, half expecting it to collapse and throw me to the ground so far below. Yet, the walkway held my weight! I crept forward and stepped through the portal. I arrived on another walkway, or perhaps the same one somehow extended through the portal. There was a platform at its far end, then another walkway... Well, it is something you must see for yourself. Suffice it to say that I journeyed through this structure, all the while being assailed by vile creatures. Near the top of this construction I spied an artifact- a tall pedestal it was, with arcane shapes gyrating in the air above it. I would know not its function but it was clear to me that this artifact, this device, is of some import. There are many things it could be and none, I believe, of small consequence! Before I was able to reach it, a wretched monster send me back to my Lifestone! Later, I attempted to return, yet the portal would not permit me to pass. I know not why.
I must study this device. I call it the Arcane Pedestal. I even believe I have the means to create a version of it, but first I require an imprint of its morphology.
I shall give you a copy of my notes and Imaging Crystal. The notes show you the way to that place. The Imaging Crystal can be imprinted with the composition and design of this device. Return to me with the imprint embedded within the Crystal and I will study it and determine how to create it.
The Aracane Pedestal! We shall have the Arcane Pedestal!

location.name: Alatar Locke
location.description:
Quest(s): Arcane Pedestal.
Famous early explorer of Dereth and friend of Elysa Strathelar. Alatar currently resides at the Precarious Sojourn, where he makes Unframed maps of Dereth.
He will give you an Unframed Map of Dereth to study the land.

location.name: Precarious Sojourn Exit Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Arcane Pedestal.
This portal, atop raised platforms, will return you from whence you came.

location.name: Precarious Sojourn Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Arcane Pedestal.
This portal can be tied, summon and recalled to. However, a quest must be completed to enter this portal.
The destination leads to a collection of raised platforms connected by bridges, leading to a floating tower.
Beware of the Champions of Blood and the Warlocks of Blood!

location.name: Verdentine Magnan
location.description:
Quest(s): Flags.
Verdentine Magnan tells you...
I am afraid I find the recent Grievver activity in this valley somewhat unsettling. They seem to guard the area against all other creatures. Ive never seen Grievvers build a nest, but I think thats just what they are doing. Perhaps the lack of Shadow infulence for so long is allowing them to return to a more natural existence. If you think yourself brave enough I would be very grateful to know what they are doing in the far east of the valley.
I am very interested in insect trophies and body parts. You can learn much about a creature from its remains. If you have any I would greatly enjoy looking them over. Dont worry Ill return them after Ive examined them. I do however have a powerful appetite and cannot make the same assurances about food. Haha!
This I know for a fact. The Grievvers cannot abide the presence of Olthoi. They will fight fiercely against them whenever the two come in contact. This leads me to believe that the Grievvers and Olthoi share some common origin.
Did you see that? A little Grievver! I wonder if its a different species or just a juvenile.
I believe that the Grievvers have a complex social order. I can often see one deferring to another in combat or during feeding. Yet it doesnt appear to be a purely physical hierarchy since Ive seen a smaller Grievver receive deferential treatment. Perhaps they also recognize intelligence or magical ability as dominating traits. Its all very interesting!
No, I cant have a campfire. It might attract the Grievvers. Small price to pay really.

location.name: Grievver Caves Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Flags.
Located North of Stonehold, this dungeon has no level restrctions. You can tie and summon and recall to this portal.
Inside, you will find numerous Scrawed and Virulent Grievvers, along with a lone Spinning Grievver, a lvl 100 Grievver who drops some silk (which is one a quest timer).

location.name: Sylsfear to Direlands Midland Portal
location.description:
This portal is Within the Sylsfear dungeon.
It is not summonable.

location.name: Candeth Keep to South Direlands Portal
Martine's Retreat
location.description:
Quest(s): Sepulcher of Nightmares, Sanguinary Aegis, Major Prismatic Stone.
Singularity Chest Gaelan's Diary

location.name: Elemental Sanctum
location.description: Quest(s): Harbinger.

location.name: Atrium Residential Halls
location.description:
This portal leads to a large residential housing complex filled with apartments and storage.
This is one of three entry portals to these halls. The other two are in Baishi and Qalaba'r.
Settlements found in these halls are: Alphus Court Gajin Dwellings Hasina Gardens Heartland Yard Ivory Gate Larkspur Gardens Mellas Court Valorya Gate Vesper Gate Winthur Gate

location.name: Atrium Residential Halls
location.description:

This is one of three entry portals to these halls. The other two are in Glendon Wood and Qalaba'r.
Settlements found in these halls are: Alphus Court Gajin Dwellings Hasina Gardens Heartland Yard Ivory Gate Larkspur Gardens Mellas Court Valorya Gate Vesper Gate Winthur Gate

location.description: Mansions provide housing and storage for player characters. Houses require a monthly fee to rent.

location.description: Quest(s): Gaerlan's Citadel.

location.name: Acid Ziggurat
location.description: Quest(s): Gaerlan's Citadel.

location.name: Lightning Ziggurat
location.description: Quest(s): Gaerlan's Citadel.

location.description: Quest(s): Gaerlan's Citadel.

This is one of three entry portals to these halls. The other two are in Lytelthorpe and Tou-Tou.
Settlements found in these halls are: Ben Ten Lodge Cedraic Court Celcynd Grotto Crescent Moon Veranda Dulok Court Ispar Yard Jade Gate Jojii Gardens Trothyr Hollow Xao Wu Gardens

location.description:

location.name: Frest Greevling's Mansion
location.description:
Quest(s): Frest Greelving's Haunted Mansion.
Frest Greevling's Mansion sits atop an odd area of land. The inhabitants of this home are very odd, and very spooky, indeed.

location.name: Frest Greevling
location.description:
Quest(s): Frest Greelving's Haunted Mansion.
This NPC seems to want the evil presence in his mansion taken care of.
Frest Greevling tells you, Traveller, please! I wonder if I may call on you to help me? An unnamed evil permeates my mansion. I cannot go back in there! There are some objects of sentimental value I wish to have retrieved from my house. I will reward you if you do.
Frest Greevling tells you, I shall give you a copy of my journal in which I have recorded the growing horror within that house. It also lists the items I would appreciate you retrieving for me. Also, if you should discover any clues of what is causing this horror, please bring them to me.

location.name: Jordan Ibn`Ikia
location.description:
This Crafter shares a residence with the Agent of Arcanum in Zaikhal.
Hello! I am Jordan. I deal specifically in wall hangings, and after I am settled into this new shop, I`ll start taking items and crafting them into wondrous hangings for your house! For now, if you give me an unframed picture I could frame it for you.

location.name: Jordan's Apprentice Craftsman
location.description:
Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.
A furntiure vendor in Zaikhal.

location.name: Victory Residential Halls
location.description:
This portal leads to a large residential housing complex filled with apartments and storage.
This is one of three entry portals to these halls. The other two are in Khayyaban and Lin.
Settlements found in these halls are: Accord Veranda Candeth Court Celdiseth Court Festivus Court Hibiscus Gardens Meditation Gardens Setera Gardens Spirit Gate Triumphal Gardens Wilamil Court

location.name: Victory Residential Halls
location.description:
This portal leads to a large residential housing complex filled with apartments and storage.
This is one of three entry portals to these halls. The other two are in Khayyaban and Samsur.
Settlements found in these halls are: Accord Veranda Candeth Court Celdiseth Court Festivus Court Hibiscus Gardens Meditation Gardens Setera Gardens Spirit Gate Triumphal Gardens Wilamil Court

location.name: Victory Residential Halls
location.description:
This portal leads to a large residential housing complex filled with apartments and storage.
This is one of three entry portals to these halls. The other two are in Lin and Samsur.
Settlements found in these halls are: Accord Veranda Candeth Court Celdiseth Court Festivus Court Hibiscus Gardens Meditation Gardens Setera Gardens Spirit Gate Triumphal Gardens Wilamil Court

location.name: Olthoi Arcade
location.description: This portal cannot be tied, summoned, or recalled to.
location.monsters: Within, can be found a horde of Olthoi ranging from the Olthoi Harvesters, Olthoi Gardeners and the more rare Olthoi Drones and Olthoi Servants.

location.name: Xarabydun Lifestone Portal
location.description: This portal inside the town of Xarabydun will transport you to the lifestone for the town.

location.name: Uninhabited Area Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Gem of Impulse.
This portal will lead you further into the depths of the underground town of Xarabydun.
This dungeon contains the following items from the Gem of Impulse Quest:
Discus Forgotten Text Guard Post Key

location.name: Copper Vanurp
location.description:
Quest(s): Glenden Wood Crafters.
Copper Vanurp tells you, Food. Food is the basis of life. We are all food. You, you I see as a bountiful dessert, layered with chocolate and cinnamon, encrusted with rare fruits and sweetmeats in arcane patterns. You are a work of art! But cloyingly sweet ...
Copper Vanurp tells you, Our purpose here? We are here to ennoble the Derethian soul! To encourage it to rise to its full potential, like a fine, full loaf of the best bread in the oven of the gods!
Copper Vanurp tells you, Tiffany is our fearless leader, the great organizer. She can tell you of our efforts here.
Copper Vanurp will take Gromnie Tooth Brushes, should you happen to stumble across any.

location.name: Tiffany Comfore
location.description:
Quest(s): Glenden Wood Crafters.
Tiffany Comfore tells you, Welcome! Here you see the beginnings -- the fragile embryo -- of the future art community of Dereth.
Tiffany Comfore tells you, We are here, my two fine friends and I, to prepare for peace! After all the recent hubaloo, we believe that Dereth is in for a long and glorious Golden Age of Art, in which all Derethians everywhere will forsake their violent ways and instead take up the gentlest and most noble of sciences: alchemy, cooking, and fletching.
Tiffany Comfore tells you, We are at the forefront of this artistic revolution, leading the way, dismantling the roadblocks, smoothing the path for the mass of humanity behind us! We live to serve!
Tiffany Comfore tells you, We're gathering converts every day, every minute! If you would like to join us, you can start by trying your hand at crafting. Just take an old, disused item that is of no worth to anyone -- for instance, gromnie teeth! -- and fashion it into a beautiful and useful object of art. Tiffany Comfore tells you, Then bring it to one of us, and we will reward your efforts.
Tiffany Comfore will reward you for any Gromnie Tooth Paste you may have.

location.name: Wils Morrem
location.description:
Quest(s): Glenden Wood Crafters.
Wils Morrem tells you, The whistling wind, the wood, the biting metal ... these are the atoms of existence.
Wils Morrem tells you, If you insist on putting motivations to our being, talk to Ms. Comfore. She's the political one.
Wils Morrem will reward you for any Gromnie Toothpicks you may have.

location.name: Jourgensson
location.description:
Quest(s): Feud of Neydisa and Bandit Castle.
Jourgensson tells you, Oi, mush! Want ter do me a favor? It's tough ter get a decent drink around here, espescially wiv the prices Gorth charges.
Jourgensson tells you, Fetch me a bottle of Olde Ispar Stout from Neydisa Castle, down the road to the west, and I'll put in a good word fer yer with MacDugal!

location.name: MacDugal
location.description:
Quest(s): Bandit Hilt.
MacDugal tells you, Arrr! Don't bother me! I've got enough problems on me hands! Talk to my lieutenant, Jourgensson!

location.name: Gwillim, the Apprentice
location.description:
Quest(s): Feud of Neydisa and Bandit Castle.
Gwillim, the Apprentice tells you, Sorry, I'm too busy with my own problems right now...

location.name: A Cave
location.description:
This small cave holds little adventure for the experienced warrior, but it may provide some diversion to those looking to test their novice skills.
Note: This entrance leads to the same dungeon as A Cave at 18.4N 62.1E

location.name: Beachside
location.description:
A portal that leads to an area close to the town of Eastham from a rather treacherous point in the Direlands.
Thanks to Reska for submitting this location.

location.name: Granite Golem Camp
location.description:
This bunker filled area in the Direlands is home to a rather large number of angry Granite Golems who would love to make you a permanent part of the landscape.
Thanks to Reska for submitting this location.

location.name: Tumerok Fort
location.description: Another one of the seemingly endless fortified structures controlled by Tumeroks that are found in the Direlands. This one houses many types of Tumeroks, including Priests and High Priests.

location.name: Tumerok Fort to Cragstone
location.description: This portal can be found within an underground bunker located near a tower and a lifestone in the Direlands.

location.name: Bunker
location.description: This small underground bunker is the home to a few Greater Mu-miyah's and Gold Wasps.

location.name: Mountain Retreat Collector
location.description: This Collector, found in the Mountain Retreat which shields adventurers from the surround frost, will exchange money or items for several monster trophies. He does not deal in hides, however.

location.name: Chest of Camping Mastery
location.description:
This chest, found in a small cave, is guarded well by many Tumeroks and Banderlings. Adventurer's frequent this chest after hearing rumors that it is enchanted with a spell which can increase the target's chance of finding phat loot.
Beware of the devilish images that may flood your mind when opening this chest. (The ghostly visage you see is that of Turbine Developer, Jesse Devilmouse Kurlancheek.)

location.name: Oolutanga`s Refuge
location.description: This town on the island of Aphus Lassal is home to Tuskers and their Human minions. Despite their unpleasant demeanor, they are more than happy to sell you items.

location.name: Tusker Emporium
location.description:
This dungeon complex is directly in the center of a large volcano.
Rumor has it that the merchant Ketnan can be found hawking various items deep inside--but look out for the Tuskers and their human minions who are trying to prevent you from purchasing overpriced shoddy items!

location.name: Tusker Habitat
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Home of the Tusker Liberator Tusk.
location.monsters: Tusker Liberator

location.name: Tusker Temple
location.description:
Inside are a myriad of Tusker Slaves, Guards and Worshippers.
There is also a Tusker Shrine deep inside.
location.monsters: Tusker Slave, Tusker Guard, Tusker Worshipper

location.name: Chess Board
location.description: A chess board where players can challenge each other to a match.

location.name: Chess Board
location.description: A chess board where players can challenge each other to a match.

location.name: Tusker Encampments
location.monsters: Tusker Slave, Tusker Liberator, Tusker Minion

location.name: Tusker Freehold
location.monsters: Tusker Minion, Tusker Liberator, Tusker Redeemer

location.name: Tusker Grotto
location.monsters: Goldenback Tusker, Tusker Crimsonback, Tusker Kin

location.name: Tusker Retreat
location.monsters: Male Tusker, Female Tusker, Tusker Kin

location.name: Tusker Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Tusker Crimsonback Tusk.
location.monsters: Crimsonback Tusker

location.name: Tusker Cavern
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Goldenback Tusker Tusk.
location.monsters: Goldenback Tusker

location.name: Tusker Abode
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Deep in this dungeon, you may be able to convince a Tusker Redeemer to part with his Tusk. If you can, Brighteyes the Tailor may be able to reward you for it.
location.monsters: Tusker Redeemer

location.name: Guardian of the Temple of Forgetfulness
location.description:
Quest(s): Skill Redistribution.
A very large Empyrean head. It appears to be watching you.

location.name: Guardian of the Temple of Enlightenment
location.description:
Quest(s): Skill Redistribution.
A very large Empyrean head. It appears to be watching you.

location.name: Tusker Quarters
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
This dungeon is teeming with Tusker Slaves. In the bowels, it's possible you may be able to convince one to part with its tusk, which Bright Eyes will be very interested in.
location.monsters: Tusker Slave

location.name: Tusker Pits
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
A dungeon filled with Silver Tuskers. Deep inside, you may be able to find a Silver Tusker Tusk which Bright Eyes in Oolutanga's Revenger will reward you for.
location.monsters: Silver Tusker

location.name: Tusker Burrow
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Female Tusker Tusk.
location.monsters: Female Tusker

location.name: Tusker Lodge
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Male Tusker Tusk.
location.monsters: Male Tusker

location.name: Tusker Barracks
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
A dungeon full of tusker guards. A Tusker Guard Tusk can be found within.
Great Place to do the Tusker 500. =)
location.monsters: Tusker Guard

location.name: Tusker Armory
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
A dungeon full of mean blue Armored Tuskers. An Armored Tusker Tusk can be found within this dungeon on some of the tuskers.
location.monsters: Armored Tusker

location.name: Brighteyes the Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): The Painbringer, Tusker Tusks.
Brighteyes is the leader of the Underground Resistance against the tuskers of Aphus Lassal. Bring him proof that you are also against the tuskers and he may reward you.
Brighteyes, the Tailor tells you, "Have you brought me proof that your fighting against the tuskers? If so, hand it over so I can give you your reward. But be discreet, they may not understand Roulean but they know when something is up."

location.name: Chapel of Mowen
location.monsters: Tusker Worshipper, Armored Tusker, Silver Tusker

location.name: Tusker Tunnels
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Inside can be found many Plated Tuskers, some of whom have been rumoed to drop Tusks that Brighteyes the Tailor will reward you for...
location.monsters: Plated Tusker

location.name: Rampager Bluff
location.description: Thanks Rexford Sykes of Thistledown.

location.name: Tusker Assault
location.description:
Quest(s): The Painbringer.
NPCs
Jonas

location.name: Tusker Lacuna
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Tusker Devastator Tusk.

location.name: Tusker Honeycombs
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Tusker Assailer Tusk.

location.name: Mayor Ko Ko
location.description: This large Tusker is the Mayor of Ooluntaga.

location.name: Spirit Cell
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
Contains the Ancient Chest with the Chrysoberyl Compound for Nuhmidira's research into the nature of Lifestones.
location.monsters: None

location.name: Aun Paritea
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
Aun Paritea tells you, Hello. Have you spoken to any of my colleagues in some of the towns?
Aun Paritea is looking for a Gem from one of Nuhmidira`s students located in seveveral towns across Dereth.

location.name: Tornash
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
This large Lugian guards the entrance to the Crystal Mines.
Tornash tells you, Greetings. I assume my fellow student sent you to obtain Daichroic crystals. If you are pure of heart and strong of bone you should be successful in navigating the perils beyond this portal.

location.name: Access to Crystal Mines
location.description: Quest(s): Gift Box.

location.name: Moarsmen Spawning Grounds
location.description: Quest(s): The Moars.

location.name: Blind Snowman
location.description:
Quest(s): The Blind Snowman.
Blind Snowman says, I'm not dangerous. See? I'm smiling.
Blind Snowman tells you, I was standing in a meadow minding my own business, taking in the scenery, when BAM I get whacked with something from behind.
Blind Snowman tells you, Shoom! Shoom! Both my eyes go flying from my head and I can't see. Then I hear two distinct voices. One was chiding the other to apologize and the other one was laughing all crazy and mean. The mean voice said that was the funniest thing it had ever seen and to shut up or it would do the same to the nicer voice.
Blind Snowman tells you, People these days! If you see my eyes around would you please bring them to me? I would be very appreciative.
You give Blind Snowman A Lump of Coal.
Blind Snowman tells you, What's this?
Blind Snowman tells you, Wohoo! Thank you! I'll be able to make a new set of eyes once this gets cold enough!
Blind Snowman tells you, You deserve a reward for your good deed. Let's see... well not see per se... one second.
The Blind Snowman scoops up a pile of snow and casts a spell. The snow coalesces forming ice crystals that shift and rearrange as if alive.
Blind Snowman gives you Snowman Snowglobe.
Blind Snowman tells you, I can't be sure it turned out exactly right, but I hope you like it.
Blind Snowman tells you, May your bottom stay cold and your eyes stay put. Soon I'll be able to see the snow again!
Blind Snowman says, Much more of this and I'm going to become an Unhappy Snowman.
The Blind Snowman swallows the Lump of Coal with a contented smile.
Blind Snowman says, Who's there? I..I've got an icicle!
Blind Snowman tells you, People these days! If you see my eyes around would you please bring them to me? I would be very appreciative.
Moved from 60.2N 11.3E to 46.7N, 48.9E

location.name: Chess Board
location.description: A chess board where players can challenge each other to a match.

location.name: Lich House
location.description: A Lich guards the treasure located inside this lone house -- a runed chest!

location.name: Bandit Camp
location.description: A group of Bandits have set up camp here. One of them is rumoured to hold a firey quarterstaff of some value...

location.name: Crystal Mines to Holtburg
location.description: This portal is found high atop some magical floating platforms. Crystal Mines

location.name: Crystal Mine Extreme
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box, Crafter Golems.
This portal lies high atop some magical platforms and cannot be reached from the ground.
From Roowan of Solclaim...
The drop is safe unless someone has drawn the two Plasma Golems to the area. These are the first of many. Platinum, Pyreal, Vapor and Plasma golems with an extremely fast Spawn rate. They also cast level 7 Vulns and level 6 war spells on you. Watch your HEALTH !!! There were several levels to work down until you reach a large room with two chests at the far end. Each member of the party can use a chest which makes it a little easier. Please note that the Golems continue to spawn while you are getting the crystal from the chests. Be prepared to hit and run.
location.monsters: Plasma Golem, Platinum Golem, Pyreal Golem, Vapor Golem

location.name: Crystal Mine Mid
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
This portal lies high atop some magical platforms and cannot be reached from the ground.

location.name: Crystal Mine New Isparians
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
This portal lies high atop some magical platforms and cannot be reached from the ground.

location.name: Crystal Mine Low
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
This portal lies high atop some magical platforms and cannot be reached from the ground.

location.name: Access to Crystal Mines
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
This portal is found on the ground just below some magical floating platforms.

location.name: Crystal Mine High
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
This portal lies high atop some magical platforms and cannot be reached from the ground.
location.monsters: Oak Golem, Obsidian Golem, Magma Golem

location.name: Tusker Holding
location.description:
Quest(s): Tusker Tusks.
Home of yet another Tusker Tusk that Brighteyes the Tailor will reward you for.
Tusker Rampager Tusk.
location.monsters: Rampager

location.name: Chest of Camping Ineptitude
location.description: A group of liches and a lich lord in a tower are guarding a rather unusual chest...

location.name: Singularity Caul to Obsidian Rim Portal
location.description: Portal To The Obsidian Rim Region.

location.name: Smith Ejan
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle.
This old undead can be found on the island of Aerlinthe muttering many things to himself.
Smith Ejan says, "Ai, Metresa?" In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "Yes, Mistress?"
Smith Ejan says, "Au virinaa! Au... baeaa?" In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "I breathe not! I... am not... slain?"
Smith Ejan says, "Etah si au hisenaa!" In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "Why can I not recall!"
Smith Ejan says, "Hanaurel..." In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "Written thoughts - letter..."
Smith Ejan says, "Kall ama te fen? Reann au..?" In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "Who was it for? Where do I..?"
Smith Ejan says, "Suvani hasode, Metresa, tamaa Dar Hallae." In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "Yes. The Shadows remain below, Mistress, at the Old Ring."
Smith Ejan says, "Zorn... zorn..." In your mind, the dusty voice of Ejan whispers, "All gone, all gone..."
Spawns In Relic Town.

location.name: Kleeoh
location.description:
Quest(s): King Bobo.
Kleeoh tells you, Hello child, I sense dat you be looking for high adventure here where da tusker is king, no? Well let Kleeoh give you da help den. Why ya wonder I hid from ya when first ya came to da island?
Kleeoh tells you, Well that be simple, Oolutanga don't be liking those of us dat can think for ourselves. Who's Oolutanga?
Kleeoh tells you, You come to da island of da king Oolutanga. A refugee from da halls of a cruel virindi name by Aerbax.
Kleeoh tells you, Oolutanga is a special tusker you see. Yes. He be powerful strong and powerful big and powerful smart. He be a tusker dat hates da virindi. He frees his people when he can.
Kleeoh tells you, He has a magic about him. A magic dat comes from da hand dat he lost while fighting da former owner of dis island.
Kleeoh chortles.
Kleeoh tells you, Dey say dat if a person get hold of da hand taken from Oolutanga dey can have three wishes granted. But only in da temple of da king.
Kleeoh tells you, You be wanting to go dere den eh?
Kleeoh tells you, Well head to da waterfall on de interior of dis island and search for da entrance. Dere you find your way... Dere you find your way.
Kleeoh tells you, Read da signs. Dey tell secrets dey do.

location.name: Behind the Waterfall
location.description:
Quest(s): King Bobo.
In order to gain access to this mysterious portal, you must speak to the strange lady by the name of Kleeoh.

location.name: Anasha
location.description:
Quest(s): Gift Box.
Anasha tells you, Greetings. I am a student of Nuhmudira. Nuhmudira is delving into the lore of Lifestones. She has sent me to enlist the services of Isparians in obtaining some rare compounds and crystals. Several types are important to this research- Iolite gems, Chrysoberyl compound and Daichroic crystals.
Anasha tells you, If I could impose on you to deliver this Iolite gem to my colleague Aun Paritea he can tell you where to obtain the Chrysoberyl compound and the Daichroic crystals. To find Aun Paritea, go through the Tia-Leh Homestead portal which is in the Hebian-to settlement portals array. Aun Paritea is just south of the Tia-Leh Homestead. When you obtain them, please bring the Daichroic crystals to me and I shall reward you. I wish you safe tidings.
Anasha gives you Iolite Gem.

location.name: Dark Tree Crystal Mine
location.description: Quest(s): Crystal Minds and Shattered Souls.
location.monsters: Iron Golem, Granite Golem

location.name: Lartorus
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystal Minds and Shattered Souls.
Lartorus tells you, You have some crystals to deliver? Go.

location.name: Student
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystal Minds and Shattered Souls.
Student tells you, "Hello. I am a student of Nuhmudira. Nuhmudira is still enlisting the services of Isparians in obtaining some rare compounds and crystals necessary for her research into Lifestones. Dark Tree Crystal and Valara crystal are critical to this research."
Student tells you, "If you could aid us in this endeavour we would be most grateful. To obtain Dark Tree Crystal you should go to a mine northwest of Fort Danby. Then, bring the Dark Tree Crystal to an ancient Empyrean dungeon we are using as a storage warehouse. It is located northeast of the Eotensfang Cottages settlement- you may journey there via the settlement portals near Arwic. A fellow student at that location can portal you into the facility. Give the crystal to the person overseeing the warehouse. I wish you safe tidings."

location.name: Student
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystal Minds and Shattered Souls.
Student tells you, "Hello. I am a student of Nuhmudira. Nuhmudira is still enlisting the services of Isparians in obtaining some rare compounds and crystals necessary for her research into Lifestones. Dark Tree Crystal and Valara crystal are critical to this research."
Student tells you, "If you could aid us in this endeavour we would be most grateful. To obtain Dark Tree Crystal you should go to a mine northwest of Fort Danby. Then, bring the Dark Tree Crystal to an ancient Empyrean dungeon we are using as a storage warehouse. It is located northeast of the Eotensfang Cottages settlement- you may journey there via the settlement portals near Arwic. A fellow student at that location can portal you into the facility. Give the crystal to the person overseeing the warehouse. I wish you safe tidings."

location.name: Caul Asylum
location.description:
Quest(s): Singularity Caul Recall.
The Quest its self is still the same path, but the creatures inside have changed. Tougher monsters new and old lurk inside. The new level restriction on the dungeon is 90+. Also the creatures that carry the keys to move on now carry quest rings.

location.name: Student
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystal Minds and Shattered Souls.
Student tells you, "Hello. I am a student of Nuhmudira. Nuhmudira is still enlisting the services of Isparians in obtaining some rare compounds and crystals necessary for her research into Lifestones. Dark Tree Crystal and Valara crystal are critical to this research."
Student tells you, "If you could aid us in this endeavour we would be most grateful. To obtain Dark Tree Crystal you should go to a mine northwest of Fort Danby. Then, bring the Dark Tree Crystal to an ancient Empyrean dungeon we are using as a storage warehouse. It is located northeast of the Eotensfang Cottages settlement- you may journey there via the settlement portals near Arwic. A fellow student at that location can portal you into the facility. Give the crystal to the person overseeing the warehouse. I wish you safe tidings."

location.name: Kayna bint Iswas
location.description:
Quest(s): Silifi of Crimson Stars.
This enchanter, who lives alone in her home guarded by two Iron Golems, is said to know much about the mystical axe known as the Silifi of Crimson Stars.

location.name: Skeleton Bunker
location.description:
Quest(s): Silifi of Crimson Stars.
Skeletons in this bunker are guarding a mysterious Weathered Red Key.
This Weathered Red Key unlocks a door in the Sylsfear Dungeon.

location.name: Astara Duskshield
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart.
Astara Duskshield tells you, "Hello. Have you seen Tamian Wilmit around at all lately? I have not seen him in quite some time now. I am concerned about him, he had been acting a bit strange lately. He is a very dear friend. If you could find where he is I would very much appreciate it. He had a row with my friend Delton Hardor. Very out of character for Tamian."
Astara Duskshield tells you, "Have you found anything out about Tamian yet?"
Astara Duskshield tells you, "No word of Tamian? I suppose not, I spoke with most people here myself. I know Delton is still angry at him. Well, Tamian acted a bit wild that day when he and Delton fought, but perhaps he is just not used to swordplay and grew furious when Delton swatted him. Delton is quite good with a sword. Tamian knows nothing about them." Astara sighs
Astara Duskshield tells you, "Of late, Tamian had been extremely interested in something a Scribe who was travelling through here had given him. It had to do with a tower. Tamian is always drawing towers and such. The Scribe was named Tian Li Quan and resides in Lin, I believe. Tamian is no great traveler and that is quite a way from here. Strange that he would go and say nothing, but perhaps..."

location.name: Delton Hardor
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart.
Delton Hardor tells you, "Have I seen Tamian Wilmit? Strange fellow he is, not very able. Seems he can do nothing. I do not understand why Astara is still friends with him. Tis true, they knew each other on Ispar when younger but he is of no use here. Little in the way of useful skills, he has."
Delton Hardor tells you, "Yes, you may go tell Astara I said so. He tried to fight me in sword practise. I swatted him finely for he is no good with a blade and he came at me like a rabid Carenzi. I had to give him a good thrashing, lucky he is we were using wood, not steel. Astara made me stop, also screamed at him, he slunk away like a drudge."
Delton Hardor tells you, "I believe the last time I saw him was over by Ji Tenxien the Tailor. You could ask her."
Delton Hardor tells you, "Do not bother me about Tamian any more, go talk to someone else about him."

location.name: Tian Li Quan
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart.
This scribe in Lin had dealings with young Tamian Wilmot. Could he possibly know of his where abouts?

location.name: Tower Base Dungeon
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart.
Some of the citizens in Rithwic are looking for a young man who mentioned looking for an Empyrean Tower. Could this dungeon and that young man be related?
location.monsters: Glacial Golem, Granite Golem, Iron Golem, Obsidian Golem

location.name: Mysterious Empyrean Tower
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart Quest.
This mysterious large structure is of Empyrean in design. What is it doing here and how did it go unnoticed for all these years?
Perhaps this is the same tower that a young man in Rithwic was mentioned to be looking for.

location.name: Bellig Tower
location.description:
Quest(s): Hammer of Lightning.
This dungeon is built like a tower. To get to the top just keep going up. Near the top you will find a Revenant that carries the Hammer of Lightning. Also in the same room as the Revenant you'll find a History Shelf with 11 volumes of the General History of Dereth. Some random rumors also spawn on the floor in the room.

location.restrictions: Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Astara Duskshield.
location.name: An Archive
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart.
This dungeon contains a locked door at the very start that you must find the key to unlock if you wish to proceed. Perhaps the note left by Tamian Wilmit could shed a clue to unlocking it...
location.monsters: Champion of the Blood, Lich, Warlock of the Blood

location.name: Iron Golem Guardian Camp
location.description:
Quest(S): Spear of the Given Heart.
These Iron Golem Guardians must be guarding something...but what?
Perhaps they are guarding an Archive as suggested by the keys they carry.

location.name: Harlune the Misanthrope
location.description:
Quest(s): Mount Lethe Recall, Impious Staff, Collegium Occultus Ring, The Temple of Xik Minru.
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Off with you, I'm a busy mage!"
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "It was so much better when you people thought I was one of you. That's impossible now though, thanks to that cretin Gaerlan."
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Never seen an Empyrean before? Shoo! Shoo! I have work to do."
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Did you know that Empyreans have 14 schools of magic? Would you like me to demonstrate them all on you?"
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Go away! And don't tell Asheron I'm down here! Never could stand the man..."
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "You best not have done anything to Alfrega, if you know what's good for you..."
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "I liberate some of your people from a despotic ruler...think you could show a little bit of respect!"
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Alfrega, Alfrega girl! Fresh meat!"
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "What, looking for some great quest, some grand purpose from the Empyrean? Go away!"
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Well if you are going to continue to bother me, you can at least do something for me. Take this note to Celcynd in Rithwic."
Harlune the Misanthrope gives you A Crabbed Note.
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "He borrowed one of my history books sometime ago and didn't return it because he became a drunken waste. Probably spilled alcohol all over it."
Harlune the Misanthrope tells you, "Go get it and I'll give you some scroll I've got lying around here...or not. Will you leave me alone then?"
Found inside the Mite Maze.
During the Dispatch event, Harlune left Mite Maze and is currently located at ???. Roderick is nearby in Mite Maze and claims to be acting on behalf of Harlune (he performs interactions needed to complete Harlune's associated quests). However, the veracity of his claims have not been verified (we need to find and speak to Harlune).

location.name: Student
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystal Minds and Shattered Souls.
Student tells you, "Hello. I am a student of Nuhmudira. Nuhmudira is still enlisting the services of Isparians in obtaining some rare compounds and crystals necessary for her research into Lifestones. Dark Tree Crystal and Valara crystal are critical to this research."
Student tells you, "If you could aid us in this endeavour we would be most grateful. To obtain Dark Tree Crystal you should go to a mine northwest of Fort Danby. Then, bring the Dark Tree Crystal to an ancient Empyrean dungeon we are using as a storage warehouse. It is located northeast of the Eotensfang Cottages settlement- you may journey there via the settlement portals near Arwic. A fellow student at that location can portal you into the facility. Give the crystal to the person overseeing the warehouse. I wish you safe tidings."

location.name: Abandoned Armory
location.description:
Quest(s): Sanguinary Aegis.
This dungeon on the Southern Landbridge contains secrets of an older time...but what could they be?
Pick up any color of Deteriorated Aegis at the end of the dungeon and use your Chorizite Formula on it to create a Sanguinary Aegis.

location.name: Maere the Dyepot Peddlar
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Armor. Sells at 1000%, buys at ??%.
From this vendor you can buy the dyes to color Greater Celdon Armor.
Red Shadow Dye - 100,000py Green Shadow Dye - 100,000py Blue Shadow Dye - 100,000py
Maere the Dyepot Peddlar tells you, "Choose your colors quickly now, I have a lot of customers right now and don't have all day."

location.name: Gormling the Sneaky Seneschal
location.description:
Quest(s): Feud of Neydisa and Bandit Castle.
Gormling the Sneaky Seneschal tells you, Welcome to our humble castle. I am Lady Tallial's senseschal. Take care not to cause too much trouble around here, hrm?

location.name: Lady Tallial
location.description:
Quest(s): Feud of Neydisa and Bandit Castle.
Lady Tallial tells you, Welcome to Neydisa Castle. We are a peaceful settlement, but MacDugal's band of raiders has recently re-occupied the castle to the east. I am sure they are planning something vile.
Lady Tallial tells you, If you are able to bring back to me evidence of MacDugal's plans, I will grant you a reward from my castle's armory.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found in the wilderness.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found in the wilderness.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description:
This is a new, animated lifestone on the island of Marae Lassal.
Thanks to Dotcher and Bodkin of Harvestgain for submitting this.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found on the beaches of the Vesayen Islands.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found on the Northern Beaches.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found on the Northern Beaches.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found on in the northern forests of Osteth.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: This is a new, animated lifestone found on the northern coast of Marae Lassal.

location.name: Vesayen Isles Portal
location.description: This portal, just south of Mayoi, leads to the chain of islands known as the Vesayen Isles.

location.name: Tumerok Fort
location.description:
Quest(s): Overlord's Sword.
A Tumerok Fort that is locked and heavily guarded.
It is rumored that a Heavy Tumerok Key can open the main gate and that a High Priest's Key can be found on the corpse of a High Priest--assuming you can defeat him first.

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: A new lifestone erected by Nuhmudira along the northern beaches of the Direlands.

location.name: Drunken Madman to Ulgrim's Island
location.description:
You can convince this Drunken Madman to summon a portal to Ulgrim's Island by giving him some spicy Wah Chon's Winter Lager found in Nanto.
You give Drunken Madman Wah Chon's Winter Lager. Drunken Madman tells you, What's this? It doesn't look like sake. Drunken Madman tells you, Not sake!? NOT Sake! YOU!!! I'll g... Drunken Madman tells you, Oh right, you must want to see Ulgrim. He said people might be looking for him. Ok, I'll portal you there this time, but next time you better bring me sake! [Drunken Madman Summons Portal to Ulgrim's Island]

location.name: Shreth Clan Training Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Tumerok Banners.
Many tumeroks of the Shreth Clan can be found in this dungeon training. Training for what? We dare not ask...
Thanks to Poison Grasshopper for submitting this location.
location.monsters: Tumerok Standard Bearer, Tumerok Major, Tumerok Controller, Tumerok Commander, Tumerok Leitentant

location.name: Falcon Clan Training Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Tumerok Banners.
Many tumeroks of the Falcon Clan can be found in this dungeon training. Training for what? We dare not ask...
location.monsters: Tumerok Standard Bearer, Tumerok Major, Tumerok Controller, Tumerok Commander, Tumerok Lieutenant

location.name: Gromnie Clan Training Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Tumerok Banners.
Many tumeroks of the Gromnie Clan can be found in this dungeon training. Training for what? We dare not ask...
location.monsters: Tumerok Standard Bearer, Tumerok Major, Tumerok Controller, Tumerok Commander, Tumerok Lieutenant

location.name: Mask Clan Training Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Tumerok Banners.
Many tumeroks of the Mask Clan can be found in this dungeon training. Training for what? We dare not ask...
Thanks to Eolorian of FF and HG for submitting this location.
location.monsters: Tumerok Standard Bearer, Tumerok Major, Tumerok Controller, Tumerok Commander, Tumerok Lieutenant

location.name: Reedshark Clan Training Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Tumerok Banners.
Many tumeroks of the Reedshark Clan can be found in this dungeon training. Training for what? We dare not ask...
location.monsters: Tumerok Standard Bearer, Tumerok Major, Tumerok Controller, Tumerok Commander, Tumerok Lieutenant

location.name: Serpent Clan Training Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Tumerok Banners.
Many tumeroks of the Serpent Clan can be found in this dungeon training. Training for what? We dare not ask...
location.monsters: Tumerok Standard Bearer, Tumerok Major, Tumerok Controller, Tumerok Commander, Tumerok Lieutenant

location.name: Ulgrim's Basement
location.description:
Quest(s): Ulgrim's Casting Stein.
Ulgrim the Unpleasant's basement dungeon. What wonders will you find in here? Chances are...stout. And lots of it!

location.name: Ulgrim's Island
location.description:
Quest(s): Ulgrim's Casting Stein, Ulgrim's Drinking Contest, Ulgrim's Hatch .
Ulgrim the Unpleasant has long spoken of his home. Well, here it finally is...at long last.
Ulgrim's Island can be reached by giving the Drunken Madman in Baishi a Mug of Winter Lager (purchase in Nanto bar).

location.name: Lifestone
location.description: A lifestone next to a small building in the wilderness of Osteth.

location.name: Small Building
location.description: A small building with a lifestone next to it. Whoever built this structure has long since abandoned it.

location.restrictions: Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Mage Syltan Rillon Near Glendon Wood.
location.name: Virindi Complex
location.description:
Quest(s): Sword of Frozen Fury Quest.
This dungeon is home to several Virindi Interrogators who are rumored to drop a Virindi Sigil. It is said that Mage Syltyn Rillon is very interested in this artifact. If you can find it in this dungeon and its maze of portals, perhaps she will reward you.

location.name: Mage Syltyn Rillon
location.description:
Quest(s): Sword of Frozen Fury Quest.
This mage, located just outside of Glendon Wood, seems to know a great deal about the frozen sword in the dais located within the town proper. Perhaps she will give you clues as to its origin and how to free it from its chilly home.
Mage Syltyn Rillon tells you, Hello. I am Mage Syltyn Rillon, a member of the Explorer Society. Perhaps you are wondering about the sword on the dais in town. I had been a friend of Martine's back on Ispar. I encountered Martine here, during one of his mad rampages. He knew not who I was, nor did he seem to care and the encounter ended badly for me. Upon arriving at the Lifestone I was angry, yet understood that the Virindi were principally at fault for causing Martine's actions. I became determined to help fellow Isparians combat the Virindi and other perils of this harsh land. With the help of Omaro Nagate the weaponsmith, I crafted a frost sword that should be of good utility to adventurers who are skilled in the ways of the blade.
Mage Syltyn Rillon tells you, To obtain this weapon you must first prove your worthiness. There is a Virindi complex north of Bandit Road. I left a note on a tree along Bandit Road, east of Neydisa Castle, marking the location where you should turn north. Go to the complex, navigate through it and bring to me a Virindi Signet. I shall then allow you to take the sword.
Mage Syltyn Rillon tells you, Oh, take this. It will aid you in your journey through part of the complex. Read it carefully.
Mage Syltyn Rillon gives you A Tale of Paths.

location.name: Tackle Master (Shoushi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Rithwic)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Yaraq)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Cragstone)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Olcris, Nuhmudira's Student
location.description:
Quest(s): Halls of Knorr, Collegium Occultus Ring , The Knorr Quiddity Seed.
Olcris seems to have knowledge of how to get to the old Empyrean Knorr Lyceum. Perhaps if you were to give him some money, he might fill you in on some details or even provide a way to get there.
If you have never been to the Knorr Lyceum before he will ask you for an M Trade Note in exchange for a Knorr Portal Gem. You have to talk to him before he will exchange a trade note for the gem.
Note: You can only get 2 Portals Gems every 2 days from Olcris.
If you have previously been to Knorr and talked to Arikas, Warden of Knorr you can hand Olcris an MMD Note in exchange for a Seat of Knorr Portal Gem. If you do this you can skip the riddles you would normally have to answer to get to the Seat of Knorr.
Talk to Arikas, Warden of Knorr every time you use a Seat of Knorr Portal Gem. That flags you so you can get another gem from Olcris the next time you want to go back.

location.name: Tazal al-Ashfai
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Jaera's Tomb.
Tazal al-Ashfai tells you, Hail, tarveler. It is pleasant to meet anyone here in the wastes. Tell me, have you discovered a crypt in these regions called the Burial Temple?
I have heard that the dead walk there, and one in particular carries a certain black gem I seek for my research.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to South Direlands
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Glenden Wood
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Baishi
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Neydisa Castle
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Plateau
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to North Direlands
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Zaikhal
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Hebian-to
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Tufa
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Jungle Shadows to Eastham
location.description: This portal is located deep within the Jungle Shadows dungeon.

location.name: Incunabula Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Atlan Weapons, Isparian Weapons, Shadow Armor, Major Stinging Stone.
This is a one portal only as the surface portal inside leads you to the surface near the other entrance to this dungeon in the Direlands.
location.monsters: Olthoi Soldier

location.name: Zefir Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Minor Atlan Stones.
Inside this sunken bunker, guarded by a handful of Sufut Zefirs, is the Minor Sparkling Stone.
've heard tell of a strange purple stone in a cave south of Lin and west of Mayoi. It's guarded by nasty zefirs. There's also a book there, but no one I know has actually braved the zefirs to see what it's all about. If you want to try your luck, head northeast from the West Mayoi Mountain Villas.
-- A Sparking Stone
Minor Sparkling Stone.

location.name: Serac Vault (New Entrance)
location.description:
Quest(s): Major Shivering Stone.
This ancient Empyrean structure is now infested with undead. Lich Lords, Revenants, and Dark Revenants swarm the dungeon. Perhaps they are the ancient Empyreans who first constructed the place
Note: This portal is one way only as the surface portal inside will take you to the surface of the other entrance to this dungeon.
location.monsters: Lich Lord, Revenant, Dark Revenant

location.name: Jahannan Vault (Khayyaban)
location.description:
Quest(s): Major Smoldering Stone.
Situated on the rim of the crater this ancient Empyrean vault is now home to various zefirs and fire elementals.
location.monsters: Flamma, Flare, Inferno, Mountain Rat, Zofrit Zefir

location.name: Artifex Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Stone Tool.
A second entrance to this Tumerok dungeon, which is also the home of the Atlan Stone Tool, lies atop this hill. Adventurers seeking to find the way in must approach the hill from the southern side to find the route up.

location.name: Amperehelion Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Major Sparking Stone.
A secondary entrance to the Lightning Vault, home of many electrical elementals and the Major Sparking Stone.

location.restrictions: 60+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Fir Tree.
location.name: Heart of Innocence
location.description: Quest(s): Heart Of Innocence.
location.monsters: Bandit Lord, Bandit Mage, Rogue, Rogue Mage, Thief

location.name: Ro Bi-Jor, Apprentice Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): Heart of Innocence, Oswald's Dirk.
Ro Bi-Jor, Apprentice Tailor tells you, "Hello I am an apprentice of To-ping Ra. He is teaching me the venerable art of tailoring. I have seen a few setbacks in my studies recently but I am sure that my confidence will return."
Hand her Letter to Ro Bi-Jor and receive 250.000 xp. Since the letter can be given, nice starter xp.

location.name: Fir Tree
location.description:
Quest(s): Heart of Innocence, Oswald's Dagger, Oswald's Dirk
This odd tree appears to be more then just a tree...but what secrets does it hold?
If you are just flagging for Weeping Weapons use the Fir Tree, then go in the portal, then recall out, you're flagged. Don't use the Puzzle Box.
If you have a high lockpick skill and want to continue on for Oswald's Dagger, use the puzzle box.
The rolling balls will kill instantly on contact. You can either watch the timings and walk between them or you can use the platforms to jump your way across the room.

location.name: Igloo (Minor Shivering Stone)
location.description:
Quest(s): Minor Atlan Stones.
This igloo in the frozen mountains contains the Minor Shivering Stone, but be warned, it is guarded by several Glacial Golems!
A pair of adventurers recently found a queer stone in the mountains to the north. They were returning from the assaults on the Frore, and became lost in a late blizzard. They took shelter in a small ice hut right on the edge of the Lost Wish Mountains, directly east of Holtburg and north of Cragstone. Inside they discovered a strange blue stone and a book. These seem to be artifacts of some lost form of Empyrean technology. Maybe you should investigate.
-- Unknown
Minor Shivering Stone.

location.name: Secret Putiputi Place
location.description: Quest(s): Putiputipuh's Onga.

location.name: Tekapuapuh
location.description:
Quest(s): Putiputipuh's Onga.
Oh, man! You can help me! My beloved Putiputipuh, she`s not very happy. She needs special onga from where I found her!
I dropped my stuff in the hidey hole where I found her. It`s all the way to the east, straight east from here, right until you hit a BIIIG wall.
I set up a magic portal to the hidey-hole. Here, I`ll give you the password.
Thanks for your help!
Tekapuapuh gives you Tekapuapuh`s Note.

location.name: Desert March to Bandit Castle Portal
Desert March to Bandit Castle Portal
Desert March to Obsidian Rim Portal
Desert March to Obsidian Rim Portal
Desert March to North Direlands Portal
Desert March to North Direlands Portal
Desert March to Black Hill Portal
Desert March to Black Hill Portal
Desert March to Southern Mt. Esper Portal
Desert March to Southern Mt. Esper Portal
Desert March to South Direlands Portal
Desert March to South Direlands Portal
Trophy Smith (Black Hill)
location.description:
Trophy Smith tells you, "I am interested in armoredillo spines and golem hearts of all kinds. If you give me one I will craft an item from it, or give you something else of value."
In exchange for certain trophies, Trophy Smiths will give rewards such as pyreals, experience points and useful items.

location.name: Black Hill Collector
location.description:
Black Hill Collector tells you, "I'm interested in monster trophies from many of the monsters that plague Dereth. If you give me such items, I will reward you with money or an item. With regret, I don't deal in hides."
Black Hill Collector says, "Have you a drudge charm, swamp stone, rat tail, or such? I'll pay you good money or items if you give them to me. They're hard to come by."
Black Hill Collector says, "There are others who will reward differently for the same items I collect. Not all types of monsters carry trophies, and of those variants that do, it's very rare."

location.name: Candeth Keep
location.description: This town is still under construction. The Lugian Guards are keeping the construction site safe from invaders while the Humans and Tumeroks continue to build.

location.name: Matron Hive West
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Raiment Quest.
The Olthoi Brood Matron here drops the Brood Matron Crest used to get Asheron's Greater Raiment.

location.name: Asheron's Sanctum
location.description:
A dungeon, consisting of one large room, in Asheron's Castle. It holds Asheron's Library, and two Golem Guardians. On tables throughout the dungeon, you can see different objects being studied by Asheron.
During Ancient Enemies, when Asheron's Island became officially accessible, Asheron was present here, and gave those who managed to reach him the Olthoi Resurgent (now retired).
Asheron was again present here for the Recollections event, and exchanged the Empyrean Spherule and the other results of the Quiddity Seeds quest for for example the Empowered Breastplate of the Perfect Light.

location.name: Effigy Foundry to Cragstone
location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Effigy Foundry to Cragstone
location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Effigy Foundry to Cragstone
location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Effigy Foundry to Cragstone
location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Blacksmith's Lifestone
location.description: A lifestone in the Dires next to a Blacksmith. Discovered by Circeus.

location.name: Blacksmith
location.description:
A blacksmith in the middle of the Dires.
Discovered by Circeus.

location.name: Carved Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Sword of Lost Light.
Rumored to be the resting place of one of the keys needed to obtain the Sword of Lost Light, this strange complex is home to Ivory Gromnies, Crude, Wild, and Rough Monougas, Skeleton Warriors and Captains, and even Mountain Rats. If you delve deep enough you may even encounter Shadows and Shadow Children.
Come prepared however, for many locks are installed in this dungeon. Some can be opened with keys found within the dungeon while others require the skills of a lockpicker. The intrepid explorer may even stumble across a rare Enchanted Fire Arrow or two.
If you find your way to the bottom, past the shadows, you'll find portals to the midlands of the Direlands and one to Qalaba'r.
Key #7 for the Sword of Lost Light is found here.

location.name: Carved Caves to Direland Midlands
location.description: Descend to the bottom of the Carved Caves, past the shadows, and you'll find a portal to the midlands of the Direlands.

location.name: Carved Caves to Qalaba'r
location.description: Descend to the bottom of the Carved Caves, past the shadows, and you'll find a portal to the town of Qalaba'r.

location.name: Mammet Foundry Portal
location.description:
This dungeon can be found in the base of the bronze statues.
* Destination: Baishi
location.monsters: Bronze Golem, Bronze Sclavus, Bronze Skeleton, Bronze Tumerok

location.name: Effigy Foundry Portal
location.description:
This dungeon can be found in the base of the bronze statues.
* Destination: Cragstone

location.name: Effigy Foundry to Cragstone
location.description: A portal to the town of Cragstone within the Effigy Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Mannikin Foundry to Nanto
location.description: A portal to the town of Nanto within the Mannikin Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Mammet Foundry to Baishi
location.description: A portal to the town of Baishi within the Mammet Foundry dungeon.

location.description: A portal to the town of Baishi within the Mammet Foundry dungeon.

location.name: Colossus Foundry to Fort Tethana
location.description: A portal to Fort Tethana within the Colossus Foundry dungeon.

A cave full of Direland Rats. Spawns some workmanshipless Sunstone at the top.
Found by Circeus.

location.description:
Quest(s): Staff of the Nomads.
A structure overrun by shadows, containing a chest. Inside the chest is a bit of lore for the Staff of the Nomads quest. Is this a depowered power station?
Found by Circeus.

location.description: Home to a clan of Gotrok's Lugians. It would appear that they followed the same construction plans as the older Lugian Citadels found in mainland Dereth.

location.name: Issk
location.description:
Quest(s): Harbinger.
Issk tells you, "You seek to assist she who sings to the world? Well you should. She has risen from the ashes to call all to her side. She seeks to repair the hurt wreaked upon the land and close the wounds that hemorrhage still."
Issk tells you, "Would you take up her banner and stride forth into the darkness wherein the true enemy lies? I think you weak."
Issk tells you, "I think you know fear. I think you suffer and sufer you shall. She bids me give you this."
Issk gives you Natural Order.
Issk tells you, "She bids you read it. She bids you understand. She bids you complete the task and return to me. She needs the proof of your resolve. She needs to see that you will not fail."

location.name: Renegade Garrison
location.description: Quest(s): Renegade Mace.
