location.name: Aun Arenura the Crafter
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Dresses (Marsh, Tidal, Littoral, Timber).
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "Greetings! My father, Aun Whethura in Timaru has tasked me with helping the younger members of the xuta, Ispar. He says that we can both learn much from each other."
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "My father's fondness for the Siraluun has also rubbed off onto me. Should you find any trophies, such as Siraluun Feathers or Claws, I will gladly take them and reward you with a weapon."
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "Also, I am learning the art of tailoring as well. If you should bring me this bag..."
Aun Arenura the Crafter gives you Embroidered Bag.
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "...full of feathers, I will craft you a gown of feathers. I should warn you though. I am not skilled enough, nor am I worthy of working with the feathers of the more powerful Siraluun. You should bring those feathers to my father in Timaru."
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "One final note, unlike my father and the others who reside within the walls of Timaru, I bear no grudges to those who may have acted against the Tonk. My father would say that I am foolish for this belief."

location.name: Aun Kahuiura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Kahuiura, Aun Artisan in Arcane Ointment.
After September 2005
Aun Kahuiura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Kahuiura, Aun Artisan in Arcane Ointment.

location.name: Aun Ihmenaura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Ihmenaura, Aun Artisan in Feather and Claw.
After September 2005
Aun Ihmenaura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Ihmenaura, Aun Artisan in Feather and Claw.

location.name: Aun Pitamaura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Pitamaura, Aun Artisan in Spike and Blade.
After September 2005
Aun Pitamaura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Pitamaura, Aun Artisan in Spike and Blade.

location.name: Aun Nireeura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Nireeura, Aun Artisan in Pin and Pitch.
After September 2005
Aun Nireeura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Nireeura, Aun Artisan in Pin and Pitch.

location.name: Vincadi
location.description:
Quest(s): Harbinger.
Vincadi tells you, "You have the mark of Nuhmudira upon you. Were I not enamored with the interactions of your race and deciphering the rationale behind your choices, I would likely remove your flesh one layer at a time for this affront."
Vincadi is the NPC to whom you give the Broken Virindi Consul and Broken Virindi Desecrator Masks.
You give Vincadi Broken Virindi Desecrator Mask.
Vincadi tells you, "How did you obtain this artifact? Well, no matter. It can be repaired and used."

location.name: Abayar's Labaratory
location.description:
Quest(s): Lunnum's Pyre, Fiun Spellcasting Gloves.
Submitted by Wile E Coyote SC
location.monsters: Frenzied Fiun's

location.name: Mana Recovery Pyramid
location.description: You feel a great swell of power rise from the ground beneath you, restoring 2 points of your mana. Submitted by Zestryl of Frostfell

location.name: The Royal Hall
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz

location.name: Thrungus Hole
location.description:
Quest(s): Hermit's Death Wish.
This dungeon is one of the most dangerous places in Dereth.
Submitted by Orionzauberson

location.name: Egg Orchard
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Olthoi Rippers), Nanjou Shou-jen Armor, Dereth Exploration.
There are three mirrors of the dungeon, commonly referred to as Mid, East and West
Tanada Nanjou Shou-jen spawn randomly in pairs after killing Olthoi Rippers.
There is an Exploration Marker in the egg room just before the exit portal at the bottom of the dungeon.
Submitted by Orionzauberson .

location.name: Sanamar to Westwatch
location.description: This portal cannot be recalled, linked or summoned. Throne of Destiny expansion is required.

location.name: Ayan Baqur to Eastwatch
location.description: This portal cannot be recalled, linked or summoned. Throne of Destiny expansion is required. Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Sanamar to Eastwatch
location.description: This portal cannot be recalled, linked or summoned. Throne of Destiny expansion is required. Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Sanamar to Fiun Outpost
location.description: Throne of Destiny expansion is required. Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Sanamar to Holtburg
location.description: Added by Mr Fizz.

location.name: Qalaba'r to Silyun
location.description: This portal cannot be summoned, recalled, nor linked to.

location.name: Beacon Tower
location.description: Quest(s): The Beacon.

location.name: Cataracts of Sabella
location.description:
The Cataracts of Sabella are a series of giant waterfalls, located at 82.7N, 74.7W on Lotila Island.
Submitted by Druideth of TD.

location.name: Dark Design
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Mosswart Worshippers), Nanjou Shou-jen Armor.
The dungeon is found in a fallen Shadow Spire. It is full of high level mosswarts.
Submitted by Druideth of TD.

location.name: Dericost Ruin
location.description: Quest(s): Dericost Ruin.

location.name: Drudge Hovel
location.description:
Quest(s): Trade Alliance, Sanamar Starter Quests.
A locked door at the entrance requires a key from Lubziklan al-Luq in Yaraq.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.
location.monsters: Drudge Servant, Slave, Robber, Red Rat

location.name: Eater Pit
location.description:
Quest(s): Knights of Karlun.
Submitted by Druideth of TD.

location.name: Forgotten Chasm
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Naughty Skeletons), Hunter Quests (Wicked Skeletons).
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull and Druideth of TD.

location.name: Frozen Library
location.description:
Quest(s):Fiun Healing Machine.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Humid Hovel
location.description:
Quest(s): Thrungus Hovels, Sanamar Starter Quests.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Insatiable Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems, Chasing Oswald, Eater Jaws.
Location of Jaw Droppers: Four drop the jaw near the exit portal at the bottom. Each is located in a dead end alcove just around the corner from the portal.
Submitted by Druideth of TD.

location.name: Lola's Den
location.description:
Quest(s): Brewmaster.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.restrictions: 80+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Huntman Of Silyun.
location.name: Lugian Ice Tunnels
location.description:
Quest(s): Chasing Oswald.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Moist Hovel
location.description:
Quest(s): Thrungus Hovels, Sanamar Starter Quests.
This hovel is home to the thieving Thrungum. Any stolen items found herein should be returned to a Portal Guardian.

location.name: Mossy Cave (Shoushi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Trade Alliance.
Home of the Mossy Herb used in the Trade Alliance Quest. Note that there are two Mossy Cave dungeons in the game.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Path of the Blind
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Tukora Lieutenants), Nanjou Shou-jen Armor.
Also known as Geth Tukora. These Lugians use hollow weapons and drop high xp trophies that can be turned in to the Sanamar Collector.
Submitted by Wile E Coyote SC.

location.name: Penguin Den
location.description:
Quest(s): Lorca Sammel's Missing Necklace, Sanamar Starter Quests.
One of the starter dungeons for Sanamar.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.
location.monsters: Cute little penguins. Bit aggressive though.

location.name: Remote Empyrean Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Brewmaster Quest, Eater Jaws, Fiun Healing Machine.
The dungeon is located on a small island between Traitor's Island and Lotila Island.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Ruined Empyrean Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Eater Jaws.
The Voracious Eater Jaw is dropped by the Eaters on the lowest level of the dungeon (go up first, next jump down two pits).
Submitted by Shobuck Jr (Leafcull).

location.name: Cannibal Caverns
location.description:
Quest(s): Red Bull of Sanamar.
Submitted by Shobuck Jr (Leafcull).
location.monsters: Engorged Eaters, Atavistic Fiun, Cannibal Fiun, Demented Fiun, Deranged Fiun

location.name: Enzo Ilario
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Arctic Mattekar).
Enzo Ilario tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Arctic Mattekars for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
Submitted by Morgwyn on Verdantine.

location.name: Ruschk Icehold
location.description:
Quest(s): Chasing Oswald.
Near the end of the dungeon in a side tunnel are Varette's Orders.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Small Empyrean Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Healing Machine.
You need lockpick or a Sturdy Iron Key to retrieve the Lavus for the Fiun Healing Machine.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Steaming Hovel
location.description:
Quest(s): Thrungus Hovels, Sanamar Starter Quests.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Sultry Hovel
location.description:
Quest(s): Thrungus Hovels, Sanamar Starter Quests.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Undead Temple
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Healing Machine.
To get to the final room with the Healing Machine Orb, you need to hand the Runic Skull from the Greater K'nath Lair to the Runic Door Guardian.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Viamontian Garrison
location.description:
Quest(s): Brewmaster.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.restrictions: 80+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Fir Tree.
location.name: Viamontian Royal Prison
location.description:
Quest(s): Chasing Oswald.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Viamontian Torture Chamber
location.description:
Quest(s): Eleonora's Heart Quest.
The locked door can be lock-picked, or opened using the Torture Chamber Key that is laying on a bed half way down.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcul.
location.monsters: Viamontian Torturer, Executioner

location.name: Waterfall Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Brewmaster.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Eastwatch Outpost Lifestone
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC.

location.name: Fiun Outpost Lifestone
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC.

location.name: Sanamar Lifestone
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC.

location.name: Silyun Lifestone
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC.

location.name: Westwatch Outpost Lifestone
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC.

location.name: Statue of King Varicci II
location.description:
To commemorate the founding of our new home and our conquests to follow.
Built in the first year of the reign of our monarch, King Varicci di Corcosi, second of his name.

location.name: Beacon Tower Exit
location.description: This portal drops you close to Sanamar.8

location.name: Marauder's Lair
location.description: Quest(s): Marauder's Lair.

location.name: Heart of Madness
location.description: Quest(s): Knights of Karlun.

location.name: Karlun's Fort Portal
location.description: Quest(s): Knights of Karlun.

location.name: Karlun's Fort
location.description:
Quest(s): Knights of Karlun.
Located on top of a hill just outside Silyun. There is a portal at 89.0N 67.6W to gain entrance (Restricted to characters 40+).
NPCs
Lian di Alduressa Guard x2 Sir Ginazio

location.name: Karlun's Fort Exit Portal
location.description: Quest(s): Knights of Karlun.

location.name: Hall of Karlun
location.description: Quest(s): Knights of Karlun.

location.name: Hidden City
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Healing Machine.
The dungeon is located on the northern smaller islands. To get there, you need to do a little bit of cliff negotiating.
To retrieve the Healing Machine Pedestal, you need either lockpick or a Sturdy Iron Key.

location.name: Beacon
location.description:
Quest(s): Beacon Tower.
This beacon is located on top of the beacon tower and can be accessed through a portal in Sanamar.

location.name: Beacon Tower Exit
location.description: Quest(s): Beacon Tower.

location.name: Beacon Tower Exit
location.description:
Quest(s): Beacon Tower.
This portal drops you close to Sanamar.

location.name: Beacon Tower Exit
location.description:
Quest(s): Beacon Tower.
This portal drops you close to Sanamar.

location.name: Beacon Tower
location.description:
Quest(s): Beacon Tower.
This structure is floating above the ground and may be reached by using a portal in Sanamar.

location.name: Ruschk Iceberg
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Healing Machine.
You will need the Ruschk Iceberg Key from the Frozen Library. At the end of the dungeon is the Healing Machine Hook in a locked chest (need lockpick).

location.name: Ravenous Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Chasing Oswald, Eater Jaws.
This is a popular leveling dungeon and at the bottom several special eaters drop a jaw that can be turned in for 35 million xp, an MMD note, a D note, and the title "Ravenous Slayer" when given to Clemenza (72.8N, 73.4W) in Westwatch. There's a three week timer for the jaw.

location.name: Ruschk Totem
location.description: Quest(s): Thief of Lunnum.

location.name: Penguin Cave Hatchery
location.description:
Quest(s): Penguin Eggs.
Take Cave Penguin Eggs and Great Cave Penguin Eggs to Chef Martam at 87.4N 70.6W in Silyun.

location.name: Feeding Tubes
location.description: Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Grievver Violators), Nanjou Shou-jen Armor.

location.name: Augmentation Realm
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Every four weeks you can obtain an augmentation gem from the corpse of Sir Bellas to use in giving your character special abilities and characteristics. See the quest Augmentation Gems for more details.
Note that there are several portals in the Lower Level that lead to the Main Level, most of them are untiable, however at least one of them is tiable/summonable.
location.monsters: Insatiable, Ravenous Eater, Twisted Shadow, Viamontian Lord, Tribune, Sir Bellas

location.name: Abhorrent Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Chasing Oswald, Eater Jaws.
This is a popular leveling dungeon and at the bottom several special eaters drop a jaw that can be turned in for 15 million xp, an MMD note, and a title when given to Clemenza (72.8N, 73.4W) in Westwatch. There's a three week timer for the jaw.

location.name: Silver Legion Keep
location.description: Quest(s): Zaikhal Defender.

location.name: Gold Legion Keep
location.description: Quest(s): Zaikhal Defender.

location.name: Copper Legion Keep
location.description: Quest(s): Zaikhal Defender.

location.name: Lightless Tunnels
location.description:
Quest(s): Gem of Impulse.
This dungeon contains the following items from the Gem of Impulse Quest: Crystal Nodule
Within Uninhabited Area.
location.monsters: K'naths D'Nob, N'Gell, N'osaj, S'tath, T'aed, Z'bog, Scrawed Grievver, Shadow Child

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Xaa Xiil
location.name: Nightmare Gate
location.description:
Quest(s): Sepulcher Of Nightmares.
An Empyrean Temple style Fortress at 89.7S 93.9W on Caul, with a floating Advocate Spire and an Empyrean Light House style tower. The Nightmare Gate (Object) can be found on top of the tower. Handing the Vestibule Lock to the Nightmare Gate (Object) will give 21 days access to the Nightmare Gate dungeon. Surrounded by a huge mob of monsters.
Submitted by: Lithea Sarmad.

location.name: Coral Caves
location.description:
Quest(s): Water of Stasis Quest.
Submitted by Uzi-El.
location.monsters: Contains Ancient Coral Golems and a handful of Blood Golems.

location.name: Creepy Canyons
location.description:
Quest(s): Darling's Collar.
Despite this quest being restricted to characters level 180 and higher, it's not that difficult, at least with a modest Melee Defense skill. The entire quest requires fighting Darling in one of the smallest quest dungeons you'll ever encounter.
1. Talk to Xsao Lann in Fort Tethana. 2. Run to Creepy Canyons at 4.6N, 89.5W (level 180+). 3. Kill Darling. 4. Return Collar to Xsao Lann.
Submitted by Uzi-El

location.restrictions: 140+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Edobar the Esoteric or Gallatria du Ressetta.
location.name: Frozen Cenotaph
location.description:
Quest(s): Grael's Rage.
Description on Portal: This dungeon is quest restricted. Royal scholars in Cragstone or Sanamar might be interested in the secrets it holds.
Final dungeon in the Books of Grael quest.

location.name: Lost Coastal Archive
location.description:
Quest(s): Grael's Rage.
Submitted by Uzi-El.

location.name: Lost Desert Archive
location.description:
Quest(s): Grael's Rage.
Submitted by Uzi-El.

location.name: The Fazenda Caves
location.description:
Quest(s): Farmer Kao's Plea for Help.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC.

location.name: Blue Coral Reef
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ.
Use it to spawn several Guardian Blue Coral Golems.
Submitted by Uzi-El

location.name: Forger's Hideout
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfit Writ.
On top of a huge spire in the south Dires. Full of Bandit Forgers, a couple of Eaters, and Gronk the Hammer.

location.name: Bandit Mansion to Bandit Castle
location.description: Submitted by Uzi-El.

location.restrictions: Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Couterfit Writ.
location.name: Keep Out!
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Dereth Exploration.
Destination: KEEP OUT! Drops At: Forger's Hideout.
Submitted by Uzi-El.

location.name: Hagra's Holdfast
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Bone and Hide Shirt Quest.
Home to Big Chief Hagra and his Mosswarts who have been stealing Hea Kassoka's supplies.

location.name: Renegade Incursion
location.description:
Quest(s): Fort Tethana Tug of War.
Part of Fort Tethana Tug of War where the the Renegades are attempting to tunnel beneath the Fort Teth defenses. Arwyth Margyle has since replaced Jared Kurth as commander. 7 Tumerok Majors guard the entrance portal.

location.name: Ruschk Camp
location.description: Quest(s): Squalid Shield.

location.name: Ruschk Camp
location.description: Quest(s): Squalid Shield.

location.name: Ruschk Camp
location.description: Quest(s): Squalid Shield.

location.name: Dionaea
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Dionaea tells you, "If you bring me five of the red monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Fly Trap!"

location.name: Drozer
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Drozer tells you, "If you bring me five of the orange monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Sundew!

location.name: Sara Sen
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Sara Sen tells you, "If you bring me five of the yellow monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Pitcher Plant!".

location.name: Collector (Sanamar)
location.description: Sanamar Collector takes Eater and other Trophies from the Throne of Destiny expansion

location.name: Clemenza
location.description:
Quest(s): Eater Jaws.
Clemenza tells you, "I am looking for warriors of exceptional ability to test against the kingdom's weapons. There are five Eater dens that I wish you to infiltrate. Return to me with the jaws of the beasts therein and I will reward you appropriately."

location.name: Alessandro Mardor
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Polardillos).
Alessandro Mardor tells you, "So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 10 of the terrible Polardillos for me, and I will reward you appropriately."

location.name: Jiang Li
location.description: Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Deathcap Thrungus).

location.name: Elena Du Furza
location.description:
Quest(s): The Beacon, Sanamar Starter Quests.
Elena Du Furza tells you, "The kingdom of Viamont requires your assistance."
Elena Du Furza tells you, "The Beacon at the top of the Beacon Tower requires regular maintenance. I have been unable to reach this beacon due to Wasps and other creatures taking up residence on the tower platforms. Place this gem within the beacon and you shall have the satisfaction of knowing that you have done your King a great service."
Elena Du Furza gives you Beacon Gem.

location.name: Rand
location.description:
Quest(s): Brewmaster.
Rand tells you, I see I have yet another brewing apprentice to deal with. Ever since the King shattered the barrier to the mainland, you people have been showing up in droves.
Rand tells you, Well, if you really want to learn the intricacies of brewing, you'll have to do me a favor first.
Rand tells you, A band of Drudges stole my brewing bible. I need some hardy soul to find it for me.
Last I saw them, the dirty thieves were headed in the direction of the Waterfall Cave at 84.0N 75.4W.
Rand tells you, Return that brewing bible to me, and I'll fill your head with the arcane secrets of the brewing world!

location.name: Anton Sillezi
location.description:
Quest(s): Trade Alliance Quest.
Anton motions for you to come closer.
Anton Sillezi tells you, You seem to be a person that is out to see the world.
Anton Sillezi tells you, Perhaps you could do me a favor?
Anton Sillezi tells you, I want to establish a trade network between Holtburg, Yaraq and Shoushi.
Anton Sillezi tells you, To do that I need a brave and stu..courageous soul such as yourself to make contact with the local merchants of those towns.
Anton Sillezi tells you, Here. I've prepared these letters inviting them to my trade network.
Anton Sillezi gives you Lubziklan al-Luq Trade Proposal.
Anton Sillezi gives you Gonjoku Den Trade Proposal.
Anton Sillezi gives you Renald the Eldest Trade Proposal.
Anton Sillezi tells you, This letter goes to Lubziklan al-Luq of Yaraq.
Anton Sillezi tells you, This one to Gonjoku Den of Shoushi.
Anton Sillezi tells you, And this last one to Renald the Eldest of Holtburg.
Anton Sillezi tells you, Return to me when you have received an answer and I'll reward you handsomely.
Anton Sillezi tells you, Not that I don't trust your memory, but here are directions so you don't get lost.
Anton Sillezi gives you Trade Contacts.

location.name: Red Bull of Sanamar
location.description: The Red Bull of Sanamar ignores you.

location.name: Lorca Sammel
location.description:
Quest(s): Sanamar Starter Quests.
Lorca Sammel tells you, Would you please help me? I have lost my most precious heirloom. And I am afraid that I have not the combat prowess required to obtain it.
Lorca Sammel tells you, A group of wild beasts waylaid me as I wandered outside the city walls. If I had not run quickly to the town gates, I surely would have met my end.
Lorca Sammel tells you, If you would, please explore the lair near 71.7N 60.4W. If you find my necklace, please return it to me. I will reward you as handsomely as I am able.
Lorca Sammel tells you, I realize that such a quest is beneath your abilities, but if you would help me, I would be most grateful.

location.name: Collector
location.description: Collector tells you, I'm interested in monster trophies from common rats, red phyntos wasps, armoredillos, Drudges, Mosswarts, Banderlings, penguins, and Ruschk. If you give me such an item, I will reward you with money or an item. With regret, I don't deal in hides.

location.name: Fabian Strinjelli
location.description:
Quest(s): Thief of Lunnum.
Fabian Strinjelli tells you, It is wonderful to see new Viamontian arrivals on Dereth! Be glad you did not arrive here when we did. The war with the Duke was bad enough, but the siege of the Olthoi nearly destroyed us all. May King Varicci be forever blessed by the glory of Karlun!

location.name: Tailor Monique du Bressa
location.description:
Tailor Monique du Bressa tells you, Good day, friend!
Tailor Monique du Bressa tells you, Be careful out there.

location.name: Paissen du Kim
location.description: Paissen du Kim tells you, Stay clear of the Eaters. The King may have found a way to harness their destructive energy, but they're still a most fearsome beast. They would as soon slay us as they would the Bloodless.

location.name: Luressi di Maki
location.description:
Luressi di Maki tells you, I know I'm taking a grave risk in talking to you, but I must follow my conscience.
Luressi di Maki tells you, There is a town on the island north of here where the rebels of Bellenesse make their home. They call this place Silyun. You can find it at 87.1N 70.6W.
Luressi di Maki tells you, Go there. Speak to the Grand Mother. I think she will convince you, as she did me, that the rebels of Silyun should be aided in their rightful struggle against the King.
Luressi di Maki tells you, If you would like, I could sell you a portal gem to Silyun. One V note is all I ask. As a gesture of goodwill.
You give Luressi di Maki Trade Note (500).
Luressi di Maki tells you, Do with this as you see fit, friend.
Luressi di Maki gives you Silyun Portal Gem.

location.name: Stuven di Bonachien
location.description:
Stuven di Bonachien tells you, The Duke's rebellion died a long time ago, which we are all grateful for, of course. But to think of how the King ended it...
Stuven di Bonachien tells you, I know that Eleonora du Bellenesse slew Prince Renlen, and for that she deserved her execution. But the manner in which it was done... It's enough to make you weep.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II Spells.
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Life Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II Spells.
Apprentice Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II Spells.
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Life Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II Spells.
Apprentice Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II Spells.
Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II Spells.
Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Traveling Salesman
location.description: Shopkeeper tells you, I had heard that an influx of new arrivals were headed this way. Please take a look at my wares! I'd be happy to do business with a fellow Viamontian!

location.name: Grand Knight
location.description:
Quest(s): Dericost Ruin, Knights of Karlun, Red Bull of Sanamar.
Grand Knight tells you, You're new to Sanamar, are you not? If you desire to prove your loyalty to the King, I have a task you may find interesting.
Grand Knight tells you, The King has been informed of an ancient tome which lies in a ruined underground city. He dispatched a company of knights to the ruins, but they were repelled by the beasts within. The craven dogs spread tales of ghosts and undead before I had them executed for cowardice.
Grand Knight tells you, I need someone to enter the ruins and retrieve this tome. If you do this for me, I may have more tasks for you in the future. Of course, if you fail or otherwise betray me, then I'll have nothing to do with you ever again.
Grand Knight tells you, You can find the ruins near the outpost of Westwatch at 74.2N 74.2W. I expect to hear from you soon.
Grand Knight tells you, But know this - the Grand Mother of Silyun also seeks this tome. Complete this task for me and she will have nothing more to do with you. Though, why you would want to socialize with those damnable rebels is beyond me.

location.name: Gallatria du Ressetta
location.description:
Quest(s): Grael's Rage, Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Gallatria du Ressetta tells you, If you would seek to help King Varicci in his attempt to bring order to the Bloodless of the mainland, I have a task for you.
Gallatria du Ressetta tells you, Venture into the swamps near the Sho hovel of Sawato. Look for the hideout of a Sclavus named Ssavish at 23.2 S, 58.3 E. That creature holds the knowledge of certain archives with... useful information. Go to the archives it speaks of, and bring me whatever books you find there.

location.name: Scrivener of Creature Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Creature tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Life Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Life tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of War Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of War tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Item Magic (Sanamar)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Item tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Piersanti Linante
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Piersanti Linante tells you, I will train you to withstand the most powerful and critical of attacks. Bring me a blank augmentation gem.
Piersanti lowers his voice and looks around warily.
Piersanti Linante tells you, You may need to speak to the Fiun who calls itself Rehlyun. You can find it at the Fiun Outpost.
Piersanti Linante gives you Critical Protection.

location.name: Blacksmith
location.description: Blacksmith tells you, A fellow warrior of Viamont! Well met, my friend!

location.name: Archmage
location.description: Archmage tells you, Welcome, my friend. It fills me with pride to serve a fellow Viamontian.

location.name: Healer
location.description: Healer tells you, Welcome, fellow child of Karlun. I will do all that I can to aid you.

location.name: Master Scrivener of Life Magic (Westwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level V Spells.
Master Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Master Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Master Scrivener of Item Magic (Westwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level V Spells.
Master Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Master Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Master Scrivener of War Magic (Westwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level V Spells.
Master Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Master Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Master Scrivener of Creature Magic (Westwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level V Spells.
Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Fratellodunon Ribellarista
location.description:
Undecided:
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, You are not from around here.
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, It might be best if you leave before you become entangled in the politics of this area.
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, ...
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, If you insist on staying I suggest that you talk to the Grand Knight in Sanamar.
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, He can better explain problems that plague this area.
Bull:
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, "I have heard of your deeds."
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, "The Stag of Bellenese is dead! Why must you and my twin brother resurrect this old hate."
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, "Are you so blind that you cannot see the misery that this will bring?"
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, "Renounce your ties to the rebellion. It is not yet too late."
Fratellodunon Ribellarista breaks down and cries.
Fratellodunon Ribellarista tells you, "Not..too..late..."

location.name: Fratellone Ribellarista
location.description:
Undecided:
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, Where do your loyalties lie? Is it with the Bull or Stag?
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, Perhaps you are undecided. Talk to the Grand Mother, perhaps she can open your eyes to our cause.
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, I look forward to seeing you on the side of the righteous.
Stag:
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, "I have heard of you. The Grand Mother has sent word of your deeds."
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, "Know that the time is near. The Stag of Bellenesse will once again rise up to unshackle the bonds of our oppressors."
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, "Death to the King!"
Fratellone Ribellarista tells you, "Keep the faith my friend!"

location.name: Marlan Nessunello
location.description: Marlan Nessunello tells you, Silyun is the last refuge for the people of the Duchy of Bellenesse. Long ago we rebelled against King Varricci. Unfortunately our rebellion was short lived and we were forced to flee. This town is all that is left of the survivors.

location.name: Aldonti di Soludatis the Jeweler
location.description: Aldonti di Soludatis the Jeweler tells you, Welcome to my shop. I sell only the finest jewelry.

location.name: Bowyer Cecili Blocconda
location.description: Bowyer Cecili Blocconda tells you, Welcome to my shop.

location.name: Aidanan Ignarias the Blacksmith
location.description: Aidanan Ignarias the Blacksmith tells you, I make the best blades and armor in all of Dereth! And all of them proudly bear the mark of the Stag!

location.name: Mancanza the Wanderer
location.description:
Quest(s): The Hunt for Muldaveus.
Mancanza the Wanderer tells you, "I have been wandering these lands in search of the Lugian Renegade Muldaveus. My journey has not gotten me very far. All I have found so far is a torn journal page, and various rumors that he may have survived his tangle with the Burun. I have written down several of these Muldaveus "sightings", and I was wondering if you could help me investigate. Go to these places. See if you can bring me any clues to his whereabouts. Good Luck!" Mancanza the Wanderer gives you Muldaveus Sightings.

location.name: Lila Fiori
location.description:
Quest(s): Snow Lily.
Lila Fiori tells you, What am I to do? The Grand Mother has placed an order for fresh Snow Lilies, but I am all out. Can you help me?
Lila Fiori tells you, Go to the Isle of Ruin and bring me back three fresh Snow Lilies. They are very rare so you will have to search for them.
Lila Fiori tells you, Be careful when picking them as they tend to attract hungry creatures.
Lila Fiori tells you, ...Why am I telling you my problems? You are much too weak to be able to retrieve the Snow Lilies that I need.

location.name: Agonno Filleteppe the Tailor
location.description:
Agonno Filleteppe the Tailor tells you, Welcome. Step this way and I shall measure you for a fine set of clothes.
Agonno Filleteppe the Tailor tells you, Did you hear? I heard the rebels are secretly recruiting. Of course, you didn't hear that from me.

location.name: Mendica Scarsolo
location.description:
Mendica Scarsolo tells you, Please, some pyreal to feed my five children.
You give Mendica Scarsolo Pyreal.
Mendica Scarsolo tells you, May the light of Eleonora du Bellenesse shine upon you.
*Note if you drag a stack of Pyreal on him, he only takes one.

location.name: Barkeeper Mallia Quios
location.description: Barkeeper Mallia Quios tells you, I know lots of things that happen around here. For the right price I'd be willing to share some of this information.

location.name: Calvinne Sporgenzenni the Shopkeeper
location.description: Calvinne Sporgenzenni the Shopkeeper tells you, Ah! A customer! What can I do for you today?

location.name: Scorus
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Healing Machine.
Scorus tells you, You come to Silyun, Isparian? Are you no friend of the Slayer?
Scorus tells you, The Slayer has unleashed the Eaters upon us. They hunt us as they did in the land before. Those they do not kill, they madden instead.
Scorus tells you, But there may be a cure. The mages who graced this land prior crafted marvelous artifacts - items of great power. Find these items. Create the machine. Perhaps we may cure our maddened kin.
Scorus gives you Healing Machine Recipe.
Scorus gives you A Message from Scorus.
Scorus tells you, One moment. A warning must be given.
Scorus tells you, One of your experience may not be able to retrieve all the pieces.
Scorus tells you, Some advice. If you cannot succeed now, gain more then try again.
Scorus tells you, Good luck, friend.

location.name: Raimonestes Risolu
location.description: Raimonestes Risolu tells you, She's so beautiful isn't she?

location.name: Sacci Mijob
location.description:
Sacci Mijob tells you, One cannot help but notice the enmity of those that dwell in Silyun.
Sacci Mijob tells you, Those who are not blue are perceived as inferior.
Sacci Mijob tells you, This I do not understand as they were once oppressed themselves.
Sacci Mijob tells you, I must contemplate on this some more.

location.name: Archmage Pazzescorios di Frodenci
location.description: Archmage Pazzescorios di Frodenci tells you, I am very busy. Can this not wait? No? So be it then! Please hurry.

location.name: Grand Mother
location.description:
Quest(s): Eleonora's Heart, Knights of Karlun, Marauder's Lair.
Grand Mother tells you, You are a stranger to Silyun and owe us nothing. Even so, I beseech you listen to my words and help me heal an old man's grieving heart.
Grand Mother tells you, The Duke's daughter, Eleonora, was a proud and noble warrior. She led our people to many great victories in the war against Varicci. But her skill was not enough to hide her from the King's vengeance forever.
Grand Mother tells you, Before the Fiun barrier was dropped - before we even knew of the existence of lifestones - Eleonora fell in battle against Varicci himself.
Grand Mother tells you, He took her to his torture chamber and murdered the poor girl. When he delivered her body to us, we were horrified to learn that he had removed her heart.
Grand Mother tells you, The Duke has not been the same since that day. His grief knows no end. But if we could retrieve that young warrior's heart, I am certain that his grief would begin to subside.
Grand Mother tells you, Journey to the Royal Hall of Sanamar, enter the torture chamber, and put an end to this tragedy.
Grand Mother tells you, But I warn you - if you do this, you will fall out of favor with the Grand Knight of Sanamar. He may well treat you with the same enmity with which he and his King have long treated us.

location.name: Scribe Copiara Parolinnis
location.description: Mendica Scarsolo tells you, I got these clothes from Agonno the tailor. He said some Bloodless had brought them in and he couldn't sell it.

location.name: Benedetta du Lucrezza the Healer
location.description: Benedetta du Lucrezza the Healer tells you, A harsh land such as this ensures that I have a steady stream of customers. How may I help you?

location.name: Chef Martam
location.description:
Quest(s): Cave Penguin Eggs.
Chef Martam tells you, What am I to do?
Chef Martam tells you, Grand Mother of Silyun...she is so terribly unhappy.
Chef Martam tells you, I must make something to cheer her up. But what?

location.name: Rickard Dumalia
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Rickard Dumalia tells you, Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I will teach you to learn more from the challenges that you face. Visit Fiun Rehlyun if you don't already have a blank gem.
Rickard Dumalia gives you Quick Learner.

location.name: Mariabella Varanese
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Polar Ursuin).
Mariabella Varanese tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Polar Ursuine for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Fiun Archmage
location.description:
Buys at xx%, sells at 180%.
Fiun Archmage tells you, Welcome. We have endured much suffering at the hands of those of Ispar. But we believe that one day your people will recognize the cruelty by which your leaders lead.

location.name: Fiun Healer
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at ??%.
Fiun Healer tells you, Welcome. We have endured much suffering at the hands of those of Ispar. But we believe that one day your people will recognize the cruelty by which your leaders lead.

location.name: Gianni Vernice
location.description: Gianni Vernice tells you, It is true that the Fiun are responsible for creating the Eaters. However, they did not do so out of malice. They thought they were doing the universe a great service. But the Eaters broke free of their bonds and decimated the Fiun homeworld. Now the Fiun focus their collective will in an effort to permanently eradicate the Eaters.

location.name: Senior Sage Shibak
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Spellcasting Gloves.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, I am Senior Sage Shibak. I welcome you, Human.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, Tales of your great deeds have spread wide and far. Long have I awaited your arrival.
Shibak stares at you silently then continues.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, We of the Fiun have long labored to rectify that which we are the cause.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, To that end we have dedicated our lives so our fate does not become yours.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, That is why it is with great concern that those that would save this world have fallen silent.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, Perhaps one such as yourself would help me?
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, Speak to Fiun Abayar and return with that which is spoken.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, The place of which you must seek lies at 92.1N 46.3W and is barred from those not invited.
Shibak touches your forehead with one finger and whispers faintly.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, I have opened the way for you.
Senior Sage Shibak tells you, Hurry. Much importance is of the knowing.

location.name: Fiun Blacksmith
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at ??%.
Fiun Blacksmith tells you, Welcome. We have endured much suffering at the hands of those of Ispar. But we believe that one day your people will recognize the cruelty by which your leaders lead.

location.name: Fiun Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at ??%.
Fiun Shopkeeper tells you, Welcome. We have endured much suffering at the hands of those of Ispar. But we believe that one day your people will recognize the cruelty by which your leaders lead.

location.name: Fiun Rehlyun
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Rehlyun tells you, You wish to improve yourself? Enhance those abilities which might otherwise languish? Return to me the Jaw of the Insatiable. Prove yourself.

location.name: Fiun Luunere
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Luunere tells you, To improve strength innate, bring an augmentation gem to me. Fiun Luunere tells you, Seek out Fiun Rehlyun should you require a blank gem.
Fiun Luunere gives you Reinforcement of the Lugians.

location.name: Fiun Noress
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Noress tells you, The inner workings of the mind can be difficult to comprehend. My life has been dedicated to such. Perhaps if you were to bring me an augmentation gem I may be able to impart some of my findings unto you so that improvement of self can be reached. Fiun Noress tells you, Fiun Rehylun may be asked if you do not have a gem.
Fiun Noress gives you Steadfast Will.

location.name: Fiun Ruun
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Ruun tells you, Improved endurance can be achieved with the assistance of an augmentation gem. Fiun Ruun tells you, Seek Fiun Rehylun should the acquiring of a gem be needed.
Fiun Ruun gives you Bleeargh's Fortitude.

location.name: Fiun Bayaas
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Bayaas tells you, If the improvement of coordination is what is required, bring me an augmentation gem. Fiun Bayaas tells you, If the finding of an augmentation is required, speak with Fiun Rehlyun.
Fiun Bayaas gives you Oswald's Enhancement.

location.name: Fiun Vasherr
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Vasherr tells you, If it is your wish to improve the focus of oneself, bring me an augmentation gem and I shall empower it thusly. Fiun Vasherr tells you, Fiun Rehlyun should be sought for information upon how to obtain such gems.
Fiun Vasherr gives you Enduring Calm.

location.name: Fiun Riish
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Fiun Riish tells you, To improve quickness innate, bring an augmentation gem to me. Fiun Riish tells you, Should a gem be required, speak with Fiun Rehlyun for advice upon how to obtain one.
Fiun Riish gives you Siraluun's Blessing.

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of Item Magic (Eastwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI.
Grand Master Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of War Magic (Eastwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI.
Grand Master Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Moina
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Grievver Violators).
Moina tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 100 of the terrible Grievver Violators for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Healer
location.description: Healer tells you, I have pledged to heal all, Viamontian or no. We may be enemies in this great conflict, but a healer is not a healer if he refuses to help another in need.

location.name: Shopkeeper
location.description: Shopkeeper tells you, What do you need from me, cur?

location.name: Archmage
location.description: Archmage tells you, Were it not for the King's mandate, I would slay you where you stand. But I am a loyal subject of the King, no matter how misguided I consider this course of action.

location.name: Blacksmith
location.description: Blacksmith tells you, The King has issued an edict that we must deal with you Bloodless rabble. But he will change his mind soon enough. And when that happens, I will decorate my hearth with the skulls of you and your kin.

location.name: Ricardo
location.description:
Quest(s): Blood Gem of Rikt Zir.
Ricardo tells you, Well met, adventurer!
Ricardo lowers his voice warily and then continues.
Ricardo tells you, My name is Ricardo and I am part of a rebel faction of Viamontians that seeks to overthrow the despotic ruler, King Varicci.
Ricardo tells you, Recently our spies have learned that the King has launched a massive campaign to recover a powerful Falatacot artifact called the Blood Gem of Rikt Zir.
Ricardo tells you, What this gem does is still unknown, but one thing is for sure. We can not let Varicci get his hands on it.
Ricardo tells you, Our sources have unearthed an obscure legend from some ancient Falatacot ruins.
Ricardo tells you, It claims the gem was fractured into three pieces and then hidden in some caves near the ocean.
Ricardo tells you, We believe the caves referred to in the legend are the Coral Caves at 90.5N 42.5W. Ricardo winces and rubs his injured leg.
Ricardo tells you, I tried to recover the gem myself, but was grievously injured and had to take refuge here.
Ricardo tells you, I have no choice, but to ask you to retrieve the Blood Gem for me...No. For the rebellion!
Ricardo tells you, Return the Blood Gem to me and may the Stag of Bellenesse watch over you!

location.name: Taku Yukio
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Naughty Skeletons).
Taku Yukio tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 100 of the terrible Naughty Skeletons for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Ruqaya al Mubarak
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Wicked Skeletons).
Ruqaya al Mubarak tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 100 of the terrible Wicked Skeletons for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Ryuichi Tai
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Floesharks).
Ryuichi Tai tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Floesharks for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic (Eastwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI.
Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of Life Magic (Eastwatch)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI.
Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Xun Yu
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Repugnant Eaters).
Xun Yu tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Repugnant Eaters for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Marcello
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Olthoi Rippers).
Marcello tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 250 of the terrible Olthoi Rippers for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Claire Artmad
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Tukora Lieutenants).
Claire Artmad tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 250 of the terrible Tukora Lieutenants for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Orfeo Orlando
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Mosswart Worshippers).
Orfeo Orlando tells you, So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 175 of the terrible Mosswart Worshippers for me, and I will reward you appropriately.

location.name: Archmage Zarri ibn Khaybi
location.description:
Quest(s): Portal Gems. Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Archmage Zarri ibn Khaybi tells you, Welcome, fellow seeker.

location.name: Xarabydun Life Stone to Xarabydun Town
location.description: From the Xarabydun Lifestone, this portal exits you UP TOP of Xarabydun.

location.name: Barkeep Anarn
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Barkeep Anarn tells you, Oy.
Barkeep Anarn tells you, Come back anytime, mate. I'll keep the taps flowing.

location.name: Farmer Kao
location.description:
Quest(s): Farmer Kao's Plea for Help.
Farmer Kao tells you, My crops! My livestock! Some vile creature has been ravaging my farm at night! Would you help me stop this terror? I have followed its tracks to a cave south of here, but I am too afraid to continue. Please help me.

location.name: Desert Citadel
location.monsters: Gotrok Extas, Tiatus, and Juggernauts

location.name: Zalphoos the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Zalphoos the Shopkeeper tells you, Welcome to my humble shop.
Zalphoos the Shopkeeper tells you, You drive a hard bargain, my friend.

location.name: Undead Housing
location.description: This is a pair of houses in the middle of the desert, surrounded by shadows and filled with undead of many types. On the second floor is a Sturdy Steel Chest and a Runed Chest Diff 300.
location.monsters: Demilich, Elite Revenant,Dark Master

location.name: Aderma the Lapidary
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Aderma the Lapidary tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Aderma the Lapidary tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Aderma the Lapidary tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Adraha bint Safsan the Appraiser
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Afsan ibn Kusain the Barkeep
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
My bar was almost at the center of the crater. Everything I owned was destroyed.

location.name: Ai Konaji the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Ai Konaji the Jeweler tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Aldera Brunall Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Almina bint Atwab the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic (Yaraq)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and Level II.
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic(Shoushi)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I (1st Floor), Level II (2nd Floor).
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic (Zaikhal)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II.
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic (Cragstone)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and Level II.
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic (Holtburg)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and Level II.
Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic (Yaraq)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and Level II.
Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic (Zaikhal)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level I and II.
Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Apprentice Scrivener of Item and War Magic (Cragstone)
location.description:

Buys at 70%, sells at 190%.
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Isolation can lead to insight or madness. Thank you for coming by."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "I was able to learn the secret of Lifestone Recall while adventuring in a nearby maze. I believe the maze contains other secrets, as well."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Let detachment guard you. Without detachment you will be unable to let go and move forward."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Let discipline hone you. Without discipline you will tire and fall away."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Joy can be found in the worst of situations. Please come by our shop again."

location.name: Aun Dreganaua the Elder Shaman
location.description:
Sells At 170% Buys At 80%. Platinum Scarabs 68k.
Aun Dreganaua the Elder Shaman tells you, "When the Virindi first came to us, we sounded for the anima of their kind...and then we were filled with terror, for we found that they had none."
Aun Dreganaua the Elder Shaman tells you, "The Hea will never be permitted back in Timaru so long as they persist in their dealings with atua ngamaru!"

location.name: Aun Laranawa the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Aun Maanuawa the Armorer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Aun Maanuawa the Armorer tells you, "This town has not been this busy since the Hea left to follow that outcast, Aranpuh."
Aun Maanuawa the Armorer tells you, "Do not trust anyone...or anything...that you meet once you venture outside our lands."
Aun Maanuawa grins cheerfully.
Aun Maanuawa the Armorer tells you, "Back again? Seems like you just left!"

location.name: Aun Ngaiona the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Aun Ngaiona the Jeweler tells you, "You will never be able to find ornaments as fine as these in Ahurenga--that town of outcasts and thieves!"
Aun Ngaiona the Jeweler tells you, "Please come again--I will have many more items in the future."

location.name: Aun Paikitea the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Aun Paikitea the Bowyer tells you, "I'm glad the Hea are no longer among us--I couldn't stand to be in their tainted presence ever again. Tailless abominations! Just look at their boy-tah. His traffic with the atua ngamaru left him quite mad, you know."
Aun Paikitea the Bowyer tells you, "Be sure not to cooperate with the Hea...or you may find our gates will be closed to you as well."

location.name: Aun Taguauri the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Aun Taguauri the Healer tells you, "Yet another in need of my help! Will Wharu's invasions never cease?"
Aun Taguauri the Healer tells you, "Take care as you venture into the wilds--there will be no one to protect you outside our drum circle."

location.name: Avorgild the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Avorgild the Shopkeeper tells you, "I'm surprised you made it up here. We enjoy our isolation."

location.name: Baggs the Armorer
location.description:
In the fall of 2005, Viamontians raided Marae Lassal and captured some of its townfolk.
Baggs tells you, They came in the night. The next day, I went to all the people of Bluespire, telling them that we had to fight! That's why they locked me up in here...
Within Viamontian Torture Chamber.

Barkeep Mordmor tells you, "I hope you found what you needed, our stocks have become depleted."

location.name: Brother Klars Melankeep the Monk
location.description:
In the fall of 2005, Viamontians raided Marae Lassal, capturing and imprisoning some of its townfolk.
Klars tells you, I am so worried about the other people of Redspire. Behdo, Bachus, all the rest... are they well? Can you bring them word of my plight?
Within Viamontian Torture Chamber.

location.name: Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk
location.description:
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, Good day. Be quick, I can hear the guards just outside.
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, Thank you. Did you hear about Brother Klars in Redspire?
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, I wouldn't normally take one of these, but I'm taking no chances.
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, I'll be here the next time you come by. Hopefully.

location.name: Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk
location.description:
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, Good day, traveler. Do you need any help? Have Varicci's men harmed you?
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, I had such grand plans for my shop, and now the Viamontians have come and ruined it all.
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, Thank you. I thought we would all do well out here on the frontier... I guess I was wrong.
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, If you see my brother Yusnar in Bluespire, tell him that I am well.

location.name: Bu-Chi Long the Armorer
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Cemcera the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Cemcera the Shopkeeper tells you, "Thank you."

location.name: Chueh Kaigin the Jeweler

location.name: Claude the Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Welcome to my shop. My name is Claude. How are you today?"
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Please, enjoy my one hundred and four items for purchase. I cast dispels in exchange for metals or promissory notes. My one hundred and fourth item is a rumor about the Obsidian Plains."
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Thank you for purchasing my wares. I appreciate your patronage."
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Return soon. Have a nice day."

location.name: Dafrida the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "Welcome to Lythelthorpe."
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "Welcome to my shop!"
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "It's a pleasure doing business with you."
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "A fine choice."
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "Thanks for coming by."

location.name: Danifa Gondmad the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Danifa Gondmad the Healer tells you, "I'm not going back to my house until I can lock my doors again. I'm letting the Captains of the Royal Guard use my shop as a base of operations until then."

location.name: Denki Sokuto the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Djuyat ibn Fisa the Armorer

location.name: Dorlan the Armorer
location.description:
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, I hope Ton Ai Yen in Redspire is all right.
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, They took Baggs! Dragged him right out of his tent! I could be next!
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, I hope Ton Ai Yen in Redspire is all right.
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, We were competitors, yes, but we were also friends. I hope he's all right.

location.name: Dortold the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Welcome. What can Dortold do for you?"
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Dortold thanks you for your business."
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Dortold thinks you have made a wise purchase. Dortold is happy."
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Dortold likes what he has bought."

location.name: Drawohan the Gem Seller
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ecutha the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

Ecutha the Tailor tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Ecutha the Tailor tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon.".

location.name: Eldrista the Adventurer
location.description:
Quest(s): Liltha's Lost Bow.
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "No more scrabbling in dungeons for me! If you want some of Lilitha's dirty old arrows, you can go get them yourself!"
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "What? You want the story? Well, just west of here is a dungeon called Hunter's Leap. You'll find it around 35.7N, 32.6E. Legend has it that the great hunter Lilitha lived there when she was younger, while she practiced her skills."
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "I never met her myself, but I have a lot of respect for someone with that kind of spirit. Anyway, when she moved out, she left behind a lot of the bows and arrows she had made -- substandard work, stuff she wasn't happy with. But it's still better than what most of these so-called archers can make today."
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "I made my living for a long time by collecting the arrows she left behind and selling them. But then the banderlings moved out and a new bunch moved in and my Farmer left and ... I just don't think I want to do that anymore."
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "But ... if you find one of her old bows, bring it to me and I'll see what I can do for a reward."

location.name: Ellimar Jorning the Healer
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.description: Within Arwic Mines.

Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "How may I help thee, traveler?"
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "An excellent purchase, friend."
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "Another fine component!"
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "May the wind be always at your back, traveler!"

Fertroth the Healer tells you, "Thank you, come again."

location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%
Fispur Ansel the Grocer tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Fletcher Peldin Yewbender
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Fletcher Peldin Yewbender tells you, "Welcome to Peldin's Bows friend. I think I killed about fifty of those Eaters when they were still attacking the town. They don't seem to enjoy pointy things being launched into their gapping maws. Do you need any missile weapons?"
Fletcher Peldin Yewbender tells you, "Did you hear the horrible news about Antius? He was a man I would have followed into battle. I can't believe that traitor Kurth was able to kill him. Fear of death, a real and final death, is something we haven't worried about for a long time."

location.name: Fyrdina Ellic the Weaponsmith
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Fyrdina Ellic the Weaponsmith tells you, "I'm selling armor and weapons while Londigul helps Miss Genza and the Captains of the Royal Guard organize the militia. What do you need?"

location.name: Gailadu the Scribe
location.description: Within Underground City.

location.name: Geldeb Finol the Weaponsmith

Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Greygor Stillwise the Armorer
location.description:
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, Greetings. Have you come to help us against the invaders?
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, Use it against Varicci's men!
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, I can always use more to restock my shelves -- it's so hard to get shipments in these days.
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, I'd recommend visiting Anh while you're up here, you can never be too careful.

location.name: Grocer Cortarn
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%. White Sacks.
Grocer Cortarn tells you, "Welcome to my shop!" Grocer Cortarn tells you, "Thank you for your patronage."
