location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Gylfolma the Scribe tells you, "Welcome. I'm glad to see someone interested in my scholary works."
Gylfolma the Scribe tells you, "I cannot see why anyone would be out there in the dangerous lands, but take care anyway."

location.name: Hau Ji Tan the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%

location.name: Hea Camauri the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Hea Kiriona the Shopkeep
location.description:
Sells at 155% buys at 90%. White Containers.
Hea Kiriona the Shopkeep tells you, "The strife in the south causes less trade. This is bad for both our peoples."
Hea Kiriona the Shopkeep tells you, "Please come again. I am particularly interested in Viamontian items."

location.name: Hea Nyrenauri the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hea Nyrenauri the Healer tells you, "The Virindi have only our best interests in mind--if you engaged their friendship, you might benefit as well."
Hea Nyrenauri the Healer tells you, "Be careful as you adventure here--the Aun are not to be trusted. I would not be surprised if they tried to drag you into their hopeless crusade."

location.name: Hea Nyrinua the Armorer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hea Nyrinua the Armorer tells you, "Is it true that there are many wondrous sights to see on the land across the water?"
Hea Nyrinua the Armorer tells you, "I would not bother traveling up to the highlands if I were you--it is dangerous there and populated only by timid, unimaginative folk. I've even heard that bukha Aun Ralirea has been spotted stalking the Ebon Gromnies among the plateau's peaks. Every year he stocks his lodge, expecting company...Aun just don't know when to let go."

location.name: Hea Palagura the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hea Palagura the Jeweler tells you, "I am so tired with Wharu's invasions and the Aun's sordid preoccupation with them! I'll bide my time here, then I'm off to join my brothers in Samsur." Hea Palagura the Jeweler tells you, "Don't take any wooden pyreals--I could name other xutas who aren't as honest as we are here in Ahurenga."

location.name: Hea Timitea the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.
Hea Timitea the Bowyer tells you, "I don't know why my xuta brethren say I'm not ready to leave for the mainland yet. I've followed the rules in our pact with the Virindi!" Hea Timitea the Bowyer tells you, "Next time we meet will be on the mainland, I'm sure!"

location.name: Healer Beysta
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Healer Beysta tells you, "Welcome to my store!"
Healer Beysta tells you, "You must be careful out there. Make sure you take plenty of healing supplies with you."

location.name: Healer Burah bint Fathlan
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Fan Lun-Kou
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Fridroth
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Healer Fridroth tells you, "What do you want?"
Healer Fridroth tells you, "Thanks. I hope you settle down in a safe place so you won't have to come back."

location.name: Healer Hisuf ibn Shudir
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Jilrisi ibn Makhur
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Kai Kou
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Healer Kai Tonweh
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Healer Kai Tonweh tells you, "The foul Gaerlan lies caged in his phylactery and Yanshi is reborn! I can assist with any health needs you may have."

location.name: Healer Kana of Kara
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Healer Rili Sou
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Sanami Siohiro
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Sunwi
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Tonsho Ha
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Healer Xidan Fensen
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Helford Beldryn the Grocer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Helford Beldryn the Grocer tells you, "Our food supplies are desperately low. I'll pay well for any food you can bring in."
Helford Beldryn the Grocer tells you, "Remember, bring back any food you can! Our town depends on it!"

location.name: Henrid the Grocer
location.description: Within Underground City.

location.name: Hinnabqiq the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Hiruhi Fensen the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Hon Fo the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Hudriffa the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Hudriffa the Shopkeeper tells you, "Welcome to the South Holtburg supply store!"
Hudriffa the Shopkeeper tells you, "Thank you. If you're new here, go through the Training Academy, and then go to Holtburg, to the north."

location.name: Hunderth the Provisioner
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hunderth the Provisioner tells you, "We were lucky. We could have lost a lot more people than we did. Those poor Scriveners. I'll never forgive the Viamonts for this."

location.name: Hydeatha the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ichi Ji
location.description: Ichi Ji tells you, "I've never had a customer that didn't live down here with us before. This has been an odd time. Now you people are crawling all over the place. There's nothing to see here."

location.name: Idenne Sulmad the Seamstress
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Idenne Sulmad the Seamstress tells you, "The Artisan's put up another tent where their old one was. They are surprisingly resilient for people who choose not to fight."
Idenne Sulmad the Seamstress tells you, "I helped the Artisan's make a new tent to replace the one they lost. They don't seem to harbor any anger against the Viamonts for what they have done. I respect their peaceful ideals, but I personally want some payback for Glenden Wood and Antius."

location.name: Iquba al-Julmud the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Ite Kenzen the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Jaikite Sanzen the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jasin of the Arcanum
location.description: This vendor resides inside the dungeon Hollow Lair near Lytelthorpe.

location.name: Jesren the Jolly Barkeep
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "I hope you enjoys your time in our hold. Just don't be preachin' about Pwyll or Jojii and we'll get on fine."
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "Yeah, good on you with that."
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "Sure, I can buy that."
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "Hope to see you around again, mate."

location.name: Jeweler Daryam ibn Zubed
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Jeweler Fathlan ibn Nuril
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Hawtala bint Arsha
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Imad Nedjim
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Jurraf al-Djiqidh
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Liman Pon
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Lo Dai-Ou
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Ryuhan Wu
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jhen Gau the Souvenir Hawker
location.description:
Sells At 190%.
Jhen Gau the Souvenir Hawker tells you, "Greetings, greetings! It is my honor to meet a fellow traveler in this distant land. Could I interest you in a memento, for the kids back in Dereth?"
Jhen Gau the Souvenir Hawker tells you, "Please tell your peers about me. No doubt they also have eager young journeymen under their tutelage, eager for spoils from this island. Surely, one of my shirts would be the most unique and memorable twink... er, souvenir!
Aerlinthe Patron Shirt (Inscribed: My patron went to Aerlinthe, and all I got was this lousy shirt.) Aerlinthe Monarch Shirt (Inscription: My monarch went to Aerlinthe, and all I got was this lousy shirt.)
Chicken (Use this item to eat it. Restores 10 Stamina when consumed.)
Image submitted by Kyn. Thanks!

location.name: Ji Tenxien the Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart Quest. Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What can I put on you today?
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "I guarantee you'll be the talk of the town with that new thing!"
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "Thank you for stopping by!"
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "I'll probably make a new pair of trousers with that ..."
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "If it ever gets a tear, come back and I'll fix it!"
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "Such a wonderful material! Thank you."
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "When they ask where you got such well-tailored clothes, please mention me!"

location.name: Jizal al-Nurla the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jo Gau the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Jo Ten-Ma
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Armor.
Jo Ten-Ma tells you, "How did I get saddled with this job, anyway? When I signed on to become Koga's apprentice I thought I would actually be making armor, not peddling pots and paints!"

location.name: Jumzik al-Budim the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Ka Ku-To the Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): Undead Mechanic. Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "The view from a great height can bring wisdom and awe, or just vertigo." Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "I just enjoying watching the windmills endlessly turn on a windy day."
Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "Looking within is sometimes harder than the most difficult dungeon."
Also sells the Inner Dungeon Key for the Undead Mechanic quest.

location.name: Kai Go-Sou the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kamira Mohonoko the Provisioner
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kan Chi Gai the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.
Kan Chi Gai the Healer tells you, "Welcome, I provide a simple service to those in need of healing."
Kan Chi Gai the Healer tells you, "Be careful out there, especially of the Virindi."

location.name: Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep
location.description:
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, Please, come in and rest. It's been so difficult since Varicci's men took over.
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, Many thanks.
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, These days, I'll stock any supplies I can get.
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, Have you any word from Redspire? My friend Bachus lives there and I've not heard from her since the invasion.

location.name: Kaza Nijina the Archmage
location.description:
Buys at 80%, sells at 170%.
Kaza Nijina the Archmage tells you, "Welcome to MacNiall's Freehold, outsider. We have almost anything you could want... at a price."
Kaza Nijina the Archmage tells you, "Go in freedom."

location.name: Kento Do the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kiun Baicho the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Koro of Kara, Farmer
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Kouxao Ei the Healer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kuyalal al-A'ma the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Ladim al-Faji the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lai Jhong the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lai Konsho the Armorsmith
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lalid al-Jasi the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lam Yi the Jeweler
location.description:
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, My beautiful jewels mean nothing to me, now that Klars is gone.
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, It's guaranteed to shine until Varicci's men drag me away. Yes, I know that's not funny, it's not a joke.
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, Yes, fine. Do you think that he's all right?
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, Please, try to find Klars? I miss him so.

location.name: Landeth Colson the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Landeth Colson the Jeweler tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Landeth Colson the Jeweler tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Lark Grifanna the Barkeep
location.description:
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, Here I was, listening to Bachus' tales of a Tumerok feud, with no idea that I'd find myself in the middle of an Isparian war!
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, Whether you need refuge or information, I can probably help you.
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, Oh, thank you, I was almost out of these.
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, I used to say we were living in interesting times. What did I know? These, these are truly interesting times.

location.name: Le Ben the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor
location.description:
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, At first, I was just happy to see new people, believe it or not.
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, Are you sure you don't need more?
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, I should have known... new friends don't arrive in the dead of night with drawn blades.
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, Take care, adventurer. Tell my friends in Ayan Baqur that I am safe, for now.

location.name: Lich Archmage
location.description: Like the Master Mages, Platinum Scarabs 44,000py.

location.name: Lin Hanza the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Lin Hanza the Bowyer tells you, "Your bow is your best friend when traveling these dangerous islands. What do you need?" Lin Hanza the Bowyer tells you, "Strike down one of those filthy Mosswarts, if you can."

location.name: Lisatha the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Lisatha the Bowyer tells you, "I sell and buy bows and arrows. Are you interested?"
Lisatha the Bowyer tells you, "This castle must surely have seen more pleasant days, long ago."

location.name: Lo Ma the Jeweler
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Lobu Shui the Armorer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Londigul Ellic the Armorer
location.description:
Quest(s): Glenden Wood Invaders.
Londigul Ellic the Armorer tells you, "We've driven the Viamontians out of town and back to where they have their blockades setup. Travel down any of the roads leading out of town to find the blockades and kill the invaders you find in that area. If you can kill twenty of the invaders I'll make you a member of the Glenden Wood Militia. Once you've proven you can fight we have more that you may be able to help us with."

location.name: Ludora the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Ludora the Healer tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Ludora the Healer tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Luthin the Smith
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Maftaltub al-Sur the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Magus Ku Min
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Maqura al-Waryah the Blacksmith
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Maryata bint Daris the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Melia Thorn the Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Melia Thorn the Archmage tells you, "Hmph. An outsider. Well, as long as you're here, you might as well make yourself useful. So buy something or talk to our captains. They'll give you something to do."
Melia Thorn the Archmage tells you, "Stay out of trouble."

location.name: Merchant
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Mi Chi the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Micon Stuvis the Barkeep
location.description:
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, Say what you will about the invaders, but they do have fascinating tales to tell.
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, All are welcome at the Siraluun's Wing, even Viamontians... as long as they can pay.
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, If you're sure you don't need this...
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, It's ironic... I advised Bachus to move here for her safety, and then this happened.

location.name: Milanna Russmad the Mage
location.description:
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, Greetings, traveler, it is good to see you. These invaders have been driving away my business.
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, Don't let those go to waste. Who knows when I'll be able to get more?
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, I can always use one of those.
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, Be sure to see Micon while you're here. And if you can, try to comfort poor Lam Yi.

location.name: Misha the Jeweler
location.description:
Misha the Jeweler tells you, I have so many beautiful things here... please, buy them before Varicci's men come and steal them!
Misha the Jeweler tells you, Conceal that under your armor if you expect to get it out of town!
Misha the Jeweler tells you, Lovely. Let me see where I can hide this.
Misha the Jeweler tells you, Come again soon, while I still have inventory to sell.

location.name: Mishiya al-Abdi the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Miya bint Atwab the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Monyra the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Mothdor the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at 80%.
Mothdor the Bowyer tells you, "Thanks for your patronage. Every little bit helps!"
Mothdor the Bowyer tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Mothdor the Bowyer tells you, "Good luck in your travels in this forsaken land!"

location.name: Muda bint Qalakh the Tailor
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Mulud al-Iyar the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Muoyen Han the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Muta al-Mai the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Najsuf al-Afan the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nashima al-Haruq the Healer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nasruya al-Khanjan the Tailor
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Natalie the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nathious Agoren the Jeweler
location.description:
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, How may I help you, adventurer? Are you come to help us?
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, I sell only the finest quality. You can trust me -- I'm not Viamontian.
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, Thank you for choosing my humble shop to sell your wares.
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, Please come again... and please, help us.

location.name: Nelvaine the Brewer
location.description:
Quest(s): Feud of Neydisa and Bandit Castle, Buadren, Invoker.
Nelvaine the Brewer tells you, "Come to sample my famous brews, have you? Seneschal Gormling, in particular, is fond of my Olde Ispar Stout. Unfortunately it goes straight to his head, lightweight that he is."
Nelvaine the Brewer tells you, "Cheers!"

location.name: Nen Gou the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nun Hong the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Nuru Misho the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nuya bint Mulud the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Oi Ra the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Old Wylfed the Scribe
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Old Wylfed the Scribe tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Ortun Trell the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Ortun Trell the Jeweler tells you, "I hear that the Captains in Danifa's shop brought some interesting information to Tomo Genza."
Ortun Trell the Jeweler tells you, "The death of Antius has saddened and worried everyone. If Varicci's mages can create weapons that really kill us we are in serious trouble."

location.name: Ostentatious Farmer
location.description:
Quest(s): Elysa's Favor.
Before Entering the Trap Door
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "Welcome to my grand opening! You are welcome to peruse my wares...but please, stay to the front of my shop--the heat from the fire is very strong, and I don't want you to get burned."
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "Thank you for your patronage. Now please be on your way, I have much work to do."
After Entering the Trap Door
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "How dare you nose around my house, when I expressely asked you not to? Ok, you can buy something, but after that, get out, GET OUT!"
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "Like I said, LEAVE! GO! OUT! NOW!"

location.name: Peddler (Rithwic)
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Crumpled Note on the floor.
As long as I am writing you, I will answer your question about the distant Carved Cave.
Start at Zaikhal, the proud capitol of the Gharu nation, and journey south for some distance. You will come to a great range of hills -- I can scarce call it mountains, though some flatlanders might. Here, in a low-roofed crevice, you will find the entrance to the Cave. Remember that you must have the other six keys before you venture through!
If you need more explicit directions, send a message to me and I will try to be more clear.
-- Tibri the Cavedweller, to Iquba al-Julmud.

location.name: Plateau Spice Merchant
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%
Plateau Spice Merchant tells you, "My spices are fresh and always in stock. But I will not buy spices, as I have my own secret sources."
Hot Pepper Cinnamon Oregano

location.name: Pondenn the Armorer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Pondenn the Armorer tells you, "Greetings."
Pondenn the Armorer tells you, "Thanks for coming by!"

location.name: Provisioner Murdo
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Provisioner Murdo tells you, Whatever you need, Murdo's got!

location.name: Provisioner Warster the Handy
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Provisioner Warster the Handy tells you, "Managed to escape the Olthoi, did you? Well, welcome to the Vesayen Isles, and to MacNiall's Freehold. What is your need?"
Provisioner Warster the Handy tells you, "Safe travels."

location.name: Qufana al-Khurti the Blacksmith
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Rahira bint Hisan the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ran Le the Librarian
location.description:
Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.
Ran Le the Librarian tells you, "Welcome to the Hebian-To Library. Here we display writings pertaining to our Sho history and culture. I also sell some writings."
Ran Le the Librarian tells you, "Thank you; I hope it is informative to you.

location.name: Rayyib al-Afij the Armorer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ri-Gau Ro the Bowyer
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Riflyffa the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%. Teal Contaiers.
Riflyffa the Shopkeeper tells you, "I guess they weren't kidding when the Arcanum warned us about all those portal disturbances..."
Riflyffa the Shopkeeper tells you, "Do you suppose I should move into Lytelthorpe proper? This outpost will never be the same again."

location.name: Rindelle the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%
Rindelle the Shopkeeper tells you, "We haven't got much good food left in town. If you have any food to sell, please bring it to Helford the Grocer. He will pay you well."
Rindelle the Shopkeeper tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Riseldor the Bowyer
location.description: Riseldor the Bowyer tells you, "Sure, being down here has isolated me from friend and family. But, really most of my family is back on Ispar. I say down with Asheron! Martine is a great man. He gives us the right to buy and sell too."

location.name: Rou Beh the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Rushiya bint Anruq
location.description: Within Accursed Halls.

location.name: Ruza bint Tinun the Armorer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Sang Nen-Kai the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Sathagg the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Sathagg the Jeweler tells you, "Welcome!"

location.name: Scribe Finaver
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Scribe Lashi Oi
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Scribe Muhiza bint Murqidh
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Scribe Renald the Younger
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Scribe Tashwi ibn Sayat
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Sedor Wystan the Blacksmith
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Selflora the Barkeep
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Selflora the Barkeep tells you, "Have a wonderful day, yes, Sindeed."
Selflora the Barkeep tells you, "Welcome, welcome, welcome!"
Selflora the Barkeep tells you, "You must come again."

location.name: Sharon the Skilled Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shen Ai-Shen the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shi Ki-Yong the Armorer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Shi Ki-Yong the Armorer tells you, "Congratulations on making it up here. Now what is it you are looking for?"

location.name: Shopkeep Bubtil al-Taywi
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shopkeep Ginan Wah
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shopkeep Julsama bint Sakim
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shopkeep Kuro of Kara
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Shopkeep Qufar ibn Ijtalwa
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shopkeep Yunen Ye
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Shopkeeper Gonjoku Ryumi
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shopkeeper Renald the Elder
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Shui Tentou the Bowyer
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Sialla Jiro
location.description:
Buys at 90%, sells at 135%. Platinum Scarabs: 54,000.
Sialla Jiro tells you, "Don't start any trouble friend. That will come soon enough, if Martine remains so solemn." Sialla Jiro tells you, "Be careful out there. The world is still a tough place. If you need anything else just come on by."

location.name: Sidzika the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Sifida bint Naril the Scribe

Sitrath the Smith tells you, "Thank you."

location.name: Smith Ashaira bint Maisa

location.name: Smith Baltiff

Smith Baltiff tells you, "Welcome to this forge."
Smith Baltiff tells you, "Thank you. Master Sitrath thanks you, too."

Sordan Edelson the Smithy tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Spice Merchant Chiani

location.name: Taryla the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Taryla the Bowyer tells you, "Welcome to the Lone Tree Bows."
Taryla the Bowyer tells you, "Welcome to my humble shop."
Taryla the Bowyer tells you, "Thank you. Your patronage is important to me."

location.name: Te Ketnan the Barkeep
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Tekai Shou the Scribe
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Thawasa al-La'ud the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Thelnoth Cort the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Thimrin Woodsetter
location.description:
Sells at 140%, buys at 100%.
Thimrin Woodsetter tells you, "Welcome to the town that you helped build Founder."
Thimrin Woodsetter tells you, "Let me see that. Yes, I'll take all you have."
Thimrin Woodsetter tells you, "Here you are, I have a lot of these if you need more."

location.name: Thiuda the Sharp-Eyed Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Tilutha Beldryn the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Tilutha Beldryn the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?""
Tilutha Beldryn the Tailor tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Tilutha Beldryn the Tailor tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: To Za-I the Weaponsmith
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: To-ping Ra the Tailor
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Ton Ai Yen the Armorer
location.description:
Ton Ai Yen the Armorer tells you, Did you hear about Baggs in Bluespire? They took him away, just like Brother Klars.
Ton Ai Yen the Armorer tells you, Use it well. It's dangerous to say so, but I could suggest one of those guards as an excellent target.
Ton Ai Yen the Armorer tells you, We were all rivals, we armorers, but we respected each other. It makes me sick to wonder where they've taken him.
Ton Ai Yen the Armorer tells you, Remember us, friend.

location.name: Tong La-chin the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Tromylda the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Tromylda the Shopkeeper tells you, "Well, if you ever wanted to know, THAT is what happens when a portal explodes!"
Tromylda the Shopkeeper tells you, "One minute I was standing here, minding my own business, then KABLAMMMMM! No more Training Hall!"

location.name: Trothyd Fletcher
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Tumina the Healer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ulib ibn Ghunir the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Urnolt the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ushad al-Fasam the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Uthab ibn Yafij the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Vanten the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ven Ounan the Blacksmith
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Viamasa the Weaponsmith
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Viamasa the Weaponsmith tells you, "I like it out here, in the open, away from the stuffy corridors."
Viamasa the Weaponsmith tells you, "One can get used to this place, but I'm still thinking of leaving."

location.name: Vuo Nin the Barkeep
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Wah Chon the Barkeep
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.
Wah Chon sells numerous item's including her famous Mug of Winter Lager.

location.name: Waham ibn Fadyat the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Wahnaqa bint Fayat the Mage
location.description:
Wahnaqa bint Fayat the Mage tells you, Hello. There are darker things on this island than Varicci's men, although they are the most pressing concern.
Wahnaqa bint Fayat the Mage tells you, Use this to best advantage, adventurer.
Wahnaqa bint Fayat the Mage tells you, These are trying times. I can afford to pay no more.
Wahnaqa bint Fayat the Mage tells you, Be careful, stranger. Death wears many faces in this place.

location.name: Tatuso of Kara
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Wantorth the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Wantorth the Shopkeeper tells you, "Welcome to the West Holtburg general store!"
Wantorth the Shopkeeper tells you, "Thank you for your patronage. By the way, the town of Holtburg is to the east, up the road. If you are new, also be sure to go through the Training Academy."

location.name: Wasifa al-Kani the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Weaponsmith (Holtburg)
location.description:
Sells at 156%, buys at 90%.
Weaponsmith tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Weaponsmith tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Weaponsmith tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Weaponsmith tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Weaponsmith Ayiz ibn Khayt
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Weaponsmith Baizai En
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Weaponsmith Bornak the Crookblade
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Weaponsmith Bornak the Crookblade tells you, "Living free and independent, on this wild island, requires strong tools. What can I help you with, stranger?"
Weaponsmith Bornak the Crookblade tells you, "Ware the Mosswarts, they can be quite tenacious in a fight."

location.name: Weaponsmith Illic Ibn'Abulfiq
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Weaponsmith Mura bint Mu`ja
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Weary-looking Man
location.description: Sells Dryreach Key and Dryreach Rumor.

location.name: Weary-looking Man
location.description: Sells Dryreach Key and Dryreach Rumor.

location.name: Wedding Planner (Samsur)
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Wedding Planner (Al-Arqas)
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Wedding Planner
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Wedding Planner (Lytelthorpe)
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Wedding Planner
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Wedding Planner (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Weldub Finol the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
-Tom U.

location.name: Wuo Ha the Provisioner
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Wylreda the Scribe
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart. Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Wylreda the Scribe tells you, "May I help you?"
Wylreda the Scribe tells you, "A wise purchase."
Wylreda the Scribe tells you, "Thank you. Please come again."

location.name: Xi Hau-Lai the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Ximi Nu the Blacksmith
location.description:
Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "My greatest wish is to craft the very best armors to protect those who devote their lives protecting others."
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "Let compassion be in your every thought and action, as you strive to help others in their paths."
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "Blessings in your travels."
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "Let humility dwell within you. Without humility you will be easily misled and lose your way."

location.name: Yahr ibn Ajaj the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Yao Lun the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Yaohan Tong the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Yatenyu Zhuong the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ye Te the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Yen Loc Anh the Mage
location.description:
Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, I knew that the storm was coming, but I did not know its shape.
Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, Be sure you have all you need. Who knows when Varicci's men will drag me away.
Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, Thank you.
Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, Keep your eyes open. This island is even more dangerous, now that the invaders have arrived.

location.name: Ynarre the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ystig Marson the Barkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Ystig Marson the Barkeeper tells you, "We finally cleaned up everything from the mess those Eaters made. They were true to their name too. I had to send runners to replace everything they ate, it cost me a fortune!"

location.name: Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer
location.description:
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, Welcome, friend. Even in these days, my prices are unbeatable.
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, Thank you. I've got more, hidden away where the invaders can't find it.
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, I'll buy at that price from you, but don't tell Varicci's men.
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, Come back soon. These are trying times, but a man still needs to make a living.

location.name: Zhofon No the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Zisaha bint Jaidka the Mage
location.description:
Buys at 80%, sells at 180%. Platinum Scarabs 72,000.
Zisaha bint Jaidka the Mage tells you, "Thank you for your patronage, but I don't like visitors."
Zisaha bint Jaidka the Mage tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Zisaha bint Jaidka the Mage tells you, "Fare well. Travel at your own risk

location.name: Ziya bint Balun the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Zubid ibn Ifi the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Saqr
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Plate Armoredillos).
Saqr tells you, "So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Plate Armoredillos for me, and I will reward you appropriately."

location.name: Hea Kassoka
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Bone and Hide Shirt Quest.
Hea Kassoka says, "This is the second time since moon-turn that those ugly little green thieves have stolen my supplies."
Hea Kassoka tells you, "Much as it shames me, human, I would ask for your help. A group of filthy, smelly creatures known as Mosswarts have made a home on my island and are raiding my supplies. I am but one warrior and cannot attend to my duties and guard my supplies all the time."
Hea Kassoka tells you, "I would like for you to go into Hagra's Holdfast at 48.2 N, 88.5 W and confront their chief. Whether you must negotiate with him or just kill him, put an end to their thievery."
Hea Kassoka tells you, "We have discussed this, have we not? Go into Hagra's Holdfast at 48.2 N, 88.5 W and confront their chief. Put an end to their theft of my supplies, one way or the other.".

location.name: Fiun Gaya
location.description:
Quest(s): Lunnum's Pyre, Thief of Lunnum.
Fiun Gaya tells you, "It is for me to welcome you to this place of sadness. I am Fiun Gaya, Keeper of the Light."
Fiun Gaya tells you, "With Lunnum missing my heart is an empty black, still my duty must be fulfilled. My duty, my purpose, is to be sure that the light of Lunnum's Pyre remains bright and pure."
Fiun Gaya tells you, "To my sorrow, the ravages of time have consumed this old one."
Fiun Gaya tells you, "No longer can I make the journey to re-stoke the fire eternal. Respectfully, I ask for your help."
Fiun Gaya tells you, "A Fiun Hatchet, you will need. Retrieve one from this chest."
Fiun Gaya gives you Story of Lunnum's Pyre.
Fiun Gaya tells you, "If you would hear of a dark deed then ask me you must."
Fiun Gaya tells you, "Another favor I might ask. Should a Snow Lily be found, perhaps you may bring it to me?"
Fiun Gaya tells you, "Good journey, friend."
Fiun Gaya gives you Luminous Robe.

location.name: Afra bint Abbas
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Ebon Gromnies)
Afra bint Abbas tells you, "So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Ebon Gromnies for me, and I will reward you appropriately."

location.name: Redspire to Sanamar
location.description: This portal was added in the Under Cover of Night event and leads to the Viamontian city of Sanamar.

location.name: Unstable Portal
location.description:
This portal seems to have become unstable. It would be very unwise to use a portal in this state.
Upon walking into the portal you will get the message: Players may not interact with that portal.

location.name: Valentina du Lurio
location.description: Valentina du Lurio tells you, Welcome to Greenspire, friend. Don't you just love this local color? Such a primitive little town. Reminds me much of those outlying settlements on the border of Aluvia and Viamont. I wonder how quickly it would burn.

location.name: Vettorio Bilcone
location.description: Vettorio Bilcone tells you, Before we took this town, Salvito and I made a wager as to exactly how long the fight would last. I am happy to say that I won that wager. Five minutes of fighting, it was. And most of that was spent regrouping after we portaled in.

location.name: Turino Ribini
location.description: Turino Ribini tells you, The King has commissioned me with the most important of tasks. I am to tax the life out of the Bloodless on this island. They have many pyreals squirreled away in chests and mattresses. But soon that will change. We will bleed these dogs dry.

location.name: Tito Brickicci
location.description: Tito Brickicci tells you, Ah, the glory of battle. It is a wonderful thing, is it not?

location.name: Susana du Loc
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Hea Windreaves).
Susana du Loc tells you, I wonder if you have come across the strange creatures they call Tumeroks on this island. Savage, filthy beasts, they are. I hate them more than I hate even the Bloodless Queen of this realm. Do me a favor, friend, and kill 25 of these Hea Windreaves for me. I would be in your debt if you would help me cleanse my new home of these disgusting creatures.

location.name: Salvito di Marden
location.description: Salvito di Marden tells you, Welcome to the Viamontian town of Bluespire. Watch your step.

location.name: Romeo Osemmi
location.description: Romeo Osemmi tells you, Back off, you. I've a job to do.

location.name: Rico Cellini
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Littoral Siraluun).
Rico Cellini tells you, What strange and terrible creatures there are on this island. Back on Ispar, I never thought to see such wonders. And what better way to appreciate the beauty of nature than to kill it!
Rico Cellini tells you, I have taken to hunting the Littoral Siraluun that wander these plains. Good sport, they are. If you would slay 25 of the beasts, I would reward you as a hunter whose prowess is equal to mine own.

location.name: Piero Cenizzi
location.description: Piero Cenizzi tells you, The climate is certainly warmer here than on our frigid isles. I say this was quite a fine idea our King had. Quite fine, indeed.

location.name: Otto Selino
location.description: Otto Selino tells you, I am ever fascinated by the new constellations viewable from this world. I wonder, are these the same stars I saw on Ispar, but viewed from a whole new angle? Or are these completely different stars altogether? Otto Selino tells you, When I contemplate the vastness of existence... well, it makes me a little ill, it does.

location.name: Niccolo Brasi
location.description: Niccolo Brasi tells you, Welcome to the Viamontian town of Redspire. If I had known the Bloodless would fall as easily as these curs, I would have counseled war long ago.

location.name: Lucio Murrio
location.description: Lucio Murrio tells you, Have you come across the beasts they call Tumeroks? Such fascinating savagery. I've never seen their like.

location.name: Lucarus Malloni the Armorer
location.description:
Lucarus Malloni the Armorer tells you, How fascinating, even a Bloodless can acknowledge the superior quality of my work.
Lucarus Malloni the Armorer tells you, Go and run, run crying to your false Queen.

location.name: Janus Roma the Shopkeep
location.description:
Found in a tent in Redspire
Janus Roma the Shopkeep tells you, I suppose you're looking for that monk, eh? Well, he's not here. Now buy something and leave!
Janus Roma the Shopkeep tells you, Begone from here. And tell that jeweler that I'm sick of hearing her weeping!

location.name: Eliza du Curena
location.description:
Quest(s): Canescent Mattekar Robe Quest.
Eliza du Curena tells you, Greetings. I suppose you're looking for that Britana woman, yes? You'll do yourself a favor if you forget you ever heard of her. She came from bad blood, even for one of the Bloodless, and King Varicci did us all a favor when he locked her away. At any rate, I am a far better businesswoman that she ever could have dreamed to be, and I have taken over this establishment and will continue crafting Mattekar Robes.
Eliza du Curena tells you, They say that there is a great white Mattekar that stalks the northern coast of this island. I understand that its coat can be crafted into a quite excellent robe. Bring one to me, and we'll see if we can do business.

location.name: Caprice du Bellenesse
location.description: Caprice du Bellenesse tells you, My husband led the invasion that took Marae Lassel. Such a brave, strong man. He has done well in distancing our house from his traitorous uncle. One day, the name Bellenesse will stand for courage and honor again.

location.name: Andrea Dilazo
location.description: Andrea Dilazo tells you, We took this town in the dead of night. The people here put up little resistance. There were a great many wounded. My oaths as a chirurgeon bound me to tend to their wounds, but Commander Bellenesse forbade me to treat them. Yes, I understand that the Bloodless must be defeated, but that's no reason to let them wail on in pain and misery when it is perfectly within our power to aid them.

location.name: Balarazo
location.description:
Quest(s): Canescent Mattekar Robe Quest.
Balarazo tells you, Varicci's invasion has certainly made me regret my decision to settle down here. However I will still exchange new style Canescent Robes for older ones, and vice-versa. Just don't get that Eliza angry at me, that woman has a cruel tongue!

location.name: Enrico di Bellenesse
location.description:
Quest(s): Enrico's Betrayal.
Enrico di Bellenesse tells you, Welcome to the Viamontian town of Greenspire. I know not whether you have chosen to side with the Queen or my King in this struggle. But so long as you do not trouble me, I will not trouble you.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description:
Town Crier tells you, As soon as we find out where they're hiding, our soldiers are going to crush those Carenzi Rebels.
You give Town Crier 119 Pyreals.
Town Crier tells you, The Lugians of Geth Tukora have been unusually active of late. I hear they've expanded their ruined quarters. If they keep this up, we'll have to drop the Eaters on them once again.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Kara)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Merchant Cellar to High Mountain Valley
location.description: Merchant Cellar to High Mountain Valley (26.3N,63.9E)

location.name: Merchant Cellar to Arwic
location.description: This portal goes to Arwic, a walled Aluvian town that has fully recovered from a devastating attack by a Shadow Spire. This is a good town for characters over level 20.

location.name: Renegade Chest
location.description:
Quest(s): Chorizite Veined Shield.
Well carved and impossible to pick, you will need a specially crafted key to open this. A small etching near the bottom of the chest makes reference to a stronghold near Shoushi.
Use this item to open it and see its contents.
Renegade Chest singes you for 30 points with Flame Bolt VI.

location.name: Renegade Chest
location.description:
Quest(s): Renegade Bone Charm (Tumerok Salted Meats).
Well carved and impossible to pick, you will need a specially crafted key to open this. A small etching near the bottom of the chest makes reference to a stronghold near Tufa.
Use this item to open it and see its contents.
Renegade Chest singes you for 30 points with Flame Bolt VI.

location.name: Platinum Legion Keep, Quest Flag: Jun Sawashima
location.description:
Quest(s): Zaikhal Defender.
At the end of the dungeon Captain Balanchi drops the Platinum Invader Lord Helm and the Corcima Caster Portal Gem.

location.name: Karwin, the Lunatic
location.description:
Quest(s): Undead Mechanic.
There's something really strange about those caves north of here. Gives me the shakes just to think about it...Hey be a nice kid and get me a bowl of Carrot Soup, and I'll tell you what's what, alright?

location.name: Journeyman Cook (Bandit Castle)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Journeyman Cook tells you, Greetings! I have left my master in Glenden Wood to help the craftsmen of this fine land to hone their crafting skills.
Journeyman Cook tells you, Prove your knowledge by bringing me some Fried Cinnamon Dough, and I shall reward you.
Journeyman Cook tells you, What, you say you don't know how to make Fried Cinnamon Dough?! Why, that is what tests of knowledge are for! Get out there and experiment, my young friend!

location.name: Alison Dulane
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Alison Dulane tells you, "Hello there, stranger."
Alison Dulane tells you, "Did you realize that you can increase the speed at which you heal by simply lying down?"
Alison Dulane tells you, "Furthermore, did you realize that I can teach you to increase that speed? When lying down?"
Alison Dulane tells you, "All I need from you is a small, blank augmentation gem. Bring one to me and I will share my secrets with you. I promise, you will be glad that you did."
Alison Dulane gives you Innate Renewal.

location.name: Vissidal Island Lifestone
location.description: Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC

location.name: Merwart Village
location.description:
The Merwart Town is a town at 79.9N, 59.0 on the Vissidal, and can be found a short run N from the drop.
It opened up with the rise of the Island during the Under Cover of Night event.
The town is occupied by Merwarts, Mosswart-like creatures.
Some quests start here, and some unique items, such as the Vissidal Island Portal Gem, are sold here.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC

location.name: Merwart Gurglurg
location.description: Merwart Gurglurg tells you, Welcome to Vissidal Island, human. We were told to expect your coming. Vissidal is the name of this land, or so Angry Grandfather told us. It once belonged to people called... Fa-la-ta-cot. Yes, that's the word.

location.name: Merwart Urglurg
location.description:
Merwart Urglurg tells you, I welcome you, human. You may be surprised to find a Merwart with my vocabulary and elocution. We here on Vissidal Island were raised out of our primitive squalor by Angry Grandfather, a human shaman.
Merwart Urglurg tells you, He gave us names and speech and taught some of my cousins how to cater to the needs of the human adventurers who would surely come here in search of excitement.

location.name: Shopkeeper Hulmurg
location.description:
Shopkeeper Hulmurg tells you, I buy and sells lots of things, like Angry Grandfather told me to.
Shopkeeper Hulmurg tells you, Sold! Soon Huldurg will have a bigger pile of pyreal things than anyone else!
Shopkeeper Hulmurg tells you, I am sure that will come in handy for us somehow.
Shopkeeper Hulmurg tells you, Good luck, human!

location.name: Blacksmith Bulidurg
location.description:
Blacksmith Bulidurg tells you, Bulidurg has many pretty things for hurting...
Blacksmith Bulidurg tells you, You get good use out of that.
Blacksmith Bulidurg tells you, Bulidurg can use that. Thank you, human.
Blacksmith Bulidurg tells you, Have fun killing things!

location.name: Archmage Moldurg
location.description:
Archmage Moldurg tells you, I am the most magic of them all! Or at least that's what Angry Grandfather told me. He told me I am supposed to help and sell to the very smartest of humans, like him.
Archmage Moldurg tells you, Moldurg hopes you find that useful, smart human.
Archmage Moldurg tells you, I will take that, and you take this... pyreal stuff in return. That's right, isn't it?
Archmage Moldurg tells you, Moldurg says goodbye, and come again, and thank you.

location.name: Healer Hargurg
location.description:
Healer Hargurg tells you, Hello, human! Angry Grandfather told me to help people, so I sell healing things.
Healer Hargurg tells you, Hargurg hopes that helps you find Angry Grandfather!
Healer Hargurg tells you, Hargurg thanks you! Enjoy your pile of metal things!
Healer Hargurg tells you, Good day, human. Tell Angry Grandfather that Hargurg does a good job!

location.name: Merwart Pelagurg
location.description:
Quest(s): Remoran Fist.
Merwart Pelagurg tells you, Help me, human! Before Angry Grandfather showed us the way of the blue stone, my family was killed, eaten, devoured by horrible Bloodmouth Remoran! I seek vengeance!
Merwart Pelagurg tells you, Go find Bloodmouth Remoran by the ruin of my house near the bay east of here. Kill them, and bring me back a Bloodmouth Maw! It may be difficult, because their wicked jaws are so well concealed inside their hateful little heads! But I will reward you with a weapon like the one I hold!
Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC

location.name: Algar Oreksun
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Mucky Moarsmen).
Algar Oreksun awakens from his trance.
Algar Oreksun tells you, It feels great rage at the Mucky Moarsmen.
Algar Oreksun tells you, They have defiled it.
Algar Oreksun tells you, A sacrifice of 50 Mucky Moarsmen must be made.
Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC

location.name: Colista Fluress
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Benek Niffis).
Colista Fluress awakens from her trance.
Colista Fluress tells you, I can hear it.
Colista Fluress tells you, It says the Benek Niffis displease it.
Colista Fluress tells you, Kill 50 Benek Niffis and rewards shall be yours.

location.name: Dayla Bint Kazm
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Shallows Gorgers).
Dayla Bint Kazm awakens from her trance.
Dayla Bint Kazm tells you, I speak for it.
Dayla Bint Kazm tells you, It bids me to tell you to kill 50 of the Shallows Gorger.
Dayla Bint Kazm tells you, Go now!
Submitted by Mr Fizz of LC

location.name: Peng-Ya
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Remoran Sea Raptors).
Peng-Ya awakens from his trance.
Peng-Ya tells you, It speaks through me!
Peng-Ya tells you, The Remoran Sea Raptors have gone too far! They must be punished!
Peng-Ya tells you, Kill 50 Remoran Sea Raptors so that they will know their place.

location.name: Leikotha
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle, Silifi of Crimson Stars.
Leikotha tells you, Ai, another comes, breaking mine wretched musings. Why have you come to this sandy tomb, filled with unnatural beasts? Is your heart filled with greed, seeking what treasures may lay within? Or is your heart of a more noble nature, perhaps seeking to release me from this torment? It matters not, for I have but one thing to offer you.
Leikotha gives you Broken Haft.
Leikotha tells you, Like so many things found on this unhappy world, it is broken. Once though it belonged to a friend. One like thee. One who hoped to release me. Ai, he failed... he failed.
Leikotha tells you, Take the haft, I would see it used again in his name than have it stay with me and crumble to dust. If thou have no use for the Haft, I would still see it as it once was. Return the haft to me, repaired, and I will reward thee. Those that surround me speak of one of thy kind who may know how to set it to order once more. Look for her at 1.7 S, 36.6 E.

location.name: Gatekeepers Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway to the Deep.
Submitted by Uzi-El.

location.name: Breached Hive
location.description: Quest(s): Enrico's Betrayal.

location.name: Devastated Watcher
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway To The Deep, Menhir Mana Fields # 13.
There is a small glint in the statue's right eye, but the left eye socket appears to be empty.
Give the statue the Watcher Token for access to the Devastated Falatacot Temple.

location.name: Temple of Xik Minru
location.description:
Quest(s): The Temple of Xik Minru.
You need to be flagged for Vissidal. To enter the next dungeon of the series, you will need to give Amber to the Causeway Sentinel.

location.name: Qath al-Haddash
location.description:
Quest(s): Mukkir Orb, Mukkir Nest.
Qath al-Haddash tells you, "Yes, you should be suitable... I have been tracking Viamontian interest in a certain obscure race of creatures, thought long-vanished... I would have you journey to the dig site overseen by Master Vaserio, a Viamontian scholar. Bring me Vaserio's notes on their findings. The notes are likely to be written in some strange cipher, unreadable by the untrained eye. The dig site can be found at 54.2 S, 78.6 W."

location.name: Mistress Halmera's Dig
location.description:
Quest(s): Mukkir Orb.
Submitted by Kitiara Dragonsblood.

location.name: Watcher of the Deep
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway to the Deep.
This statue appears ancient and weathered. A small inscription is carved at its base: When the Gatekeepers are sated, the city that once was shall rise from the depths, the imprisoned shall break free, the weak shall become strong, and the rulers of this world shall be burned within the fires of treachery.

location.name: Vissidal Island Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway to the Deep.
You must obtain the blessing of the Watcher of the Deep before you may use this portal.

location.name: Underground Cave
location.description: To Back Tunnels

location.name: Daniel
location.description: Daniel tells you, I don't know about this. I just want to go home. The Viamontians, they're Isparians too. But Jed says we can't, and Robert... whenever I try to talk to him, he just tells me to kill more Knights.

location.name: Gromnie
location.description: Gromnie tells you, I've been training with Count Tenera, we're going to try an attack on one of those big Eaters soon!

location.name: Matthias Eckhart
location.description: Matthias Eckhart tells you, Meeting the Count was a stroke of good luck. He's been fighting Varicci since the Duke's rebellion back on Ispar, and he's been training us!

location.name: Arica
location.description: Arica tells you, Count Tenera... he's pretty handsome, don't you think? And so brave!

location.name: Antonia
location.description: Antonia tells you, Tell You think you're brave? Have you ever led four Viamontian Knights into an ambush without a weapon in your hand? I didn't think so.

location.name: Count Tenera
location.description: Count Tenera tells you, When I heard that Varicci had invaded Marae Lassel, I knew that the resistance here would need help. I didn't expect to find a bunch of kids hiding out in a valley, but they have spirit.

location.name: Dar Rell
location.description: Dar Rell tells you, What good are we doing? A bunch of nobodies trying to fend off an invading army. Impossible! Sometimes I think we should lay down our arms and go back home.

location.name: Robert Gutsmasher
location.description: Robert Gutsmasher tells you, You, however, could do me a favor. There is a type of Viamontian Knight called the Man-At-Arms. Those ones, I find especially irritating. Kill 50 of them for me, and I will reward you for your efforts.

location.name: Jedeth Eckhart
location.description:
Quest(s): Rebel Hideout.
Jedeth Eckhart tells you, Those Viamontian scum are up to something! Our scouts have reported a large gathering of soldiers, but they don't seem to be doing anything. We need someone to sneak into their midst to find out what their plan is. Use the Back Tunnel to sneak in and find out what they are up to.
Jedeth Eckhart tells you, Good luck!
Jedeth Eckhart lets out a mighty yell.
Jedeth Eckhart tells you, CARENZI!

location.name: Back Tunnels
location.description: Quest(s): Rebel Hideout.

location.name: Festival Vendor
location.description:
Sells at 100%, buys at 90%.
Appears in Glenden Wood during the halloween festival. Sells a variety of Festival robes, foods and other items.
Updated with Anniversary Sparklers, Scarecrow Stand and T-mon Backpack Straps during the Dance of the Dead event.
Festival Vendor tells you, "Happy Festival Season! I have many delicious and traditional festival treats for sale."
Festival Vendor tells you, "Enjoy the Festival! I'll be here all month."
Only Available During The "Halloween" Patch

location.name: Majestic Pumpkin
location.description:
Quest(s): The Majestic Pumpkin, Hunter Quests (Harvest Reaper, Pumpkin Lord).
Majestic Pumpkin tells you, "Do not fear me friend. I am a spirit of the earth and I would have you help me."
Majestic Pumpkin tells you, "A few days ago I witnessed a terrible evil while visiting one of the growing places. A monstrous form was moving in the patch. It's shape was that of a huge man, but it's body was made of my kin. I do not wish to speak of what I found in the patch after destroying the abomination. Know that it fills me with a great sadness and rage."
Majestic Pumpkin tells you, "I will not abide with these perversions of my kin. Find three of these Pumpkin Lords, as they call themselves, and destroy them. Return to me when your task is complete and I will reward you as best I can."
Only Available During The "Halloween" Patch.

location.name: Master Vaserio's Dig
location.description:
Quest(s): Mukkir Orb.
This dungeon is quest-restricted. Speak with Qath al-Haddash in Qalaba'r to learn more.

location.name: Captain Nyino
location.description:
Quest(s): Viamont Staging Area (Low).
Captain Nyino tells you, "We know of three Viamont Portal Platforms in the woods outside of town. I want you to investigate the North East Portal Platform and if possible put it out of commission. Do whatever it takes to prevent the Viamonts from reinforcing their foothold in Glenden Woods."
Captain Nyino tells you, "I wouldn't advise going on this mission alone though. Find others skilled soldiers to accompany you. Have them talk to me before you leave so I know who is in the field. When your done report back to me."
Captain Nyino tells you, "You will find the Portal Platform at 32.3N 29.5E"

location.name: Tomo Genza
location.description:
Quest(s): Glenden Wood Invaders, Viamont Staging Area.
Tomo Genza tells you, "Welcome to Glenden Woods traveller. I am Tomo Genza, the leader of the Glenden Woods Militia." Tomo Genza tells you, "The Royal Guard now organize our raids on the Viamont Staging Areas so that I may focus on supplying our troops." Tomo Genza tells you, "You should see Londigul here first if you haven't helped to clear out the Viamont Blockades yet."

location.name: Lt. Commander Arwyth Margyle
location.description:
Quest(s): Fort Tethana Tug of War.
Lt. Commander of Fort Teth, replacing Commander Kurth. Location is S/W of Teth and called the Renegade Incursion dungeon. Located at 0.5N, 73.3W

location.name: Abayar's Study
location.description:
Quest(s): Fiun Spellcasting Gloves.
Kill Fiun Abayar for the quest to get the Fiun Spellcasting Gloves.
Within Abayar's Laboratory.
location.monsters: Frenzied Fiun Maniacal Fiun Enoki Thrungus

location.name: The Deep (Vissidal Island)
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway to the Deep, Gold Trophies.
A amorphous haze that accepts Gold Trophies in exchange for experience and a title.
You give The Deep Gold Shallows Shredder Fin. You've earned 6,500,000 experience.
You give The Deep Gold Moarsman Tooth. You've earned 6,500,000 experience.
You give The Deep Gold Niffis Tentacle. You've earned 8,700,000 experience.
You give The Deep Gold Remoran Eggs. You've earned 11,400,000 experience.

location.name: Tursh Dungeon
location.description: Quest(s): Ruschk Challenger.

location.name: Antius Blackmoor Memorial
location.description: A statue placed over the grave of Antius Blackmoor

location.name: Bier of Antius Blackmoor
location.description:
The body of Antius Blackmoor is here, laying in state.
You may pay your last respects, if you wish.

location.name: Royal Guard Adrana
location.description:
Quest(s): Shield Of Yanshi.
Royal Guard Adrana tells you, You have helped me, and indeed, all of Yanshi. The Queen is most grateful.

location.name: Chess Board
location.description: This game board can be used to play chess.

location.name: Abandoned Yanshi Meeting Hall
location.description: In the December '05 event, the portal of this meeting hall was moved to the newly rebuilt town of Yanshi, leaving the old building abandoned.

location.name: Yanshi (Rebuilt)
location.description: With the death of Antius, the people of Dereth have realized that a change is in the air. This has prompted them to take action. The town of Yanshi has finally rebuilt and has been fortified. You can find the new town near the Yanshi festival grounds. There has also been a memorial built there for the great Antius Blackmoor. Deep below the memorial, Antius lays in his final resting place. The citizens of Dereth may still go and pay their respects if they already haven't done so.

location.name: Yanshi Bindstone
location.description: Allegiance monarchs can use this item to set the town recall point for their allegiances.

location.restrictions: 130+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Tomo Genza
location.name: Viamont Staging Portal (High)
location.description:
Quest(s): Viamont Staging Area.
To enter the dungeon, first speak to Tomo Genza in Glenden Wood at 29.7N 27.2E. Kill the three pillars by the portal to activate the portal for a brief period. This flags all people in the fellowship to enter.
location.monsters: Viamontian, Eaters

location.name: Bromord Morresten
location.description:
Bromord Morresten tells you, I am here to stand vigil at the memorial of brave Antius Blackmoor. The Queen has also charged me to reward those who helped slay his murderer, the traitor Kurth. If you have a shard of Kurth's armor or a shard from that loathsome sword he wielded, give it to me and I will reward you.
Accepts the Prince's Medal of Bravery for xp. (5% of level)
In chests at 67.4N 30.5E (take Glystaene Cottages at 8.8N 60.9E in Rithwic).
Pick-up is once per character.
You give Bromord Morresten Prince's Medal of Bravery.
Bromord Morresten tells you, "A hero from the opening of the portal to Bur, hm? Let me teach you a few combat techniques, so you can help the realm again in the future."

location.name: Shade of Farelaith
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadowfire Stone, Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Shade of Farelaith tells you, You... Yes, you could help me, mortal. I need you to slay my younger brothers, who were corrupted into beings of Shadow by our former master, Grael. Please, you must enter this Temple of the Stirring Shadow. The temple has three wings, and one of my brothers serves in each wing. They have lost their names and faces to the Shadow corruption, but they still bear their own weapons... I was a mage in my past life, mortal. Help me, and I shall reward you.
Shade of Farelaith tells you, Enter the South Wing first, and seek out my poor youngest brother, Baranaith. He wielded a spear in life, as he does now in the shadow. Bring me his spear so that I may know his torment is no more.

location.name: Temple of the Stirring Shadow
location.description:
Quest(s): Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Acts as a gateway to the three lower parts (Sourth, North, East).

location.name: Temple South Wing
location.description:
Quest(s): Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Enter the Temple of the Stirring Shadow to access this portal. Hot drop!

location.name: Temple North Wing
location.description:
Quest(s): Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Enter the Temple of the Stirring Shadow to access this portal. Hot drop!

location.name: Temple East Wing
location.description:
Quest(s): Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Enter the Temple of the Stirring Shadow to access this portal. Hot drop!
location.monsters: Shadows

location.name: Tunnel of Love
location.description:
Quest(s): Tunnel of Love.
You must appease the Golem Xireri before you may use this portal.

location.name: Xireri
location.description:
Quest(s): Tunnel Of Love.
Find and give a Butterscotch Suckling (VERY Rare drop) dropped by Stalking Marguls.

location.name: Mysterious Hatch
location.description:
Quest(s): Ulgrim's Hatch.
Unknown Hatch on Ulgrims Island.

location.name: Outpost Lifestone
location.description: Thanks to Fizzbah of Morningthaw

location.name: Royal Guard Qumasha
location.description:
Quest(s): Necklace Of Elemental Adepts.
Royal Guard Qumasha tells you, "Ah! Perhaps you can help me. The Queen has asked me to find out all I can about how Varicci crafted that terrible weapon, Heartbreaker. Regardless of your background or political affiliation, I hope you can appreciate how much of a menace Varicci poses. Please journey to the Viamontian Esper Mine at 72.2 N, 3.0 E and see if you can get the gem that the mine's commander carries. I should be able to use that to forge a portal gem into the heart of Varicci's research operation."

location.name: Hashina
location.description:
Quest(s): Head of Baron Entemarre, Whispering Blade Infiltration.
Hashina tells you, "Queen Elysa has sent me here to establish a formal relationship with the good people of Silyun, who have rebelled against Varicci's tyranny. In order to aid them in their fight, I would ask you to journey into the Direlands near Ayan Baqur. The Viamontians have built a fortress at 62.7S, 82.5W. Bring me the head of Baron Entemarre, the garrison commander. The people of Silyun seek vengeance upon Entemarre for his brutal tactics in the earlier rebellion."
Hashina tells you, "Have you found Baron Entemarre at his encampment in the Direlands yet?"

location.name: Viamontian Direlands Mine
location.description:
Quest(s): Necklace Of Elemental Adepts.
Submitted by Theknight

location.name: Viamontian Esper Mine
location.description:
Quest(s): Necklace Of Elemental Adepts.
Submitted by Theknight

location.name: Rat Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Rat Catcher.
Not a dungeon per se, but a Cave.

location.restrictions: 60+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, PK, Quest Flag: Hassha
location.name: Cells of the Black Book bunker
location.description:
Quest(s): Water of Stasis, Black Pages of Salt and Ash.
A stone bunker containing four portals to the Cells of the Black Book, and the Sclavus NPC Hassha. Part of the new PK quest.

location.name: Viamontian Laboratory
location.description:
Quest(s): Plateau Village Transit.
Laboratory with a portal used by the Viamontians to send soldiers and equipment from Marae Lassel through to the mainland. Since creating the portal, the Castle Pietrus has been built and the nearby Tumerok Fortification taken over. The fortifications are used to prevent Queen Elysa's army from sending troops to the northern Direlands.
The Viamontian Portal Mage that created the portal is located in a side room here and drops a bracelet which when worn can be used to access the portal to Castle Pietrus at the end of the dungeon.

location.restrictions: 60+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, PK, Quest Flag: Hassha
location.name: Cells of the Black Book
location.description: Quest(s): Water of Stasis, Black Pages of Salt and Ash.

location.name: Hassha
location.description:
Quest(s): Water of Stasis, Black Pages of Salt and Ash.
Hassha tells you, Hassha grants you leave to enter the Cells of the Black Book, human. Tread carefully, but rejoice! Great power lies within. You must take it, and use it... Let it be known, the portal will only accept you if you have given yourself to blood and darkness. You may only enter the Cells of the Black Book if you seek the blood of your fellow humans...
Hassha tells you, Hassha has granted you entrance, human. Go, make use of this blessing...

location.name: Garmasi
location.description:
Quest(s): Whispering Blade Infiltration.
Garmasi tells you, If you seek to gain the King's favor, I suggest you speak with the Grand Knight of Sanamar. Once he has deemed you worthy, you may seek me out again.

location.restrictions: 125+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Give a Repaired Shadowstone to Ciandra in Xarabydun.
location.name: Empyrean Workshop
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadowfire Stone.
At the end is a book on the ground, you'll need to take the book to Bretself the Translator, then take to Ciandra, Arcanum Alchemist in Xarabydun. This flags you for the portal at the end of the dungeon to Atlan's Laboratory.

location.restrictions: 80+,Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Completed Dericost Ruin, Knights of Karlun and Red Bull of Sanamar, Talk to Garmasi.
location.name: Silyun Chapterhouse
location.description: Quest(s): Whispering Blade Infiltration.

location.name: Lieutenant Rothe
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Tumerok Gladiators).
Lieutenant Rothe tells you, "The Queen is concerned that the Tumerok siege here is growing, and we do not have the resources to stop it. To this problem, I have been authorized to reward those stout and loyal souls who will go outside the walls and thin the numbers of the Tumeroks a bit."
Lieutenant Rothe tells you, "Track down and slay 25 of the Tumerok Gladiators for me, and I will reward you for your aid in the defense of Dryreach."

location.name: The Dark Spiral
location.description:
Quest(s): The Dark Spiral.
At the bottom of the dungeon is the Lore of the Dark Spiral.
This book almost seems to reek of the taint of the shadows and Mukkir who inhabit the Dark Spiral. The book begins in a strong hand, but descends into spidery illegibility.
Special Properties: Attuned, Bonded
May this book bear witness to my defection from the light. I am no longer one of the weak, no longer one of those who follow Asheron's ways. I make this choice of my own volition, embracing the ultimate freedom that is the birthright of all living beings. I cast even my name to the wind - no shackle shall hold my identity.
I have chosen my path - the path of the strong. I do not follow some defeated power, as Bael'zharon was defeated. Nay - my allegiance is only to the strong, to that which will lead me to triumph!
I remember hearing of my master for the first time. The thrill which ran through me...ah, as only power can thrill! I knew, though those who spoke of my future master spoke in enmity, that I had found truth in this world at last. The only truth in this world is strength, and there is no greater strength.
Only my master can claim to be so strong. Those who follow the teachings of Isin Dule, they live a lie. They will be swallowed whole! They will be consumed as this paper is consumed by fire! *the rest of this page is burned away*
The call! Oh, how they speak of the call which led us to this world, but another calls me. I cannot ignore it, nor do I want to! A call to ruin! A call to greatness!
Why do they resist? I watched it all, watched the armies break. Some died forever...eaten. Fuel for my great master! Some were fortunate...changed despite themselves, given the gift I seek. Some were slain for the sake of slaughter. But none were allowed to escape.
I feel insubstantial. I drift. I will no longer be what I am soon. I embrace the last moments of an old life and the beginning of a new existence.
-- Unknown

location.name: Creepy Chambers
location.description:
Quest(s): Bandits of the Creepy Chambers.
The Spinning Staff of Death is found here.

location.restrictions: Quest Flag: Silyun Faction, Shade Iron Mine Complete.
location.name: Whispering Blade Chapterhouse
location.description:
Quest(s): Whispering Blade Chapterhouse Access, Tracking Grael.
You must have completed all three Silyun Faction quests and the Shade Iron quest in order to begin this quest.
Completing this quest gives you access to the Whispering Blade Chapterhouse in Ayan Baqur.

location.name: Black Spear Temple Upper Levels
location.description: Quest(s): Rossu Morta Chapterhouse Access.

location.restrictions: 100+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: 1-4 Whipering Blade Quest.
location.name: Dardante's Workshop
location.description:
Quest(s): Whispering Blade Chapterhouse Access.
To access the Summoning Chamber and the Binding Realm, loot a Ring of the Summoning Adepts from a Summoning Chamber Adept and wear it while passing through the portal.

location.name: Stone of Yanshi
location.description:
Quest(s): Harbinger.
You give Stone of Yanshi Decanter of Nullified Essence.
Stone of Yanshi tells you, "You pour the Nullified Essence onto the Stone of Yanshi. It crackles and sparks on contact. Steam rises from the rock as it seeps into the stone."
The ground shakes and you hear a howl of rage from far beneath.

location.name: Aun Saritea
location.description: Quest(s) Buarden, Invoker.

location.name: Aun Kauhmala
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Queen.
Aun Kahmaula tells you, "Greetings, seeker. I am a spiritcaller of the Aun xuta. We are responsible for maintaining the stone rings of this island." Aun Kahmaula tells you, "Please disturb not my work, for all depends upon this rhythm."

location.name: Aun Gehaua
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Queen.
Only Spawned After Pyeal Bell #1 Has Been Handed To Aun Kahmaula.

location.name: Aun Tanaua
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Queen.
Only Spawned After Pyeal Bell #2 Has Been Handed To Aun Gehaua.

location.name: Aun Laiaua
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Queen.
Only Spawned After Pyeal Bell #3 Has Been Handed To Aun Tanaua.

location.name: Aun Aanaua
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Queen.
Only Spawned After Pyeal Bell #4 Has Been Handed To Aun Laiaua.

location.name: Jolly Snowman
