location.description: This jolly giant snowman sells one thing; Magic Iceballs. A rare and much sought after ingredient in many frosty recipes. But come prepared as the price is a bit steep.

location.restrictions: 80+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Whispering Blade Faction 1-3, Mekhmet in Ayan Baqur
location.name: Shade Iron Mine
location.description:
Quest(s):Shade Iron Mine (Silyun Faction Part 4).
Near the end of the dungeon there are three similar branches, each has a group of Viamontian Ore Collectors that drop the Shade Iron Ore Hammer, so if you have a large group of people you can split up to avoid waiting. At the end of each branch is a pillar of Shade Iron Ore Deposit. Use the hammer to obtain a Shade Iron Ore Sample to return to Mekhmet in Ayan Baqur. Note that there is a surface portal at the start that can be tied and summoned.
location.monsters: Viamontian Knights, Viamontian Counselors, Viamontian Commanders, Viamontian Ore Collectors

location.name: Matron Hive South
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Raiment Quest.
The Olthoi Brood Matron here drops the Brood Matron Claw used to get Asheron's Lesser Raiment.
Portal screenshot by Yoshi of Harvestgain. New coords by Seeker of Morningthaw and Yoshi of Harvestgain.

location.name: Iian di Alduressa
location.description: Quest(s): Alduressa Shadow Armor.

location.name: Camp Entemarre
location.description:
Quest(s): Head of Baron Entemarre.
Camp Entemarre is found within the walls of the Viamontian Fortress. It is the home of the brutal Viamontian warlord known as Baron Entemarre. He drops his severed head on death.
location.monsters: Voracious Eaters, Viamontian Knights, Viamontian Commanders, Viamontian War Wizards, Baron Entemarre

location.name: Viamontian Fortress
location.description: Quest(s): Head of Baron Entemarre.
location.monsters: Viamontian Knights, Viamontian Commanders, Royal Thaumaturges

location.name: Matron Hive East
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Raiment Quest.
The Olthoi Brood Matron here drops the Brood Matron Carapace used to get Asheron's Supreme Raiment.
location.monsters: Olthoi Swarm Guardians, Swarm Warriors, Swarm Mutilators, Brood Matron

location.name: Sarkin Killcrane
location.description:
Quest(s): Sepulcher of Nightmares, Targor's Awakening, The Temple of Xik Minru, Shadowfire Stone, Shadow Breach.
Sarkin Killcrane tells you, "Greetings, I am Shadow Hunter Killcrane. Not a very uplifting title for a Knight of the Golden Flame, I know, but mine is a grim task."
Sarkin Killcrane tells you, "High Queen Strathelar has bid myself and others like me to follow the shadow wherever it goes. This is a daunting task to be certain."
Sarkin Killcrane tells you, "Of late, my journeys have led me to following the actions of the Order of the Raven Hand. Their activities have stirred again, particularly near the energies of the center of the Obsidian Plains."
Sarkin Killcrane tells you, "I tracked a heavily laden party of their agents to the Singularity Bore not but a handful of days ago."
Sarkin Killcrane tells you, "My Queen's orders were to find the source of the activity of the Raven Hand. My Lady did declare that I may seek the aid of others if need be."
Sarkin Killcrane tells you, "Travel to the Singularity Caul, seek out the Order of the Raven Hand, and find what it is that now draws those Shadow-worshipping miscreants to that island and return to me with your findings. Reports from adventurers tell of cultist campsites in the southern, eastern, and western portions of the island."

location.name: Randall the Sponge
location.description:
Quest(s): Brewmaster.
Randall sells Ruined Hops and other spoiled items. Randall the Sponge tells you, Can't say I expected to meet anyone out here in such a remote area. But I'll not turn away a potential customer. Take a look at my wares - such as they are - and let me know if I've aught you wish to purchase!
Randall the Sponge tells you, Thanks for stopping by! Oh and be careful. The ridge on the easter side of this canyon is crawling with some rather nasty-looking young men. And the beasts they're travelling with Fearsome, I say.
Thanks to Larhanya of Morningthaw for this entry!

location.name: Melaverre
location.description: Quest(s): Rossu Morta Chapterhouse Access.

location.name: Rossu Morta Chapterhouse
location.description:
Quest(s): Rossu Morta Chapterhouse Access, Ring of the Rossu Morta, Rossu Morta Chapterhouse Recall Orb, Red Rune Silveran Weapons, Grael's Summoning Chamber, Rossu Morta Lost Messenger.
Portals:
Ayan Baqur Cragstone Hebian-To Sanamar Qalaba'r

location.name: Lieutenant Dialossa
location.description:
Quest(s): The Dark Spiral.
Lieutenant Dialossa tells you, Let me be honest. Your allegiance, whether for or against His Majesty, doesn't matter for the particular matter I am dealing with. Frankly, it seems like a threat against all Isparians.
Lieutenant Dialossa tells you, The two warring sides were on the brink of battle, at long last, near the northern coast of the Direlands. But Count Di Orza has not sent a report back to King Varicci. Neither have the Bloodless sent a report back to their leader. There was a detachment of Tumeroks in the area as well, and they also have not been heard from since.
Lieutenant Dialossa tells you, Something awful has happened, I fear. Please gather what information you can and return, and I will do what I can to help you.

location.name: Mekhmet
location.description:
Quest(s): Shade Iron.
Mekhmet tells you, "The Grand Mother must have sent you. Yes, I know how much you helped the people of Silyun. Now that Silyun has formally allied with Queen Elysa, their cause is our cause."
Mekhmet tells you, "If you would seek to defeat the tyrant Varicci, journey to the Shade Iron Mine in a cavern south of here, along the coast at 65.0 S, 87.6W."
Mekhmet tells you, "The Viamontians have been extracting a metal known as Shade Iron there. This is the metal they crafted the foul blade Heartbreaker with. We must know more about it, so I would ask you to obtain a sample of the ore. The ore is difficult to properly extract. I suspect you will have to take a proper tool from the Viamontian mages in the mine who collect the ore."

location.name: Harkwull the Discreet
location.description:
Quest(s): Whispering Blade Chapterhouse Access.
Harkwull the Discreet tells you, Ah, excellent... I have been looking for a person of your obvious skill who is loyal to Queen Elysa and the good folk of Silyun... as well as another organization. I seek someone of skill and daring to infiltrate the Summoning Chamber of Count Dardante, King Varicci's chief thaumaturgical counselor.
Harkwull the Discreet tells you, You must journey to Sanamar, to the Royal Hall itself, and find the portal to Dardante's Workshop. In there, you must find a way to gain access to his Summoning Chamber, and find what information you can from the spirits that the Count binds and torments there. Bring me what you find, and I will further initiate you into the mysteries of the Whispering Blade.
Harkwull the Discreet tells you, I must also warn you that if you have made it this far into our confidence and are thinking of making use of those unscrupulous plumbers to erase your record of service... Well, suffice it to say, royal archives can be pillaged, but the Whispering Blade does not forget its own.

location.name: Lost Messenger's Corpse
location.description:
Quest(s): Lost Messenger.
You find nothing of interest on this corpse.
You search the fallen messenger's corpse and turn up a scrap of paper with some scribbled writing on it.
Lost Messenger's Corpse gives you Messenger's Journal.

location.name: Assassins' Hideout
location.description: Quest(s): Lost Messenger.

location.name: Pheraion's Sanctum
location.description: Quest(s): Pheraion's Sanctum.

location.name: Shadow Spire (Singularity Caul)
location.description:
Quest(s): Shield of Isin Dule.
A enormous floating Shadow Object.
The Shadow Spires were the places where Bael'Zharon gathered his forces.
During the The Fourth Sending of Darkness arc, Shadow Spires appeared at different towns.
Arwic as well as Tufa were destroyed by the forces coming from these Spires.
The Spires were destroyed during the Twilight's Gleaming event. Their remains can be found near quite a few Isparian towns, for example the Fallen Shadow Spire of Cragstone.
The only one existing at the moment is on the Singularity Caul at 91.8S, 92.8W. It appeared during the The Price of Loyalty event. The rumor A Shadow Spire on the Caul refers to this one.
Original Entry For A Singularity Caul Shadow Spire.
Added 06-17-2006

location.name: Targor's Cave
location.description: Quest(s): Necklace of the Golden Flame.

location.name: White Spear`s Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Tracking Grael.
Head of the White Spear (dropped by Harrak).

location.restrictions: 140+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Speak to Varlanna in the Whispering Blade Chapterhouse.
location.name: Altar Nest
location.description:
Quest(s): Tracking Grael.
Once you have completed the quest and handed in the Head of the Mukkir Scion, you will never again be able to enter this dungeon.
location.monsters: Broodling, Vargol the Scion

location.name: Temple of Forgetfulness
location.description:
Quest(s): Skill Redistribution.
Dungeon for untraining skills and attributes.

location.name: Cydna Wren
location.description:
Quest(s): Ancient Olthoi Queen.
Cydna Wren tells you, What do you want from me? Go away, I do not trust you.

location.name: Balor
location.description:
The huge tame Hoary Mattekar which was Lord Kresovus beloved pet.
Note: "Retired". Balor was kidnapped during the Infiltration event, and not seen ever since.
Poor Balor...
Guinevere du Avalon TD

location.name: Repair Golem
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle.
You give Repair Golem Sluice Gate Bar.
The golem turns and fuses the bar into the Sluice Gate. Somewhere below, you feel a grinding vibration through the ground... The fires of Tenkarrdun have been redirected to the ancient Yalaini forges.
Within Aerlinthe Lower Reservoir.

location.name: Smithing Golem
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle.
You give Smithing Golem Pyreal Forge Bellows.
The golem, obeying ancient directives, turns and ignites the forges. Far below you, a tremor runs through the earth. The decayed machinery groans, shivers, and grinds quickly to a halt. Mount Tenkarrdun has become active again!
Within Tenkarrdun Foundry.

location.name: Oubliette Gatekeeper
location.description:
Quest(s): Gelidite Library.
Oubliette Gatekeeper tells you, "It is forbidden to pass these walls unless you have been given the permission of he who watches the gate. To be given that passage, hand me your key so that I may verify the inscriptions and grant you access. But be forewarned, your entry to this place will place you in direct contact with the accused. Make your decision wisely, for you may cast your vote only once."
Oubliette Gatekeeper tells you, "The key, had you forgotten, is a writing infused with the magic of my masters. I will infuse the writing with the power of the dias, and then return it to you."

location.name: Platinum Golem
location.description:
Quest(s): Gaerlan's Citadel.
Found at the end of the Ziggurat Dungeons Give Him the Imbued Pyreal Nugget that was given to you by Asheron and he will open a portal to the Proving Grounds.
The golem looks at you expectantly.
Platinum Golem tells you, "You have something for me?"

location.name: Hea Rangaua the Elder Shaman
location.description:
Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.
Hea Rangaua the Elder Shaman tells you, "We have gained much through the pact with our Virindi friends. For this we have named them Atual Arutoa--Granters of Freedom." Hea Rangaua the Elder Shaman tells you, "Farewell--and do not believe the lies of the Aun in Timaru."

location.name: Hea Mutuona
location.description:
Quest(s): Putiputipuh's Onga.
Hea Mutuona tells you, "I'd tell you more but, ah, I'm a little parched. Need a little ale."
Hea Mutuona says, "A puh like that shouldn't have been allowed to stay on the island."
Hea Mutuona says, "If he ever shows up in town again, I'll make him and his 'Putiputi' sorry..."

location.name: Knorr Lyceum (Ishilai Lyceum)
location.description:
Quest(s): Halls of Knorr, Collegium Occultus Ring, The Knorr Quiddity Seed, Menhir Mana Fields # 5.
The Yalaini Lyceum on the island of Knorr.
The Lyceum is made up of various collegia, dormitories, libraries, and other wings which are connected by portal devices. Most of these areas are deemed unsafe due to Olthoi infestation, and are inaccessible.
Obtain A Knorr Portal Gem from Olcris, Nuhmudira's Student.

location.name: Eaushi the Trainer
location.description:
Quest(s): Hieromancer's Armor.
Hand Eaushi a Slip of Paper that spawns nearby and it will teleport you to the Lyceum Training Grounds dungeon.

location.restrictions: 40+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest flag: Hand an Untranslated Writing dropped randomly by various Burun Ruuks to Aun Laokhe in Arwic.
location.name: King Toad Idol
location.description:
Quest(s): King Toad Idol.
Hot drop.
When you enter take either left or right but when you find the 4 way remember which way you take down. In this dungeon you recieve fellowship spells ( missle/melee/magic resist ) levels 4-7 and the A Carved Mosswart Statue. Each level of spells are at different ends of the 4 way intersection.

location.name: Executor Assistant
location.description:
Quest(s): Singularity Weapons.
Executor Assistant tells you, "The Master would be pleased to see you have made it so far, little one. You haven't lost your pretty Singularity weapon now, did you? Give it to me, and we shall embark on the next step on this journey...yes? Yesssssss."
Executor Assistant gives you A Journal by Martine.
Executor Assistant tells you, "If you already have one of my pretty Singularity weapons, let me enhance it for you."

location.name: Riordin Nightbane
location.description:
Quest(s): Aegis of the Golden Flame, Shadow Statues.
Riordin Nightbane tells you, "I have been brought here to assist Sarkin Killcrane in the collection of the Frozen Black Crystals he has been receiving from adventurers as of late. If you wish to try to retrieve one of these crystals for us, I have heard that they can be found on a Mukkir named Targor. Targor seems to be a part of an ongoing conflict between the Raven Hand and a group of Shadows up around 68.4N, 66.6E."
Riordin Nightbane tells you, "Also, there have been reports of Shadows and Raven Hand Cultists erecting statues to the Hopeslayer in what people refer to as the 'Valley of Death'."
Riordin Nightbane tells you, "If you find any small idols or some such in their possession, my colleagues in the Knighthood would be interested in studying them. I'd say, three of them, total, would be enough to allow them to magically study them for information."

location.name: Alfrin
location.description:
Quest(s): Alfrin's Stolen Supplies.
Alfrin tells you, "Hello, hello! May I buy you a drink? Oh ... no, I am out of pyreal again. I had forgotten. That is the danger of drowning your troubles, I suppose - you may forget the troubles in the drink, but you forget everything else as well!"
Alfrin tells you, "My troubles? How kind of you to ask. I would be happy to tell you my troubles! You see, I am a farmer ... well, all right ... an aspiring farmer. I just know that I could be a good farmer if I could but get the seed in the ground. But drudges keep stealing my seed!"
Alfrin tells you, "If you could retrieve my seed bags for me - all three of them - and perhaps bring me the head of the dastardly drudge who is behind the theft, I will reward you well. You can find the drudges in their nearby Hideout; Wilomine at the bar has directions.

location.name: Worcer
location.description:
Quest(s): Worcer's Missing Heirlooms.
Worcer tells you, "I'd appreciate your help recovering some items from the old Redoubt."
Worcer tells you, "My parents were killed there when I was but a boy, when Holtburg was overrun with Tumeroks. I was saved, whisked away by the mage Celcynd at my parents' behest."
Worcer tells you, "The Redoubt is directly south of here. We put up an eternal flame at the site, in memory of all the townsfolk who died. Some of us are also trying to get together an exhibit to honor our parents. For instance, my mother had these heirloom dishes she was always polishing. She loved those dishes ..."
Worcer tells you, "Anyway, if you could recover any of these items for our exhibit, I will reward you as well as I can."
Worcer gives you A List of Items.
Worcer tells you, "If you need more help getting to the Redoubt, you can buy directions from Wilomine at the bar."

location.name: Flinrala Ryndmad
location.description:
Quest(s): Brogord's Demise, Holtburg Starter Quests, Exploration Society Letters
Flinrala Ryndmad tells you, "Greetings! Welcome to Holtburg! I am the local representative of the Explorer Society. My job is to help new arrivals in Dereth get settled in and learn their way around."
Flinrala Ryndmad tells you, "If you have just arrived in Dereth, you should talk to my friend Worcer. He is looking for some help with an errand. He's a good man - if you help him out, he will help you out."
Flinrala Ryndmad tells you, "Or you can peruse the rumors at the bar. Wilomine always knows something that needs doing."

location.name: Branwyn
location.description:
Quest(s): The Temple of Xik Minru.
Under 130:
Branwyn tells you, `Oh sweet young one. Thank you for offering your aid, but I fear that the task I would have you do be far beyond your grasp.` Branwyn manages smile weakly at you, but her grief overwhelms her once again.
130+:
Branwyn tells you, `Please, bold one! Would you help me find my husband Geowulf the Stonehearted? It has been weeks since he left and I am worried something awful may have happened to him!`
Branwyn tells you, `I am sorry. I should know to behave better in front of those who would help me.`
Branwyn tells you, `One morning, Geowulf and I had an argument, over some silly little thing now that I think upon it. He wanted to move closer to Glenden Wood to be near his ailing father. I love Geowulf`s father dearly, but Arwic has been so profitable for my small floral business that I couldn`t fathom leaving. I suppose I could commute, but at the time the thought didn`t even enter my mind.`
Branwyn sniffles slightly and sounds as if she is on the verge of breaking into tears once again.
Branwyn tells you, `We... we fought, and he grew angry and left. On his way he took his hiking pack and canteen and I have not seen him since.`
Branwyn tells you, `He would at times hike along the western reach he`s of the Lost Wish range, and he always made certain to stop along the northern coast to take in the ocean view. I couldn`t stand the hike, but I would often meet him at the Haliana settlement and we would walk the beach together.`
Branwyn fights back another surge of tears and continues with her story.
Branwyn tells you, `I ... just I... oh Geowulf!`
Branwyn tells you, `Please find my husband! Start your search along the northern coast near that settlement I told you of. Please find him, bring me good news of my beloved!.

location.name: Merchant
location.description: He sells basic supplies.

location.name: Lord Kresovus
location.description:
Quest(s): Balor's Rescue, Aerbax's Prodigal Lugian.
Balor's Rescue
Lord Kresovus tells you, "Greetings, small one. It looks like we have seen the worst of the siege on Linvak Tukal, but not without losses. My poor Balor..."
Lord Kresovus tells you, "My scouts still report the demons who attacked us have a base somewhere in the northermost reaches of the Direlands."
Lord Kresovus tells you, "If you seek to repay the invaders who took so much from us then seek them there. Return whatever information you might find."

location.name: Captain K'rank
location.description:
Queat(s): Captain K'rank's Errands, Noble Weapons.
Captain K'rank tells you, "Hail Isparian, I am sorry if I appear preoccupied. I am waiting on a very important report from a spy working amongst the Renegades. His report from the Renegade fortress in the Direlands is overdue and we have seen an increase in the number of camps surrounding the fortress. I should not bother you with such concerns."
Captain K'rank tells you, "You have come to aid us, no? Well then, let me see what I have for you."
Captain K'rank seems to consult some notes.
Captain K'rank tells you, "Let me see what I have for you."
He then gives you a random quest.

location.name: Royal Guard Gabrielle
location.description: It has come to our attention that Lord Kresovus has managed to get a warrior into the Renegade army. If you can make your way to the fortress in the direlands, I am certain your efforts would be rewarded.

location.name: Lo Raen
location.description:
Quest(s): Rat Catcher.
Lo Raen tells you, "I require an experienced hunter for the task I have. Let's see what you've hunted..."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Blood Shreth."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Polardillo."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Dire Mattekar."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Littoral Siraluun."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Olthoi Nettler."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Olthoi Nymph."
Lo Raen tells you, "You haven't finished hunting the Olthoi Drone."
Lo Raen tells you, "You're not ready to help me with my problem. Here, complete the tasks that the people on this list have for you and I will allow you to help me."
Lo Raen gives you Lo Raen's List of Tasks.
These are the tasks that require completion before I deem you ready to help me with my problem.
Complete the task given to you by San Ming in Shoushi.
Complete the task given to you by Alessandro Mardor in Sanamar.
Complete the task given to you by Fergal the Dire in Baishi.
Complete the task given to you by Rico Cellini in Greenspire.
Complete the three tasks given to you by the Olthoi Hunter in Arwic.

location.name: Shin Ou-Ye the Shopkeep
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nu Sha the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Wah Fo-Za the Armorer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Master Sonji Pan, Archmage
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Dai Yi the Scholar
location.description: Quest(s): Exploration Society Letters.

location.name: Ydnew
location.description:
Quest(s): Hidden Entrance.
Ydnew tells you, "Hail, friend. My name is Ydnew. I have been sent by High Queen Elysa to discuss the frequency with which the Burun have been appearing. Further, I am here to see that we keep close attention on the movements of the Burun and their new allies, the Renegades."
Ydnew tells you, "The events of the past few months has brought a great deal of consternation into the High Queen's court. Since Rage Lao mistakenly opened the first portals from the world that these creatures came from, we have wondered what they were. We still know very little, but we are confident that we will learn more about them soon."
Ydnew tells you, "In the past few weeks, we have seen a rise in Renegade and Burun activity near the old swamp temple near 25s and 46e."
Ydnew tells you, "I have been given leave to reward adventurers who assist us in finding out as much information as they can about the new relationship that the Renegades have forged with these Burun. Please use caution when approaching the temple. We know that they have enclosed the structure and are busy working toward some other nefarious end as we speak."
Ydnew tells you, "If you begin to become overwhelmed, please retreat. We have no cause for people to needlessly endanger themselves against this threat."

location.name: Wedding Planner (Yanshi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Trials.
Wedding Planner tells you, "Welcome! I have everything that you may need to help plan your wedding."

location.name: Emissary of Asheron (Yanshi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Harbinger.
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "With the resurgence of the Harbinger and the assaults levied against it by Nuhmudira and Aerbax, I have taken it upon myself to stand as a balance between the two. I cannot offer the same gifts that they would grant but if you return to me with proof of the Harbinger's defeat I will gladly offer you a reward and a symbol of your efforts."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "If you wish to fight the Essences that reside below. You should buy a Decanter of Nullified Essence and a Guide to the Harbinger from Beldin in the old mage tower west of the stone. Or you could talk to Ciandra's Apprentice, Talar, in Xarabydun."

location.name: Edobar the Esoteric
location.description:
Quest(s): Grael's Rage. Temple of the Stirring Shadows.
Edobar the Esoteric tells you, "Brave adventurer! Would you help your true Queen and the unified citizens of Dereth against external foes most fell? The realm seeks knowledge of an ancient and almost forgotten barbarian named Grael, who fought in the arenas of vanished Haebrous."
Edobar the Esoteric tells you, "Seek the hideout of the Sclavus named Ssavish in the swamps at 23.2 S, 58.3 E, and win from him the knowledge of the archives where the books of Grael are kept. Find the books and bring them to me, and you shall have my gratitude and the gratitude of the realm."

location.name: Bretself the Translator
location.description: Bretself the Translator tells you, "I study Empyrean history of Lord Asheron's era, which we call the Empyrean Era of Lore. If you have a text from that time, perhaps I may be of service."

location.name: Alec
location.description: Noble Guard

location.name: Apprentice Alchemist (Zaikhal)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Tiffany Comfore, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills."
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "If you bring me a vial of Concentrated Bloodseeker Oil, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Apprentice Cook (Tou-Tou)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Cook tells you, "Hello! My master, Copper Vanurp, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills.
Apprentice Cook tells you, "If you bring me some Flaming Kimchi, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Nawamara Ujio
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Nawamara Ujio tells you, "Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I will teach you to increase the duration of your spells."
Nawamara Ujio tells you, "Visit Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you have not already acquired a blank augmentation gem."
Nawamara Ujio gives you Archmage's Endurance.

location.name: Farner
location.description: Sells basic cooking supplies.

location.name: Font of the Eternal Harvester
location.description: Quest(s): Crypt of Adhorix.

location.name: Temple of N'cthail
location.description:
Quest(s): Helm Of Isin Dule.
The Temple of N'cthail is located in the water west of Vissidal Island, at 79.7N 57.4E. There is a portal a short run north of the Bandit Castle, at 70.4N 50.5E, restricted to characters level 100+.
The temple is part of the Helm of Isin Dule Quest, and has portals to the Eastern Temple Catacombs, Western Temple Catacombs, Northern Temple Catacombs, and the Vault of Eternal Slumber.

location.name: Lanaith
location.description:
Quest(s): Dark Isle Flagging.
Lanaith tells you, "As was promised, my Master has opened the path to the Dark Isle. However, the Mukkir have reacted quickly, raising Wards about the Isle to stop us from gaining access to it."
Lanaith tells you, "My Master has located a nest of Mukkir on Vissidal Isle, near that village of strange Merwarts. He believes they are the ones holding the Wards in place. Go there, find a way to bypass their Wards, gain entry to the Dark Isle."

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: speak to Lanaith Near Bandit Castle.
location.name: Deep Mukkir Nest
location.description:
Quest(s): Dark Isle Flagging.
There are currently only two ways to get to Dark Isle. There is a portal on the far east side of Vissidal in the open that requires you be flagged to enter. And the other portal appears at the bottom of this dungeon after killing the Dark Crystal Spire. Going through this summoned portal flags you to use the other permanent portal (most people lifestone on Dark Isle because of the difficulty in getting back).
location.monsters: Fanatical Mukkir, Fanatical Mukkir Ward Guardian, Barbaric Mukkir, Coruscating Mukkir, Mukkir, Vile Mukkir, Dark Crystal Spire, Decaying Ruschk Laktar

location.restrictions: 140+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Talk to Jathaq al-Nishadina in the Rossu Morta Chapterhouse.
location.name: Black Spear Summoning Chamber
location.description:
Quest(s) Grael's Summoning Chamber.
Once you have completed the quest and handed in the trophies, you will never again be able to enter this dungeon.
location.monsters: Tainted Knight, Tainted Vivimancer, Umbral Soldier, Panumbral Soldier, Keeper of the First Door, Keeper of the Second Door, Archmage Aigonne, Pontifex Maegris

location.restrictions: 125+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: See Description.
location.name: Repository
location.description:
Quest(s): Repaired Shadow Stone, Shadowfire Stone.
The Damaged Shadow Stone can be found in two locations in this dungeon (they are identical), also a lore item, the Shriveled Lump.
The exact means of flagging for this dungeon are unknown, several theories exist. The most prominent (and probable) theory is that you have to re-do the Singularity Caul flagging quest (Bore).

location.name: Water Guardian
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway to the Deep.
Water Guardian tells you, "You have done much to reach this point. You have appeased the Gatekeepers. You have been bathed in the waters of the Deep. You have bested the warrior Bur Lizk. And now you seek my blessing."
Water Guardian tells you, "As you were bathed in the waters of the deep, now must you be cleansed by its fires. Slay the spirits of Flame. Bask in their glory."

location.name: Flame Guardian
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway to the Deep.
Flame Guardian tells you, "Welcome to my lonely isle, little one. You seek the mysteries of Vissidal, do you not? Many have come before you. Many will follow in your footsteps. The power which once lay dormant beneath the waves has surfaced. I fear the new rulers of this world will regret their meddling before all is done."
Flame Guardian tells you, "You seek a boon from me, do you not? You seek my permission to further your quest?"
Flame Guardian tells you, "You must prove yourself, little one. You must bathe in the cleansing waters of the deep. You must destroy the spirits of Water that lay claim to this isle."

location.name: Abandoned Mines Mirror
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway To The Deep.
Speak to Shuthoth in Ayan Baqur for the Watcher Token.
Get 4 Items:
Yellow Jewel Swamp Stone Sezzherei's Lair Portal Gem Pyreal Bar
Aerlinthe > Devastated Watcher > Devastated/Corrupted Falatacot Temple > Gatekeepers > Trials > Abandoned Mines Mirror > Watcher Of The Deep.

location.restrictions: 100+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Kiriel Shadowborn in Bandit Castle.
location.name: Northern Temple Catacombs
location.description: Quest(s): Helm of Isin Dule.

location.restrictions: 100+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Kiriel Shadowborn in Bandit Castle.
location.name: Western Temple Catacombs
location.description: Quest(s): Helm of Isin Dule.

location.restrictions: 100+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Kiriel Shadowborn in Bandit Castle.
location.name: Eastern Temple Catacombs
location.description: Quest(s): Helm of Isin Dule.

location.restrictions: 100+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Kiriel Shadowborn in Bandit Castle.
location.name: Vault of Eternal Slumber
location.description: Quest(s): Helm of Isin Dule.

location.name: Kitana Oazaka
location.description:
Quest(s): Relic Armor.
Kitana Oazaka tells you, "Queen Elysa has been informed that this island houses many dread enemies in service to Grael. She asks all brave warriors to destroy them and bring evidence of their destruction to me."
Accepts Dark Isle Trophies for xp, for every 100 trophies turned in will give a random piece of Noble Relic Armor.
Introduced during: Toward Ancient Shores (July 2006)
Note: Replaced By: Tyrina of Arwic During Unfinished Business (February 2009).

location.name: Francois di Terli
location.description:
Quest(s): Relic Armor.
Francois di Terli tells you, King Varicci wishes to reward any who defeat the servants of this foul Grael. Bring any remains to me, that he shall know of your deeds.
Accepts Dark Isle Trophies for xp, for every 100 trophies turned in will give a random piece of Relic Alduressa Armor.
During the Unfinished Business event, his armor was changed from Black Diforsa to the same Relic Alduressa Armor he hands out.

location.name: The Deep to Vissidal Island
location.description: You must obtain the blessing of the Watcher of the Deep before you may use this portal.

location.name: The Deep (Dark Isle)
location.description:
Quest(s): Dark Isle Trophies, Relic Armor, Damaging the Deep.
As you stare into the void, you feel the rage of The Deep enter you.
The Deep tells you, "Destroy the inhabitants of this island!"
The Deep tells you, "Bring their remains to me!"
The Deep tells you, "Bring the remains of the servants of Grael to me!"
Gives xp for Dark Isle Trophies and for every 100 trophies gives a random piece of Ancient Relic Armor.

location.name: Floating Rocks
location.description: Outside of Trial of the Deep

location.name: Ruined Watcher
location.description:
Quest(s): Gateway To The Deep (Alternate), Menhir Mana Fields # 14.
There is a small glint in the statue's left eye, but the right eye socket appears to be empty.
Give the statue the Watcher Token for access to the Corrupted Falatacot Temple.
The Watcher looks down on you, a glint in its one good eye. There appears to be something missing from the other eye socket.

location.name: Ancient Masonry
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafting Golems, Prismatic Shadow Armor.
This dungeon contains items for the Crafting Golems and Prismatic Shadow Armor Quests.

location.name: Aerfalle Keep
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle, , Menhir Mana Fields # 16 (In Aerfalle's Sanctum).
NPCs
Ghost of Dylaeral Ghost of Galaeral

location.restrictions: Must be a newly created character with a Pathwarden Token.
location.name: Pathwarden Thorolf
location.description:
Quest(s): Training Academy.
Greetings, friend! Are you new to Dereth? If you are, you might have found a Pathwarden Token in your pack when you arrived here. If you give me that token, I'll give you a key to the chest you see behind me. The chest contains a complete set of armor, provided to all newcomers by my fellowship, the Pathwardens.

location.restrictions: Must be a newly created character with a Pathwarden Token.
location.name: Pathwarden Thierra Molanti
location.description:
Quest(s): Training Academy.
Greetings, friend! Are you new to Dereth? If you are, you might have found a Pathwarden Token in your pack when you arrived here. If you give me that token, I'll give you a key to the chest you see behind me. The chest contains a complete set of armor, provided to all newcomers by my fellowship, the Pathwardens.

location.restrictions: Must be a newly created character with a Pathwarden Token.
location.name: Pathwarden Koro Ijida
location.description:
Quest(s): Training Academy.
Pathwarden Koro Ijida tells you, "You've already been given a key to a supply chest in exchange for the Pathwarden Token. Use the armor well, and remember that you can trade pieces in to me for useful items once you've outgrown the armor."

location.restrictions: Must be a newly created character with a Pathwarden Token.
location.name: Pathwarden Qanara bint Qolosh
location.description:
Quest(s): Training Academy.
Pathwarden Qanara bint Qolosh tells you, "You've already been given a key to a supply chest in exchange for the Pathwarden Token. Use the armor well, and remember that you can trade pieces in to me for useful items once you've outgrown the armor."

location.name: Raxanza Folthid
location.description:
Quest(s): Dagger of Tikola.
I am Raxanza Folthid. Unless you have business with me, I do not wish to speak with you.

location.name: Collector (Mountain Retreat)
location.description: This Collector, found in the Mountain Retreat which shields adventurers from the surround frost, will exchange money or items for several monster trophies. He does not deal in hides, however.

location.name: Apprentice Alchemist (Lin)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Tiffany Comfore, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills."
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "If you bring me a vial of Concentrated Frost Oil, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Asheron`s Servant
location.description:
Asheron's Servant tells you, "You have spoken with my master. There is no more I can tell you. Please investigate the Quiddity Seeds and return as quickly as possible."
Asheron's Servant tells you, "You may test yourself against the Tower Guardian if you wish. It will learn a great deal by battling your best warriors and mages."
Within Asheron's Castle.

location.name: Kiriel Shadowborn
location.description:
Quest(s): Dark Isle Flagging, Helm of Isin Dule.
Kiriel Shadowborn tells you, "Thank you for coming. I feared many would not be willing to hear me out."
Kiriel Shadowborn tells you, "Grael has awakened. My lord tried to stop this, but it has come to pass. I fear the Black Spear's rage will consume this world, if he is not stopped. To that end, my Lord has sent me to aid you and all those who go with you."
Kiriel Shadowborn tells you, "First, a little lesson in history..."
Kiriel Shadowborn tells you, "Long ago, Grael, the Black Spear of the Kemeroi, chose to sleep. The place he chose to sleep was an isle north of here, north of Vissidal Isle. His presence covered the island in Shadow, and the isle soon came to be called the Dark Isle."
Kiriel Shadowborn tells you, "Those Falatacot who followed the Old One, N'cthail took a chance and used ancient seals to sink the isle below the waves. It was their hope that none would ever wake Grael and that this world would be free of him forever. Now, however, that wish has been undone by another."
Kiriel Shadowborn tells you, "I can show you the path to this Temple. Though the original Crystal binding the Isle to the deeps has been destroyed, it must not be allowed to reform, lest the Isle sink back down beneath the waves. The Temple is heavily defended. There are wards that block the use of the portals to the Catacombs. I've located a tablet that will allow me to enchant you to bypass the Eastern Temple Catacomb's wards. Go into the Temple. There is a portal to the Temple opened at 70.4N, 50.5E. Find the entrance to the Eastern Catacombs, bring back the Tablet you will find there, and I can give you further access to the Temple."

location.name: Fanatical Mukkir Cave (Vaeshok's Cave)
location.description:
Quest(s): The Dark Isle Crystal, Defeating Vaeshok, Dereth Exploration Society.
Did a quick run around only to have seen Fanatical Mukkir.
Thamior and Slaith Maha: It looks like the entrance to the Deep, but goes deep under the surface and is filled with Mukkir. There didn`t appear to be anything of note. There were no specially named monsters or portals.
Zen Tek Ken
Now home to the Ruschk Vaeshok, as well as the site of a Rock and a Dereth Exploration Marker.

location.name: Ancient Temple
location.description: Quest(s): Preparation for the Ritus.
location.monsters: Falatacot Abbess, Consort, Matriarch, Patrician

location.name: Ruschk Ice Mountain / Tower
location.description:
Quest(s): The Dark Isle Crystal, Dereth Exploration.
An Ice Tower with quite a few Sodden Undead Ruschk at 96.4N, 54.6E on Dark Isle.
This is an icy mountain with a narrow path upward that is surrounded by Undead Ruschk.
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken, Vic Naydew, Thamior and Slaith Maha.
Also home to a Rock and a Dereth Exploration Marker.

location.name: Lytelthorpe to North Yanshi Plains Settlement
Abandoned Buildings
location.description: Thanks to Sho Far of HG for the location!

location.restrictions: 100+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Amulet Of Dark Rage.
location.name: Shadow Breach
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Breach.
Retrieve Amulet of Dark Rage from Makkar's corpse. Equip necklace and enter Shadow Breach. Leads to the dungeon to battle Shadow Vortex.
location.monsters: Mukkir Sadist, Soldier Mukkir, Void Knight, Wretched, Shadow Vortex

location.name: Emissary of Ulgrim
location.description:
One time log in message during Shattering of the Dark - August 2006.
Ulgrim the Unpleasant has created a present for each and every denizen of Dereth! Please report to Ulgrims Emissaries in Cragstone, Zaikhal, Hebian-To, or Sanamar to receive your special gift!
Note: One Time Log In.

location.name: Emissary of Ulgrim
location.description:
One time log in message during Shattering of the Dark - August 2006.
Ulgrim the Unpleasant has created a present for each and every denizen of Dereth! Please report to Ulgrims Emissaries in Cragstone, Zaikhal, Hebian-To, or Sanamar to receive your special gift!
Note: One Time Log In.

location.name: Emissary of Ulgrim
location.description:
One time log in message during Shattering of the Dark - August 2006.
Ulgrim the Unpleasant has created a present for each and every denizen of Dereth! Please report to Ulgrims Emissaries in Cragstone, Zaikhal, Hebian-To, or Sanamar to receive your special gift!
Note: One Time Log In.

location.name: Emissary of Ulgrim
location.description:
One time log in message during Shattering of the Dark - August 2006.
Ulgrim the Unpleasant has created a present for each and every denizen of Dereth! Please report to Ulgrims Emissaries in Cragstone, Zaikhal, Hebian-To, or Sanamar to receive your special gift!
Note: One Time Log In.

location.name: White Totem Gateway
location.description:
Quest(s): Totem Gateways (sub 100).
Hand a White Gateway Token to the Gateway to summon a portal to the White Totem Temple.
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken

location.name: Sergeant Huang
location.description:
Quest(s): Sawato Bandit.
Sergeant Huang tells you, "Hello, I am Sergeant Huang, apprentice to the Ryu Jou Gai, temple of the Dragon of Power. The people of Sawato, in this obscure swamp, have gone unnoticed and unprotected for too long. Because of this bandits have moved in and are extorting the people of Sawato. As an apprentice to the Ryu Jou Gai I have been charged with organizing efforts to remove or at least hinder these bandits."
Sergeant Huang gives you Sawato Bandit's Mask.
Sergeant Huang tells you, "Take this mask, I believe it will allow you to infiltrate the Bandit's hideout. Their hideout can be found near 25.6S 56.5E. Talk to the Barkeeper there, our intelligence leads us to believe he acts as some sort of door man."
Sergeant Huang tells you, "Gain access to the base of these bandits and bring me back any information you may find about their activities in this region."
Sergeant Huang tells you, "May you be guided by the Four Stones of Jojii."

location.name: Unfriendly Barkeeper
location.description:
Quest(s): Sawato Bandit.
Unfriendly Barkeeper tells you, "We're all out! Get out of here before I have you removed!"
Unfriendly Barkeeper tells you, "I don't think I have seen you around these parts before... You must be one of those new recruits."
The Barkeeper sneers at you.
Unfriendly Barkeeper tells you, "Get out of here, go around back and use the trap door!"

location.name: Black Totem Gateway
location.description:
Quest(s) Totem Gateways.
You must be between level 100 and 149 to get flagged to pick up the Essence. You can easily run to the end of the dungeon, to a safe spot near the exit portal. The final room has about 6 Wretcheds in it. If you can't kill them fast enough, you can ignore them and just attack the totem.
Submitted by Zegeger

location.name: Abyssal Totem Gateway
location.description:
Quest(s): Totem Gateways.
Can only be entered by giving the Abyssal Totem Gateway a Abyssal Gateway Token. Once you have entered the portal you are flagged to reenter the dungeon by simply using the gateway. Contains the the Abyssal Totem which can be destroyed as part of the Totem Gateways quest.
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken.

location.name: Ruschk Encampment
location.description:
Quest(s): Shattered Out-Lands - Rylane di Cinghalle's Task.
A Ruschk Encampment in the Shattered Outlands. The Coordinates given by Commander Rylane di Cinghalle are slightly off.
Commander Rylane di Cinghalle tells you, "Greetings. If you have the time, I have a set of tasks you could aid me with. I'm here to help thin out the number of Ruschk in the valley below, and to gain one of their Totems for further study."
Commander Rylane di Cinghalle tells you, "If you were to kill, say... 30 of the Ruschk in the valley, and then acquire one of their smaller Ice Totems from the encampment at 95.5N, 42.3W, I'd be more than happy to reward you for your efforts."
Commander Rylane di Cinghalle tells you, "I'd kill the Ruschk first. That should throw them into enough disarray that you should be able to grab the Totem unnoticed."
submitted by Shadow of Lokania

location.name: Bandit Fort
location.description:
Quest(s): Sawato Bandits.
A couple of Sawato Bandits are here behind a killable Reinforced Door, if you kill the initial 3 a couple more will spawn. There are also 2 Old Runed Chests inside the fort on a shared weekly timer. If you have completed the Sawato Bandit quest, you will be portaled inside the Fort. The Bandits are hollow as well.
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken

location.name: Hoshar ibn Jalaq
location.description:
Quest(s): Totem Gateways, Mukkir Aspect of Grael.
Hoshar ibn Jalaq tells you, "You may be able to help me... I would ask you to seek out a powerful Mukkir known only as the Progenitor. Its ichor has some unique properties, and may be of great use to us in our efforts to combat the demon known as Grael. If you are strong enough to fight mighty Mukkir, venture to 86.4 N, 57.4 E on the Dark Isle, and bring me the ichor of the Progenitor."

location.name: Lamorda Loschi
location.description:
Quest(s): Totem Gateways (sub 100).
Lamorda Loschi tells you, "You may actually be too powerful to help me! More to the point, your great talents can be more productively used by one of my counterparts. Kindly speak with Soju Bo-Ki of the Whispering Blade."

location.name: Soju Bo-Ki
location.description:
Quest(s): Totem Gateways (100-149).
Soju Bo-Ki tells you, "You may be able to help me... I would ask you to seek out a twisted Shadow lord named Hastar the Misbegotten. His essence has some unique properties, and may be of great use to us in our efforts to combat the demon known as Grael. If you are strong enough to fight mighty Shadows, venture to 92.9 S, 94.7 W in the Singularity Caul, and bring me the essence of Hastar."

location.name: Silencia`s Magma Golem (Motey)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hollow, Phantom, Atlan, Isparian, Ravenous Weapons
This creature is well versed in the craft of creating Atlan Weapons from infused ingots of pyreal.

location.name: Arikas, Warden of Knorr
location.description:
Quest(s):Halls of Knorr, Collegium Occultus Ring, Knorr Quiddity Seed.
A golem servant left by Asheron to watch over the Knorr Lyceum. He explains the how to move around the Lyceum and tells you that only certain parts of the Lyceum are safe due to the Olthoi.
Talking to Arikas flags you to receive a Seat of Knorr Portal Gem from Olcris for an MMD Trade Note rather than just a Knorr Portal Gem for an M Note.
The Seat of Knorr Portal Gem lets you bypass the riddles that you would normally have to answer to get the Seat of Knorr.
Arikas, Warden of Knorr tells you, "Asheron did not specify that students would be arriving at the Lyceum. However since you are here I will explain transportation within this place."
Arikas, Warden of Knorr tells you, "Lord Master Asheron has establish a network of devices through his knowledge of Planar magic, that will ease your movement through the Lyceum construct."
Arikas, Warden of Knorr tells you, "I will determine the level of safety of the different areas and allow you to pass through the Planar tunnels provided that the presence of entities catalogued as, Olthoi, are small enough to allow for survival in said areas."

location.name: Diamond Guardian
location.description:
Quest(s): Halls of Knorr, Collegium Occultus Ring.
Tests you with a number of riddles to allow passage into the Seat of Knorr.
The Golem speaks in old Yalain, a language foreign and strange, but as it speaks you gain comprehension of it's words.
Diamond Guardian tells you, "A moth ate a word. To me it seemed, a piteous thing when I learned the wonder that a worm had swallowed, in darkness stolen, the song of Empyrean, our glorious sayings, A great Empyrean's strength; and the thieving guest, who was no whit the wiser for the words it ate."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "Hand me that which was lost to the worm that night."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "I am valued by Empyrean, fetched from afar, Gleaned on the hill-slopes, gathered in groves, In dale and on down. All day through the air, Wings bore me aloft, and brought me with cunning Safe under roof."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "Empyrean steeped me in vats, to give me power to pummel and blind, To cast to the earth, the old and young. Stripped of their strength if they cease not their folly, Loud is their speech, but of power despoiled To manage their mind, their hands or their feet."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "Now give me the item, who can bind all to earth, And lay fools low in the light of day."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "A lonely wanderer, wounded with iron, smitten with war-blades, sated with strife,Worn with the sword-edge; I have seen many battles, many hazardous fights, oft without hope of comforts or help in the carnage of war Ere I perish and fall in the fighting hands of Empyrean."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "The leavings of hammers, the handiwork of smiths, Batter and bite me, hard-edged and sharp; The brunt of the battle I am doomed to endure. No healer may mend me that a fire may cure."
Diamond Guardian tells you, "Hand me the item."
Within Knorr Lyceum.

location.name: Renegade Stronghold
location.description:
Quest(s): Ornate Tumerok Breastplate and Horned Lugian Helm.
At the end of the dungeon War Chief Amanua drops the Ornate Tumerok Breastplate and General Fostok drops the Horned Lugian Helm.

location.name: Aidene
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Iron Spined Chitticks).
Aidene tells you, "So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Iron-Spined Chitticks for me, and I will reward you appropriately."

location.name: Renald the Eldest
location.description:
Quest(s): Pets, Trade Alliance.
Renald the Eldest tells you, "Well? What do ya want?"
Renald the Eldest tells you, "Speak up! Olthoi got yer tongue?"
Renald the Eldest tells you, "If ya ain't got nothing to say then beat it!".

location.name: Arcanum Refurbisher (Holtburg)
location.description:
Arcanum Refurbisher tells you, "Greetings, I am an agent of the Holtburg Arcanum specializing in the refurbishment of broken and abused items."
Arcanum Refurbisher tells you, "Over the years, we find that the elements of this land are often unkind to a number of our prize possessions. The wind and rains erode statues, dampness causes the colors of our prized pack animals to change oddly, and even the magics of the world itself play havok with some of the more.. disturbing... of our decorations."
Arcanum Refurbisher tells you, "This parchment contains a list of items that we of the Arcanum know to be most severely affected by the climate of this world. Should you find that you are in possession of one of these damaged items, please bring it to me and I'll see what I can do about getting it fixed up for you."
Arcanum Refurbisher tells you, "While I have the utmost confidence in my ability to repair such things, I have been unable to capture the knack of retaining any personalizations. This means that my repairs will obliterate any inscriptions you, or someone you know, may have etched into the item."
Arcanum Refurbisher tells you, "If you have any sentimental attachment to those inscriptions, I would recommend that you refrain from using the service I offer."
Arcanum Refurbisher gives you Refurbisher's Tally.."

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Town Crier tells you, Ooo oo aaa aaa aaa. Hoo.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Town Crier tells you, Hoo, ooo oo oo?

location.name: Lug
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Lug tells you, "Arr!"
Lug tells you, "I shall be telling ye of the ability ye may learn in order what to gain more of the luck when doing the imbues of the things that which you be imbuing."
Lug tells you, "But first, ye shall be journeying to the far-off isles of Halaetan and be bringing me a blank augmentation gem from the creature of the Fiun what goes by the name of Rehlyun."
Lug tells you, "Arr!".
Lug gives you Charmed Smith.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on all the latest news and gossip.

location.name: The Royal Firkin
location.description: Lift a pint with friends at the western pub of Rithwic.

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Mosswart
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Mosswart that once threatened Rithwic.

location.name: Apprentice Fletcher (Rithwic)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Wils Morrem, has sent me out into the world to participate in the great Mission - encouraging the young people of Dereth to embrace a life of artistry!"
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "If you bring me an example of your craftsmanship - say, a Frost Arrowhead - I will reward you with a token of encouragement."
The apprentice coughs quietly.
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "Um, we're not rich yet, though, so I'm afraid I can only reward you once a week."

location.name: Lady of Blades
location.description: Here, you can purchase weapons of variety of shapes and sizes.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Rithwic)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on all the latest news and gossip!

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic (Rithwic)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic (Rithwic)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic (Rithwic)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic (Rithwic)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: The Gilded Tome
location.description: Purchase all of your reading and writing materials here!

location.name: Fishing Shack
location.description: Purchase your license and supplies here.

location.name: Tenxien`s Garments
location.description: Keep up with the latest fashion trends here.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Keep up on the latest news and gossip.

location.name: Skull and Flagons
location.description: Lift a pint with friends and comrades in the eastern pub of Rithwic.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on the latest news and gossip.

location.name: Advocate Tower
location.description: A place where the Advocates and Sentinels used to gather.

location.name: Kira Sojini
location.description:
Kira Sojini tells you, "It was you people that brought Martine to his end. You and your meddling. Why couldn't you have left him alone?"
Kira Sojini tells you, "He was finally becoming happy, but then you had to come down here and cause your ruckus and look where we are now."
Kira Sojini tells you, "Everything is falling apart and your hands are tainted. Your hands are covered in his blood."
Kira Sojini tells you, "You make me sick."

location.name: Remmick
location.description:
Quest(s): Sunstone and Opal Gauntlets.
Remmick tells you, "Everything is falling apart. I can't get crops anymore, and without those crops then everyone here will starve, or be forced to move back to the surface. But most don't want that. They'd rather live out their lives here."
Remmick tells you, "If only we could get rid of Harker! The farm has never been truly safe. Rats, wasps, even Olthoi have been known to peek their heads in from time to time."
Remmick tells you, "The worst were the grubs, though. Hundreds of them at times. They're small enough to smash outright, sure... but they're more a threat to the harvest."
Remmick tells you, "If you're going down there, be prepared... One more thing: Harker has a bundle of hooligans who traffic with him now. You watch your back down there, you hear?"
Remmick tells you, "Go talk to Hibdin, he's the one organizing the expeditions down there."

location.name: Timon Rae
location.description:
Timon Rae tells you, "Hello Fellow human, might I interest you in some insight into we who live beyond the world?"
Timon Rae snickers.
Timon Rae tells you, "If you would hand over any objects of Virindi nature I will divine the truth behind them."

location.name: Josef
location.description:
Quest(s): Major Prismatic Stone.
Josef tells you, "I knew if I whispered long enough one of you outsiders would make your way over to me. The names Josef, and before you ask no there's no surname. Just Josef. Don't ask cause I ain't tellin'."
Josef tells you, "Now listen up, and listen up well cause i don't like taking to much time in repeating myself. It makes me waste precious air and that's not fun."
Josef clears his throat and then drops his voice into a deep whisper.
Josef tells you, "A while back the boss, Martine, was planning on opening the way to Marae Lassel. A new home for people. Thing is there were people there already, like us but they grew up different. No big deal right? Well the thing is when he did his spell or whatever something else happened."
Josef tells you, "He finished his little trick and suddenly a portal storm hit the center of the living area here. Portal energy was whipping off the walls and down the corridors. Next thing we know there's a guy sitting in the middle of the room, naked as the day he was born and about eight, maybe nine feet tall."
Josef tells you, "He was real confused. Had no clue where he had come from or where he was, just his name. Gaerlan. And he said over and over again...is Asheron among you."
Josef tells you, "Now here's the rub. I know a lot more than that, but I need some help. So you help me...I help you. Take this."
Josef gives you Josef's Wish List.
Josef tells you, "Get me the things on that list and I'll talk. It's simple really."

location.name: Julian Bartok
location.description:
Julian Bartok tells you, "Since Martine... left the simulacra that used to assist me in the armory have begun acting strange."
Julian Bartok tells you, "It's starting to become a chore to keep them in line. But so far so good. Hibdin is a good man, but the things down there don't listen to him the same."

location.name: Leandra
location.description:
Quest(s): Sanguinary Aegis.
Leandra tells you, "Ah, a visitor! It is so nice to see a new face around here, especially now that my spirits have been lifted. I must tell you of my newest findings."
Leandra tells you, "I have been working on a distillation process that transforms chorizite ore into a viscous formula capable of absorbing magical damage."
Leandra tells you, "If you have the inclination, bring me a small amount of the highest quality refined chorizite available, and I will reward you with one application of the formula, and my notes.".

location.name: Hibdin Velos
location.description:
Quest(s): Sunstone and Opal Gauntlets.
Hibdin Velos tells you, "Hello friend. We've fallen on some hard times here in Martine's Retreat. With Martine being gone for so long, we can only surmise that he is indeed dead. But that is the least of our problems."
Hibdin Velos tells you, "About two weeks ago Remmick, our head farmer, came up from the subterranean farm and said that it was madness down there. It seems that a farm hand named Harker had become... touched."
Hibdin Velos tells you, "If you wouldn't mind helping us out with getting some of the food and maybe killing Harker, we'd be in your debt. I'd pay you handsomely."
Hibdin Velos tells you, "Before you go, you might want to speak to Remmick. He might have some pointers for you."
Sunstone Gauntlets (60+) Opal Gauntlets (20 - 59).

location.name: Ambrosia Roe
location.description: Ambrosia Roe tells you, "Things have begun to quiet down thankfully. But there are stirrings from the deeper areas of the Retreat. Hibdin knows more about it than I do. I'm content simply watching for now. I'm just glad that I am free of Gaerlan's mind control."

location.name: Dwennon
location.description:
Quest(s): Cow Tipping
Dwennon tells you, You've seen them lingering around town, haven't you? They've been here all along, you know that, don't you? They have spies all over the place. They see and hear everything. They must be stopped, and stopped the only way we know how. Simply killing them isn't good enough, we need to tip them and tip them often. Go, go tip the cows, they must be stopped!

location.name: Journeyman Cook(Neydisa Castle)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Journeyman Cook tells you, "Greetings! I have left my master in Glenden Wood to help the craftsmen of this fine land to hone their crafting skills"
Journeyman Cook tells you, "Prove your knowledge by bringing me some Fried Anchovy Dough, and I shall reward you."
Journeyman Cook tells you, "What, you say you don't know how to make Fried Anchovy Dough?! Why, that is what tests of knowledge are for! Get out there and experiment, my young friend!"

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (MacNiall's Freehold)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Onda Nakoza
location.description:
Quest(s): Peg Legs.
Onda Nakoza says, "Strangers to our island... Does this mean the Olthoi are gone?"
Onda Nakoza says, "I wonder what that tame Mosswart is up to?"
Onda Nakoza says, "I spit upon the tenets of Jojii."
Onda Nakoza tells you, "Welcome to MacNiall's Freehold. You must be one of those people who has... rediscovered our island. Those who live here have earned their place by the strength of their arms and the power of their convictions. Do what you will is the whole of the law."

location.name: Journeyman Fletcher (MacNiall's Freehold)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Greetings! I have left my master in Glenden Wood to help the craftsmen of this fine land to hone their crafting skills. Prove your knowledge by bringing me a Hollow Atlatl dartshaft, and I shall reward you.
What, you say you don`t know how to make a Hollow Atlatl dartshaft?! Why, that is what tests of knowlege are for! Get out there and experiment, my young friend!

location.name: Apprentice Alchemist (Arwic)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Tiffany Comfore, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills."
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "If you bring me a vial of Concentrated Lightning Oil, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Apprentice Fletcher (Samsur)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Wils Morrem, has sent me out into the world to participate in the great Mission - encouraging the young people of Dereth to embrace a life of artistry!"
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "If you bring me an example of your craftsmanship - say, a Lightning Arrowhead - I will reward you with a token of encouragement."
The apprentice coughs quietly.
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "Um, we're not rich yet, though, so I'm afraid I can only reward you once a week."

location.name: Scrivener of War Magic (Tou-Tou)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of War tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Life Magic (Tou-Tou)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Life tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Item Magic (Tou-Tou)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Item tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Creature Magic (Tou-Tou)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Creature tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Banderling
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Banderling that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains as a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Learn the latest news and catch up on gossip!

location.name: Tower Tavern
location.description: A rest stop on the way to the tourist site of the Lighthouse. Reasonable prices, good food.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on current events.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Hear about the latest gossip.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Al-Jalima)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Wisdom`s Way
location.description: A great place to stock up on your magical supplies.

location.name: Janda`s Apprentice
location.description:
Quest(s): Apprentice Mask Maker.
Hello, I`m Bleis, Janda`s apprentice. She`s letting me work iwth skulls, scarecrow heads, mosswart heads and banderling heads.
Finally! Of course I`m still learning, I never thought that apprenticeship would take so long. I`ll craft the older versions of the mossward, banderling and hollow minion masks for you. If you would like the old styles or something unique, hand one of the heads to me
Also, with Janda`s blessing, I am learning the art of facetting. She believes I am capable of applying what I have learned. If you have them handy, I will be happy to alter your Sunstone Gauntlets and bring a dark red color to them.

location.name: Scrivener of Creature Magic (Al-Jalima)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.
Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Scrivener of Item Magic (Al-Jalima)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.
Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Scrivener of War Magic (Al-Jalima)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.
Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Scrivener of Life Magic (Al-Jalima)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.
Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Skeleton
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Skeleton that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains as a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Learn the latest happenings.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Give her a tip; get a special tip!

location.name: Khayyaban Bind Stone
location.description: Allegiance monarchs can use this item to set the town recall point for their allegiances.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: She loves to gossip!

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Khayyaban)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Zayjay`s Clothing
location.description: Find the latest fashions here!

location.name: Desert`s Respite
location.description: A cool place to heal up from crossing the desert.

location.name: The Skeleton`s Mug
location.description: Specialists in stuffed grape leaves.

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Skeleton
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Skeleton that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains as a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: Scrivener of War Magic (Lhayyaban)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of War tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Creature Magic (Khayyaban)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Creature tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Item Magic (Khayyaban)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Item tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Scrivener of Life Magic (Khayyaban)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV.
Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Scrivener of Life tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Bowyer Safruya bunt Blak
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Apprentice Fletcher (Khayyaban)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Wils Morrem, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills."
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "If you bring me a Greater Acid Arrowhead, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Najmima the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Matron Hive North
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Raiment Quest.
The Olthoi Brood Matron here drops the Brood Matron Pincer used to get Asheron's Raiment.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Hear the latest news.

location.name: Hidden Valley to High Mountain Valley
Zenzaburou Hensu
location.description:
Zenzaburou Hensu tells you, "Greetings to you, kind sir. My name is Zenzaburou Hensu, and I am the leader of Kryst."
Zenzaburou Hensu tells you, "Can you tell us what happened to the Olthoi? I noticed that many of you newcomers seem more concerned about strange floating crystals..."

location.name: The Olthoi`s Eye
location.description: Archers newly come to the town can stock up on supplies here.

location.name: The Wildsong Inn
location.description: Take refuge from the heat of the jungle with a cool drink!

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Sclavus
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Sclavus that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains as a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: The Magi`s Refuge
location.description: Mages can find all their spellcasting needs here.

location.name: Mosswart Camp
location.description: Several Mosswarts make camp in and near these ancient stone heads.

location.name: Saqat
location.description:
Quest(s): The Old Dry Well.
Saqat tells you, "Say, I might have 200 nice, shiny Pyreals with your name on them! I'll have you know this key was fashioned by the best lockpi... finest craftsman in Uziz!"
Saqat gives you Iron Key.
Saqat tells you, "Straight southwest from here, you'll find an old dry well. Go down into it, and bring me back some well water. And don't you believe those stories about the lower caves being haunted!"

location.name: Ashqa the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Blue Ghost Falls
location.description: A popular fishing spot, the falls are named after Kushina Naidu, a wizard who slew a Gigas Lugian warlord, saving the town of Nanto. He died from his wounds after the battle, and some locals say you can see his spirit standing on the shores of the pool beneath the falls.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Hear the latest news from him!

location.name: Ji Ra Ping
location.description:
Quest(s): Water for Ji Ra Ping.
Ji Ra Ping tells you, "Can you please help me? Here is the letter I would like you to give Shin Ro, who is the Archmage's Apprentice in Nanto itself. He will give you a small reward."
Ji Ra Ping gives you Letter to Shin Ro.

location.name: Inuo KonKou
location.description:
Quest(s): Magical Lights, Nanto Starter Quests.
Inuo KonKou tells you, "I am a keeper of lights, seeking to illuminate the paths of the lost, as the good Elders would have me do."
Inuo KonKou tells you, "I once filled an entire dungeon with glorious candles to help wanderers. Recently, some creature or other stole my reference book on magical lights."
Inuo KonKou tells you, "I suspect my book was stolen by drudges, who have lately taken up residence in the dungeon I filled with lights, the Kindled Path."
Inuo KonKou tells you, "Ungrateful creatures. The dungeon is to the east of here. Look for the candles that mark the entrance."

location.name: Tackle Master (Nanto)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Learn the latest news and gossip.

location.name: Shin Ro
location.description:
Quest(s): Exploration Society Letters, Nanto Starter Quests.
Shin Ro tells you, "I have been contracted by the Dereth Exploration Society to help them in their outreach program towards the Isparians who find themselves newly exiled in Dereth. Here is a book that explains their mission. I am also giving you a list describing the locations of the nearest stamp and portals to other towns. If you collect any of the Society's stamped letters, you may bring them back to me for a reward."
Shin Ro gives you A Book of Quests for New Explorers. Shin Ro gives you Nexus Town Information Guide.
Shin Ro tells you, "By the way -- if you haven't yet done so, you might want to visit Ji Ra Ping at the North Outpost, or Inuo KonKou at the East Outpost. They often have tasks for young adventurers.".

location.name: The Oak Talisman
location.description: Younger mages can find their needed supplies here.

location.name: The Touch of Healing
location.description: Adventurers can soothe their wounds with the items found here.

location.name: Southern End Tavern
location.description: Share a pint with friends, and strike up a conversation about rats!

location.name: Apprentice Cook (Nanto)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Cook tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Copper Vanurp, has sent me out into the world to participate in the great Mission - encouraging the young people of Dereth to embrace a life of artistry!"
Apprentice Cook tells you, "If you bring me an example of your craftsmanship - say, a bowl of Fish Noodle - I will reward you with a token of encouragement."
The apprentice coughs quietly.
Apprentice Cook tells you, "Um, we're not rich yet, though, so I'm afraid I can only reward you once a week."

location.name: Miyako Nujou-Wah
location.description:
Quest(s): Miyako's Moonstone.
A poet of some reknown, Miyako is looking for a lost volume of her poetry. Perhaps you can help retrieve it!

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Reedshark
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Reedshark that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains as a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: Jewels of the South
location.description: Buy and sell rare and exotic jewelry and gems here.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Nanto)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic (Nanto)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
