Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic (Nanto)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic (Nanto)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic (Nanto)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend."

location.name: Collector (Nanto)
location.description: Collector tells you, "I'm interested in monster trophies from many of the monsters that plague Dereth. If you give me such items, I will reward you with money or an item. With regret, I don't deal in hides."

location.name: Southern Town Bows
location.description: Stock up on ammunition at this small town armory.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Learn the latest news from the Nanto Town Crier.

location.name: The Full Net
location.description: Stock up on provisions and rations in this store, run by Jo Gau.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Visit the Town Crier to learn the latest news.

location.name: Robert Crow
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Robert Crow tells you, You want to specialize your skill in Salvaging? Go to Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands. Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I'll see if I can help you out.

location.name: Burrell Sammrun
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Burrell Sammrun tells you, Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I will help you specialize your Magic Item Tinkering skill.
Burrell Sammrun tells you, If you haven't already done so, go talk to Fiun Rehlyun. When you get the gem, come back to me.

location.name: Lenor Turk
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Lenor Turk tells you, If you want to specialize your Weapon Tinkering skill, bring me a blank augmetation gem.
Lenor Turk tells you, You can get a blank augmetation gem from Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands.

location.name: Joshun Felden
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Joshun Felden tells you, If you'd like to vastly improve your skill in Armor Tinkering, bring me a blank augmentation gem.
Joshun Felden tells you, If you don't already have one of those, go talk to Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands.
Joshun Felden gives you Jibril's Essence.

location.name: Kris Cennis
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Kris Cennis tells you, I will teach you the secrets of salvaging, so that you can acquire salvage materials much more efficiently. But you'll have to give me a blank augmentation gem first.
Kris Cennis tells you, If you haven't already acquired one of these gems, you should seek out Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Isles. Until you speak with it, there is nothing I can do for you.
Kris Cennis gives you Ciandra's Fortune.

location.name: Brienne Carlus
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Brienne Carlus tells you, I can show you some tricks I learned as a warrior on how to get the most out of your items by using Item Tinkering on them, but you'll have to give me a blank augmentation gem first.
Brienne Carlus tells you, Find Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you need a blank augmentation gem.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Candeth Keep)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Empty Hut
location.description: Empty hut next to House of Bones in Candeth Keep.

location.name: Town Mason and Storage
location.description: Back entrance at the Metalworks.

location.name: Candeth Keep Treehouse
location.description: Quest(s): Town Founder.

location.name: Finn Skigg
location.description:
Quest(s): The Temple of Hizk Ri (Ancient Armor).
Finn Skigg tells you, Good day! I see that you're an adventurous sort. So am I, my dear friend! I must admit that I have been in better spirits than I am at the moment, but the sight of another adventurer has caused a smile to spread across my face.
Finn Skigg tells you, You see, I have just finished a jaunt across and all around Dereth. I managed to make the walk in about eighty days. I've only recently settled her in the pleasantly arid air of Candeth Keep. I had a particularly nasty run-in with some foul undead near the southern entrance of the Valley of Death.
Finn Skigg tells you, While making my way into the a valley, I was accosted by these foul looking undead beasts. They gave me such a fright that I lost a collection of rare plates I'd received from Baron Eli von Schreft back on Ispar. They're priceless, and I would certainly be pleased if someone were to bring them back to me. If you find them please bring them here.

location.name: Grania the Bold
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Mottled Carenzis).
Grania the Bold tells you, "So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Mottled Carenzi for me, and I will reward you appropriately."

location.name: Gilly
location.description: Sells Mana Scarabs for 90,000py.

location.name: Pagrok the Stone Collector
location.description:
Quest(s): Obsidian Enchanter.
In the basement of the Metalworks.

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of War Magic (Candeth Keep)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI Spells.
Grand Master Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of War Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of Item Magic (Candeth Keep)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI Spells.
Grand Master Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of Item Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic (Candeth Keep)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI Spells.
Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Agent Dravos
location.description:
Quest(s): Housing Kit.
Basically an Agent of the Arcanum. Gives Writs for Trophies.

location.name: Grand Master Scrivener of Life Magic (Candeth Keep)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level VI Spells.
Grand Master Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Grand Master Scrivener of Life Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Ulna bint-Fasha the Ivory Crafter
location.description: Ivory Crafter tells you, "I am interested in various teeth, horns, shells, and skulls. For those I will reward you with useful items I make myself."

location.name: Aun Amanaualuan the Elder Shaman
location.description:
Sells at 140%, buys at 100%.
Aun Amanaualuan the Elder Shaman tells you, "Welcome, my friend. You have helped this town greatly. How may I serve you."

location.name: Tunlok Weapons Master
location.description:
Sells at 140%, buys at 100%.
Tunlok Weapons Master tells you, "I'm glad to help you. I personally thank you for your work to help build this town." Tunlok Weapons Master tells you, "Protection from those that would do you harm."

location.name: Black Ferah's Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Mukkir Aspect of Grael.
Speak to Varetha at 44.4S 62.5W on the run there to flag for entry. Once you have completed the quest, you will be unable to reenter this dungeon until your timer has expired (28 days).

location.name: Night Club Attendant
location.description:
Quest(s): Night Club.
Night Club Attendant tells you, "If you have a Night Club Ticket, give it to me and I will send you directly to the Night Club."
Only Available During The "Halloween" Patch.

location.name: Night Club Attendant
location.description:
Quest(s): Night Club.
Night Club Attendant tells you, "If you have a Night Club Ticket, give it to me and I will send you directly to the Night Club."
Only Available During The "Halloween" Patch.

location.name: Ungrim the Unpleasant Smelling
location.description:
Quest(s): Undead Attack on Al-Jalima, Zombie Butler Quest.
Ungrim the Unpleasant Smelling says, "Party! Someone bring me another Stout!"
Ungrim the Unpleasant Smelling tells you, "Bring me some stout and we'll have a nice chat. Bring me two stouts and I'll tell you whatever you want to know. Bring me three stouts and I'll make some stuff up for you."

location.name: Trilaine di Ricard
location.description:
Quest(s): Mask Makers of Dereth, Heritage Masks.
Trilaine di Ricard tells you, Greetings, I am Trilaine di Ricard. It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance. If you bring me the complete mask from one of those strange and gifted creatures, the Virindi, I can forge for you a piece of Regalia worthy of the ancient Viamont Heroes of lore!
Trilaine di Ricard tells you, If you seek one of the more common masks or costumes, tied to the Bloodless festivities, I`m afraid you will need to seek out one of their crafters. Such creations are frowned on in Sanamar, so I have not practiced the art of their creation.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Even Town Criers can get into the Festival mood!

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Even Town Criers join in the Festival fun!

location.name: House of the Seven Stars
location.description: Mages can find the supplies they need at this oasis shop.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Even Town Criers join in the Festival fun!

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Tufa)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Skeleton
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Skeleton that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: Gabal Feteh
location.description:
Quest(s): Mnemosynes.
Gabal Feteh tells you, "Hello. Myself and my brothers-in-arms have been assigned to exchange gifts with those that donate undead trophies to the Shagar Zharalim. We were not expecting the plethora of trophies we have received, so we have adjusted our prizes accordingly."
You give Gabal Feteh A Large Mnemosyne.
Gabal Feteh tells you, "Thank you. Here is your reward."
Gabal Feteh gives you 100 Soulrender Arrowheads..

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Even Town Criers join in the Festival Fun!

location.name: The Bursting Quiver
location.description: Obtain all your fletching needs in this desert town.

location.name: Tufa Crater Falls
location.description: Water falls into the crater left behind by the attacks, so many years ago.

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic (Tufa)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Item Magic (Tufa)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of War Magic (Tufa)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Journeyman Scrivener of Life Magic (Tufa)
location.description:
Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level III Spells.
Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Isn't it wonderful what Asheron and the Arcanum were able to accomplish for us?" Journeyman Scrivener of Creature Magic tells you, "Good luck in your travels, friend.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Even Town Criers join in the Festival Fun!

location.name: Sclavus Umbral Forge
location.description: Submitted by BARTZ of HG

location.name: Temple Entrance
location.description:
Quest(s): Search For Lunnum.
From the drop stick left at the first large room, then it's linear all the way to the end. Near the boss you'll need to kill Patrician Kilkitris and Patrician Phaerix for keys that open wooden doors to get to levers. Once past these lever doors there is no way to reopen them.

location.name: Arwic to Cragstone
location.description: This portal goes to the Aluvian capital, Cragstone. Thie is a good town for characters over level 10.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Cragstone)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.restrictions: 80+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Shan Zhen, Portal Servitor
location.name: Realaidain Eastern Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure (Bur Flagging).
First dungeon of the In Search of Asheron quest.
location.monsters: Chomu Sclavus Lord, Falatacot Consort, Karkuul the Defiler

location.restrictions: 80+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Shan Zhen, Portal Servitor
location.name: Realaidain Northern Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure (Bur Flagging).
Second dungeon of the In Search of Asheron quest.
location.monsters: Chomu Sclavus Lord, Siessa Sclavus, Falatacot Patrician, Falatacot Consort, Vizidh the Despoiler

location.restrictions: 80+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Shan Zhen, Portal Servitor
location.name: Realaidain Western Vault
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure (Bur Flagging).
Third and final dungeon of the In Search of Asheron quest.
location.monsters: Siessa Sclavus, Falatacot Patrician, Haisanix the Destroyer

location.name: Ancient Caves
location.description:
Quest(s): Composite Bow Upgrade.
Inside are several Grievvers, as well as the Ancient Bone that can be used to upgrade the Composite Bow.

location.name: Deeper Caves
location.description:
Quest(s): Composite Bow Upgrade.
Inside are stronger Grievvers and the Hardened Bone to upgrade the Composite Bow.
Within the Ancient Caves.

location.name: Belinda Du Loc
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Fallen, Banished Creatures), (Rare Game).
Hello, I am Belinda a hunder of rare creatures. There`s nothing like the hunt to let one know they are alive.
I would like you to experience the hunting of the elusive banished creatures. Return to me when you have located and killed 10 of them.
I would like you to experience the hunting of the elusive fallen creatures. Return to me when you have located and killed 10 of them.
I would like you to experience the hunting of some of this lands rarest and most elusive creatures.
Use this list as a reference. Kill 50 of the creatures in the Rare Game section of that list and I will reward you greatly.
Belinda du Loc gives you List of Hunted Creatures.
List of Rare Game:
Dark Sorcerer Lord of Decay Dark Myrmidon Cold One Master of the Pack Swamp King Tundra Mattekar Lugian Warlord Pure One Sentient Fragment Basalt Golem
List of Banished Creatures:
Banished Banderling Banished Drudge Banished Grievver Banished Lugian Banished Monouga Banished Mu-miyah Banished Olthoi Banished Phyntos Wasp Banished Shadow Banished Tumerok Banished Tusker
List of Fallen Creatures:
Fallen Crystal Shard Fallen Doll Fallen Drudge Fallen Grievver Fallen Lugian Fallen Margul Fallen Marionette Fallen Mite Fallen Rift Fallen Shadow Fallen Tumerok

location.name: Elise Du Ricard
location.description:
Quest(s): Pets.
Elise Du Ricard tells you, "I trade in baby Thrungus, catering to those who like unusual and... creative pets."
Elise Du Ricard tells you, "Simply bring me a Baby Pet Token, and I will give you a Baby Thrungus Crate. If you need a token, ask Larinne Kerendova, over by the door."

location.name: Gharon al-Bhavarn
location.description:
Quest(s): Pets.
Gharon al-Bhavarn tells you, "I am a trader in fine Armoredillo Eggs. These eggs are enchanted to allow you to call forth from inside a docile Armoredillo Pup, who will follow you in your travels."
Gharon al-Bhavarn tells you, "Simply bring me a Baby Pet Token, and I will give you an Armoredillo Egg in return. If you seek a token, ask Larinne Kerendova, by the entrance to this humble shop."

location.name: Hadiya bint Anan
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Kilif Zefirs).
Hadiya bint Anan tells you, "So, you wish to prove your hunting prowess? Well then. Track down and slay 35 of the cunning Kilif Zefir for me, and I will reward you appropriately."
Hadiya bint Anan gives you Kilif Zefir Sites.
Caution is advised in trying to reach the known Kilif Zefir sites, the journey may be dangerous.
36.2S 65.0E at an overrun temple
60.5N 15.7E inside Crater Pathway
74.7N 18.5E inside Mage Academy
29.8S 93.9E inside Mountain Sewer, level 15+
10.2N 56.7W inside Mountain Halls, level 15+

location.name: Larinne Kerendova
location.description:
Quest(s): Pets.
Larinne Kerendova tells you, "Welcome to my shop!"
Larinne Kerendova tells you, "If you'd like a pet of your own, I can provide the token you will need to acquire one. Normally, I'd just sell these, but I'm in need of a bit of help, and I'm willing to waive payment in coin if you'll help me out."
Larinne Kerendova tells you, "I have four letters that I need delivered to certain people around Dereth. Normally I'd go to deliver these myself, but there is so much to do with the shop open now, that I don't have the time."
Larinne Kerendova tells you, "Take these letters, bring back word from the people they go to, and I'll give you a token you can trade for an adorable new pet."

location.name: Ma-Kii
location.description:
Quest(s): Pets.
Ma-Kii tells you, "I train and sell well-mannered baby Drudges."
Ma-Kii tells you, "If you bring me a Baby Pet Token, and I will give you an Baby Drudge Crate in return. If you wish a token, ask Larinne Kerendova, who is over by the entrance."

location.name: Maqudh al Nishadina
location.description:
Quest(s): Silifi of Crimson Night.
Maqudh al Nishadina tells you, "Do you wield the Silifi of Crimson Stars? Would you like to wield a Silifi like mine? If so, I can help you improve the weapon, to add the Critical Strike ability and Lightning Cleaving properties to it... Yes, I have a way of repairing one of the damaged jewel settings. But my method demands a very particular ruby... Never mind that for now. If you wish to start on the path to improving your Silifi, you must first bring me a Plate Armoredillo Spine. Do not trouble me with the specifics. Just bring me a spine.

location.name: Master Liao Oazaka
location.description:
Quest(s): Nanjou Shou-jen Armor.
Master Liao Oazaka tells you, "It has been told to me that the Tanada clan of the Nanjou Shou-jen have come through the portals from Ispar to Dereth! I bear a great grudge against them - my clan on Ispar was slain by them, leaving me with only a sister left alive. I desire revenge against them."
Master Liao Oazaka tells you, "I understand they hone their skills in the Egg Orchard, the Dark Design, the Path of the Blind, the Feeding Tubes, and the Forgotten Chasm now. Seek them there and slay them for me. Each bears upon themselves a golden shuriken bestowed upon them by their clan leader. If you give me sixteen of these shuriken to prove that you have slain many of their number, I shall give you a replica of the gear that the Nanjou Shou-jen wear. I understand that this appearance may be of interest to some."
There are five pieces of armor. If you get a duplicate other than the mask, give it back to Liao to exchange it for a different piece (Gauntlets get Shoes, Jacket gets Trousers, and vice versa).
Set bonuses:
2 pieces: Epic Deception, Major Quickness 3 pieces: add Major Coordination 4 pieces: add Epic Quickness 5 pieces: add Epic Coordination

location.name: Shoichi
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Tusker Guards) (The Tusker 500).
Shoichi tells you, "Greetings, have you come to train?"
Shoichi tells you, "There is much you can learn from fighting any opponent. I have specialized in the fighting of Tusker Guards and have learned many, if not all of their weaknesses."
Shoichi tells you, "If you wish to do the same you must first go out and experience combat with these creatures. Return to me after you have killed 500 Tusker Guards and I will reward you."

location.name: Tamara Mistrunner
location.description:
Quest(s): Pets.
Tamara Mistrunner tells you, "I train and sell Ursuin Cubs. Want one?"
Tamara Mistrunner tells you, "If you do, bring me a Baby Pet Token, and I'll give you one of my cubs. If you seek a token, ask Larinne Kerendova, over by the entrance to the shop."

location.name: Zahir
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Elementals).
Zahir tells you, "Hello, you look like the very kind of person who would be able to assist me in my research." Zahir tells you, "After the events with the Harbinger and the Essences interest in elementals has gone up considerably and thanks to that I have been able to secure grants that I can use to fund my research... but you don't care to hear much more about that, do you?"
Zahir tells you, "Okay, here is what I'd like of you, Please venture out and find Caustic, Synnast, Inferno, and Hyem. Fight twenty-five of these creatures and then return to me and tell me everything you learned about them."
Zahir tells you, "I will also accept, and reward you for, anything you find that may be of value to my research."

location.restrictions: 70+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Maqudh al Nishadina
location.name: Crypt of Crimson Night
location.description:
Quest(s): Silifi of Crimson Night.
Dungeon for the Silifi of Crimson Night Quest which contains the Ruby of Crimson Night. You must be flagged for the quest to enter.

location.name: Old Scratchy`s Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Mi Krau-Li's Improved Jitte.
Home of Old Scratchy who drops Cartilage of Old Scratchy used in Mi Krau-Li's Improved Jitte Quest.

location.name: Ruschk Camp of the Black Spear
location.description: This camp has two of the pillars that are found near the Grael dungeon, as well as a floating spear much like the housing item. there are more ruschk just down the hill, gathering around blue campfires.

location.name: Viamontian Blockade
location.description: There is a large group of Viamontian knights and mages encamped behind spiked blockade walls just north of the egg orchard

location.name: Viamontian Mining Operation
location.description:
The Viamontians have set up a mining operation in a dead end valley in the shattered out-lands.
They have constructed a wall and gate at the valley entrance at 94n, 51w. this structure is guarded by mages, knights, and eaters.
Further back in the valley is a smith building at 93.5n, 51.8w and a cave at 93.5n, 51.9w. There are Viamont forces in both of these locations, along with the rest of this dead end valley.

location.name: A Strange Swamp Temple
location.description:
Quest(s): Messenger's Collar.
Information on a temple found in the Direlands Swamp.
For those of an adventurous mind. I have been asked to explore a new structure found in the Direland Swamps. I am told that it lies somewhere near 41.5s, 49.5w. I will have set an Explorer Society Marker at this location if you wish to follow in my footsteps.
As a poet once said, "Who knows what treasures lost lie beneath the muck of ages?"
-- Madam Ainea Besu, Explorer of the Society

location.name: Ikzisik Tika Ri Zikma
location.description:
Quest(s): Messenger's Collar.
The fastest route through this dungeon to the tome is basically to stick left throughout the entire thing, you will know you're going to the right way when you head up ramps and through long halls with traps.
To gain entry, you must be wearing the Messenger`s Collar.

location.name: House Golem
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure.
Within Realaidain Eastern Vault.

location.name: Sayuji Jina
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House of Storms, Tanada Clan Master's Medallion.
Sayuji Jina tells you, "I've asked you to journey into the southern mountains and seek out the Tanada training school at 68 S, 45 E. As far as I can tell, you have not proven yourself to any of the shrines, let alone confronted the Enlightened Master, so I have to ask why you are here. Please, go to the Tanada House of Air and take the Enlightened Master's jade medallion. I need to inspect that medallion. It will shed some light on the mysterious arrival of the Nanjou Shou-Jen."

location.name: Shan Zhen
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure.
Shan Zhen tells you, "I need to ask your help, and you may possibly even need my help. We still seek much information about Asheron before he left Dereth. The Portal Servitor Golem that kept track of Asheron's last movements prior to his departure to Bur still maintains a very tight security and refuses to divulge its master's secrets! Please travel to the Empyrean temple at 67.4N 30.5E and see if you can get the Golem to reveal what it knows! If you do this, I think I can attune you to be able to pass to Bur, despite Asheron's wards.

location.name: Tanada House Of Earth
location.description: Quest(s): Tanada House of Earth.

location.name: Tanada House Of Storms
location.description: Quest(s): Tanada House of Storms.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on the latest news with the town criers.

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on the latest news with the town criers!

location.name: The Leaping Stallion
location.description: Sit back and have a drink with friends in this cozy pub!

location.name: Nullified Statue of a Banderling
location.description: This nullified shell is all that remains of the living Statue of a Banderling that once threatened our peaceful town. Destroyed through the sole efforts of the citizens of Dereth, it remains as a testament to their valor. This land is yours now.

location.name: Scrivener of Creature Magic (Eastham)
location.description: Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.

location.name: Scrivener of War Magic (Eastham)
location.description: Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.

location.name: Scrivener of Life Magic (Eastham)
location.description: Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.

location.name: Scrivener of Item Magic (Eastham)
location.description: Sells at 4900%, buys at 50%. Level IV Spells.

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Eastham)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Aaminah
location.description:
Quest(s): Oswald's Dirk.
Aaminah tells you, "Now that I know what happened to my husband there is much that must be done. I want to thank all those that helped find him. I will not go to his final resting place, along the road from the Obsidian Span toward Glendon Wood, for there is nothing there for me."
Aaminah tells you, "If you find his things within that place I will still reward you for finding them." .

location.name: Apprentice Fletcher (Eastham)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Wils Morrem, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills."
Apprentice Fletcher tells you, "If you bring me a Greater Frost Arrowhead, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Town Crier
location.description: Catch up on the latest rumors with the town criers.

location.name: Alexander's Apprentice (Calvin)
location.description:
Quest(s): Apprentice Mask Maker.
Alexander doesn`t know it yet, but I am working on side project that I hope iwll pad my pockets a bit better once I get better at it. Give me your Sunstone Gauntlets and I`ll see about bringing out a nice orange color in them!

location.name: Degel Parson the Scrivener
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Olivier Rognath
location.description:
Quest(s): Mace of the Explorer.
Olivier Rognath tells you, "Hello! If you journey to the Banderling Conquest dungeon far west from Sawato, and bring me back the mace shaft, I may be able to give you some more information."

location.name: Halls of Metos (Imuth Maer Doquin)
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure, Crafting Golems.
Metos was an Empyrean expert in the construction of Golems, and a friend of Asheron. He maintained three workshops, what we know today as the three Halls of Metos. His heritage is unknown. Since he is a contemporary of Asheron, he is likely Yalain. However, the style of the three halls is strikingly Dericost, and the halls themselves are occupied by Dericost undead.
Found behind a false wall inside a bunker. Provides a shortcut that allows lowe-level characters to reach the Wai Jhou Metos.

location.name: Halls of Metos (Zaikhal)
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure, Crafting Golems.
Metos was an Empyrean expert in the construction of Golems, and a friend of Asheron. He maintained three workshops, what we know today as the three Halls of Metos. His heritage is unknown. Since he is a contemporary of Asheron, he is likely Yalain. However, the style of the three halls is strikingly Dericost, and the halls themselves are occupied by Dericost undead.
An alternate entrance to the Ayan Baqur Halls of Metos.

location.name: Felscuda
location.description:
Quest(s): Dagger of Tikola.
The scholar Felscuda, who lives in a small house around 8.8S, 53.1E, is always looking for blank parchment for her studies.
Funny thing about Felscuda - she's lived out that way for so long, but lately the town's been abuzz about Falatacot this and that, and it all seems to center around her. I've even heard some people saying quietly that she's a friend of Asheron's, and knows how he got to Bur in the first place. No one will admit anything directly, though, and she's been skittish about talking to highly-accomplished heroes lately. You might have more luck if you're just beginning your adventures - she might be more sympathetic.
-- Unknown
Give Felscuda a blank sheet of Parchment to learn how to gain access to the deeper areas of Folthid's Cellar.

location.name: Borsh
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Monstrosities).
Borsh tells you, "There are monsters lurking in the fetid recesses of the Southern Catacombs, huge and bloated with dark purpose. Take your weapon and hunt down 10 of the Guruk Monstrosities and I will reward you. Be careful human, those are dangerous caverns."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Brogosh
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Colossi).
Brogosh tells you, "Those Guruk Colossi have been stomping on our citizens! Prove yourself a hunter my friend. Search the Southern Catacombs and kill 30 of those colossal brutes! I'll reward you well for stomping them flat."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Brozuu
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%. Platnium Scarabs: 54,000py.
Brozuu tells you, "Have you come to trade with me? How exciting! I am still learning, but counting out the shiny coins is fun."
Brozuu tells you, "Yes! I will sell you that now! Oh, what a nice pile of shiny pyreal you have given me."
Brozuu tells you, "Come back to trade with me again soon, friend human!"
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Dobblar
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Dobblar tells you, "Welcome to my shop, here on lovely, fragrant Bur! I operate a duly enfranchised branch of Ketnan's Trading Enterprises and I am teaching our scaly friends here on Bur about the fine points of mercantilism."
Dobblar tells you, "Happy adventuring! Remember to come to Ketnan's for all your trading needs!"
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Doruuk
location.description:
Quest(s): Tiriun Mushrooms.
Crafts Tiriun Mushrooms.
Doruuk tells you, "Welcome, human! Welcome to our humble outpost! I am an expert in cutting the fabled Tiriun Mushroom into pieces - spores, cap, and stalk. Very delicate work! It would take you a lifetime to learn how! If you give me a mushroom, I will cut it into its component pieces for you."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Drogur
location.description:
Drogur tells you, "I welcome you to Kor-Gursha, human. You are a friend of Asheron, yes? These caverns are home to me and to my friends, who escaped the tyranny of the Kings and the evil magic of the Dark Ones. The others in these caverns could use your help, fighting against the things which threaten our home. My cousin Rheegur can tell you more about the history of Kor-Gursha."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Furgal
location.description:
Queat(s): Titles, Bur Mushroom Collection.
Furgal tells you, "I collect the mushrooms that grow in the Catacombs. We used to be able to harvest these ourselves, but then the Guruk invaded our caverns and destroyed our store houses so we retreated here."
Furgal tells you, "We sneak out when we can to collect the food we need, but I'm worried the Guruk will eat all of the mushrooms and we might starve. So, I'm collecting a backup supply for the town just in case."
Furgal tells you, "Go and find as many mushrooms as you can in the Catacombs. I'll reward you with the knowledge that will help you stay alive on Bur."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Kurket
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Marauders).
Kurket tells you, "You need something to hunt? We have a problem with the Guruks invading our territories. From time to time we send hunting parties into the Catacombs to clear them out. If you want to prove you're a real hunter, track down and slay 40 of those despicable Guruk Marauders and I will reward you appropriately. They mostly forage in the Northern Catacombs."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Kushuk
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Smashers).
Kushuk tells you, "Those Guruk Smashers keep destroying our fungal store houses. You should hear them laughing. I've gotten pretty good at hunting them, but I could really use your help. They hide out in the Eastern and Southern Catacombs. Track down and slay 40 of those infuriating Guruk Smashers and I'll reward you well."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Kuuru
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Bosh Bosh).
Kuuru tells you, "Prepare to hunt down the most degenerate boil this land has ever been afflicted with. A Kukuur named Bosh Bosh has been stealing into our town at night and taking our young! He... eats them."
Kuuru tells you, "He must pay for every innocent life he has taken! He makes the Deep Guruk Caverns below the Southern Catacombs his home. Do not rest until you have hunted that filthy scum down and made him pay."
Kuuru tells you, "Do not fail me on this. Bring me proof of his demise and I will reward you well for your help."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Mohor
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Fiends).
Mohor tells you, "If there's a more dangerous Guruk than the Guruk Fiend I don't know of it. They are more cunning than the average Guruk and stronger too. They've been trying to get into our town's caverns ever since Torgluuk passed through. Go and kill 30 of the cunning fiends lurking in the lower Southern Catacombs and I'll reward you for your help."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Nimeruuk
location.description:
Quest(s): Tiriun Mushrooms.
Nimeruuk tells you, "Happy to meet you, human! Do you seek the prized Tiriun Mushroom? Very useful! I take trade notes for Tiriun Mushrooms and Ginger! I will give you one Tiriun Mushroom for a D note and five Tiriun Mushrooms for a MMD note. If you want Ginger, I will give you one Ginger for a CC note and five Gingers for an M note. Yes, I collect trade notes to do business with the glorious mercantile company, Ketnan's Trading Enterprises!"
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Rheegur
location.description:
Rheegur tells you, "Welcome, human friend of Asheron! Have you come to me to learn the history of Kor-Gursha? Give me a piece of parchment, and I will write it for you in your language. Are you surprised that a Ruuk would know your language? We are a surprising group here in Kor-Gursha..."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Shiruuk
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Bashers).
Shiruuk tells you, "The Guruk Bashers have been stealing our fungal harvest. I could really use your help clearing them out of the Eastern Catacombs. If you want to prove you're a real hunter track down and slay 40 of those lumbering Guruk Bashers and I'll reward you."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Portal to Bur
location.description: This portal, created by Prince Borelean Strathelar, will transport you to the world of Bur. However, it is warded in such a way that only those who have undertaken certain preparations may proceed through.

location.name: Portal Servitor
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Departure (Bur Flagging).
If you have not spoken to Shan Zhen in Cragstone he will not acknowledge you:
Portal Servitor tells you, "I do not know you and I do not know who sent you. I have no words to speak to you."
Once you have spoken to Shan Zhen:
Portal Servitor tells you, "I sense that the apprentices of the sword sage have sent you. This is meet by my master's wishes. But I must ensure that you are a true friend of my master. You must bring me three heirlooms of the House of Realaidain. A true friend of my master would know such artifacts. Bring me first the necklace that belonged to my master's family."

location.name: King Toad Idol
location.description:
Quest(s): King Toad Idol.
Use this statue to enter the King Toad Idol (Dungeon).

location.restrictions: Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Tanada House Of Storms, Earth, and Water Copleted. Talk to Pau Yajin in Sawato.
location.name: Tanada Temple Of Black Water
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada Temple of Black Water.
To begin this quest you must have completed the Tanada House of Storms Quest, Tanada House of Earth Quest, and then the Tanada House of Water Quest quest at least once before.

location.name: The Colosseum
location.description:
Quest(s): Advanced Colosseum Arena, Colosseum Arena, Colosseum Bosses.
The Colosseum is a place that hosts several arena style activies. It is located West of Yanshi, at 11.3S 37.6E.

location.name: Mhoire Estate: The Ancient Graveyard (Area)
location.description: The Graveyard is an area in the Southeastern Direlands designed for high-level small group hunting. It was introduced in the Ancient Enemies patch. The graveyard has been updated with new content during the Strange Sightings, Dark Materials, Corrupted Sovereigns, Prodigal Sons, Foolish Ambition, Upping the Ante, Introductions, Dispatch, Shattered Lines, Ancient Powers, and Risks and Rewards events.

location.name: Amelia
location.description:
Quest(s): Amelia.
Amelia is the ghost of a small girl who appears in Graveyard at night. Normally she'll be at 64.8S 43.8W, but if someone is doing her quest, she will be wandering the area looking for her toys.
Amelia will reward you with Amelia's Gargoyle Amulet and an Ancient Mhoire Coin if you help her find her toys.
Talking to Amelia flags you to use the Dirt Piles, and also removes any previous toys you've collected from your inventory. You can use the dirt piles until you successfully complete the quest. The toys only exist for one real-time hour before disappearing from your inventory.

location.name: Apep-tek the Tolerant
location.description:
Quest(s): Pyre Shrouds.
Ten Pyre Shrouds given to Apep-tek the Tolerant gives 15 million xp. You must be at least Level 100 to turn them in but the amount is flat (no effect of your level).

location.name: Candrus Steady-Hand
location.description:
Quest(s): Investigate The Factions.
Candrus Steady-Hand tells you, "Old Jondor sent you looking for me, eh? I have little to hide, and perhaps you would some day be a worthy compatriot in our service, but first I think you must prove your mettle, for we all face dangerous times. Down in this strange pit is a nest of revenants, foul even by the standards of the undead. These Blight Spirits are a symptom of the disease that is spreading across our beloved Dereth! Slay eight of them for me and I will write you a letter of introduction to bring to my superior."

location.name: Jawaq ibn Janath
location.description:
Quest(s): Investigate The Factions.
Jawaq ibn Janath tells you, "Ah, that Arcanum scholar sent you to find out what you could from me, eh? Well, there may be a way for you to prove yourself worthwhile to me, and to my superiors. Down in this pit nearby is a foul, diseased creature known as a Blight Lictor. It is a symptom of the contamination that is creeping across this land. Bring its head to me and I will give you a letter of introduction that you can present to my field commander."

location.name: Kousu Temo
location.description:
Quest(s): Investigate The Factions.
Kousu Temo tells you, "Ah, so that curious Arcanum scholar sent you. I would be willing to give you the knowledge you seek on his behalf, if you would simply retrieve an artifact for me from this infected pit here before us..."
Kousu Temo tells you, "In that crypt below, there is a chest that contains an ancient scepter. The scepter is an artifact that is of some interest to my superiors. Find the key among those creatures milling about in the pit, unlock the chest, and bring me the scepter. That will prove you worthy, and I will write you a letter of introduction to bring to my commander."

location.name: Lo Shoen
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Grave Rats), DeathTail.
Lo Shoen tells you, "The Lo family has been hunting rats for generations. My younger brother hunts them back in the capital but I came out here for bigger game."
Lo Shoen tells you, "The rats are everywhere, and even I have trouble keeping up. Something drives them mad and makes them stronger. If you want to help me, kill 100 of these Grave Rats. Maybe then I will have more work for you."

location.name: Hurnmel the Smith
location.description:
Quest(s): Ancient Mhoire Coins, Graveyard, Call of Mhoire Forge, Spectral Weapons.
Hurnmel the Smith tells you, "It has been many centuries since I have practiced my craft. I will create items for the living, but only for the ancient coins of my lord's house."
Hurnmel the Smith tells you, "the years have stolen memory and skill from me. Choose wisely, for I may create different items in times to come."
Hurnmel the Smith tells you, "You found my sanctum from the daylight. Here I make spectral weapons from the ingots the Forge Golem makes. Bring me a Spectral Ingot and I will sell you one."
Ghostly Blacksmith Only Appears At Night And At The Bottom Of The Mhoire Armory. Sells a variety of items in exchange for Ancient Mhoire Coins.

location.name: Northern Summoning Stone
location.description:
Quest(s): The Jester, Lalalas in my Head.
Jester tells you, "Oho! Rythy doesn't know what he's playing with. But I know. I KNOW! AHahahahahaha!"
The first time doing The Jester quest, the Jester appears as an NPC. When repeating the quest he appears as a creature. Previously the Jester spawned randomly in the Graveyard. During the Dispatch event, two Summoning Stones were added to Graveyard, using the stone causes the Jester to appear for a moment. The north stone is used for the Lalalas in My Head quest, and the south stone is used for the Jester's Lost Marbles quest.

location.name: Shade of Parieth
location.description:
Quest(s): Exhumed Bones Piles, Lord Mhoire.
Shade of Parieth tells you, "In life I was one of a sacred order tasked with tending to the affairs of the dead. This once sacred place has been buried beneath the earth for countless eons. The recent upheavals that unearthed this place have awoken many angry spirits."
Shade of Parieth tells you, "I dare not guess what corruption is unearthing this place and waking long dead spirits. The lords have not yet awoken, but they are restless. I fear this will grow worse." Shade of Parieth tells you, "The graveyard is in disarray, and it is disrespectful to the dead who are buried here. Many long dead bodies have been exhumed by the troubles here."
Shade of Parieth tells you, "Each night corrupted bones are forced to the surface all over the graveyard. Destroy the corrupted piles to retrieve the uncorrupted bones of 10 unfortunate spirits. Bring them to me so I may lay them to rest and I am sure fortune will smile upon you."
Gravekeeper Located in Graveyard at 65.6S 43.9W, Shade of Parieth has you destroy Exhumed Bones Piles for an xp reward. He only appears at night time, as do the bone piles.
Shade of Parieth also appears inside Lord Mhoire's Tomb as part of the Lord Mhoire Quest.

location.name: Skettek the Wanderer
location.description:
Skettek the Wanderer tells you, "Greetings. I have been sent here by the Arcanum to observe what we can about this place. I have also been empowered to sell materials to intrepid adventurers in the area."
Skettek the Wanderer tells you, "I hope my provisions are useful."
A human NPC sent by the Arcanum to observe the Graveyard and provide supplies for adventurers. He sells fletchings items, alchemy supplies, magic components, and other items. He is located just outside the Graveyard to the southeast.

location.name: Lacarra Avanthi
location.description:
Quest(s): Disturbance In The Ley Lines.
Faction: Radiant Blood
This is a popular quest due to its short repeat timer and being quick to complete. You can either kill Rytheran to take his mnemosyne and visage, or retrieve his ring and return it to him for the same items.
Lacarra Avanthi tells you, "You stink of Empyrean filth. Let me guess, you're already working for Ben Ten's little minion, Heishan, aren't you? I have no use for you."
Lacarra Avanthi tells you, "You may be worth my time... My masters have determined that the dusty, deposed Lord Rytheran is the source of our current troubles with ley lines. If you would make yourself useful to us and to all the humans of Dereth, seek him out in his garden sanctuary."
Lacarra Avanthi tells you, "There is aportal to these gardens located in the midst of the Empyrean Graveyard. We need a mnemosyne from Rytheran, bearing... vital information about a book he once held. Take it from him, by force or coercion, and bring it to me. You will be well rewarded."
Lacarra Avanthi tells you, "Did we not already speak of this matter? I wish you to seek out the moldering fool Lord Rytheran in his lonely perch within the Gardens of Menilesh. Be on your way, others have already begun the search as well, I am sure."

location.name: Zho Heishan
location.description:
Quest(s): Disturbance In The Ley Lines.
Faction: Celestial Hand
This is a popular quest due to its short repeat timer and being quick to complete. You can either kill Rytheran to take his mnemosyne and visage, or retrieve his ring and return it to him for the same items.
Zho Heishan tells you, "Excellent, perhaps you can help me. My superiors seek some knowledge of the troubles affecting the ley lines of Dereth, and the problem seems to trace back to Rytheran, the ancient Dericostian noble. We have become aware that a path into Rytheran's current abode within the ruined Gardens of Menilesh has opened somewhere in the Empyrean Graveyard."
Zho Heishan tells you, "Find a way to seek out Rytheran and see if you can retrieve his personal mnemosyne... We need access to his memories about the reading of the Book of Eibhil. It may not be necessary to destroy the undead lord, but merely to attain his cooperation."
Zho Heishan tells you, "You have already taken on this task on behalf of Nuhmudira's agent, that barbarous woman Lacarra. I do not think we can cooperate."
Zho Heishan tells you, "I've already asked you to journey to the Empyrean Graveyard, find the way in to the Gardens of Menilesh and seek out Rytheran's mnemosyne. Please, there is little time to waste."

location.name: Gardens Of Menilesh
location.description:
Quest(s): Disturbance in the Ley Lines.
The ancient, ruined Gardens of Menilesh. Currently Lord Rytheran can be found here. Speak to either Lacarra Avanthi at 61.8S 51.3W or Zho Heishan at 61.9S 51.4W, both in Wai Jhou to be flagged for access. Be sure you pick the one allied with the faction you are sympathetic to, you cannot switch after speaking to one of them. It is believed your choice will have no long term impact on your ability to join a particular faction.

location.name: Mhoire Armory
location.description:
Quest(s): Jester's Lost Marbles, Spectral Weapons.
To enter this dungeon you must hand Jester's Marbles to the Jester that randomly spawns in the Graveyard to be flagged to enter. It appears the flag is permanent. The marbles are found at 65.1S 43.7W. (Get up on the cliff at 62.8S 45.1W.)
While the Jester summons a portal to the dungeon when given the marbles, there is also a fixed location portal in the bunker at 64.8S 44.3W.
The dungeon is a no drop dungeon, meaning you will never drop items on death, not even Drop on Death items.

location.name: Knathtead Excavation
location.description:
Quest(s): Lalalas In My Head.
Quest Overview
Help the Jester clear out the voices of the lalalas from his head for bit.
You must have completed the Jester's Lost Marbles Quest in order to complete this quest.
This quest overlaps greatly with two other quests: Lord Rytheran's Journal and Disturbance in the Ley Lines. It might be best to do all three at the same time.

location.name: Lord Rytheran's Private Sanctum
location.description:
Quest(s): Lord Rytheran's Journal.
The dungeon entrance is the statue Master's Sentinel that's next to the portal to Mage Academy. You need Rytheran's Master Seal from an Ancient Chest in Graveyard (65.6S 43.9W). Give the seal to the statue to enter. If returning, simply use the statue to enter. The surface portal may be tied (or used to Last Portal recall).

location.name: Lord Mhoire's Tomb
location.description:
Quest(s): Lord Mhoire.
Quest Overview
To begin this quest, you must obtain a Ornate Bone Key, which spawn on creatures throughout the Graveyard at night.
Note: Higher drop rates have been reported for Pyre Champions, Wight Blade Sorcerers, and Wight Captains.

location.name: Burnt and Twisted Stump
location.description:
Quest(s): Ranger Lord Mhoire.
A strange and twisted stump with a keyhole carved into a knot near the roots.
Can hold up to 120 items and 10 containers.
Locked.
This lock looks impossible to pick. (Resistance 9999)

location.name: Laylana
location.description:
Quest(s): The Jester.
Laylana says, "My Love, where have you gone?"
Laylana tells you, "Hello, my name is Laylana. I would ask you a favor."
Laylana tells you, "My love is missing. We are betrothed, but I have not seen him for so long. Please, you must help me find him. He was once the Jester to Lord Cynreft and the House of Mhoire. I fear that something horrible may have befallen him."

location.name: Jailer
location.description:
Quest(s): The Jester.
Jailer tells you, "Begone! Only Lord Cynreft may visit the prisoner."
Jailer tells you, "You have not heard of the prisoner? So powerful and so very mad. Once he entertained the court of Mhoire with his antics, but that was before the betrayal. Now he is imprisoned here for all time."
Jailer tells you, "Go now. You have no business here."

location.name: Jester's Prison
location.description:
Quest(s): The Jester.
Down inside the bunker at 64.9S 44.1W is the NPC the Jailer. Just north of the Jailer is a hidden wall, behind it is a hidden portal (does not show up on radar) to Jester's Prison, double click the portal to enter. The Jester's Prison Door inside is Resistance 9999 to lockpick. To gain access you will need to give Laylana's Pleading Letter to Lord Cynreft Mhoire and obtain the Jester Prison Key. The key is usable for 24 hours (as many times as needed). You can obtain another key 48 hours after completing the quest by talking to the Jailer.
Logging out or disconnecting when inside will cause you to log in at your lifestone!

location.name: Meshenq
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House Of Water.
Traveling Scholar Located In Zaikhal
Meshenq tells you, "Ah! Sayuji Jina told me of you! You helped her investigate the Tanada houses of Earth and Air, did you not? Excellent! I need your help now.
Note: Hand him Directives, found in the Black Death Catacombs to receive 6,882,669 xp and a copy of the Directives.

location.name: Tanada House Of Water
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House Of Water.
To begin this quest you must have completed the Tanada House of Storms Quest and the Tanada House of Earth Quest at least once before.

location.restrictions: 1+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Speak To Chow Doun
location.name: Tanada House Of Pancakes
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House Of Pancakes.
A seasonal quest for April Fools. The dungeon opens on April 1st.

location.name: Asheron's Island Portal
location.description: Portal To Lord Asheron Realaidain's Island.

location.name: Asheron's Castle
location.description: Portal To Lord Asheron Realaidain's Castle.

location.name: Asheron's Castle
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Tower Guardian, The Black Death Catacombs Quiddity Seed, The Ithaenc Quiddity Seed, The Knorr Quiddity Seed.
Lord Asheron Realaidain's Castle.
The home of Asheron on Asheron's Island. Located at 21.1N, 69.3E on top of a huge mountain, with a long spiraling path up.
The castle has been playing a major role during the A Time of Chaos story arc. Since then, the Castle has been accessible on and off during different story arcs. Now, the Castle and its NPCs play a major role in the Quiddity Seed quests.

location.name: Tower Guardian
location.description:
Quest(s): Asheron's Tower Guardian.
X strikes the killing blow to the Tower Guardian. Its crystaline form flies apart. Each piece vanishing in a purple flash as the golem returns to its lifestone.
Only attacks if attacked. XP 20,000,000

location.name: Chief Taraash
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Banderling.
Chief Taraash tells you, "Why you here, eh? How I know I can trust you..."

location.name: Guard Winterborn
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Banderling.
Guard Winterborn tells you, "Greetings Citizen. I am here researching several strange sightings that have been reported in this area. Perhaps, when you are a bit more experienced, I may have a task for you."

location.name: Jarvis Hammerstone
location.description:
Quest(s): Bonecrunch, Hunter Quests (Cragstone Drudges).
Jarvis Hammerstone says, "Don't feed the Drudges, it just emboldens them."

location.name: Oswent The Pale
location.description:
Quest(s): Bur Recall, Aerbax's Prodigal Lugian.
Oswent the Pale tells you, "You do seem like a mighty warrior, but can I trust you? If you can earn my trust by defeating the plans of the Falatacot witches that once imprisoned Asheron on Bur, I'll be more inclined to trust you with a very sensitive mission..." (You receive this message if you have not completed the Saving Asheron quest).

location.restrictions: 120+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Guard Winterborn
location.name: Harraag's Hideout / Lair
location.description:
Quest(s):Aerbax's Prodigal Banderling.
At the entrance, you will already see a portal to Harraag's Lair. However, you need to make your way to the bottom, and use the portal there first.

location.name: Mosswart Town
location.description: A Mosswart settlement at 78.2S, 86.7E on Thesalene Island.

location.name: Mosswart Holding
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Mosswart, Hunter Quests (Mosswart Townsfolk).
Tanada Nanjou Shou-jen spawn randomly in pairs after killing various mosswarts, similar to the Egg Orchard.

location.name: Visiting Shaman
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Mosswart.
Visiting Shaman tells you, "Me trust you. Me seek out others of my kind who maybe resist Bragara. Wish luck."
Visiting Shaman tells you, "Humie been around too much lately. Me uneasy about humie. Maybe it better if I wait for things to calm down."

location.name: Secret Chamber Of Kresovus
location.description:
Quest(s): Bur Recall.
Use Kresovus' Lockbox To Enter

location.name: Mosswart Worship Cavern
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Mosswart.
At the end, Ahumba can be found, a Mosswart NPC who will give you the Blessed Spear of the Mosswart Gods if you finished the first part, talking to the visiting Shaman, of the Aerbax's Prodigal Mosswart Quest.

location.name: Hoogan
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Drudge.
The Banderling leans over to the window and whispers to you.
Hoogan tells you, "You must help us. The Drudges have imprisoned us here. We've tried everything to escape, but they're always watching."
Hoogan tells you, "The only one whose been kind to us is Sergeant Shanks. We found out he knows where the blueprints for the Drudge Fort are. You may be able to "convince" him to give you the information if you bring him something tasty to eat. He tends to talk when he eats."

location.name: Researcher Tharin
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Mosswart.
Researcher Tharin tells you, "Yes, these Mosswart do seem to utilize a strange cipher - unusual even for Mosswarts. Luckily for you, I've figured out what they mean by some of these keywords..."

location.name: Sergeant Brigitta
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Mosswart.
Sergeant Brigitta tells you, "Friend, welcome to our lines. I am Sergeant Brigitta, second in command of the defense here. We're managing to keep Kryst safe, but there are things you could do to help us against the Mosswarts."
Sergeant Brigitta tells you, "The Mosswarts are led by a being named Bragara. However, we are not concerned for him so much as we are concerned about the movements of his forces."
Sergeant Brigitta tells you, "Go to the caverns under the Mosswart Holding and bring us the plans for his attack, and we will be better able to stop their advance."
Sergeant Brigitta tells you, "Also, there are shamans who did not agree with Bragara's claim of godhood among the Mosswarts. We have it on good authority that some shamans have been imprisoned in the very same caverns that the plans are located in. While you are in there, please free a shaman. It will help the Mosswarts be able to muster a resistance against Bragara, which will in turn make our jobs easier."

location.name: Sergeant Shanks
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Drudge.
You give Sergeant Shanks Peppermint Chocolate Cookie.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "Mmm! Slurp! Crunch! Munch! Those Biters think they special just because Klank give them blueprints to guard. Crunch! Munch! I could guard blueprints. No one gets nothing from me!"
You give Sergeant Shanks Chocolate Cookie.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "I named after my favorite food, Ursuin Shanks. So sweet meaty juicy! Do you have some?"
You give Sergeant Shanks Ginger Bread Pumpkin.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "This good, but you have any Meaties? They part of a balanced morning food. Those and apples."
You give Sergeant Shanks Tempting Apple.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "I was one of first Drudges that learn to speak. My mother so proud. She call me "weeraawreee." That mean good smart son."
You give Sergeant Shanks Peppermint Cookie.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "Mmm! This good! You have anymore? I not picky with food or drink. I like them all."
You give Sergeant Shanks Peppermint Monougat Chew.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "Chocolate makes me sick, but I love it. I don't blame chocolate for making me sick, it can't help it."
You give Sergeant Shanks Ginger Bread Drudge.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "I was one of first Drudges that learn to speak. My mother so proud. She call me "weeraawreee." That mean good smart son."
You give Sergeant Shanks Candied Apple.
Shanks gobbles the food in a happy dimwitted sort of way. He begins to babble about this and that. Sergeant Shanks tells you, "Mmm! Slurp! Crunch! Munch! Those Biters think they special just because Klank give them blueprints to guard. Crunch! Munch! I could guard blueprints. No one gets nothing from me!"

location.name: Chaos Virindi Cave
location.description: Quest(s): The Archivist.

location.name: Ennio de Cinghalle
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Banderling, The Archivist.
Ennio di Cinghalle tells you, "Greetings. Your name is on the list of people Guard Winterborn has given me. It seems you were helpful to him in his investigations. My King has graciously lent my skills to the... Queen, Elysa, for further investigation into this mutual threat."
Ennio di Cinghalle tells you, "Guard Winterborn has been telling me of this 'Harraag' and his apparently massive increase in power over that of his kin. He has also told me of the findings brought by those, such as yourself. These shards, filled with the power of both the Virindi and the Shadows."
Ennio di Cinghalle tells you, "Given what information Guard Winterborn could provide, I was able to locate a Cave, off to the north of the Banderling-creature, where a large gathering of 'Chaos-Virindi' have gathered, and seem to be monitoring the Banderling-creature's present predicament."
Ennio di Cinghalle tells you, "My job for you is simply this: Go to that cave, located at 58.6S, 81.5W and bring me back any information that you find. Do this for me, and you will be well rewarded."

location.name: Drudge Fort
location.description: Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Drudge, Evolution.

location.name: Drudge Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Drudge.
Orb = 9140 BU Scroll = 9070 BU Hammer = 9840 BU

location.name: Jilna Fullgood
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Tusker, Bobo's Medicine.
Jilna Fullgood tells you, "Now that King Oolutanga is free of Mudmouth's hold I can treat him for the Jungle Orchid poison Mudmouth gave him. It's amazing he survived really. That much poison would have killed any normal Tusker. To create more of the potion he needs I'll need more King's Crown."
Jilna Fullgood tells you, "You can find the King's Crown water lily at the base of a giant tree overlooking the Chapel of Xi Ru on the last of the Vesayen Islands. Be careful, I hear it is protected by Moarsmen."
Jilna Fullgood tells you, "Oh, if you are able to find and destroy Mudmouth, I have been honored by Oolutanga to reward you in exchange for any befouled treasures he may have wrought."

location.name: Watcher Of The Dead (Reeshan)
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Qin Xikit, Mistress of the Golden Shore, Keeper of the Kilika Vale in Ualannan's absence, lays beneath over thirty thousands years of weight. She has been silent these years imprisoned beneath her temple, bound by those who called her sister."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Once she walked amongst children of other suns and ushered them along a quickened path. Heresy! Cried our sisters and a great hunt began within our sect. A schism grew and swallowed our sisters in madness. They drew chains of mana about our immortal forms and locked our eternal bodies away."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Qin Xikit was the first to feel the sting of her sister's barbs, locked into a temple of her crafting, sealed away with the power of her crown."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Eternal silence is shattered and Qin Xikit stirs in her tomb. A gateway has opened and through it comes consumption. Sealed in her tomb the matron can do nothing and the spirits therein are all but gone. I am the last to hold vigil."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Seek her crown. Xi Ru consumed in madness, sealed Qin Xikit away. The crown must be found and the gateway to Qin Xikit's temple must be opened. At long last I can see Xi Ru's island, the magic that once locked it from sight has failed, a sister has succeeded at breaking the wards."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Rejoice! Absolution is at hand."

location.name: Watcher Of The Dead (Kiree)
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Qin Xikit, Mistress of the Golden Shore, Keeper of the Kilika Vale in Ualannan's absence, lays beneath over thirty thousands years of weight. She has been silent these years imprisoned beneath her temple, bound by those who called her sister."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Once she walked amongst children of other suns and ushered them along a quickened path. Heresy! Cried our sisters and a great hunt began within our sect. A schism grew and swallowed our sisters in madness. They drew chains of mana about our immortal forms and locked our eternal bodies away."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Qin Xikit was the first to feel the sting of her sister's barbs, locked into a temple of her crafting, sealed away with the power of her crown."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Eternal silence is shattered and Qin Xikit stirs in her tomb. A gateway has opened and through it comes consumption. Sealed in her tomb the matron can do nothing and the spirits therein are all but gone. I am the last to hold vigil."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Seek her crown. Xi Ru consumed in madness, sealed Qin Xikit away. The crown must be found and the gateway to Qin Xikit's temple must be opened. At long last I can see Xi Ru's island, the magic that once locked it from sight has failed, a sister has succeeded at breaking the wards."
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Rejoice! Absolution is at hand."

location.name: Watcher Of The Dead (Broodu)
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
Watcher of the Dead tells you, "Qin Xikit, Mistress of the Golden Shore, Keeper of the Kilika Vale in Ualannan's absence, lays beneath over thirty thousands years of weight. She has been silent these years imprisoned beneath her temple, bound by those who called her sister."

location.description:
