Was originally located only in Glenden Wood, however, during the Dance of the Dead event, a Pumpkin Buffer can also be found in Sanamar, Holtburg, Shoushi, and Yaraq.
Only Available During The "Halloween" Patch.

location.name: Monster Fights
location.description:
Quest(s): Monster Fights.
Located north of Sanamar at 72.8N 60.7W, the Monster Fight Bookie will take 5 MMD and give you a Monster Fight Ticket.
There are 5 torches around the cages. About every 10 minutes, one more will light up, indicating how long it will be for the next fight begins.
Once an hour, when all 5 torches are lit, eight combatants will spawn in the cage, give your ticket to the one you think will win.
The fight takes about 10 minutes. Monsters will fight in pairs, or in 2 to 1s.
If your pick is the last monster standing at the end of the free-for-all battle, give the stub to the Bookie for your reward.
Combatants:
Champion Bulgara Chief Grogbash Darcusch the Barbarian Glormigoth Hea Tnakarea Kerthump the Ear Taker Korgluuk of Bur Warrior Corthos

location.name: Monster Fight Bookie
location.description:
Quest(s): Monster Fights.
Monster Fight Bookie tells you, "I take 5 MMDs to buy a ticket. Bring winning tickets to me before the next fight and I'll reward you with a Grand Casino Key."

location.name: Patriarch's Valley
location.description: Quest(s): Summoning of T'thuun.

location.name: Patriarch's Valley Portal
location.description: Quest(s): Summoning of T'thuun.

location.name: Captain Tulmada
location.description: Quest(s): 12/19/08 - All Servers - Dereth's Elite, Summoning of T'thuun.

location.name: Rand, Game Hunter
location.description:
Quest(s): Monthly Game Hunter.
Rand, Game Hunter tells you, "As a game hunter I've tagged a variety of creatures to test your skills. Kill these creatures to test your skills and prove your abilities and I'll make it worth your while."
Rand, Game Hunter tells you, "This month I've tagged (Every Month He Chooses 5 New Creatures To Hunt)"

location.name: Sean the Speedy
location.description:
Quest(s): Dereth Exploration.
Sean the Speedy tells you, "Hello traveler, my name is Sean, I'm a member of the Explorers Society. I've spent years exploring the wonders of Dereth. There are many interesting corners of Dereth that sadly go unvisited, but that's why I'm here."
Sean the Speedy tells you, "In order to introduce others to the joy of exploration I've placed markers on, above and below Dereth. If you feel the urge to explore you may come across a few of these Exploration Markers like the one to my right here. Come see me when you've found 10 of them and I'll reward you."
Sean the Speedy tells you, "Go ahead and use this marker. I hope it will be the first of many you find while exploring the majesty of this world."
Sean the Speedy tells you, "In the coming months, I'll be hiding more and more markers across this wondrous land. For now, there are a total of 100 hidden in the world, some of which are linked by theme." (Increased 10 Locations Per Month)

location.name: Bhravarn ibn Salizim
location.description:
Quest(s): Sword of Bellenesse, Royal Runed Weapons, Princely Runed Weapons.
Bhravarn ibn Salizim tells you, "Salutations, friend."
Bhravarn ibn Salizim tells you, "I wonder if you could aid me in a piece of research, for which you will be well rewarded. Recently, a sword was stolen from the Vaults of Sanamar, the Sword of Bellenesse. It is reported to be one of the most exquisite pieces of Viamontian Weaponsmithing of its time."
Bhravarn ibn Salizim tells you, "Rumor has it that the thief is hiding in a cave around 71.1 N, 50.2 W. If you could get this weapon so that I could study it, I will reward you well for your time."
Bhravarn ibn Salizim tells you, "Have a care, however. If you choose to aid me in this, you will have to find the blade before the agents of Sanamar or Silyun do so. I do not wish to get in the middle of their feud, and would not wish for you to be needlessly caught in it either. All I wish is a chance to learn from the blade."

location.name: Tyrina of Arwic
location.description:
Quest(s): Relic Armor.
Tyrina of Arwic tells you, "Queen Elysa has stationed me here to reward those brave adventurers, such as yourself, that destroy the corrupted beasts of this 'Dark Isle' and bring me proof of their deeds."
Replaced Kitana Oazaka, who used to reside at the same coordinates.

location.restrictions: You must complete the Tanada Temple of Black Water Quest before this NPC will speak to you.
location.name: Tanada Sajo
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House Of Fire.
Tanada Sajo tells you, "Greetings! I can see you have aided my clan in the sensitive matter of the Temple of Black Waters. I am Tanada Sajo. You have aided us once before, so I must ask for your help again. Though your actions at the Temple of Black Waters helped free the majority of our clan from the thrall of Aerbax, another important task remains."
Tanada Sajo tells you, "Because Aerbax succeeded in corrupting the Masters of Air, Earth, and Water, he was able to steal the scroll of each House. Only my uncle's House of Fire remained uncorrupted. Aerbax has locked the scrolls inside infernal devices of his own creation and continues to try to influence the acolytes of the orders through them. We cannot appoint new Masters of the schools until the scrolls are recovered. Please, journey to the Chamber of the Scrolls in the southern mountains at 52.2S, 63.2E and destroy the devices imprisoning the scrolls. Free the scrolls and bring them to me, and I will see that you are richly rewarded."

location.name: Chamber Of Scrolls
location.description:
Quest(s): Tanada House Of Fire.
Gives Access To The Chamber Of Air > Chamber Of Earth > Chamber Of Water.
NPCs
Tanada Han-Tu - gives you Fist of Enlightenment Tanada Ganza Tanada Hido Tanada Shouka

location.name: Crystaline Crag
location.description:
Quest(s): Bound Wisp, Crystalline Adventurer, Marker Crystals, Wisp Whipper.
Located at 14.6S, 62.0W, the Crystalline Crag is a large plateau in the middle Direlands. Previously just barren land, in Coldeve, 20 P.Y. the plateau changed drastically, covered in charred ground and large crystal formations.

location.name: Resonant Portal
location.description: Quest(s): Crystalline Crag, Portal Space Research.

location.name: Bound Wisp
location.description:
Quest(s): Bound Wisp.
You have reached the bound wisp!
Bound Wisp gives you Adventurer's Token.
You've earned 10,000,000 experience.
Bound Wisp teleports you with Crystalline Portal.

location.name: Jyotsana
location.description:
Quest(s): Marker Crystals.
Jyotsana tells you, "I've found a variety of markers in this area and the ground under it. If you find these markers you can return to me and I will reward you for every five you discover.

location.name: Oorjit
location.description:
Quest(s): Wisp Whipper.
Oorjit tells you, "I'm here as a hunter and to assist Ando in his research. Go out and kill 100 Wisps in this area and I will reward you."

location.name: Tokashi Ando
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystaline Adventurer.
Tokashi Ando tells you, "I've been sent to head up the research in this area however I am not able to make significant advancements on my own."
Tokashi Ando tells you, "It's been decided that I should bring others in to assist with the exploration and research about the creatures and crystals in this region."
Tokashi Ando tells you, "I've also been able to recover crystalline shards in the remains of the wisps. They'll assist our research and I'll reward you for bringing them to me."
Tokashi Ando tells you, "If you find any unique wisps they may have unique crystalline shards that I'd be able to grant you a greater reward in exchange for it."
Tokashi Ando tells you, "There are also a few locations that I have not been able to reach on my own. If you can reach these places you may find great reward there."
Tokashi Ando tells you, "Return to me with any objects you may find. Talk to my associates about any other rewards."
Tokashi Ando tells you, "Now get out there and have an adventure!".

location.name: Pyramid
location.description:
Quest(s): Summoning of T'thuun, T'Thuun's Marauders.
While the T'thuun pyramids appeared over many different cities, it was only in Unfinished Business that a means to enter the pyramids was uncovered. There are now three permanent portals in Patriarch's Valley that each lead into a different pyramid, though they all share the same landblock.

location.name: Pyramid
location.description:
Quest(s): Summoning of T'thuun, T'Thuun's Marauders.
While the T'thuun pyramids appeared over many different cities, it was only in Unfinished Business that a means to enter the pyramids was uncovered. There are now three permanent portals in Patriarch's Valley that each lead into a different pyramid, though they all share the same landblock.

location.name: Pyramid
location.description:
Quest(s): Summoning of T'thuun, T'Thuun's Marauders.
While the T'thuun pyramids appeared over many different cities, it was only in Unfinished Business that a means to enter the pyramids was uncovered. There are now three permanent portals in Patriarch's Valley that each lead into a different pyramid, though they all share the same landblock.

location.restrictions: 70+, Cannot Summon, Must have completed Portal Space Research.
location.name: Crystaline Portal
location.description:
Quest(s): Crystalline Adventurer, Marker Crystals, Wisp Whipper, Progenitors' Lair.
This is made up of several progressively more difficult dungeons in a series. The level restrictions increase in increments of 20. The first dungeon is 70+ and its entrance is found at 18.1S 56.9W on the Crystalline Crag. At the bottom of each dungeon is a portal to another harder dungeon.
NPCs
Shade Of Ja'qu (in 130+ Section)

location.name: Sclavus Temple
location.description: Quest(s): The Creeping Blight.

location.name: Sclavus Temple
location.description: Quest(s): The Creeping Blight.

location.name: Sclavus Tunnels
location.description: Quest(s): Radiant Mana Infusion Quest.

location.name: Jusad The Collector
location.description:
Rare Items Collector.
Jusad the Collector tells you, "Greetings. My name is Jusad, and I have come to this place in order to collect bundles of the Mana-infused Jungle Flowers for my colleagues."
Jusad the Collector tells you, "For every bundle of 10 Mana-infused Jungle Flowers that you bring to me, I will reward you."
Jusad the Collector tells you, "Do not bring me the larger lilies. I do not have any requests for those at this time."

location.name: Barkeep Alice Landlig
location.description: Quest(s): Assassin's Roost Quest.

location.name: Jin Ghao
location.description:
Quest(s): Blade of the Realm, Fort Tethana Tug of War.
Jin Ghao tells you, "You! If you would do your Queen a service, I bid you listen to me."
Jin Ghao tells you, "Our forces have spotted several Viamontian Knights in the area around Fort Tethana. When attacked, they quickly fled into the hills. We have sent emissaries to Teth in the hopes that they might shed some light on this situation, but our emissaries have not exactly been met with the warmest of receptions."
Jin Ghao tells you, "I do not like this situation. There is something about it that fills me with dread. Go to Teth. Scout the hills north of Teth. If you find anything of note, report back to me."

location.name: Journeyman Fletcher (Danby's Outpost)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Journeyman Fletcher tells you, "Greetings! I have left my master in Glenden Wood to help the craftsmen of this fine land to hone their crafting skills"
Journeyman Fletcher tells you, "Prove your knowledge by bringing me a Hollow Arrowshaft, and I shall reward you."
Journeyman Fletcher tells you, "What, you say you don't know how to make a Hollow Arrowshaft?! Why, that is what tests of knowledge are for! Get out there and experiment, my young friend!"

location.name: Agent of the Arcanum (Danby's Outpost)
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfeit Writ, Renegade Mace.
Talk to the agent to get a Agent of Arcanum List of items they accept for writs.

location.name: Gunther Danby
location.description: Gunther Danby tells you, "Hrm...Something is still missing just can't seem to figure out what that is."

location.name: Assassin's Roost
location.description:
Quest(s): Assassin's Roost.
A large lighthouse style tower located in the center of a crater in the Southeast Direlands.
This tower cannot be accessed simply by running to its physical location on the map. You must complete a quest to gain access.
This is the headquarters of Selaina the Subtle, a master assassin, and Creed, a middle man who sells several different items in exchange for MMDs.
NPCs
Creed Selaina the Subtle

location.name: Mana Forge
location.description:
Quest(s): Society Armor/Chests/Loot.
NPCs
Component Exchanger

location.name: Mana Forge
location.description:
Quest(s): Society Armor/Chests/Loot.
NPCs
Component Exchanger

location.name: Mana Forge
location.description:
Quest(s): Society Armor/Chests/Loot.
NPCs
Component Exchanger

location.name: Ned The Clever
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Nexus Quest, Portal Space Research.
A tribute to Maggie the Jackcats vassal named "Ned Cleversun" who inspired the creation of her website and who passed away in late 2008.
Ned is also featured in the Secrets of the Apostates Teaser along with Magaritta du Jacquette, a tribute to Maggie the Jackcat.

location.restrictions: Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: 2 MMDs to the Arena Master.
location.name: Isparian Combat Arena
location.description: Quest(s): Isparian Combat Arena.

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Ned The Clever.
location.name: Apostate Nexus
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Nexus Quest.
Located Inside Nexus Dungeon.
The entrance to this dungeon is hidden in the 2nd acid pit of the Nexus dungeon and requires you speak to Ned the Clever in Zaikhal first. You will not be able to reenter this dungeon after completing the quest (speaking to Ned after having handed in the resonator). After speaking to Ned in two weeks you can again enter.

location.name: Sharia Blackmist
location.description:
Quest(s): Ghost Hunter Quest.
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "Greetings. The Blackmist family has accepted the position of investigators of the paranormal for the Arcanum."
Sharia Blackmist gives you Crystal of Spectral Blood.
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "The recent unearthing of Mhoire Castle has left unusual paranormal disturbances in the rubble left behind. These unseen spirits corrupt the magic in this area. I need you to find and destroy the spirits there. Unfortunately the spirits are invisible and incorporeal."
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "I have developed two pieces of arcane equipment to locate and banish these spirits."
Sharia Blackmist gives you Skull of One Thousand Torments.
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "The Crystal of Spectral blood will glow red when it detects a spirit. If the spirit is close it will whisper to you."
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "The Skull of One Thousand Torments can destroy these spirits. The problem is you must be very close to a spirit for it to work. It alos takes a few seconds to recharge."
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "You must figure out the location of these spirits using the crystal and destroy three of them. Nothing will be left except for their corrupted, spectral hearts."
Sharia Blackmist tells you, "When you have obtained three hearts as proof that you have destroyed them hand one to me and I will reward you for your efforts."

location.name: Arcanum Lookout
location.description: A floating platform with NPCs on the edge of Graveyard.

location.name: Ries Woron
location.description:
Quest(s): Ries Woron and the Thugs.
Ries Woron tells you, "Thank you for helping to beat off these thugs."
Ries Woron tells you, "Unfortunately they have made off with my wife so I may have to call on your assistance then."
Ries Woron tells you, "Did I reward you?"
Ries Woron tells you, "I will."
Ries Woron tells you, "I wasn't in time before they took my wife, I must find where they took her."

location.name: Carolyn Woron
location.description:
Quest(s): Ries Woron and the Thugs.
Carolyn Woron tells you, "I'm sorry but I can not afford to trust anyone right now, I've already lost both my parents to these terrible thugs."
Carolyn Woron tells you, "I just wish I could of helped either of them."
Carolyn Woron tells you, "I have almost nothing left to remember them by."

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Limited to locked fellowship, give one Nexus-keyed Mana Shard to the Ghost of Galaeral to flag everyone in fellow for portal.
location.name: Aerfalle's Sanctum
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle, Menhir Mana Fields # 16.
Located Inside Aerfalle Keep.
You do not drop death items if you die here, however you cannot return to the quest if you do (or if you log/disconnect).
The portal to this dungeon opens in the lady room at the bottom of Aerlinthe Keep, it opens when a Nexus-keyed Mana Shard is given to the Ghost of Galaeral at the start of the Keep dungeon. The shard is located on an altar in the chest rewards room (go down, get shard, backtrack to give shard).

location.name: Pyre Skeleton Cave
location.description: Just A Small Cave With 3 Pyre Skeletons.

location.name: Mhoire Castle
location.description:
Quest(s):Castle of Lord Mhoire, Noble Remains Kill Task, Guardian Statue Kill Task, Spectral Fountain, Finding Hoshino Kei.
The castle has erupted from underneath and is floating on clouds, leaving a rubble strewn pit beneath it.
Mhoire Castle has been destroyed by Geraine in the April 2012 Patch - Retribution. The castle now lies on the hillside in pieces below where it used to float.

location.restrictions: 50+, Cannot Summon, Quest Flag: You need to have finished the first parts of the Marker Crystals to be able to enter the crater.
location.name: Facility
location.description:
Quest(s): Marker Crystals, Crystalline Adventurer.
This dungeon is accessible via the Crater of Crystalline Crag. The crater can't be accessed from the surrounding area, so you need to have finished the Marker Crystals to access it.

location.name: Do Za-I the Weaponsmith
location.description:
Quest(s): Ries Woron and the Thugs.
Do Za-I the Weaponsmith tells you, "Ries Woron?"
Do Za-I the Weaponsmith tells you, "All I know about him is the trouble he brings with him."
Do Za-I the Weaponsmith tells you, "Do you know how much pyreal we lost in weapons that were stolen by those Thugs?"
Do Za-I the Weaponsmith tells you, "And all of that is because of that no good Ries Woron who hid here instead of facing his problems head on."
Do Za-I the Weaponsmith tells you, "As far as I'm concerned if you're asking questions about him you're bringing the same trouble he did, so get out and don't return."

location.restrictions: 5+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Sent To Lifestone if Logged.
location.name: Thug Hideout
location.description:
Quest(s): Ries Woron and the Thugs, Ries Woron's Story.
The landscape dungeon portal was removed and you can now access the dungeon by speaking to Ries Woron in Baishi on the 2nd floor of the bar at 49.5S 62.8E.
NPCs
Fiona Woron

location.name: Felizio Calmasi
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Excavation Investigation .
Felizio Calmasi tells you, "Hrm, you look to be a tough enough adventurer to suit my purposes. The realm needs you! The Apostate Virindi have been working on something in secret for some time, and we have been unable to find out what they are up to. But scouts have brought back word of some new dig site in the Direlands where the Virindi are excavating an ancient site that hails from the days before the Olthoi invasion."
Felizio Calmasi tells you, "Please find the pit at 24.6 S, 56.2 W and bring me back whatever intelligence you can find. I will reward you handsomely for your effort."

location.name: Gate Warden Kris
location.description:
Quest(s): Moarsman Jailbreak.
Gate Warden Kris tells you, "I'll open the gate to let you in. Once you're inside the best way out may be to simply recall. If you can call to me from inside the door I'll open it for you to let you out."

location.name: Prison Guard
location.description:
Quest(s): Moarsman Jailbreak.
Several of these NPCs are on the walls around the Moarsmen Prison.

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Felizio Calamasi.
location.name: Apostate Excavation
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Excavation Investigation.
You must speak to Felizio Calmasi at 25.7N 48.8E in Cragstone to be flagged to enter the portal halfway through the dungeon. The surface portal at the end drops at 24.8S 56.1W and is not tiable/recallable.

location.name: Moarsman Prison
location.description: Quest(s): Moarsman Jailbreak.

location.name: Hei Shou
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Arrival.
Hei Shou tells you, "Hail, friend! Are you as concerned about the Apostate Virindi threat to Dereth as I am? If you are, I would ask you to investigate a site in northwestern Osteth that seems to be the source of some very interesting energy emanations."
Hei Shou tells you, "Seek the site at 40.1 N, 50.9 W, investigate it to its deepest levels, and bring me back anything interesting that you find. You will be well rewarded."

location.name: Nurino
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Parts.
Nurino tells you, "Greetings."
Nurino tells you, "My name is Nurino. I am a researcher for the Arcanum who specializes in ancient constructs. I've recently heard both rumors and reports of some strange parts being seen that could be a portion of some ancient form of Golem. I would be very interested in piecing together the truth of these rumors, and if they are true, piecing together this Golem itself."
Nurino tells you, "The majority of the reports have come from adventurers who were dealing with some problem with thugs. I sent a scout to look in the areas reported, but the pieces seem to have been moved. Perhaps the pieces can be found wherever these thugs have gone?".

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Hei Shou.
location.name: Reaving Facility
location.description: Quest(s): Gear Knight Arrival.

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Hei Shou.
location.name: Arrival Chamber
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Arrival.
Located Inside Reaving Facility.

location.name: Akemi Fei
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Located Inside Mage Shop 2FL.
Akemi Fei tells you, "I can teach you how to use Life Magic without the use of a Focus. I can teach it to you, but I will need an augmentation gem. Visit Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you have not already acquired one of these gems."
Infused Life Magic.

location.name: Gan Fo
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Located Inside Mage Shop 2FL.
Gan Fo tells you, "I'll teach you the way of casting Item Enchantment spells without the use of a Focus. Bring me an augmentation gem and I shall inscribe it for you."
Gan Fo tells you, "You might ask Fiun Rehlyun of the Halaetan Islands about augmentation gems if you do not have one."
Infused Item Magic.

location.name: Al-Shashqa
location.description:
Quest(s): Empyrean Beacon Destruction.
Al-Shashqa tells you, "Greetings. I am known as Al-Shasqa. I have been sent here to study the strange devices the Gear Knights have been erecting here since their arrival."
Al-Shashqa tells you, "Of special concern to me is one that they have created using an Empyrean Beacon they've unearthed. They seem to be using it to siphon the ambient Mana Energy from the area, to Asheron only knows what end."
Al-Shashqa tells you, "I've figured out a way to disrupt it, if not destroy it, but I'll need your help. I can create an Unstable Mana Stone using a device I've made, along with a Titan Mana Charge. I'll give you the Unstable Mana Stone, and you go drop it into their Mana Siphon. The unstable stone should cause the Mana Siphon to discharge everything it's accumulated, hopefully frying the device in the process. Once you've done so, come back to me, and I'll reward you for your help."
Al-Shashqa applies a strange device to a Titan Mana Charge, making it spark erratically.
Al-Shashqa tells you, "Here you go. Quickly now, drop that into the Mana Siphon!"
Al-Shashqa gives you Unstable Mana Stone.

location.name: Alex Brummel
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Alex Brummel tells you, "Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I will help you specialize your Gearcrafting skill."
Alex Brummel tells you, "If you haven't already done so, go talk to Fiun Rehlyun. When you get the gem, come back to me."
Alex Brummel gives you Tristra's Essence.

location.name: Emily Yarow
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Emily Yarow tells you, "If you want to discover the secret of reducing the amount of damage you take from attacks bring me a blank augmentation gem."
Emily Yarow tells you, "You can get a blank augmentation gem from Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands."
Emily Yarow gives you Iron Skin of the Invincible.

location.name: Gustuv Lansdown
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Gustuv Lansdown tells you, "You want to cast Creature Enchantment spells without the use of a focus? Go to Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands. Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I'll see if I can help you out."
Gustuv Lansdown gives you Infused Creature Magic.

location.name: Alishia bint Aldan
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Alishia bint Aldan tells you, "Anfram believes that his technique is superior, he may be able to land more critical blows but I've discovered the true form. My form will increase the damage you deal when you hit a critcal location."
Alishia bint Aldan tells you, "I can teach you how to hit critical locations harder but you will first have to provide me with a blank augmentation gem. Speak with Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you have not done so already."
Alishia bint Aldan gives you Hand of the Remorseless.

location.name: Anfram Mellow
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Anfram Mellow tells you, "I've discovered an attack technique that increases the chance of your attack hitting a critical location."
Anfram Mellow tells you, "Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I will teach you my secret."
Anfram Mellow gives you Eye of the Remorseless.

location.name: Ayala bint'Shashqa
location.description:
Arcanum Tinkerer.
Ayala bint'Shashqa tells you, "I see you have not yet received my most glorious creation, the Bronze Wind-up Gear Knight! Allow me to rectify this oversight!"
Ayala bint'Shashqa gives you Bronze Gearknight Gear.
Ayala bint'Shashqa tells you, "Salutations! I am Ayala bint'Shashqa, the most skilled Tinkerer in the Arcanum! I have created the most glorious beings in Dereth, the Bronze Wind-up Gear Knights!"
Ayala bint'Shashqa tells you, "To those who were here to celebrate a decade in Dereth, I have been authorized by the Arcanum to give one of these fabulous creations!"
Ayala bint'Shashqa tells you, "To those who were not here for the 10th year in Dereth, or who have already received their wonderful companion, I am not authorized to give you anything at this time." Ayala bint'Shashqa glances around, to make sure nobody is in earshot.
Ayala bint'Shashqa whispers to you, "Perhaps with the right parts, in time, I may be able to build something else on the side... The Arcanum doesn't have to know."
Ayala bint'Shashqa smiles conspiratorially.

location.name: Carlito Gallo
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Carlito Gallo tells you, "With an augmentation gem I can inscribe for you ancient teachings that will increase your abilities with all melee weapons. Visit Fiun Rehlyun if you don't already have a blank gem."
Carlito Gallo gives you Master of the Steel Circle.

location.name: Raphel Detante
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Raphel Detante tells you, "I've trained with the greaters masters of offensive magics. I'll be able to instruct you in how to use War Magic without a Focus if you desire."
Raphel Detante tells you, "You may speak to the Fiun who calls itself Rehlyun in order to find out how to get a blank augmentation gem."
Raphel Detante gives you Infused War Magic.

location.name: Dame Trielle
location.description:
Quest(s): Iron Blade Commander.
Dame Trielle tells you, "Greetings, I am Dame Trielle, of Queen Elysa's Knights. I've been sent here to organize the disruption of the Gear Knight forces by eliminating key leadership."
Dame Trielle tells you, "Near the center of these invading forces, you'll find a Gear Knight called the Iron Blade Commander. Go kill him, and I'll reward you."

location.name: Sir Yanov
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Gear Knights).
Sir Yanov tells you, "Greetings, I am Sir Yanov, and I am in charge of recruiting assistance against this mechanical invasion. If you wish to help me, just head over to the area these 'Gear Knights' have occupied and kill 25 of them. Thin their numbers for me and I'll reward you."

location.name: T'ing Douzen
location.description:
Quest(s): Aetherium Collection.
Name derrived from player character Same T'ing of Harvestgain in honor of his fight with cancer
T'ing Douzen tells you, "Salutations, I am known as T'ing Douzen, and I have been sent here by the Arcanum to collect the Aetherium Power Cores dropped by the Gear Knights, and the Aetherium Ore they've been piling up in their excavations here."
T'ing Douzen tells you, "I am prepared to reward Adventurers of sufficient experience for their efforts in collecting 10 Aetherium Power Cores, and also for 10 Aetherium Ore. I only have enough supplies on hand to reward adventurers for one pile of 10 Cores and one pile of 10 Ores each per day."

location.name: Dame Alistra
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Invasion Area.
Dame Alistra tells you, "I am Dame Alistra, one of Queen Elysa's Knights. It is my chare to disrupt the Gearknight's command structure."
Dame Alistra tells you, "Atop the six towers sit six Gearknight Lesser Lords. Destroy six Lesser Lords atop their towers and return to me once you have."
Dame Alistra tells you, "To reach the six Lesser Lords you must first make sure their gauntlet of six guardians is destroyed, only then will a portal open to the tower of the first lord."

location.name: Jin Ato
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Invasion Area.
Jin Ato tells you, "Greetings adventurer. I am Jin Ato a member of the Arcanum. The arcanum sent me to retrieve remnants of Gearknight as well as anything else you may collect from their encampment."
Jin Ato tells you, "I have been instructed to reward adventurers for lots of 10 Depleted Aetherium Ore as well as Gold Aetherium Core Fragments once a day."
Jin Ato tells you, "I'll also accept fragments of any Gearknight cores you may find. I'll take as many as you can get me."

location.name: Lieutenant Faen
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Silver Scope Troopers).
Lieutenant Faen tells you, "I am Lieutenant Faen of Queen Elysa's forces. I've been tasked to track information on the Silver Gearknight units."
Lieutenant Faen tells you, "Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Silver Scope Troopers."

location.name: Lieutenant Grenlin
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Bronze Gauntlet Troopers).
Lieutenant Grenlin tells you, "I am Lieutenant Grenlin of Queen Elysa's forces. I've been tasked to track information on the Bronze Gearknight units."
Lieutenant Grenlin tells you, "Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Bronze Gauntlet Troopers."

location.name: Lieutenant Micham
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Iron Blade Troopers).
Lieutenant Micham tells you, "I am Lieutenant Micham of Queen Elysa's forces. I've been tasked to track information on the Iron Gearknight units."
Lieutenant Micham tells you, "Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Iron Blade Troopers."

location.name: Lieutenant Zin
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Copper Cog Troopers).
Lieutenant Zin tells you, "I am Lieutenant Zin of Queen Elysa's forces. I've been tasked to track information on the Copper Gearknight units."
Lieutenant Zin tells you, "Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Copper Cog Troopers."

location.name: Missive
location.description:
Quest(s): Gearknight Invasion Area.
Sells at 140%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Sir Stavitor
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Gold Gear Troopers).
Sir Stavitor tells you, "I am Sir Stavitor of Queen Elysa's forces. I've been tasked to track information on the Gold Gearknight units."
Sir Stavitor tells you, "Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Gold Gear Troopers."

location.name: Neela Nashua
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Neela Nashua tells you, "With training you can learn to make all of your attacks hit harder."
Neela Nashua tells you, "All I need from you is a blank augmentation gem. Bring one to me and I will share my secrets with you. I promise, you will be glad that you did."
Neela Nashua gives you Frenzy of the Slayer.

location.name: Rahina bint Zalanis
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Rahina bint Zalanis tells you, "I have a trick that will enhance all of your magics. But you will have to hand me a blank augmentation gem first."
Rahina bint Zalanis tells you, "Visit Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you do not already have an augmentation gem."
Rahina bint Zalanis gives you Master of the Four Fold Path (+10 Magic).

location.name: Gear Knight Invasion Area
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Gold Gear, Silver Scope, Copper Cog, Iron Blade, Bronze Gauntlet Troopers).
Gear Knights have established a beach head on the eastern shore of the Inner Sea. Dame Alistra has you assault the Gear Knight leaders.

location.restrictions: 1+, Cannot Summon, Quest Flag: Portal opens after killing all six guardians inside the statues.
location.name: Gear Knight Lord's Tower
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Invasion Area.
Not a traditional dungeon, this portal leads to a series of tower top locations inside the Gearknight Invasion Area.
To cause the portal to open, kill the six guardian gear knights in the six statues surrounding the point where the portal will spawn (36.7S 7.1E).

location.name: Gear Knight Resistance Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Resistance Camp.
Al-Shashqa - Use mana item on Mana Siphon at 10.2S, 75.1W.
Dame Trielle - Kill boss spawn named the Iron Blade Commander.
Sir Yanov - Hunter Quests (Gear Knights).
T'ing Douzen - Accept's stack of ten Aetherium Power Core and Aetherium Ore once per day.
Sir Durnstad - Destroy Aetherium Ore Stockpile in Dungeon at 10.sS, 75.2W.

location.name: Tent
location.description:
Quest(s): Gear Knight Invasion Area, Hunter Quests (Gold Gear, Silver Scope, Copper Cog, Iron Blade, Bronze Gauntlet Troopers).
A desert tent filled with various quest NPCs.
NPCs
Jin Ato Lieutenant Faen Lieutenant Grenlin Lieutenant Micham Lieutenant Zin Missive Sir Stavitor

location.name: Fortress Of Xaa Xiil
location.description:
Quest(s): Sepulcher Of Nightmares.
An Empyrean Temple style Fortress at 96.5S 95.0W on a hill on Caul, with a floating Advocate Spire. It hardly seems to fit on the cliff.

location.name: Caul Lake
location.description: The only larger lake, with an Advocate Spire floating over it, found on the east side of Caul at 95.5S 91.4W. Usually, a spawn of several Listris Nefanes, Sephal Nefanes and Parfal Nefanes can be found under the Spire.

location.name: Black Marrow Reliquary
location.description:
Static spawn within a floating tower, no key required, 7 day Timer. As far as I know, this place can only be reached by using the Antiquated Compass. This portal gem item may be found in Black Marrow Reliquaries.
Taarna Blood SC 6/8/2005. ACS

location.name: Burned Out Light House
location.description:
Two Advocate Spires , attached to an Empyrean Light House, near the northern border ridge of Singularity Caul.
The spires look completely burned out.
You can go up the lighthouse, and contrary to the Black Marrow Reliquary in the floating spires at other POIs on Caul, directly access the Black Marrow Reliquary present here.

location.name: Empyrean Temple Ruin
location.description:
The remains of an Empyrean Temple on a hill to the far north of Caul, near the border ridge. It looks like part of it fell down the cliff.
This is a spot where more points of interest can be found: Nearby is the 89.5S, 95.8W - Burned Out Light House, and down the hill the 90.6S, 97.5W - Statue of Bael'Zharon. On the same cliff, are more, smaller, 91.4S, 96.5W - Empyrean Ruins found.

location.name: Empyrean Ruins
location.description: A hardly noteworthy Empyrean Ruins on a cliff to the far east of Caul. It consists of one Empyrean Standing Stone.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description:
One of the many statyes of Bael'Zharon on the Singularity Caul.
This one wears a Virindi Mask.
It might be the same one from the historical island, before the change, which got a Virindi Mask duing the Mirror, Mirror Event. This Statue was referred to in the Developer's Notes of From The Darkness Born as a Virindified Bael'Zharon Statue, and obviously, before this event it could be "used".

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: Nothing Written.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: One of the many statues of Bael'Zharon on the Singularity Caul, found not that far of the entrance to Caul Asylum.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: Two of the many statues of Bael'Zharon on the Singularity Caul, found near 96.8S, 93.4W on the edge of two cliffs. They are facing each other, looking down at the narrow valley below.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: Statue of Bael'Zharon At The Entrance To Caul Asylum.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: A stone (Empyrean?) Statue of a creature much resembling Bael'Zharon.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: A stone (Empyrean?) Statue of a creature much resembling Bael'Zharon.

location.name: Statue of Bael'Zharon
location.description: A stone (Empyrean?) Statue of a creature much resembling Bael'Zharon.

location.name: Empyrean Temple Ruin
location.description:
An Empyrean Temple Ruin on the northeast side of Caul. Almost empty of creatures.
It does show the red energy flows like many of the ruins occupied by the Raven Hand.
On the cliff nearby is the Shadow Spire of the Shield of Isin Dule Quest.

location.name: Empyrean Ruins
location.description:
Some Empyrean Ruins on a hill to the far north of Caul, teeming with energy.
It consists of one Empyrean Three-legged Arch, and an Empyrean Stone Head.
Nearby is a larger ruin, the 89.8S, 96.6W - Empyrean Temple Ruin.

location.name: Empyrean Ruins
location.description:
Some Empyrean Ruins in a valley to the northeast of Caul.
It consists of an Empyrean Stone Head and some other objects resembling defunct lifestones.

location.name: Empyrean Ruins
location.description: A few objects, resembling a defunct lifestone with a typical virindi crystal in the middle, just under a Virindi Spire.

location.name: Advocate Spire Bridge
location.description: Two floating Advocate Spires connected to each other with a bridge.

location.name: Raven Towers
location.description:
Quest(s): Sepulcher Of Nightmares.
Two Empyrean Stone Towers on a cliff at 94.3S 93.4W on Caul, occupied now by many of Raven Augur and other members and friends of the Raven Hand. Archon Greis, in the South Tower, drops the Circle of Raven Might. The Greater Void Lord, in the North Tower, drops the Raven Fragment for the Vestibule Lock.

location.name: Empyrean Stone Towers
location.description: Two Empyrean Stone Towers, in Caulcano.

location.name: Xireri's Stone Tower
location.description:
Quest(s): Tunnel Of Love.
An Empyrean Stone Tower.
Xireri, the golem who you give the Butterscotch Suckling to be flagged to enter the Tunnel of Love dungeon at the base of the Tower, resides on top.

location.name: Raven Hand Spire
location.description:
Quest(s): Sepulcher Of Nightmares.
A fallen Advocate Spire style building, loaded with energy, at 95.0S 98.2W on a hill on Caul, now occupied by many of the Raven Hand and their associates.

location.name: Empyrean Ruins
location.description:
Some Empyrean Ruins on a foothill on the west side Caul.
It consists of three Empyrean Columns, Empyrean Pillars, a Lifestone resembling floating crystal and other small objects.

location.name: Empyrean Stone Tower
location.description: An Empyrean Stone Tower with an Empyrean Three-legged Arch on top, north of the drop to Caul.

location.name: Empyrean Temple Ruin
location.description: The remains of an Empyrean Temple on a cliff on the southeast side Caul, not that far from drop. Inside is a glowing object.

location.name: Solange's Temple
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Umbral/Tenebrous Rifts)
A temple, found just N of the drop to Singularity Caul. Introduced in Dark Materials, this is where Solange resides, the NPC who finds spiritual solace by getting familiar with rifts.

location.name: Floating Advocate Spire
location.description: One Advocate Spire on a hill at the southeast of Singularity Caul, floating up in the air.

location.name: Empyrean Ruins
location.description:
Some Empyrean Ruins on a hill south of the drop to Caul.
It consists of one Empyrean Stone Tower, one Meeting Hall Style Building and an Empyrean Statue.

location.name: Floating Advocate Spires
location.description: Three Advocate Spires near the border ridge of Singularity Caul, floating almost directly over each other, high up in the air.

location.name: Surloshen's Bunker
location.description:
Quest(s): Tunnel Of Love.
A stone bunker.
It is the home of Surloshen Realaidain, who claims to be the unwanted son of Asheron Realaidain.

location.name: Surloshen Realaidain
location.description:
Quest(s): Tunnel Of Love.
Surloshen Realaidain slaps himself in the face.
Surloshen Realaidain says, "Shut up, you!"
Surloshen Realaidain tells you, "Welcome to my home, friend! Do have a look around. Do you like my lilies?"
Surloshen Realaidain tells you, "Have you heard of my father? I suspect you most likely have. He is a great man, my father. They call him Asheron Realaidain. He is responsible for many marvels and wonders, is he not? Truly a legend of his time."
Surloshen Realaidain tells you, "There are some who doubt that Asheron is actually my father. They say that he would never deign to father an illegitimate son with a common Isparian woman, but those people know nothing, I tell you! I will admit, even Asheron himself has not admitted to my existence, and I cannot fathom why he has not, but he is my father! I speak true!"
Surloshen Realaidain tells you, "I dearly wish to visit my father, wherever he may be. And I would like him to acknowledge me as his own, but I fear he will not do so without some sort of undeniable proof of our relation. There is a pit nearby, crawling with monsters of an ill disposition, which contains proof that Asheron is indeed my father! If you would be a good soul, please descend into that pit, retrieve this proof, and return it to me. You would be doing this poor soul a great service."

location.name: Portal To The Obsidian Rim
location.description: Portal To The Obsidian Rim Region.

Taarna Blood SC 06-08-2005. ACS

Taarna Blood SC 06-08-2005. ACS

As far as I know, this place can only be reached by using the Burning Veil. This potal gem may be found in Black Marrow Reliquaries.
Taarna Blood SC 06-08-2005. ACS

A castle broken in two during the transformation of the caul.
The Happy Clapper / Gloominus Doom SC 4/25/2004. ACS

location.description: Astalon Decurth. ACS

location.description: Astalon Decurth. ACS

location.name: Floating Advocate Spire
location.description: Astalon Decurth. ACS

location.name: Aun Rukuona
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Totem
Aun Rukuona tells you, "Greetings, tail-less one! I am Aun Rukuona, and I am here in Timaru to learn statecraft from my kinsman Aun Hareltah. If I learn well, I may one day act as envoy to your people."
Aun Rukuona tells you, "Aun Hareltah has tasked me with rewarding Isparians who defeat Hea Temepuh. Give me the Totem of Temepuh and I will give you the Stave of Palenqual."

location.name: Aun Turiona
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Totem
Aun Turiona tells you, "Greetings! I am Aun Turiona, and I am here in Timaru to learn statecraft from my kinsman Aun Hareltah. If I learn well, I may one day act as envoy to your people."
Aun Turiona tells you, "Aun Hareltah has tasked me with rewarding any no-tail who defeats Hea Temepuh. Give me the Totem of Temepuh and I will give you the Kalindan of Palenqual."

location.name: Aun Kiriona
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Totem
Aun Kiriona tells you, "Greetings, Isparian! I am Aun Kiriona, and I am here in Timaru to learn statecraft from my kinsman Aun Hareltah. If I learn well, I may one day act as envoy to your people."
Aun Kiriona tells you, "Aun Hareltah has tasked me with rewarding Isparian no-tails who defeat Hea Temen .. ah, Temepuh. Give me the Totem of Temepuh and I will give you the Hoeroa of Palenqual."

location.name: Aun Ngationa
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Totem, Buadren
Aun Ngationa tells you, "Greetings, Isparian! I am Aun Ngationa, and I am here in Timaru to learn statecraft from my kinsman Aun Hareltah. If I learn well, I may one day act as envoy to your people."
Aun Ngationa tells you, "Aun Hareltah has asked me to assist our drummers by organizing any bits of stone debris or rubble that can be found. I will sort this debris, and send it out to our drummers where it can do the most good. If you bring me a piece of rubble I will reward you well for it -- although if you wish to aid us more directly, you should still take the rubble directly to the proper menhir ring."
Aun Ngationa tells you, "In addition, I have also been experimenting with modifying certain buadrens. If you happen to possess the Awakener of Hea Karenua, I will modify it for you."

location.name: Aun Faranua
location.description:
Quest(s): Captain K'rank's Errands
Aun Faranua tells you, "I have been sent by High Queen Elysa to reward those who have assisted Captain K'rank of Linvak Tukal. If you have proof of this assistance give it to me and I will see that you are rewarded."

location.name: Aun Ruperea
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Voracios Eaters)
Aun Ruperea tells you, "With the arrival of the blue-skins come the creatures of tooth and boil. The gray ones call them simply Eaters, and aptly named they are."
Aun Ruperea tells you, "These Eaters have wrought much destruction on my brothers. I require assistance in ridding the Aun of these beasts. There is a particular breed of Eater, the one they call Voracious. You must aid me. Slay 50 of the Voracious Eater and I will sing your name to the elders of my xuta."

location.name: Barkeep Guzglurg
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Lubrik the Resupplier
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Aurutis
location.description:
Quest(s): Arm, Mind, Heart, Aerbax's Prodigal Lugian.
Arm, Mind, Heart:
Aurutis gives you Lugian Scout Report.
Aurutis tells you, "The raiders are striking hard now. They are fearful of our efforts to reach out to the Isparians. We have lost three of our most sacred totems due to their depredations. The Cloth of the Arm, the Sceptre of the Mind, and the Blade of the Heart must be found to ensure the continued stability of Linvak Tukal."
Aurutis tells you, "Our scouts have compiled information as to the whereabouts of the raiders' encampments into this report. You may find it useful in retrieving our totems. Kifandel the Imbuer now carries the Book of the Arm, Mind, and Heart, which records the words of Lauriagne, our first Matriarch. Read her words you will understand why the recovery of our totems is of the utmost importance to us."
Aurutis tells you, "I've recently made some improvements to the Sleeves of Inexhausitibility, the Staff of Clarity, and the Spear of Purity. If you would like to have one of these items, I will gladly improve it."
Aerbax's Prodigal Lugian:
Aurutis tells you, "Lord Kresovus sent me word of your honor. You may have one item from this list upgraded to the quality befitting a Guardian of Linvak Tukal my friend." Aurutis gives you Arm, Mind and Heart Upgrades.

location.name: Master Ulkas
location.description:
Quest(s): Arm, Mind, Heart.
Master Ulkas tells you, "Greetings, soft one. I am Ulkas, Master smith of Linvak Tukal."
Master Ulkas tells you, "The Gotrok looted the donjon of Linvak, taking all they could carry. Many of the items have not true value, but some are quite dangerous in the wrong hands..."
Master Ulkas tells you, "My skills have grown over the past few years. If I made an item for you in the past, I would be happy to improve it for you.

location.name: Suzuhara Sheshumi
location.description:
Quest(s): Suzuhara's Care Package.
Suzuhara Sheshumi says, "Blessed sea breeze, work your magic."
Suzuhara Sheshumi says, "Ah, this cough is going to kill me."
Suzuhara Sheshumi tells you, "I came down with this nasty cough a few months ago when my brother and I explored one of those new Burun pits. I just cannot seem to shake it."
Suzuhara Sheshumi coughs loudly.
Suzuhara Sheshumi tells you, "Hello, friend. How do you like this ocean breeze? I feel it has quite a restorative property."
Phlegm rattles in Suzuhara Sheshumi's lungs as a nasty bout of coughing racks his weakened frame.

location.name: Archmage (Beach Fort)
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer (Beach Fort)
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Peddler (Beach Fort)
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%. Black Containers.

location.name: Weaponsmith (Beach Fort)
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Brown Rat Tower
location.description: A short stone tower on top of a hill that is inhabited by 3 Brown Rats.

location.name: Undead Barricade
location.description: A short stone tower on top of a hill that is inhabited by 3 Brown Rats.

location.name: Hawker For Ketnan
location.description:
Hawker for Ketnan tells you, "Hey, right this way for the Tusker Emporium of Deadly Doom! Thrills. Chills. Spills! Bask in the warmth of our volcanic tunnels. Marvel at the ancient, trap-filled Empyrean architecture. Run shrieking like a little girl from tuskers galore."
Hawker for Ketnan tells you, "And please be sure to visit our fully stocked refreshment stand and souvenir gift shop."

location.name: Mar'uun
location.description:
Quest(s): Machinist's Gloves Quest, Portal Space Research.
"The Drifter's home."
The portal to the town appeared during the Unfinished Business event. It was home to some researchers and Shopkeepers. During the Who Watches the Virindi? event, two Virindi guests appeared in the bar, making the Shopkeepers feel uncomfortable.
NPCs
Archmage Malak ibn Hern Barkeep Rubin Bowyer Ali ibn Mahir Grocer Khamal al-Rachard Jean Jeweler Jurraf al-Djiqidh Jinmi al-Evv Kaywin (Machinist's Gloves) Luc Marcus Manfried Smith Aisha bint Karal Wren the Curious
Portals
Resonant Portal Surface Xarabydun
The town lies in ruins since the Old Ghosts event. The Town portal at 10.6S, 17.1E is still there. Two human NPCs simply disappeared (Jinmi the Alchemist and Kaywin the Machinist), but there are 2 corpses near the Test Portal (Marcus and Wren, the Portal Researchers?) and corpses where the Shopkeepers Rubin (Barkeep), Jurraf (Jeweler), Aishi (Smith) and Ali (Bowyer), Khamal (Groceries), and Malak (Archmage) were. Of the two Virindi guests, Jean and Luc, there is no trace... The Test Portal is still there, but doesn't function.
You try to enter the portal but there is no effect. The portal seems unstable.
Also the Stabilizing Machine is still there. The door is now barricaded, but you can access it by going up near the Test Portal, and shift-jump down into a small gap in the floor.
On the floor, there is a Scrap of Paper (Attuned and Bonded).
I'm afraid, something dark, very dark is happening. Screams came from the depths of Mar'uun reaching across the chasm to me. A darkness spread acrosss Mar'uun. I've managed to baricade myself in the corner. I don't feel very safe, but I may be. I dream of rescue, were it possible. As I write this I can feel the darkness coming.
(the writing on the note becomes unkempt)
...there's scratching above me...
the note ends abruptly.

location.name: Kor-Gursha
location.description:
Kor-Gursha is an underground village on the distant world of Bur. It is the home of a renegade group of Burun Ruuk. It is the starting point for all the quests on Bur.
To gain access to Bur and therefore this city, a character must first complete the upper or lower Bur Flagging quests (Asheron's Departure Lower for 1-79 or Asheron's Departure for 80+).
To find the portal, go as N as possible through Bur. Completing a series of quests (Asheron's Departure, Saving Asheron, then Bur Recall) gives a recall spell that drops the caster at the western end of Kor-Gursha."
Within Bur.

location.name: Muggy Guruk Caverns
location.description:
Quest(s): Falacatot Medaillon.
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Northern Catacombs
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Marauders, Bashers).
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Humid Guruk Caverns
location.description:
Quest(s): Falacatot Medaillon.
Within The Northern Catacombs.

location.name: Eastern Catacombs
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Marauders, Smashers, Fiends, Colossi.
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Swamp Cavern
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Moars), Slaying Spiketooth.
Within The Eastern Catacombs.

location.name: Steamy Guruk Caverns
location.description:
Quest(s): Falacatot Medaillon.
Within The Eastern Catacombs.

location.name: Southern Catacombs
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Guruk Monstrosities, Smashers), (Bosh Bosh).
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Deep Guruk Caverns
location.description:
Quest(s): Falacatot Medaillon, Hunter Quests (Bosh Bosh).
Within The Southern Catacombs.

location.restrictions: Requires access to Bur, 80+, Quest Flag: Scout Leader Tmauruk .
location.name: Upper Catacombs
location.description:
Quest(s): Kaurik's Ghost Messenger, Enhancing Mucor, Asheron's Savior, BurunLiberator, Harlune's Diplomacy.
Within The Southern Catacombs.

location.name: Collector Golem (Kor-Gursha)
location.description:
Quest(s): Saving Asheron.
Collector Golem tells you, "Greetings to you, Adventurer from Dereth. I remain here to reward those who aid my Master, Lord Asheron, by defeating the Falatacot's attempts to complete rituals using blood and essence, stolen from my Master."
Collector Golem tells you, "If you could bring to me any sign of your involvement in Lord Asheron's release, salvation, or defense, I am prepared to reward you for your aid."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Gruuk'lar
location.description:
Quest(s): Falatacot Medaillon.
Gruuk'lar tells you, "Greetings, traveler from Dereth."
Gruuk'lar tells you, "Don't look too surprised that I know your language. We've had one of your people here for some time, teaching us of your ways. Teaching us of this metal you call 'Pyreal' and of how to engage in 'Commerce'."
Gruuk'lar tells you, "But I digress. I'm no gatherer or 'merchant' to trade in such things. I'm a guardian of this small Tribe, and my Clutch helps protect and hide this place from the others."
Gruuk'lar tells you, "There are four caverns which have become connected to this cavern via magic, "Portals" I have heard them called. They appeared the same time Torgluuk and Asheron disappeared, and occasionally Guruk come through them to attack us. I have sent hunters from my Clutch, but none have returned, and I can't afford to send more, as we must be ready to defend the village."
Gruuk'lar tells you, "These Guruk who attack us seem to be being controlled by those your people call Falatacot. The False Gods of our hated Fiazhat enemies. Travel into these 'Portals', destroy these False Gods, and bring proof of their demise to me, and I will reward you."
Gruuk'lar looks you over.
Gruuk'lar tells you, "There is a portal to the Southern Catacombs, down the tunnel to the Northeast of here. In the depths of those catacombs, you will find the portal to the Deep Guruk Caverns."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Kaurik
location.description:
Quest(s): Kaurik's Ghost Messenger.
Kaurik tells you, "Greetings, human. You are just in time, if you can help."
Kaurik tells you, "I am Kaurik - I follow Tmauruk's commands in all things. He is clever and quick, much more so than most of us."
Kaurik tells you, "He has asked me to ask help of humans who come by in an important task."
Kaurik tells you, "Recently, a ghost appeared at the spot that your portal sends people when they come here from your Dereth. As we scouts drew closer, it fled quickly away. It moved too quickly for us to catch it, but it sealed itself into one of the many ways hidden in the Upper Catacomb."
Kaurik tells you, "Tmauruk thinks that it is a messenger, going to see the Falatacot which live in the catacombs. Anything which helps them is bad for us, so we want to catch the messenger, see what it plans."
Kaurik tells you, "I will show you how to use the statue so that you may gain access to the ghost's hiding place. Help us - bring us the message - and we will hail you accordingly. You also help your own people - the Falatacot do not love the humans who have defeated them and freed their prisoner."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Scout Leader Tmauruk
location.description:
Quest(s): Burun Liberator.
Scout Leader Tmauruk tells you, "Jurukka. I am Tmauruk, leader of the scouts of this tribe. While I would rather be away from the town scouting, Gruuklar has asked me to remain here and brief those of you who wish to help."
Scout Leader Tmauruk tells you, "Torgluuk has been rescued, but the bloodletters continue to abduct the other shamans of the tribe. Torgluuk wants me to continue instructing you Derethians how to find the upper catacomb so that they can be rescued."
Scout Leader Tmauruk tells you, "There is a rock in the southern catacombs, somewhat near the north of the top level cavern. If you push the rock aside, you'll find a very small corridor, impossible to see without knowing exactly what you are looking for."
Scout Leader Tmauruk tells you, "Bring the chains that bound the shaman to me as evidence of their freedom."
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Tibik
location.description:
Quest(s): Slaying Spiketooth, Hunter Quests (Moars).
Tibik tells you, "Me Tibik. Me gather food for Clutch and Tribe. Me find magic path to great food, but cave full of Moar! Moar bad. Moar eat Tibik. If less Moar, then maybe Tibik sneak and gather food. You kill Moar, hmmm... 25. You kill 25 Moar, and Tibik reward Strong Traveler from Faraway."
Tibik tells you, "You find magic door in Eastern Catacombs, near top. You go, kill Moar, come back, yes?"
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Torgluuk
location.description:
Quest(s): Enhancing Mucor.
Kuurak tells you, "Jurukka, friend! I am Kuurak, the chief weaponsmith of Kor-Gursha. I have been trading my work to Dobblar in exchange for training in how to work with metal, so I am afraid I have no goods myself to sell."
Kuurak tells you, "Ah! But I do have something that you may be interested in!"
Kuurak gives you Burun Weaponcrafter's Note.
Kuurak tells you, "Read that over! Discoveries to amaze the smallest egg or largest Kukuur!"
Within Kor-Gursha.

location.name: Tumerok Camp
location.description: A Bunker with a Runed Chest, guarded by lower level Hea Tumeroks.

location.restrictions: 35+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Hand a totem to Aun Shimauri at 46.7N 70.7W.
location.name: Aun Kerehanua
location.description:
Quest(s): Palenqual's Living Weapons.
Within Palenqual's Cavern.

location.restrictions: 35+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest Flag: Speak to Hea Kassoka in Ahurenga.
location.name: Big Chief Hagra
location.description:
Quest(s): Hea Bone and Hide Shirt Quest.
Big Chief Hagra tells you, "You! Human help Hagra! Big 'Rok with spear in 'Rok village, very angry with Hagra! Hagra have no choice, Hagra's people very hungry! We escape bad things on bigger land, need food to live and make more Mosswarts! You take this to Big 'Rok with spear, tell him we be friends!"
Within Hagra's Holdfast.

location.name: Aerlinthe Lower Reservoir
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle.
Portal to Aerlinthe Lower Reservoir behind a locked (322) door at the bottom.
Three hours after the Relic Watchman has died the Repair Golem spawns at the bottom. Handing the Sluice Gate Bar to it will start the Lady Aerfalle Quest. If the golem is not present, it means the quest is in progress or it hasn't been three hours since the watchman died.
There is an important jump near the end, you'll come to a shaft facing east. There is a small grate you need to hit or you'll fall to the very bottom of the shaft and there is no way back except running back to the dungeon from Aerlinthe drop. To hit the grate, jump normally towards the SE corner of the shaft, you'll slide down the corner and hit the grate.
Within Aerlinthe Reservoir.
location.monsters: Ember, Magma Golem, Mist Golem, Nublious Golem, Injured Olthoi, Panumbris Shadow, Umbris Shadow, Great Skeleton, Fire Wisp

location.name: Coral Columns (East Harbor)
location.description:
A Row of Empyrean Columns and an Empyrean Pillar on the E Side of the Harbor of Aerlinthe.
It used to be one of the favorite sides for mages to level.
location.monsters: Coral Golem

location.name: Coral Columns (West Harbor)
location.description: A Row of Empyrean Columns and an Empyrean Pillar on the W Side of the Harbor of Aerlinthe.
location.monsters: Coral Golem

location.name: Lifestones Sign
location.description: This is a Lifestone. DOUBLE-CLICK on it to use it. If your character dies, he or she will return to life at the last Lifestone you used. If you are not very strong, do not use a Lifestone in dangerous territory.

location.name: Lifestones Sign
location.description: This is a Lifestone. DOUBLE-CLICK on it to use it. If your character dies, he or she will return to life at the last Lifestone you used. If you are not very strong, do not use a Lifestone in dangerous territory.

location.restrictions: 125+, Cannot Tie/Recall/Summon, Quest flag: Give the book from the Empyrean Workshop to Ciandra in Xarabydun.
location.name: Atlan's Laboratory
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadowfire Stone.
Atlan's Laboratory, sealed by Empyrean Wards. Perhaps something in the Workshop could provide clues to gaining entrance to the Lab.
Within Empyrean Workshop.

location.name: Caleb Jinor the Healer
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Journeyman Cook (Crater Lake Village)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter Quest.
Journeyman Cook tells you, "Greetings! I have left my master in Glenden Wood to help the craftsmen of this fine land to hone their crafting skills"
Journeyman Cook tells you, "Prove your knowledge by bringing me some Fried Mushroom Dough, and I shall reward you."
Journeyman Cook tells you, "What, you say you don't know how to make Fried Mushroom Dough?! Why, that is what tests of knowledge are for! Get out there and experiment, my young friend!"

location.name: Crater Lake Village
location.description:
Deep in the heart of the northern mountains, within the caldera of a dormant volcano, millennia of rainfall have created the placid Crater Lake. On the banks, birds lazily patrol the sky above the cathedral stands of old-growth trees, and ancient monoliths recline carelessly by fields of giant water lily. Year after year, the lake mysteriously keeps the same level, regardless of snow or rainfall. However, the static tranquility belies extreme hazards. Fierce monsters roam the lake shore and maintain eager watch on this portal, hoping to snare hapless adventurers.
Legends surround the lake. It is rumored that the monster-infested caverns nearby link the crater to the outside slopes. What's more, the Sho have taken particular interest in the lake since a priest of the Unicorn related a strange bedtime tale to his Koutei's son. The priest claimed to know sorcerers who once created a glass citadel beneath a mountain lake. On calm, cloudless nights, the clear waters would focus starlight so that distant worlds could be viewed across the ether. Whether this story bears on the mysteries of Crater Lake may never be known, for the priest packed up and disappeared that very night, unexpectedly ending several decades of faithful service to his master.
From Glenden Wood Settlement Portals at 27.9N, 29.5E Take portal to Highland Manors 63.2N, 16.9E run southwest to Crater Pathway 60.6N, 15.7E Inside Crater Pathway, take all ramps up. Surface portal at top of dungeon drops at Crater Lake Village.

location.name: Skeleton Bunker
location.description: A bunker populated by 3 Skeletons and 1 Skeleton Captain. There a couple Sarcophagi that are unlocked and contain some junk loot.

location.name: Chef Jonus
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfit Writ.
Chef Jonus tells you, "I used to be a famous chef, but now I am forced to cook for these outlaws."
Chef Jonus tells you, "Bah!"
Chef Jonus tells you, "It wouldn't be so bad except these heathens have no taste. I could cook up a pot of Banderling Stew and they would still eat it and call it great!"
Chef Jonus tells you, "My talents are wasted here!"
Chef Jonus tells you, "However, that blue skinned fellow that came in the other day seemed to appreciate my culinary skills. He even complimented me and said my food was fit for a King!"

location.name: Hinkel
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfit Writ.
Hinkel tells you, "You didn't hear this from me, but Gronk isn't running this operation. I wish I could tell you who it is, but it definitely isn't Gronk."
Hinkel tells you, "An auroch has more smarts than that one."
Hinkel looks around.
Hinkel tells you, "And you didn't hear that from me neither."

location.name: Larnia
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfit Writ.
Larnia tells you, "These awful people kidnapped me from Holtburg and forced me to make Fake Niffis Pearls for them. But now that you're here I can go home now."
Larnia tells you, "Right?"

location.name: Markis
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfit Writ.
Markis tells you, "I promise not to try and run away again."
Markis tells you, "Please don't let them eat me!"

location.name: Shanrek the Forger
location.description:
Quest(s): Counterfit Writ.
Shanrek the Forger tells you, "Do you need cheap Housing Writs?"
Shanrek the Forger tells you, "For the kindly donation of a Trade Note (10,000), I'd be willing to tell you how this can be done."
Shanrek the Forger wrings his hands anxiously.

location.name: Olthoi Pass
location.description: A small rock formation located in a pass between two mountains near Neydisa Castle and guarded by several olthoi.

location.name: Ice Golem Shrine
location.description: A triple stone arch found north of Mount Esper surrounded by 6 Ice Golems.

location.name: Lake Pillar
location.description:
A pillar in the middle of a small lake north of Mount Esper.
2 Water Golems and a Granite Golem spawn near the pillar. Also two junk loot chests are found near the pillar. On the edge of the lake near the pillar are 3 Water Wisps.

location.name: Deeper Catacombs (Crater Lair)
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Weapons.
A portal to this dungeon is found at the bottom of the Crater Lair. At the end of the dungeon is a portal to the Catacombs of Opposition where the parts and NPCs for the Olthoi Weapons quest are found. On the ground in front of the Catacombs of Opposition portal you will find a Note from a Scout. The note can be turned in to the Royal Guard in Cragstone for 150,000 xp.
Within Crater Lair.

location.name: Catacombs Of Opposition (Olthoi Town)
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Weapons.
The Catacombs of Opposition (aka the Olthoi Town) is where a group of Isparians are holding out underground against a swarm of Olthoi brought on by the Ancient Olthoi Queen. In this dungeon you can find several Olthoi body parts and mundane generic items that can be given to the NPCs there in exchange for an Olthoi Weapon.
The Catacombs of Opposition can be gotten to from any of the seven dungeons by first traveling through them then through the Deeper Catacombs.
Black Death Catacombs Crater Lair Lair of Death Olthoi Horde Nest - Bandit Castle Olthoi Horde Nest - Colier Olthoi Horde Nest - Mountain Retreat Olthoi Tunnels
NPCs
Scout Luzumin Abigwei Scout Nytani Strongbow Scout Tel al-Arat Mandible Nanoc, Basher of Bugs Narg Pincer Danta Rat Nose Ripper Teela
Within Deeper Catacombs.
location.monsters: Olthoi Advance Guard, Eviscerator, Guard, Grub, Mutilator, Noble, Soldier, Vanquisher, Warrior, Swarm Eviscerator, Swarm Guardian, Swarm Soldier

location.name: Fiun Layeel
location.description:
Quest(s): Search for Lunnum (Undead Slayer).
Fiun Layeel tells you, "At this time, my friend Gaya needs your help more than I. Fiun Layeel tells you, "You will find him tending Lunnum's Pyre on the Isle of Ruin at 89.1N 47.6W.
You give Fiun Layeel Blue Face Paint Recipe. Layeel takes the recipe and reads it.
Fiun Layeel tells you, "This isn't enough to directly tie Nuhmudira to the theft of Lunnum, but I may be able to use this to scry for places this note has been."
Layeel holds the recipe to his chest and slowly turns around chanting something unintelligible beneath his breath. His eyes grow hazy and unfocused and he slows to a stop facing east.
Fiun Layeel tells you, "I have scryed a strong connection to a place located in the eastern end of the Osteth Mountain Range. Travel to 84.3N 24.7E and seek out what lies there."
Fiun Layeel tells you, "I have one more favor to ask of you. If you find that Lunnum's corpse has been desecrated in any way I would have you destroy it rather than see it returned to Fiun Gaya in such a state. Better that he never sees such a sight."

location.name: Undead Ruins
location.description:
On a ledge overlooking the southern ocean you will find 3 different ruins occupied by low level undead.
83.2S, 49.9W - A meeting hall building populated by 2 Lichs, 2 Lich Lords, and a Revenant.
82.7S, 48.8W - A short stone tower populated with a few Lichs and a Lich Lord. Also the chest here casts Camping Ineptitude on you when you open it.
84.8S, 47.8W - A meeting hall style building populated by zombies and lichs. Another building houses a portal to the Isle of Tears and a portal to Zaikhal is found outside.
Also below the ledge near the water is an empty tent and a Lifestone at 84.2S, 48.8W.

location.name: Garaena The Emmisary
location.description:
Portal to isle called Aerlinthe. Same as portal from Chalicmere Fortress but you dont need lockpick and there is no need to fight, of course its 40,000 pyreals more.
- Zoran and SilvrDrgn - Chia - Silverion DD - DaOlthoiKiller
Very near Candeth Keep. Give her a D note and she will summon a 40+ portal to Aerlinthe Island. She will accept and give change for an M note. Many annoying monsters will rush you.
- Taarna Blood SC. ACS

location.name: Anadil's Tomb
location.description:
Quest(s): Staff Of The Nomads.
The tomb of the Sand King Anadil. A small inscription on the lid reads, "Last of the high desert's mighty, fallen at last. Honor is yours on this world chieftain. Serve the gods with distinction in the next."
This Crypt is heavily guarded by Horrible and Nomad Mu-miyah, at the bottom lies the Tomb of the Sand King Anadil, which holds his most prized possession the Staff of the Nomads.... The Tomb is locked and has a resistance of 350. Warning to those wanting to get the staff. Stamina traps galore. And the nomads arent the 50th level variety, but the 100 + variety. - Fon Win SC 10/20/2001. ACS

location.name: Ryukai Hiro
location.description:
Quest(s): Aerbax's Prodigal Human.
You give Ryukai Hiro Dojiro Sangi's Ring.
Ryukai Hiro tells you, "You have something for me?"
Ryukai Hiro tells you, "I recognize this... Where did you get this?"
You tell Ryukai Hiro about your encounter with Dojiro Sangi in Aerbax's Lab.
Ryukai Hiro tells you, "I see. It is a great sadness that things needed to turn out this way, but you did the right thing, and saved Sangi from a terrible fate. Please, allow me to reward you."
Ryukai Hiro grants to you the title, "Dojiro Sangi's Savior".
You've earned 164,455,904 experience.
Ryukai Hiro gives you Mana Forge Key.

location.name: Tyokai Renjiro the Grocer
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at 80%
Tyokai Renjiro the Grocer tells you, "Hello, need some fresh fruit or perhaps some cooking supplies?"

location.name: Candeth Keep Tree Portal
location.description: To access the Tree Portal, you must complete the Town Founder quest.

location.name: Tent
location.description: A Tent With a Archmage and Merchant Next To A Lifstone In The Middle Of Nowhere.

location.name: Portal to Hilltop
location.description: Destination: Hilltop (32.8N, 34.7E).

location.name: Small Fledgling Mukkir Nest (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Small Fledgling Mukkirs).
Royal Guard tells you, "I have been sent by Queen Elysa to seek the aid of those willing to give it. There is a small nest of those vile Mukkir just northeast of here. If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts."
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken

location.name: Small Fledgling Mukkir Nest (Shoushi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Small Fledgling Mukkirs).
Royal Guard tells you, "I have been sent by Queen Elysa to seek the aid of those willing to give it. There is a small nest of those vile Mukkir just northeast of here. If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts."
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken

location.name: Small Fledgling Mukkir Nest (Yaraq)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Small Fledgling Mukkirs).
Royal Guard tells you, "I have been sent by Queen Elysa to seek the aid of those willing to give it. There is a small nest of those vile Mukkir just northeast of here. If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts."
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken

location.name: Apprentice Alchemist (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "Hello! My master in Glenden Wood, Tiffany Comfore, has sent me out into the world to participate in the great Mission - encouraging the young people of Dereth to embrace a life of artistry!"
The apprentice coughs quietly.
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "If you bring me an example of your craftsmanship - say, a Frost Infusion - I will reward you with a token of encouragement."
Apprentice Alchemist tells you, "Um, we're not rich yet, though, so I'm afraid I can only reward you once a week."

location.name: Aun Kielerea
location.description:
Quest(s): Aun Golem Hunters.
Aun Kielerea tells you, "Greetings. I am Aun Kielerea, a hunter for the Aun Xuta. My brothers and I have ventured away from the land of Palenqual to seek out mightier prey than what can be found near our home."
Aun Kielerea tells you, "This does not mean we have forsaken Aun Hareltah, rather that we are looking for glorious battle against truly worthy opponents. And we believe we have found it!"
Aun Kielerea tells you, "My brothers have stationed themselves across this land, hunting the strongest of the creatures you call golems. They are not selfish, and during the times that they are at rest, they will be happy to share in the hunt and reward those who have taken up the same challenge as they. Please go visit them."
Aun Kielerea tells you, "May you always be brave in battle."

location.name: Hemmik the Sly
location.description:
Quest(s): Elemental Weeping Weapons.
Hemmik the Sly tells you, "If you are stealthy enough, you can sneak right up to a banderling who is too busy looking around nervously to notice -- sadly, I have not found this to be the case with dancing drudges."
Hemmik the Sly tells you, "I have learned the deadly and secret arts from Dereth's greatest assassin -- so do watch your back, please."
Hemmik the Sly tells you, "I can move with complete invisibility, using no magic trick or power. I use only skill to move unseen, or to strike, or to evade the onslaught of war magic -- you do know what skill is, aye?"
Hemmik the Sly tells you, "Well, you do seem to be pretty wealthy, and this is broad daylight, after all -- so how's about you consider loaning me one of those crisp new 250,000 pyreal notes? Consider it payment for the two gifts I am giving you: Protection from imminent danger, and a bit of advice to be imparted upon payment."

location.name: Reformed Bandit
location.description:
Quest(s): Elysa's Favor Quest.
Reformed Bandit tells you, "Greetings, stranger. I've done many things to be ashamed of in the past, but I've come here to make a new start near the fair town of Holtburg. I enjoy the peace and quiet of these parts. Would you mind if I asked you to be on your way? I am entertaining some important guests, and I don't want them to be disturbed."

location.name: Reformed Bandit's House
location.description: Quest(s): Elysa's Favor Quest.

location.name: Royal Guard (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Small Fledgling Mukkirs).
Royal Guard tells you, "I have been sent by Queen Elysa to seek the aid of those willing to give it. There is a small nest of those vile Mukkir just northeast of here. If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts."

location.name: Royal Guard (Shoushi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Small Fledgling Mukkirs).
Royal Guard tells you, "I have been sent by Queen Elysa to seek the aid of those willing to give it. There is a small nest of those vile Mukkir just northeast of here. If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts."

location.name: Royal Guard (Yaraq)
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Small Fledgling Mukkirs).
Royal Guard tells you, "I have been sent by Queen Elysa to seek the aid of those willing to give it. There is a small nest of those vile Mukkir just northeast of here. If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts."

location.name: Tirenia
location.description:
Quest(s): Tursh Totem Quest.
Tirenia tells you, "Please, the Queen is in dire need of your assistance! A group of creatures recently assaulted one of the Queen's hidden vaults. The few guards who were able to escape told me that these creatures were after some sort of artifact."
Tirenia tells you, "These vaults house numerous objects of immense power. Whoever these invaders are, we cannot allow them to obtain that which they seek. I need you to infiltrate the vault and repel the interlopers. If you happen upon the object they are after, return it to me."
