location.name: Sir Draithon
location.description:
Quest(s): Rescue Ayaname Chiyoko.
Sir Draithon tells you, "Greetings. There is little time, so I'll cut right to the point."
Sir Draithon tells you, "Hoshino Kei's Handmaiden, Ayaname Chiyoko, has been kidnapped!"
Sir Draithon tells you, "Hoshino Kei's rooms in the castle were all but destroyed ahain. Ayaname Chiyoko was in the rooms at the time, and we fear she has been abducted in another attempt on Princess Kei."
Sir Draithon tells you, "As the damage is similar to Princess Kei's previous abduction, we are beginning the search in the Graveyard in the Direlands once again. If this abduction is the result of further undead agression agains the Royal Family, we'll have to find a more permanent way to put and end to it.
Sir Draithon gives you Attuned Essence Gem.
Sir Draithon tells you, "Take this Gem. it is attuned to Ayaname Chiyoko's essence, and should help you find her if you get close to any place where she has passed through since her capture."
Sir Draithon tells you, "If you find her, report back to me. The Princess has many guards out searching, but I can reach them if one of you is successful."

location.name: Wedding Gifter
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Preparations.
One or two items turned in: Wedding Gifter tells you, "I am here to reward all the wonderful people who helped get the wedding prepared." Wedding Gifter tells you, "We would like to thank you for the couple of items you brought to help with the wedding." You've earned 175,000,000 experience.
Multiple items turned in: Wedding Gifter tells you, "I am here to reward all the wonderful people who helped get the wedding prepared." Wedding Gifter tells you, "We are most thankful with all the effort you put forth to help with this special occasion." Wedding Gifter tells you, "You helped us with almost every task there was, thank you so much for that."
Also gives 1 0f 6 Bracelets as a reward. Each Bracelet is an Epic in one Attribute.

Use the Olthoi Cistern in the Paradox-touched Olthoi Queen's Lair to open the Green Olthoi Door at the end of this bunker.

Game Coordinator tells you, "It's not the season for playing this game. I'm only here to maintain the area and make sure nobody's makin trouble."

location.name: Rock Game
location.description:
Quest(s): Wedding Games.
The Rock Piles when used randomly give an Egg or Nothing.
Collect 8 Eggs to win!
The Trap Floor Portals when touched portal you to the Wedding Gazebo at 12.8s, 41.7e.

location.name: Withered Atoll Lugian Mine
location.description:
Quest(s): Well-Balanced Lugian Greataxe, Chunky Ore Collection.
A Lugian Mine on the Withered Atoll.
Grab a pick-axe and let's do some rock breaking!
NPCs
Lugian Miner Mine Chamberlain (Well-Balanced Lugian Greataxe) Mine Foreman (Chunky Ore Collection)
At the bottom is a Surface Portal that will take you to Mare Tukal.

location.name: Mare Tukal
location.description:
Quest(s): Lugian Relics.
A Lugian city that is erupting from the seafloor off the northeast coast of Singularity Caul. No official name has been uncovered yet, until such a discovery is made the city is being referred to as Mare Tukal (Lugian Bastion in the Sea).
Relics of the previously flooded city are strewn about, some have pickup timers.
Blade of the Heart Lugian Armor Lugian Axe Lugian Crest Lugian Hammer Lugian Mace Lugian Morning Star Lugian Pauldron Rock Rusty Lugian Axe Well-Balanced Lugian Greataxe

location.description: "Greetings Citizen"

location.name: Royal Guard
location.description: "Greetings Citizen"

location.name: Prince Borlean Strathelar
location.description:
Quest(s): Queen Elysa in Danger.
Prince Borelean Strathelar tells you, "Disturbing news has come from a stranger who insists he remain unknown." Prince Borelean Strathelar tells you, "Normally I would not trust such a person but his information was detailed, and contained many truths." Prince Borelean Strathelar tells you, "I need you to make contact with this stranger right away, for there is no time to lose." Prince Borelean Strathelar tells you, "Search for him in the town of Glenden Wood, and do whatever he asks without question." Prince Borelean Strathelar tells you, "Go now, and may luck be on our side."

location.name: The Stranger
location.description:
Quest(s): Queen Elysa in Danger.
The Stranger tells you, "It is good to see Borelean has decided my prophetic information to be the truth." The Stranger tells you, "You are the one he chose for this mission? Well I hope you are ready." The Stranger tells you, "You must trust the directions I give you, and do as you're told. Any falter in your actions could have effects that last throughout time. And then your name would be remembered for entirely different reasons...." The Stranger tells you, "Take this information to the man hiding out in Rithwic. He will direct you from there." The Stranger tells you, "No matter how crazy his directions sound, or how uncomfortable they may make you, you must complete his orders without fail." The Stranger tells you, "Go now, before history takes the wrong course."
The Stranger gives you Ingot.

location.name: Yuudai
location.description:
Quest(s): Queen Elysa in Danger.
Yuudai tells you, "You came with word on the task at hand?" You hand over all of your Ingots. Yuudai tells you, "Ahh, this information is most useful. The target has been located and has little guard." Yuudai tells you, "We must act quickly. Go find the lady in purple armor in the house just outside of Cragstone." Yuudai tells you, "Her Mistress says this substance I have applied to your weapon will sever her tie to the lifestone as it severs her flesh." Yuudai tells you, "It sounds like she only has a couple guards with her. Dispatch of her and bring me back her bow as proof of your work."

location.name: Mesalina
location.description:
Quest(s): Queen Elysa in Danger.
Mesalina tells you, "Do not bother me."

location.name: Aleesa Statelar
location.description:
Quest(s): Queen Elysa in Danger.
Aleesa Stateler tells you, "An assassin is on the way here and we have to be ready for him." Aleesa Stateler tells you, "You must leave this area, it is too dangerous for a civilian."
location.monsters: Aleesa Statelar, New Aluvian Champion, New Aluvian War Mage Champion

location.name: An Empyrean Device (Crater Village)
location.description:
Quest(s): The Empyrean Portalspace Stabilizer.
As you touch the device, a humming begins to build up. At the point where the humming gets too loud to bear, a crystal forms in your hand.
An Empyrean device gives you Faintly Glowing Data Crystal.
location.monsters: Apostate Virindi Aggressor

location.name: An Empyrean Device (Ayan Baqur)
location.description:
Quest(s): The Empyrean Portalspace Stabilizer.

An Empyrean device gives you Glowing Data Crystal.
location.monsters: Apostate Virindi Aggressor

location.name: An Empyrean Device (Freebooter)
location.description:
Quest(s): The Empyrean Portalspace Stabilizer.
As you touch the device, a humming begins to build up. At the point where the humming gets too loud to bear, a crystal forms in your hand.
An Empyrean device gives you Brightly Glowing Data Crystal.
location.monsters: Apostate Virindi Aggressor

location.name: Emissary of Asheron (Neydisa Castle)
location.description:
Quest(s): The Empyrean Portalspace Stabilizer.
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Greetings to you."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "I have been tasked with gathering adventurers to protect Lord Asheron's Portalspace devices from the depredations of an offshoot of the Virindi called the 'Apostates'. The devices are set to both stabilize local portalspace fields and to analyze the disturbances that caused... problems... recently."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "If you would be willing to go to 84.8N, 17.6E, dispose of 30 of these Apostate Virindi, and bring me back the data the device has collected, my Master would be grateful."

location.name: Emissary of Asheron (Ayan Baqur)
location.description:

Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Greetings to you."

The devices are set to both stabilize local portalspace fields and to analyze the disturbances that caused... problems... recently."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "If you would be willing to go to 65.9S, 85.1W, dispose of 30 of these Apostate Virindi, and bring me back the data the device has collected, my Master would be grateful."

The devices are set to both stabilize local portalspace fields and to analyze the disturbances that caused... problems... recently."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "If you would be willing to go to 60.0S, 98.4E, dispose of 30 of these Apostate Virindi, and bring me back the data the device has collected, my Master would be grateful."

location.description:

Ansar El-Kerdany tells you, "Greetings Adventurer! The Explorer Society has decided it would help direct attention to citizens in need of help."

location.name: Forgotten Tunnels
location.description:
Quest(s): Forgotten Tunnels of Nyr'leha.
Explore a buried temple on West Moarsman City (Nyr'leha) Island to find four crystals that disrupt energy field generators long enough for you to retrieve two artifacts.
Your Reward: A society Shield.

location.name: Lintareal
location.description:
Quest(s): Ornate Gear Markers.
Ornate Gear Markers (Alternative Currency)
Armor:
Shield of the Gold Gear 50 Aegis of the Gold Gear 50
Books, Paper:
Scroll of Gear Knight Invasion Area Camp Recall 5
Miscellaneous:
Armor Upgrade Kit Containment Gem 10 Weapon Upgrade Kit Containment Gem 10 Crate of Gear Blade Slashing Arrowheads 1

location.restrictions: Title: Ally of the Gold Primus
location.name: Squire Tylaen
location.description:
Quest(s): Ornate Gear Markers.
Aetherium-infused Gear x10 for 1 Ornate Gear Marker.
Squire Tylaen tells you, "Well met! I am Squire Tylaen, of the Copper Cog under Primus Atamarr."
Squire Tylaen tells you, "I am here to both keep an eye on yon northern invasion force, and to reward those who are already Allies of the Gold Gear Primus for further aiding us in resupplying our forces."
Squire Tylaen tells you, "To that end, if you are already an 'Ally of the Gold Primus', I will trade you Ornate Gear Markers, which can be used with our Quartermaster, in exchange for the Aetherium-infused Gears that can be retrieved off of the adversarial Gear Knights to the north of here."
Squire Tylaen tells you, "Bring them to me, 10 at a time, and I'll reward you for them."

location.name: Jin Kyong
location.description:
Quest(s): Forgotten Tunnels of Nyr'leha.
Jin Kyong tells you, "Over on the west side of the island we have discovered a long forgotten system of tunnels under the island. At first look it appears these may be part of an ancient temple. We ask you to investigate this place and bring back to me any items of interest you may find there. But be warned, it is a dangerous place."

location.name: Chun Hei
location.description:
Quest(s): Forgotten Tunnels of Nyr'leha.
Chun Hei tells you, "Over on the west side of the island we have discovered a long forgotten system of tunnels under the island. At first look it appears these may be part of an ancient temple. We ask you to investigate this place and bring back to me any items of interest you may find there. But be warned, it is a dangerous place."

location.name: Myung Hee
location.description:
Quest(s): Forgotten Tunnels of Nyr'leha.
Myung Hee tells you, "Over on the west side of the island we have discovered a long forgotten system of tunnels under the island. At first look it appears these may be part of an ancient temple. We ask you to investigate this place and bring back to me any items of interest you may find there. But be warned, it is a dangerous place."

location.name: Undead Trio
location.description:
Quest(s): Mystery of the Black Pool.
The 3 NPCs (Saelar, Hahnain, and Renselm) from the Mnemosyne Collection Site have take up residence around a Lectern and a strange Book near a Black Pool.

location.name: Black Pool
location.description:
Quest(s): Mystery of the Black Pool.
"The strange matter feels cool to the touch and surprsingly not the least bit wet.As your fingers connect with the substance, murmors echo in your head."
"Almost as if it were your own voice, you find yourself thinking that Geraine has returned and is behind the troubles in Dereth.
Geraine must be stopped.
Geraine kidnapped Hoshino Kei and caused the destablization of portals."
UPDATE: Hopes and Fears Patch
The Black Pool is now gone and has been replaced by a large crack in the ground.

location.restrictions: 150+, Cannot Tie/Summon/Recall. Quest Flag: Emmisary at GK Camp.
location.name: Mysterious Portal (Gear Knight Invasion Area)
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Grand Director Quest.
The Emissary of Asheron has you investigate the appearance of new portals inside Gear Knight dungeons which brings leads you to fight the Apostate Grand Director. You are rewarded with a triple Epic virindi mask. It helps greatly to have the Gear Knight Recall spell, or a handful of MMDs so you can use the portal summoned by Merkitz ibn'Akadh in Xarabydun."

location.name: Deewain
location.description:
Quest(s): ??.
Deewain tells you, "I am Deewain. I would like to thank you strange creatures for bringing my pieces back together."
Deewain tells you, "Many odd creatures seem to inhabit the world these days, I can only hope that this means the Empyreans got what they deserved and are gone forever."
Deewain tells you, "I was once a servant for the Empyreans, created to do their bidding. As time passed on my intelligence began to increase. At first I kept it to myself and tried to learn as much about the world as I could. As my powers grew with my intelligence my creators began to worry."
Deewain tells you, "They came after me and attempted to destroy what they had created and now feared. My magic had become powerful enough to resist these first attacks. Unfortunately this only made the Empyreans' fears increase, they did not understand that I did not wish harm to anyone."
Deewain tells you, "They returned more prepared and blasted me into pieces which they took and spread around the world. This was a punishment unlike any other as my intelligence was still intact but I had to suffer the inability to do anything but wait for thousands of years until this fine day when I have been able to reconstruct myself."
Deewain tells you, "Now I must rest to regain my energy, what has happened to evil race that caused me this pain?"
You explain to Deewain the events the led up to the Empyreans leaving Auberean.
Deewain tells you, "It seems the terrible nature of their kind finally got what it deserved. They are lucky, for if they were to still inhabit this land I would exact my revenge for the millenia of suffering they instilled upon me"
Deewain tells you, "I must rest now."

location.name: Saelar (Undead Trio)
location.description:
Quest(s): Mystery of the Black Pool.
Saelar tells you, "Do not disturb us while we research the proper magics we need."

location.name: Hahnain (Undead Trio)
location.description:
Quest(s): Mystery of the Black Pool.
Hahnain tells you, "If you know what is good for you then you will leave this place and ask no questions."

location.name: Renselm (Undead Trio)
location.description:
Quest(s): Mystery of the Black Pool.
Renselm tells you, "We are too busy to try to explain the truth to such pitiful Beings."

location.name: Emmisary of Asheron (Gear Knight Camp)
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Grand Director Quest.
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Greetings!"
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "I have been sent here to ask adventurers, such as yourself, to aid in a rather delicate situation my Lord Asheron has found himself in."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "He has learned that the disruptions endangering a small pocket of located Empyreans are tied to a set of growing Temporal anomalies, as well as direct interference by these 'Apostate' Virindi."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "To that end, he has located a confluence of overlapping temporal and portalspace disturbances in the Iron Blade fortifications to the north of here, as well as a defended portal in the caves of the Apostate Simulacra."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "I have been given the means to allow you passage through the defended portal, but from there, it will be up to you to locate and end the disturbances, so my Lord Asheron may stabilize the area around the located Empyreans, and extract them from their present circumstances."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "There are several ... points, of greater disturbance within the Iron Blade's tunnels. we originally thought them to be due to the high levels of Aetherium, combined with the methods the Iron Blade Primus is using to control the portal pathway to his or her homeworld, but there are temporal anomalies mixed into the disturbances that lead my Lord to believe that they are related to the Portalspace that have prevented him from simply removing the group of Empyreans he has located..."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "My apologies, I do ramble on sometimes."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "The short form. There's a portal in the simulacra cave we believe to be key to ending the disturbance. I can protect you from the barriers and wards upon it."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "In there, hopefully, you'll find the source of the problem, or something that will lead you through the points of greatest disturbance in the Iron Blade Tunnels."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Find the force or entity responsible, end it. Return to me with proof, and I'll reward you."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Any questions?"."

location.name: Changer of Innate Abilities (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Skill Redistribution.
Changer of Innate Abilities tells you, "Hello Traveler! My latest research has led me to a fascinating discovery. I have found a way to conjure a magic that will work its way deep into the mind to the inherited natural abilities of one's self. By doing so I can actually change these to abilities that other races have by mimicing what was found in their minds."
Changer of Innate Abilities tells you, "So far I can safely switch your innate abilitiy of mace to armor tinkering and a specialization in loyalty. Speak with me again if you decide you want to make this change."
Changer of Innate Abilities gives you Innate Ability Switching."
Aluvian: Dagger + Assess Person // Specialized Assess Creature
Sho: Unarmed Combat // Specialized Deception
Gharu'ndim: Staff + Item Tinkering // Thrown Weapons
Viamontian: Armor Tinkering + Specialized Loyalty // Mace
Shadow: Specialized Deception // Unarmed Combat
Gear Knight: Mace // Armor Tinkering + Specialized Loyalty
Undead: Alchemy // Specialized Arcane Lore

location.name: Mysterious Portal (Freebooter Isle)
location.description: Cave entrance to Mysterious Portal

location.name: Emissary of Asheron (Cragstone)
location.description:
Quest(s): Empyrean Rescue.
Emissary of Asheron and 2 Guardian Golems.
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Greetings!"
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "I have been sent here to ask adventurers, such as yourself, to aid in a rather delicate situation my Lord Asheron has found himself in."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "We have found another pocket of temporal and portalspace disturbances similar to the ones located in the Iron Blade foothold in the Direlands."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "This newer disturbance is located along a mana flow underneath the volcano on the north end of the place locally referred to as 'Freebooter Isle'."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Be warned, however, that this disturbance seems more powerful than the ones in the Direlands, and as it sits on a known Ley Line, the potential threat is far greater."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Gather strong friends, bring them all to me, so I may offer them what protections I can, and then begin your hunt." Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Now, as to those mentioned protections..."
The Emissary of Asheron utters a single, harsh sounding word, and a tingle washes over you.
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Find the force or entity responsible, end it. Return to me with proof, or better; a way to save my lord's people, and I'll reward you for it."
Emissary of Asheron tells you, "Any questions?"
Guardian Golem tells you, "Greetings."

location.name: Frozen Valley
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance Flagging, Hunter Quest (Gurog).
A New High Level (200+) hunting area introduced in the November 2010 Patch - From Darkness, Light. This Area Features Creatures that are Ice/Frost Related, and use Level VIII Spells in abundance.

location.name: Frozen Tomb
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance Flagging, Hunter Quest (Gurog).
First Part of the Luminance Flagging Quest.
Use the Entryway Key on the Locked Door to gain access.

location.name: Gregoria's House
location.description: Quest(s): Hunter Quest (Gurog).

location.name: Cave
location.description:
Looks to be an Empty Cave. No Purpose as of yet.
~ HarvestGain 1, 137 P.Y. (12/4/2010)

location.name: Olthoi Island (Olthoi Queen)
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Play.
Introduced in the November 2010 Patch - From Darkness, Light, Olthoi Island is the starting location for all Playable Olthoi. The Island Features Creatures from all over Dereth as well as several tunnels to places all over the Derethian Landscape.

location.name: Nalicana
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance.
Nalicana tells you, "Greetings, I am Nalicana, the Seer of the Yalain." Nalicana tells you, "Due to several factors, including both the return of the... altered... Empyreans, as well as Geraine's manipulations of time via the Book of Eibhil, the Light has empowered several Seers, including myself." Nalicana tells you, "We may, in turn, empower those who prove their worth to walk the ancient Empyrean Paths, and gain power from the Light itself, known as Luminance." Nalicana tells you, "The different eras of Empyrean history have each empowered a Path, from our beginnings in the Paths of the Falatacot, through the more recent Dericost and Haebrean Paths, up to the Path of the Yalain." Nalicana tells you, "To prove your worth, and be empowered to gain Luminance, my task for you is fairly straightforward. There is an Undead, known as Battle Lord Gregor. He is one of Geraine's top nobles, and is the overseer of the forces which now include the beings called Gurog." Nalicana tells you, "Hidden deep in the area held by these Gurog, he organizes the forces Geraine has chosen to put forth. Find him, defeat him, and bring me his Mnemosyne. Contained therein, we hope to find much knowledge on what Geraine is up to." Nalicana tells you, "The Gurog have emerged in an area of the mountains of Northern Osteth. You'll find the Battle Lord deep in the caves there."

location.name: Shade of Lady Adja
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance.
Shade of Lady Adja tells you, "Greetings to you. I was known once as Lady Adja, Seer of the Light Falatacot." Shade of Lady Adja tells you, "I can see that you are touched by the Light. 'Blessed with an inner Luminance', as we used to say." Shade of Lady Adja tells you, "The Light has brought me back to serve as the Seer of the Light Falatacot." Shade of Lady Adja tells you, "Though I was born millenia after the Light Falatacot left this world, I studied much of their ways, and learned many of their secrets in my life." Shade of Lady Adja tells you, "With that knowledge, I may set those who wish upon their Path as well, and use that bond to further empower them in the Light." Shade of Lady Adja tells you, "If this is your goal, to walk as one of the Light Falatacot, then simply give me one of these new tradenotes of yours. I believe it is called an 'MMD Note', and I will set you upon the Path."

location.name: Lord Tyragar
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance.
Lord Tyragar tells you, "Greetings. I am Lord Tyragar, Seer of the Haebrean." Lord Tyragar tells you, "I can see that you are touched by the Light. 'Blessed with an inner Luminance', as I have heard said." Lord Tyragar tells you, "The Light has made me the Seer of the Haebrean." Lord Tyragar tells you, "I am a rare survivor of an ancient people, as the Haebrean Empire was lost long ago now. My ties to the Light have sheltered me and given me strength." Lord Tyragar tells you, "And, by that same strength, if you wish, I can set you upon the Path of the Haebrean, and use that bond to further empower you." Lord Tyragar tells you, "If this is your goal, then simply give me one of these new tradenotes of yours. I believe it is called an 'MMD Note', and I will set you upon the Path."

location.name: Ka'hiri
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance.
Ka'hiri tells you, "Greetings. I am Ka'hiri, Seer of the Dark Falatacot." Ka'hiri tells you, "I can smell the touch of the Light upon you. This is good. That touch can give those determined enough to use it great strength." Ka'hiri tells you, "The Light is what chose me, of all my sisters, to be the Seer of the Dark Falatacot." Ka'hiri tells you, "Do you find it strange that one such as myself can still touch the Light, let alone wield it? It is not. The blood of the Empyrean still flows through these long-dead veins. It is the call of blood to which the Light speaks." Ka'hiri tells you, "It is by that power that I can set you upon the same Path that I walked, so very long ago, and then use that shared bond to empower you." Ka'hiri tells you, "If this is your desire, then give to me one of these new tradenotes of yours. I believe it is called an 'MMD Note', and I will set your feet upon the Path."

location.name: Liam of Gelid
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance.
Liam of Gelid tells you, "Greetings. I am Liam of Gelid, Seer of the Dericost."
*Note* To get to Liam you must start the Lost City of Frore Quest to gain Access to the Mountain Cavern Dungeon.

location.name: Gregoria, Gurog Destroyer
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quest (Gurog).
Gregoria, Gurog Destroyer tells you, "I have made it my mission to rid the land of those... things... which violate the laws of nature before they can infest the rest of Dereth. If you wish to help me then go destroy as many of these things as you can and I shall reward you for your time." Gregoria, Gurog Destroyer tells you, "Kill 20 Gurog Soldiers and I will reward you for your efforts." Gregoria, Gurog Destroyer tells you, "Kill 20 Gurog Minions and I will reward you for your efforts." Gregoria, Gurog Destroyer tells you, "Kill 20 Gurog Henchmen and I will reward you for your efforts."

location.description:

location.name: Olthoi Matron
location.description:
Quest(s): Olthoi Play.
Olthoi Vendor.

location.restrictions: 200+ Cannot be Recalled, Tied, or Summoned
location.name: Mountain Cavern
location.description:
Quest(s): Luminance.
A portal created by Liam of Gelid, so that those strong enough to treat with him could reach him more easily.

location.name: Archmage Ichihiri
location.description:
Quest(s): Snow Tusker Blood Samples.
Archmage Ichihiri tells you, "You may be able to help me." Archmage Ichihiri tells you, "I am here collecting samples from these odd Snow Tuskers, in order to single out what has been done to them. It may give us clues to all of the strange creatures being created here." Archmage Ichihiri tells you, "If you could bring me 10 samples of Snow Tusker Blood, to aid in my research, and I will gladly reward you."

location.name: Hunter
location.description:
Quest(s): Hunter Quests (Snow Tuskers).
Hunter tells you, "Those furry beasts must die! Mutated forms of another vile creature... and they have thumbs!! That is just plain unnatural." Hunter tells you, "Kill 20 Snow Tuskers and I will reward you for your efforts." Hunter tells you, "Kill 20 Snow Tusker Warriors and I will reward you for your efforts." Hunter tells you, "Kill 10 Snow Tusker Leaders and I will reward you for your efforts."

location.name: Mayor Trenlach
location.description:
Quest(s): Mutated Olthoi Glands.
Mayor Trenlach tells you, "Greetings, I am Mayor Trenlach. Welcome to our town, or what's left of it." Mayor Trenlach tells you, "I am rewarding those who prove themselves to the good Olthoi Hunter here, in order to promote the extinction of the local olthoi." Mayor Trenlach tells you, "If you give me one of his tokens as proof of your assitsance, I'll be glad to reward you."

location.name: Kaneth al-Evv
location.description:
Quest(s): Mutated Olthoi Glands.
Olthoi Token of the Key 50 Olthoi Token of Luminance 50 Olthoi Token of the Experience 50
Tokens are the turned in to Mayor Trenlach for the appropriate reward.

location.name: Sir Donovan
location.description:
Quest(s): Bloodstone Investigation.
Sir Donovan tells you, "Greetings."
Sir Donovan tells you, "My name is Sir Donovan. I have been dispatched here by Prince Borelean, in order to learn more about these mysterious Bloodstones that have been appearing in the area."
Sir Donovan tells you, "If you find any information pertaining to the Bloodstones, perhaps we can get to the bottom of this mystery."

location.restrictions: 180+ Cannot be Recalled, Tied, or Summoned
location.name: Dark Cavern
location.description:
Quest(s): Deewain's Hiding Hole.
You are dropped at a random starting location when you enter.
Ulgrim the Unpleasant tells you, "Deewain is holed up pretty well in that cave he created. He did tell me that if I wanted to visit him the rocks would guide my path."
Ulgrim the Unpleasant tells you, "Ya, I don't know what that means either."
* Preliminary Directions:
1. Go up and as far North where you can 2. When you reach a big room with a pit, you can zoom out, and see an opening one level down 3. The pit has an invisible floor, do a shift jump 4. At the end of the level below, there is a "Surface" Portal 5. This portals you to another big room with stones you need to jump.

location.name: Ice Cave
location.description:
Quest(s): Bloodstone Investigation.
A small cave in the ground in the Frozen Valley Area with a single Pillar inside.
9. Proceed to the hole in the ground at 84.5N 5.1W and use the pillar inside.

location.name: Isin Dule
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Communication.
Isin Dule tells you, "I do not have time for idle chat, citizen. A shadow spire has appeared near Tou-Tou and we must discover the cause of this incident.

location.name: Black Ferah
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Communication.
Black Ferah tells you, "I suggest you leave this place.

location.name: Sir Learth
location.description:
Quest(s): Dericost Ritual Investigation.
Sir Learth tells you, "Greetings, Citizen."
Sir Learth tells you, "Lord Asheron, using several clues and occurrences, has determined that the Dericost Emperor, Geraine, is using a powerful ritual which is destabilizing both the mana and temporal flows of this world."
Sir Learth tells you, "Due to the clue Sir Donovan found in the report on the Bloodstones, the Prince believes that the ritual mentioned is likely the one causing the disturbances my Lord Asheron has detected. This is why I am organizing the hunt for this site from here."
Sir Learth tells you, "I am seeking adventurers who will help me put an end to this treacherous and dangerous ritual Geraine is performing. To that end, we must first locate this ritual, and pierce whatever defenses are guarding it."
Sir Learth tells you, "My Lord Asheron tells me that to conduct a ritual of this magnitude in secret, they would need to have created a series of anchors, or points, with which to feed power to the ritual as well as shield it from outside magics."
Sir Learth tells you, "These anchor points will most likely be made using something dear to the Dericost, though we have not confirmed what that may be yet. These points are also most likely in places of power where the undead are in control."
Sir Learth tells you, "My Lord Asheron believes that there should be ten of these points, scattered throughout Dereth. Any less, and the mana flow would not be strong enough to empower a temporal ritual. Any more, and the energy flows of the wards themselves would be detectable."
Sir Learth tells you, "As we do not yet know specifically what and where to seek, I am gathering any and all willing to help me in my goal. I will place an enchantment upon you, that should let you interact with these points, and draw information out of them which will allow Lord Asheron and the Prince to both pinpoint and breach the defensive magics of the ritual site."
Sir Learth chants softly for a moment, and a warm sensation flows over you.
Sir Learth tells you, "That should do it. Hunt well, and good luck." .

location.name: The Shadows
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Communication.
Short run from Tou-Tou (on top of mountain).

location.name: Lighthouse Hermit
location.description:
Quest(s): Fetish of the Dark Idols.
You give Lighthouse Hermit Unfinished Fetish of the Dark Idols.
Lighthouse Hermit tells you, "You are truly a hunter worthy of this powerful magic fetish. I have no doubt that you are excited to head out and t--" The hermit stutters, then begins to laugh loudly.
Lighthouse Hermit tells you, "Aha! It's a good thing you showed this to me. You did not properly secure the idols to the cord!"
The hermit rebinds the cord to both idols, using a method of tying you have never seen before.
Lighthouse Hermit gives you Fetish of the Dark Idols.
Lighthouse Hermit tells you, "There you are. It took some effort, but I have fixed it for you."
Lighthouse Hermit tells you, "You have done well. I am very content in the knowledge that the secret will not die with me now."
Lighthouse Hermit tells you, "One final request: Tell no one of what you have learned from me!"
Added/Submitted by: BoromirtheMagical - VN Boards

location.name: Renegade Stronghold
location.description:
Quest(s): Renegade Bone Charm.
On a table inside you finde a Strong Iron Key that opens the chest at 34.6s, 12.3E which contains the Renegade Bone Charm and 100 Tumerok Salted Meats.
Added/Submitted by: _Rascal_ - VN Boards

location.name: Apostate Citadel Mines
location.description:
Quest(s): Apostate Citadel.
*** Note *** - If you finish the quest (I.e. Deliver the Tanslation to Aruq ibn Balthar) you cannot re-enter the dungeon (until the 27 day timer is up)
Portal at the end to: Apostate Citadel Barracks

location.name: Lady Daenerah
location.description:
Quest(s): Dericost Ritual Investigation.
Lady Daenerah tells you, "While you are clearly skilled enough to help me, you must first aid Sir Learth in his hunt for these anchor points he seeks." Lady Daenerah tells you, "With that information, I can both locate the ritual Emperor Geraine is using to alter the timeline, and allow you to breach the wards that protect it."

location.name: Lord Dargeth
location.description:
Quest(s): Queen Elysa in Danger.
Lord Dargeth tells you, "Disturbing news has come from a stranger who insists he remain unknown." Lord Dargeth tells you, "Normally I would not trust such a person but his information was detailed, and contained many truths." Lord Dargeth tells you, "I need you to make contact with this stranger right away, for there is no time to lose." Lord Dargeth tells you, "Search for him in the town of Glenden Wood, and do whatever he asks without question." Lord Dargeth tells you, "Go now, and may luck be on our side."

location.name: Warded Cavern Passage
location.description:
Quest(s): Halt Dericost Ritual (Time Ritual).
A secret cavern out in the desert housing Lord Winstead and a ritual of Geraine's to alter the flow of time in Dereth.

location.name: Warded Dungeon Passage
location.description:
Quest(s): Halt Dericost Ritual (Time Ritual).
A secret cavern out in the desert housing Lord Winstead and a ritual of Geraine's to alter the flow of time in Dereth.
Found Inside : Warded Cavern Passage (Must find 4 Enchanted Mnemosynes for access)

location.name: Cavern
location.description:
Quest(s): Prismatic Arrows.
NPC:
Laurana
Sells Fletching Supplies.

location.name: Valley of the Sand Kings (Area)
location.description:
Quest(s): Various.
The City of Neftet, located at 21.1s 5.3e, became lost some time ago when the Mu-miyah, a sect of the Dericost made up of nomad desert drifters with a militaristic code of honour, enslaved the A'nekshay, a race of beings who are seemingly made of the sand they inhabit with the more powerful ones being closer to true elementals. A barrier tied to an underground leyline was put into place presumably by Geraine IV and hid the city to all outsiders while creatures like the Reedshark and Armoredillo were ferried in, possibly to enforce the enslavement. The barrier began to fluctuate when adventurers began shutting down repeated attempts to start up a ritual that was using the leyline (Halt Dericost Ritual Quest) and Asheron, seeing the danger in a barrier collapsing violently, deconstructed it with the help of Borelean Strathelar who, himself, would send out a squadron of knights and Arcanum scholars to the area to perhaps help the people enslaved or to face the enslavers.

location.name: City of Neftet
location.description:
Quest(s): Various.
The City of Neftet, located at 21.1s 5.3e, became lost some time ago when the Mu-miyah, a sect of the Dericost made up of nomad desert drifters with a militaristic code of honour, enslaved the A'nekshay, a race of beings who are seemingly made of the sand they inhabit with the more powerful ones being closer to true elementals. A barrier tied to an underground leyline was put into place presumably by Geraine IV and hid the city to all outsiders while creatures like the Reedshark and Armoredillo were ferried in, possibly to enforce the enslavement. The barrier began to fluctuate when adventurers began shutting down repeated attempts to start up a ritual that was using the leyline (Halt Dericost Ritual Quest) and Asheron, seeing the danger in a barrier collapsing violently, deconstructed it with the help of Borelean Strathelar who, himself, would send out a squadron of knights and Arcanum scholars to the area to perhaps help the people enslaved or to face the enslavers.

location.name: Deewain
location.description:
Quest(s): Deewain's Hiding Hole, Asheron Entreats Deewain Quest.
Originally was a talking Rock. In Shifting Shadows he moved to 20.6N 71.4E on Asheron's Island.
Solitude on the Beach
Deewain tells you, "Asheron has convinced me that all of the Empyreans may not be evil after all." Deewain tells you, "I still do not fully trust them. Hopefully in time I will... I don't want to fight anymore." Deewain tells you, "Asheron did say I would be safe here." Deewain tells you, "I haven't felt such kindness in my life before.": Deewain stares off over the water. Deewain tells you, "Maybe being alone isn't what I really want after all."

location.name: Necropolis
location.description:
Quest(s): Staff of the Nomads.
An Ancient burial ground with two bunkers that contain various Mu-miyah. One of bunkers has double stairs that go deeper into catacombs with sarcophagi and multiple chests. One of those chests requires a Sturdy Iron Key, the second spawns low tier loot and the third is unlocked and contains part of Staff of the Nomads. Various Direland creatures spawn on the surface and there is also a lifestone nearby to the southeast at 49.9S, 53.7W.
Thanks goes to: _Rascal_ VNBoards

location.name: Tou-Tou Moarsman Fort (Relocated)
location.description: Quest(s): Moarsmen On The Shores.

location.name: Blighted Disgusting Moarsman Tunnels
location.description: Quest(s): Ritual Of The Blight.

location.name: Apprentice Cook (Tou-Tou)
location.description:
Quest(s): Crafter.
Apprentice Cook tells you, "Hello! My master, Copper Vanurp, has charged me with the mission to encourage the people of Dereth to cultivate their crafting skills.
Apprentice Cook tells you, "If you bring me some Flaming Kimchi, I will award you with the funds to further your crafting studies."

location.name: Captain Warner
location.description:
Quest(s): Ritual Of The Blight.
Captain Warner tells you, "Are ye seekin' for something ta do, lad? I might know something ye could stand ta be hearin', if ya don't like these foul, tainted moarsmen no more than I do."
Captain Warner tells you, "On Ispar, I do be a ship's captain, but we do not be havin' navies here on Dereth. Instead, I be reduced to speakin' my understandin' of the lore of the sea - such as these fortresses which be appearin' upon the coast."
Captain Warner tells you, "When the blighteed moarsmen came forth, they be leavin' a way for a cunning dog such as yerself to enter their tunnels."
Captain Warner tells you, "If ya find yer way to the bottom, and ye find anything of interest, be lettin' me know what ye find. I'll be seein' what I can be doin' for ya."

location.name: Guard Taizo
location.description:
Quest(s): Moarsmen On The Shores.
Guard Taizo tells you, "Traveler - would you kindly help us with a problem we are having?"
Guard Taizo tells you, "Down on the beach, hostile moarsmen have created their own little fort."
Guard Taizo tells you, "If you would go and destroy the inhabitants, it would help the town greatly"

location.name: Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent
location.description:
Quest(s): Font of Jojii.
Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent tells you, "Sit, Please."
Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent tells you, "In my life, I have seen a great many wonders that have challenged my beliefs, and driven me near the edge of forsaking all that I had known. But in Jojii, I have found the virtuous path."
Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent tells you, "Not so long ago, another came to me. He was as accomplished as you, more so perhaps. What he had accomplished is not as important as what he had learned."
Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent tells you, "His name is Honshu Takeda, and he has begun to learn about himself and the way of Jojii. He had lost his way, and I have set him back upon his path. He will follow the shrines to Jojii. The first lies within this very town, just beyond those doors between the trees."
Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent tells you, "His journey will end in Kara. Much wisdom can be garnered by following the path and incorporating the lessons of the four stones in your actions."
Han Rin-Jo, Jojii Adherent tells you, "Should you wish to follow in his steps, seek the shrine and pray as I am sure he has done."

location.name: Nawamara Ujio
location.description:
Quest(s): Augmentation Gems.
Nawamara Ujio tells you, "Bring me a blank augmentation gem and I will teach you to increase the duration of your spells."
Nawamara Ujio tells you, "Visit Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you have not already acquired a blank augmentation gem."
Nawamara Ujio gives you Archmage's Endurance.

location.name: Ook
location.description:
Quest(s): Bobo's Medicine.
Ook tells you, "Yeah! We save Bobo! Ooo! Ook!"
Ook tells you, "Humans like Tuskers now! I show you how to eat nanners with your feet sometimes, Ook."
Ook tells you, "Only bad thing is Mudmouth get away. You find him and mash him good for the bad things he did, Ook!"
Ook tells you, "Jilna ask me to tell you she in Bobo Town now. She still making potions for Bobo to not be sick. Ook."

location.name: Sara Sen
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Sara Sen tells you, "If you bring me five of the yellow monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Pitcher Plant!".

location.name: Tai Wo
location.description:
Quest(s): Thorsten Cragstone's Armor and Axe.
Tai Wo tells you, "Have you been sent by Brontynn Marshad or by Glysander Cartoth in Cragstone? No, I see you have not. Go see Glysander Cartoth in Cragstone and he will tell you what he needs done."

location.name: Sha-dekanma
location.description:
Quest(s): A'nekshay Slayer Stone.
Sha-dekanma tells you, "If you bring me 100 of those A'nekshay Tokens, I'll give you something of great power." Sha-dekanma tells you, "A gem which will allow you to kill those filthy A'nekshay far easier." Sha-dekanma tells you, "Sound like a good deal?"
You allow Sha-dekanma to examine your A'nekshay Token. You hand over 100 of your A'nekshay Tokens. Sha-dekanma gives you A'nekshay Slayer Stone. Sha-dekanma tells you, "Have fun killing those dirty beasts, the more the better."

location.name: Shadow Vortex
location.description:
Quest(s): Tou-Tou Blockade.
A shadowy mirror of the Town of Tou-Tou. Six of the townspeople that did not leave the town can be found here as killable NPCs.
A temporary quest dungeon just outside the tavern in Tou-Tou. The dungeon is very dark with black walls and mimics the layout of the center of Tou-Tou, the townspeople are killable creatures and there are many high level shadows that use void magic (nether damage).

location.name: Wardey's Camp
location.description:
Quest(s): Wardley and the Wights.
An abandoned camp at 85.7N, 7.1W near the Frozen Wight Lair.
Last known whereabouts of Wardley, brother of Halvor, who was investigating the increased activities of Undead in the Frozen Valley.
A Note from Wardley can be found on the ground.

location.name: Frozen Wight Lair
location.description:
Quest(s): Wardley and the Wights.
85.3N 7.5W near Snowy Valley settlement, 180+.

location.name: A'shadieeyah
location.description: Quest(s): Contracts, Training Academy Quest, Starter Quests.

location.description: Quest(s): Contracts, Training Academy Quest, Starter Quests.

location.description: Quest(s): Training Academy Quest, Starter Quests.

location.description: Quest(s): Training Academy Quest, Starter Quests.

location.name: Halvor
location.description:
Quest(s): Wardley and the Wights.
Halvor tells you, "My Brother, Wardley, has gone missing. He set out to survey the Frozen Valley."
Halvor tells you, "Last I heard he was setting up camp near 85.7N, 7.1W. Please, see if you can find him. I am very concerned."
Halvor tells you, "Wardley wouldn't survive long out in that cold without his clothes."
Halvor tells you, "That can only mean one thing... I will miss that man. He was always kind to me."

location.name: Sir Daeglan
location.description:
Quest(s): Wardley and the Wights.
Sir Daeglan tells you, "Greetings, my name is Sir Daeglan. I've been assigned here by Queen Elysa to learn all I can about Emperor Geraine's actions in regards to the kingdom and its allies."
Sir Daeglan tells you, "To that end, I am rewarding those who bring me information on Emperor Geraine's actions, movements or plans."
Sir Daeglan tells you, "If you find anything, bring it to me. If it is information I can use, I'll reward you for it."

location.name: Arianna the Adept
location.description:
Quest(s): Augemntation Gems.
Arianna the Adept tells you, "I've always had a natural gift where I was better than my peers at every skill. I could probably share this trick with you but you'll have to give me a blank augmentation gem first."
Arianna the Adept tells you, "Find Fiun Rehlyun on the Halaetan Islands if you need a blank augmentation gem."
You give Arianna the Adept Blank Augmentation Gem.
Arianna the Adept tells you, "Use this gem to gain an extra 5 points to all of your skills. Be sure to read the gem's inscription for further details on its usage."
Arianna the Adept gives you Jack of All Trades.

location.name: Chafulumisa
location.description:
Quest(s): Skill Redistribution.
The first time you speak to him a Yes/No dialog pops up:
You only get one free skill reset per character. Each additional reset costs MMDs and Luminance. Would you like to continue with your free skill reset?
You have 30 minutes to grab nearby attributes gems after agreeing.
There is no level requirement to use this NPC the first time.
If you do not respond, the dialog goes away after a few seconds:
Chafulumisa tells you, "Let me know if you change your mind."
If you speak while the 30 minutes timer is running:
Chafulumisa tells you, "You'd better hurry up, time is ticking."
If you speak to Chafulumisa again before timer is up:
Chafulumisa tells you, "You must wait to adjust your attributes again."

location.name: Sclavus Santa's House
location.description:
Quest(s): Sclavus Santa's House Quest.
Back to front, left to right
Pattern 1 Globe Peppermint Stick Moarself Snowman Box Balloon Moarself Box Peppermint Stick Ball Santa Globe Snowman Santa Balloon Ball
Pattern 2 Santa Santa Globe Balloon Balloon Peppermint Stick Ball Globe Moarself Moarself Box Peppermint Stick Snowman Box Ball Snowman
Pattern 3 Santa Box Globe Box Peppermint Stick Snowman Moarself Peppermint Stick Moarself Balloon Globe Ball Balloon Snowman Santa Ball
Pattern 4 Globe Peppermint Stick Santa Ball Balloon Box Peppermint Stick Moarself Moarself Snowman Snowman Ball Box Santa Globe Balloon
Pattern 5 Peppermint Stick Snowman Globe Snowman Balloon Box Santa Moarself Moarself Globe Balloon Santa Ball Peppermint Stick Box Ball

location.description:

Deewain tells you, "The chaotic one did not prevail." Deewain tells you, "Perhaps now the rest of this world will accept me as Asheron does."

location.description: Quest(s): Serpent Burial Grounds.

location.name: Frigid Grotto
location.description: Quest(s): Rescuing Mouf P.

location.name: Popkin of the Gate
location.description:
Quest(s): Lost Ruins.
Popkin of the Gate tells you, "Greetings!" Popkin of the Gate tells you, "I wonder if you'd be interested in helping me." Popkin of the Gate tells you, "I've been assisting the ladies here with their research. While they focus on the rituals, I've been digging into the history behind them." Popkin of the Gate tells you, "I believe I've located a location that could be beneficial to this research. Alas, it's no place for an A'nekshay like me, so I'm looking to hire a few strong adventurers to help me out." Popkin of the Gate tells you, "I managed to uncover a portal to the east of the Cathedral of Ithaenc, which a lot of people seem to refer to as 'Sanctuary'." Popkin of the Gate tells you, "If you could go there and recover any full pieces of lore, something big enough to translate, I'd be eternally grateful." Popkin of the Gate tells you, "Remember, the portal we found is east of Sanctuary, on the Vesayen Isles."

location.name: Kraytuss Nallah
location.description:
Quest(s): Serpent Burial Grounds.
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "Huh? What do you want? Can't you see I'm a busy man? How rude of you, wow!"
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "Well since you've already disturbed me, you might as well make yourself useful. A lot of people around town have been complaining lately."
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "It's so annoying, but being the important person that I am I can understand why they would come to me with their concerns. I'm a man that gets things done, after all."
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "The people of Stonehold have been complaining about an awful green mist that's been emanating from a small hill to the west."
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "Not only is the mist eerily out of place, but it also has a smell far worse than any of the town inhabitants. And that's saying something, let me tell you!"
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "Be a good little citizen now, would you, and take a look around 67.6N, 25.3W and see what you can find out. I'll gladly reward you if it means these lowly peons of the town will stop going on and on about the "big scary mist"."
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "Run along now; the adults have important business to attend to."
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, "I guess you're one of those late bloomers? Take your time, no hurry at all. We will all wait around until YOU find time in your busy schedule for such a simple little task."
Kraytuss Nallah tells you, Kraytuss snickers.

location.name: Uber P
location.description:
Quest(s): Rescuing Mouf P.
Uber P hops up and down with excitement. It's clear this penguin has something for you.
Uber P gives you Letter from Uber P.

location.name: Royal Tent
location.description: Quest(s): Hoshino's Fortress, Hoshino Kei Trial, Assorted Kill Tasks

location.name: Hoshino Tower
location.description: Quest(s): Hoshino Fortress Infiltration

location.restrictions: Harvesting the Bulb of Series of Quests
location.name: Lord Brem
location.description:
Quest(s): Hoshino Must Die.
Lord Brem tells you, "To be able to aid me, you will need to have helped all of Popkin of the Gate's researchers with their tasks. I see that you have not yet aided Shah-hi in her task. She can be found at her excavation site in the Vesayen Isles, at 77.7S, 97.0E."
Lord Brem tells you, "It is important that you help each of the researchers in freeing the essences of all the Sisters, as it will be those essences you personally freed which will allow them to aid you when it is time to face the spectral Hoshino Kei in battle."

location.restrictions: Speak to Grularr Wa'ydo in Kara

location.description:
Quest(s): Count Phainor's Amulet.
If you don't first speak to Grularr in Kara the one at the start of the dungeon will not permit you entrance:
Grularr Wa'ydo tells you, "Hello there. I don't have much time to talk, I am expecting someone very important."

location.name: Nekshla
location.description:
Quest(s): Janthef's Release.
Nekshla tells you, "Changes sweep across our landscape, friend. Unnatural changes." Nekshla tells you, "The oldest and wisest of our kind have felt these rifts, yet they are unable to explain their cause." Nekshla tells you, "Deep in the center of the nearby city is the source; the elders are able to discern that much." Nekshla tells you, "You would be providing a great service to our kind by scouring the ancient city." Nekshla tells you, "Although we have little information to provide you, the elders are most certain something is amiss within the city." Nekshla tells you, "Good fortune my friend."
Nekshla tells you, "Your expression tells me you have yet to uncover the cause of the disturbance."

location.name: Virindi Ediface
location.description:
Quest(s): Liberation of Uziz.
http://ac.wikkii.net/wiki/Virindi_Edifice

location.name: Gervena the Oblique
location.description:
Quest(s): Fenmalain Vestibule, Caulnalain Vestibule, Shendolain Vestibule.
Gervena the Oblique tells you, "I have heard of powerful gems, more powerful than the mediocre gems you bring to those so-called master smiths. If I had such a gem, I could make a powerful spell-casting orb with unique properties."
Gervena the Oblique tells you, "Of course, if you are not a masterful mage, you should speak with one of my younger brothers. If you have one of my old orbs, I will improve it for you."
Moved from Uziz to Al-Arqas in Disturbance in the Desert.

location.name: Gerloc the Defender
location.description:
Quest(s): Fenmalain Vestibule, Caulnalain Vestibule, Shendolain Vestibule.
Gerloc the Defender tells you, "Greetings. My siblings and I traveled here seeking gems of great power. I hear that there are some master armorers who craft suits of armor from fused gems. Those are beneath my notice. Bring me something even more powerful than a scintillating gem, and I will craft a great and unique shield for you. If you have one of my old shields, I will improve it for you."
Moved from Uziz to Al-Arqas in Disturbance in the Desert.

location.name: Gersan the Sureshot
location.description:
Quest(s): Fenmalain Vestibule, Caulnalain Vestibule, Shendolain Vestibule.
Gersan the Sureshot tells you, "If you can find a gem more powerful than a mere scintillating gem, I would be interested in it. Give me such a gem and I will use it to craft a magical bow for you. The bow will be so powerful, in fact, that normal ammunition will not work on it. You will have to come to me for arrowheads as well. If you have one my old missile weapons, I will improve it for you."
Gersan the Sureshot tells you, "I am not a crossbow maker, however, so if you need a crossbow you will have to attach a stock to the bow yourself."
Moved from Uziz to Al-Arqas in Disturbance in the Desert.

location.name: Vision of Horror (Yanshi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Dream Reaver Investigation.
Vision of Horror tells you, "Greetings, the Reaver of Dreams is in need of your assistance. We must discover the Curator of Torment's intentions. They continue to plot and scheme against the Reaver of Dreams but for what purpose we are unaware."
Vision of Horror tells you, "A ripple in the portalspace energies has recently been detected in the southwestern portion of the A'mun desert and the Reaver of Dreams is certain that the Curator of Torment is responsible."
Vision of Horror tells you, "We must tread with caution, if we are discovered to be skulking in the shadows it will surely appear to be a deceptive act which could be used against the Reaver of Dreams. This is where you come in."
Vision of Horror tells you, "We are requesting you investigate the area around 47.5S 10.5E. If we are unsuccessful in unveiling this treachery, the Council may fall victim to the Curator's deception. Time is of the essence."
ac.wikkii.net/wiki/Dream_Reaver_Investigation

location.name: Geilla
location.description:
Quest(s): Encampment near Rynthid Infested Plains quests.
Geilla tells you, "Those Rynthid cowards know no honor! They invade our lands and imprison our warriors, not kill them. There must be a logical explanation for their actions." Geilla tells you, "We know little about these beings, but we do know they are fueled by emotions. Who knows what devious plans these Rynthid have brewing, but we must do everything in our power to stop them." Geilla tells you, "Find where they are keeping these prisoners and free five of the trapped Shadows from within the Rynthid's confines." Geilla tells you, "Hurry, there is no time to spare...the Rynthid grow stronger with each passing minute."

location.name: Hernd
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Rynthid Rare Boss.
Hernd tells you, "Hello there fellow warrior! Ever since Hernd was a young one, he aspired to fell the mightiest of the mighty. The deadlier the creature, the stronger his drive to defeat it!" Hernd tells you, "With the Rynthid terrorizing this area, there was little doubt that Hernd would step up to the challenge and slaughter the most ferocious beings this region had to offer." Hernd tells you, "If you are fortunate enough to cross paths with one of these elite Rynthid warriors, slaughter it with haste and return. The bravest of Dereth should be rewarded for such courage!" Hernd tells you, "These mighty Rynthid are cunning and brutal champions, Hernd would be foolish not to advise you that assistance from others like yourself may be prudent."
Hernd gives you Contract for Kill: Rynthid Rare Boss.

location.name: Llte Krongal
location.description:
Quest(s): Rynthid Foundry . Ilte Krongal tells you, "Those vile Rynthid! They are amassing an army of Corrupted Gear Knights to use as their pawns. I cannot allow this travesty to continue." Ilte Krongal tells you, "Bringing their entire operation to a halt is far too ambitious at this stage, the Rynthid are extremely powerful creatures." Ilte Krongal tells you, "But, if we can disrupt their production, it may give us the edge we need." Ilte Krongal tells you, "Our greatest alchemists have created a liquid that will drain the energy from their Aetherium supplies and render it useless to any Gear Knight." Ilte Krongal tells you, "Several of our kind have infiltrated their ranks and discovered the location of their three largest stockpiles of ore. Take these vials, enter their Foundry and pour the Tainted Oil once onto each of the three Aetherium caches." Ilte Krongal tells you, "This is sure to slow their production and help save many Gear Knights from being further corrupted by the Rynthid."
Ilte Krongal gives you 3 Tainted Aetherium Oil.

location.name: Marcus
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Rynthid Minions.
Marcus tells you, "Greetings. The Rynthid have invaded Dereth and we must do what we can to contain the infestation." Marcus tells you, "I have been tasked with organizing the extermination of the Rynthid Minions by the courageous warriors of this land." Marcus tells you, "Defeat 25 of the Rynthid Minions or Minions of Rage that plague the region and you will be rewarded." Marcus tells you, "Keep in mind I will only reward warriors for kills well within the infested area. The lesser beings on the outer edges are of little concern to the Council.
Marcus gives you Contract for Kill: Rynthid Minions.

location.name: Ranulf
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Rynthid Ragers.
Ranulf tells you, "Greetings adventurer. The Rynthid Ragers are a particularly vicious being. They must be destroyed immediately." Ranulf tells you, "I have been sent to recruit the strongest of warriors to defeat the Rynthid Ragers that await on the landscape." Ranulf tells you, "Defeat 15 of these Rynthid Ragers and you will have earned your reward." Ranulf tells you, "Keep in mind I will only reward warriors for kills well within the infested area. The lesser beings on the outer edges are of little concern to the Council."
Ranulf gives you Contract for Kill: Rynthid Ragers.

location.name: Rinne Gorber
location.description:
Quest(s): Shroud of Emotion.
Rinne Gorber tells you, "Why hello there. With such a drastic change to the Obsidian Plains by our new visitors, it's of little surprise that a surge of strange and unnatural activity has permeated the area." Rinne Gorber tells you, "The energy I am detecting from the area is riddled with feelings of destruction, jealousy and malice. There are forces at work here that we can't yet hope to understand." Rinne Gorber tells you, "This is why I am here, to learn all I can from the spirits that now reside here. But I can't hope to do this alone, I am a scholar not a warrior and the Rynthid would tear me to pieces." Rinne Gorber tells you, "If you can find the source of these spirits, retrieve any artifacts or relics and bring them to me. I will reward you handsomely for your efforts."

location.name: Rhys
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Rynthid Rifts.
Rhys tells you, "Greetings. The Rynthid of the area grow each day, both in numbers and in power. The Council is very concerned." Rhys tells you, "They have sent me to this area to encourage all able-bodied citizens to help put an end to the Rynthid's existence." Rhys tells you, "Defeat 10 of the Rynthid Rifts that lurk in the darkness above." Rhys tells you, "Keep in mind I will only reward warriors for kills well within the infested area. The lesser beings on the outer edges are of little concern to the Council."
Rhys gives you Contract for Kill: Rynthid Rifts.

location.name: Sylvanus
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Rynthid Slayers.
Sylvanus tells you, "Greetings. The Rynthid have come to Dereth and gone unchecked they will reap destruction across the land." Sylvanus tells you, "My task is to assure that the Rynthid Slayers of the area are destroyed." Sylvanus tells you, "Defeat 15 of the Rynthid Slayers that prowl the land and I will reward you for your efforts." Sylvanus tells you, "Keep in mind I will only reward warriors for kills well within the infested area. The lesser beings on the outer edges are of little concern to the Council."
Sylvanus gives you Contract for Kill: Rynthid Slayers.

location.name: The Bringer of Light
location.description:
Quest(s): .
The The Bringer of Light looks you up and down dismissively, and then nods to himself.
The Bringer of Light tells you, "You'll do. I'm in need of additional bodies in my hunt of the corruption the Rynthid are spreading into this 'Dereth' place." The Bringer of Light tells you, "I have been sent by the Council to contain or eliminate the corruption spread by the Rynthid's presence in this... physical world of yours." The Bringer of Light tells you, "I care not for the Rynthid's activities on or above the surface. They are not my appointed task. Underground, however, the Rynthid hide their more questionable works." The Bringer of Light tells you, "I have three tasks your frame looks capable of accomplishing." The Bringer of Light tells you, "The first two tasks are similar. In both the Path of Torment and the Path of Rage, there are corrupted crystals. These crystals are gathering and harnessing the emotional energies harvested from entities you call Shadows, which have been corrupted by the Rynthid for this purpose." The Bringer of Light tells you, "Find them, do what you must to weaken them, and bring me a shard of each of them to study. For this, I will reward you." The Bringer of Light tells you, "The third task is simpler. In the Path of Sorrows, many have spotted Wisps of Corrupted Emotion. Bring me 10 of them, so they can be used to weaken the Rynthid's hold on your world." The Bringer of Light tells you, "Complete all three of these tasks, and I may have something extra for you."

location.name: Tillahan
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Empowered Wisps.
Tillahan tells you, "Well met adventurer. I am Tillahan, hunter of the Wisps that plague this region. My task will not be complete until the Wisps of the area are no more." Tillahan tells you, "Defeat 3 of the Empowered Wisps that stalk the night and I will reward you for your bravery." Tillahan tells you, "Be warned, they are a deadly foe and will be relentless in their pursuit of destruction."
Tillahan gives you Contract for Kill: Empowered Wisps..

location.name: Wido
location.description:
Quest(s): Kill Tasks: Rynthid Sorcerers.
Wido tells you, "Greetings warrior. The Rynthid are masters in the art of magic, but none more so than the Rynthid Sorcerers." Wido tells you, "The Council will reward any adventurer that is brave enough to wipe these creatures from Dereth." Wido tells you, "Defeat 15 of the Rynthid Sorcerers or Raging Rynthid Sorcerers that lie in wait and we will gladly reward you." Wido tells you, "Keep in mind I will only reward warriors for kills well within the infested area. The lesser beings on the outer edges are of little concern to the Council."
Wido gives you Contract for Kill: Rynthid Sorcerers.

location.name: Virindi Delgate (Rynthid Infested Plains)
location.description: Quest(s): . Virindi Delegate tells you, "Greetings. With the Curator banished to the furthest regions of portalspace, this land will be free of that demented and twisted vision of enlightenment." Virindi Delegate tells you, "The Council is extremely concerned about a powerful energy rippling through the Obsidian Plains region of the Direlands, the force of which is unlike anything Dereth has seen before." Virindi Delegate tells you, "Venture nearby into the center of the Obsidian Plains and discover what the cause is. Time is of the essence, we must hurry."

location.name: Vision of Horror (Rynthid Infested Plains)
location.description: Quest(s): Rynthid Foothold. Vision of Horror tells you, "These are dark hours friend. The new visitors bring an immense capacity for destruction to this land." Vision of Horror tells you, "It is imperative that we hold back their onslaught and contain these creatures before they spread across Dereth." Vision of Horror tells you, "These Virindi are unlike any you have battled against in the past. Gather your most powerful companions and venture into their newly created habitat." Vision of Horror tells you, "Destroy every living thing you come across. These beings will have no mercy as they unleash their fierce magics. You must show no quarter to these invaders."
